Matthew 15 1 Hangkani, ria-ra to Parisi hante guru agama Yahudi ngkai Yerusalem mpohirua' -ki Yesus. Rakamaro-i, ra'uli':
Matthew 15 2 "Napa-di pai' ana'guru-nu mpotiboki ada totu'a-tae? Hangaa ngkoni' -ramo, uma-ra mowano ncala' ntuku' atura."
Matthew 15 3 Na'uli' Yesus: "Bangku' koi' -koiwoe', napa pai' nitiboki parenta Alata'ala hi kampotuku' -ni ada-ni moto!
Matthew 15 4 Alata'ala mpo'uli': `Kana tabila' tuama pai' tina-ta.' Pai' na'uli' wo'o: `Hema to mpotipo' tuama ba tina-na kana rapatehi.'
Matthew 15 5  
Matthew 15 6 Hiaa' koi' metudui' hewa toi: uma-pi mingki' tabila' tina pai' tuama-ta, asala ta'uli' -raka hewa toi: `Napa to masipato' kuwai' -kokoi totu'a, mpolia' kutonu-mi hi Alata'ala.' Jadi', Lolita Alata'ala uma nisaile'. Ada-ni moto to nipomobohe.
Matthew 15 7 Hi mali-na-wadi petuku' -ni hi Alata'ala tetu-e! Makono mpu'u lolita nabi Yesaya owi to mpolowa-koi, hewa toi moni-na:
Matthew 15 8 Na'uli' Alata'ala: `Tauna tohe'era mpobila' -a hi wiwi-ra-wadi, nono-ra molaa ngkai Aku'.
Matthew 15 9 Uma ria kalaua-ra mpopue' -a, apa' tudui' -ra tudui' manusia' -wadi, bela tudui' ngkai Aku'.'"
Matthew 15 10 Oti toe, Yesus mpokio' tauna to wori' mpomohui' -i, na'uli' -raka: "Epe-koi bona ni'inca:
Matthew 15 11 Pongkoni' to mesua' hi nganga-ta, bela-hawo toe to mpakada'a-ta hi poncilo Alata'ala. Lolita to mehupa' ngkai nganga-ta, toe-die to mpakada'a-ta hi poncilo Alata'ala-e."
Matthew 15 12 Ngkai ree, tumai-ramo ana'guru-na mpo'uli' -ki: "Nu'inca wa kapeda' nono-ra to Parisi mpo'epe lolita-nue we'i?"
Matthew 15 13  
Matthew 15 14 Na'uli' Yesus: "Pelele' -ramo to Parisi toera lou! Apa' butu nyala hinu'a to uma nahu'a Tuama-ku to hi rala suruga, bate rawuka. To Parisi toe-rale hewa pangkeni to wero, apa' uma ra'incai ohea to makono hilou hi Alata'ala. Pai' ane towero mpotete' hingka towero-na, bate moluli' roduaa-ra mpai' hi rala kinali."
Matthew 15 15 Na'uli' Petrus: "Guru, notohi-kakai lolita rapa' tetu-e we'i."
Matthew 15 16 Na'uli' Yesus: "Ha uma oa' -di nipaha-e!
Matthew 15 17 Pongkoni' to mesua' hi rala nganga-tale kaliliu hi rala ta'i-ta, pai' ngkai ree kaliliu tatadi. Bela-hawo toe to mpakada'a-ta hi poncilo Alata'ala-e.
Matthew 15 18 Aga lolita to dada'a to mehuwu ngkai rala nono-ta pai' to howa' hi wiwi-ta, toe-mi to mpakada'a tauna hi poncilo Alata'ala.
Matthew 15 19 Apa' ngkai rala nono pehupaa' pekiri to dada'a, pai' alaa-na ria to mepatehi, mobualo', mogau' sala' hi tobine ba tomane, manako, mosabi' boa' pai' metipo'.
Matthew 15 20 Kehi to hewa toe-mi lau to mpakada'a tauna hi poncilo Alata'ala. Ane ngkoni' uma leba' mowano, bela-hawo toe to mpakada'a tauna hi poncilo Alata'ala."
Matthew 15 21 Ngkai ree hilou-imi Yesus hi tana' to mohu' ngata Tirus pai' Sidon.
Matthew 15 22 Ria hadua tobine to Kanaan, bela-i to Yahudi. Tobine toei tumai hi Yesus ntora mekio', na'uli': "Pue', muli Magau' Daud! Poka'ahi' -a-kuwo! Ana' -ku tobine kahawia' seta, hangaa uma-ipi katonoa toe-e ria."
Matthew 15 23 Uma-i winihi Yesus. Tumai ana'guru-na mpomohui' -i, ra'uli' -ki: "Guru, popalai-i tobine tetui, daa' kakakio' -kio' -i mpotuku' -ta."
Matthew 15 24 Na'uli' Yesus hi tobine toei: "Alata'ala mpohubui-a tumai mpotulungi muli to Israel-wadi, apa' hewa bima to puha-ramo, uma-rapa mpotuku' konoa Alata'ala."
Matthew 15 25 Ngkai ree, tumai lau-imi tobine toei motingkua' hi nyanyoa Yesus, mpo'uli' -ki: "Pue', tulungi-a-kuwo!"
Matthew 15 26 Na'uli' Yesus: "Uma lompe' mpo'ala' koni' ana' pai' rarora-ki dike'."
Matthew 15 27 Na'uli' tobine toei: "Makono moto-di Pue', aga biasa moto-hawo dike' ngkoni' rupu' koni' to mohewu' ngkai lolo meja' hi tomi pue' -na."
Matthew 15 28 Ngkai ree, Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Bohe mpu'u pepangala' -nu, totina! Wae-pi, jadi' -mi hewa konoa-nu." Hinto'u toe, mo'uri' mpu'u-imi ana' -na.
Matthew 15 29 Oti toe, me'ongko' wo'o-imi Yesus ngkai ree, mako' mewiwi' rano Galilea. Manake' -i lou hi bulu' -na, pai' -i mohura metudui'.
Matthew 15 30 Mo'iko tauna mpotoa' -i, ngkeni to pungku, to keru, to wero, to uma howa' mololita pai' to peda' ntani' -na wo'o. Ratu'u-ra hi nyanyoa Yesus, pai' napaka'uri' -ra.
Matthew 15 31 Konce-ramo ntodea mpohilo hawe'ea tauna to napaka'uri' Yesus: tauna to uma howa' mololita, howa' -mi mololita, to keru mo'uri' -mi, to pungku momako' -mi, to wero pehilo-mi. Toe pai' mpobila' -ramo Alata'ala to rapue' to Israel.
Matthew 15 32 Oti toe Yesus mpokio' ana'guru-na, na'uli' -raka: "Tuna-kuna nono-ku mpohilo tauna to wori' toera lau. Tolu eo-ramo dohe-ku, uma ria pongkoni' -ra. Uma lau nono-ku mpohubui-ra nculii' ntali oro' -ra, molinga' -ra mpai' hi ohea."
Matthew 15 33 Ra'uli' ana'guru-na: "Beiwa-mile, apa' wao' -di hi rehe'i-e lau. Tarata hiapa-mile pongkoni' tapokoni' -raka tauna to hewa toe lau kawori' -rae?"
Matthew 15 34 Yesus mpekune' -ra: "Hangkuja roti to ria hi koi' -e?" Ratompoi' -i: "Pitu meha', pai' bau' uru to kedi' ba hangkuja ma'a-wadi."
Matthew 15 35 Ngkai ree nahubui-ramo tauna to wori' mohura hi tana'.
Matthew 15 36 Na'ala' -mi roti to pitu pai' bau' kedi' to ba hangkuja ma'a toe, pai' -i mpo'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala. Oti toe napihe-pihe-mi pai' nawai' -raka ana'guru-na bona rabagi-raka tauna to wori' toera.
Matthew 15 37 Ngkoni' -ramo omea duu' -ra bohu. Ka'oti-ra ngkoni', ana'guru-na mporumpu toro-na, pitu luncu-pi.
Matthew 15 38 Kawori' -ra to ngkoni' nto'u toe, opo' ncobu tomane, uma tebila' tobine pai' ana'.
Matthew 15 39 Oti toe, nahubui-ramo nculii' hilou hi tomi-ra, pai' -i mpohawi' sakaya hilou hi tana' Magadan.
Matthew 16 1 Ria wo'o ba hangkuja dua to Parisi pai' to Saduki rata hi Yesus doko' mposori-i. Merapi' -ra hi Yesus, ra'uli' -ki: "Babehi anu to mekoncehi bona monoto ki'inca kangkai Alata'ala-nu."
Matthew 16 2 Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Ane neo' limpa-mi eo pai' mperelei langi', ni'uli': `Morawa mpai' raoa.'
Matthew 16 3 Ane mepupulo ni'uli': `Udaa mpai' toi-e, bo mperelei pai' mojimuu' -di oo lau.' Ni'inca lia mpelence raoa. Aga uma ni'incai mpelence napa to nababehi Alata'ala tempo toi.
Matthew 16 4 Uma mowo kadada'a-ni, nisapuaka oa' -pidi Alata'ala! Merapi' -koi tanda mekoncehi. Aga uma hanyalaa tanda mekoncehi to rapopohiloi-kokoi. Sampale-wadi to rapopohiloi-kokoi, tanda hewa to jadi' hi nabi Yunus owi." Oti toe malai-imi mpalahii-ra.
Matthew 16 5 Hilou-ramo Yesus hante ana'guru-na medipo rano, aga ana'guru-na uma mpokiwoi ngkeni boku. Ngkai ree, na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka:
Matthew 16 6 "Pelompehi, mo'inga' -inga' -koi hi ragi to Parisi pai' to Saduki-e'!"
Matthew 16 7 Aga uma ra'incai batua-na walatu toe, helee momepololitai moto-ramo, ra'uli': "Pai' na'uli' hewa toe-le, apa' uma takiwoi ngkeni roti we'i."
Matthew 16 8 Ntaa' na'inca-di Yesus napa to ra'uli' ana'guru-nae, toe pai' na'uli' -raka: "Napa pai' ntora mpololita ka'uma-ni ngkeni roti-e! Kura' rahi pepangala' -ni!
Matthew 16 9 Ko'ia oa' -tano nipaha-e! Ha uma-pi nikiwoi roti to lima meha' to kupokoni' -raka tauna to lima ncobu-e? Pai' hangkuja luncu-pi toro-na to nirumpu?
Matthew 16 10 Pai' beiwa wo'o hante roti to pitu meha' kupokoni' -raka tauna to opo' ncobu-e? Hangkuja luncu wo'o-pi toro-na to nirumpu?
Matthew 16 11 Napa pai' uma oa' nipaha kabela-na roti mpu'u to ku'uli' -e! Mo'inga' -inga' -koi hi ragi to Parisi pai' to Saduki."
Matthew 16 12 Lako' ra'inca-di we'i ana'guru-nae kabela-na ragi to ragalo-ki roti to na'uli' Yesus-e. Patuju lolita-na, bona mo'inga' -inga' -ra hi tudui' to Parisi pai' to Saduki.
Matthew 16 13 Hilou-ramo Yesus hante ana'guru-na hi tana' to mohu' hi Kaisarea Filipi. Hi ree mepekune' Yesus hi ana'guru-na: "Ntuku' ponguli' -ra ntodea, hema-a Aku' Ana' Manusia' toi-e?"
Matthew 16 14 Ratompoi' ana'guru-na: "Ria-ra to mpo'uli' Yohanes Topeniu' -ko tuwu' nculii'. Ria wo'o-ra to mpo'uli' Iko hadua nabi to owi mehupa' nculii', hewa nabi Elia, nabi Yeremia, ba nabi to ntani' -na."
Matthew 16 15 Napekune' tena-ra, na'uli': "Hiaa' koi' -koiwo mpo'uli' hema-a Aku' toi-e?"
Matthew 16 16 Natompoi' Simon Petrus: "Iko-mile Magau' Topetolo' -e, Ana' Alata'ala to Tuwu'."
Matthew 16 17 Na'uli' Yesus: "Marasi' mpu'u-ko, Simon ana' Yunus, apa' bela manusia' to mpopo'incai-ko tetu-e, Tuama-ku to hi rala suruga-hana.
Matthew 16 18 Jadi', toe pai' rahanga' Petrus-ko-- batua-na `watu.' Pai' hi lolo parawatu tohe'i kuwangu tomi-ku-- batua-na, kurumpu hawe'ea tauna to mpopangala' -a. Hawe'ea kuasa anudaa' uma mpokulei' mpodagi-ra.
Matthew 16 19 Kuwai' -ko kuasa mpototu'ai ntodea Alata'ala. Napa to nubotuhi hi dunia', tetu wo'o to nabotuhi Alata'ala hi rala suruga: Ane nu'uli' neo', Alata'ala-mi to mpo'uli' neo'. Ane nu'uli' ma'ala moto, Alata'ala-mi to mpo'uli' ma'ala moto."
Matthew 16 20 Oti toe, Yesus mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Neo' ulu ni'uli' hi hema-hema ka'Aku' -na Magau' Topetolo'."
Matthew 16 21 Ntepu'u ngkai tempo toe, Yesus mpakanoto hi ana'guru-na napa to kana jadi' hi woto-na. Na'uli' -raka: "Kana hilou-a hi Yerusalem. Hi ria mpai' totu'a ngata, imam pangkeni hante guru-guru agama mpobalinai' -a pai' mposesa' -a. Rapatehi-a mpai', aga hi eo katolu-na tuwu' nculii' moto-a."
Matthew 16 22 Aga Petrus mpo'ai' -i hi ncori-na pai' nakorai' -i na'uli': "Neo' Pue'! Kuperapi' hi Alata'ala bona nawi'iha tetu lau ngkai Pue'."
Matthew 16 23 Hampe'ili' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki Petrus: "Palai-ko topesori! Doko' nulawa' -a, bona ngalai' neo' -a mpotuku' konoa Tuama-ku? Pekiri-nu tetu-le pekiri manusia', bela pekiri Alata'ala."
Matthew 16 24 Oti toe Yesus mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Hema to doko' mpotuku' -a kana mpobahaka konoa-na moto, pai' kana napaha'a kaju parika' -na-- batua-na: kana natuku' hawa' -ku nau' napopate-ki. Oti toe-di pai' lako' ma'ala-i mpotuku' -a.
Matthew 16 25 Hema to mpentaei konoa-na moto, uma-i mpai' mporatai katuwua' to lompe'. Aga hema to mpobahaka konoa-na moto sabana petuku' -na hi Aku', nau' napopate-ki, hi'a mpai' to mporata katuwua' to lompe'.
Matthew 16 26 Napa kalaua-na tarumpu hawe'ea ka'uaa' dunia', ane uma taratai katuwua' to lompe' hi eo mpeno-na. Apa' uma ria napa-napa to ma'ala tasula' -ki katuwua' to lompe' toe.
Matthew 16 27 Bate rata mpai' tempo-na, Aku' Ana' Manusia' tumai ngkai suruga mpopehuwu kabaraka' -ku, to hewa kabaraka' Tuama-ku, pai' wori' wo'o mala'eka mpodohei-a. Nto'u toe mpai', bate kuhiwili kehi butu-butu dua tauna.
Matthew 16 28 Mpu'u-mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: ngkai olo' -ni koi' toi, ria-koi mpai' to ko'ia mate kako'ia-na nihilo-a, Aku' Ana' Manusia', rata jadi' Magau'."
Matthew 17 1 Ono mengi ngkai ree, Yesus mpobawai tolu ana'guru-na hilou dohe-na hi bulu' to molangko. Ana'guru to tolu toera: Petrus, Yakobus pai' Yohanes ompi' -na Yakobus. Muntu' Yesus hante ana'guru-na to tolu toera-wadi to hi ria.
Matthew 17 2 Bula-ra hi ria, mobali' -mi lence-na. Lio-na mehini hewa eo, pai' pohea-na mengea' meringkila'.
Matthew 17 3 Muu-mule' rahilo-rawo ana'guru-nae, ria wo'o rodua nabi to owi mpololitai Yesus. Nabi to rodua toera, Musa pai' Elia.
Matthew 17 4 Ngkai ree Petrus mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Pue', lompe' lia-ta mo'oha' hi rehe'i. Ane nupokono Pue', kubabehi tolu bamaru' hi rehe'i: hameha' bagia-nu Pue', hameha' bagia-na Musa pai' hameha' wo'o bagia-na Elia."
Matthew 17 5 Bula-na mololita-pidi Petrus, muu-mule' hompo-mi limu' to mehini mpokamoui-ra, pai' ngkai rala limu' toe mpo'epe-ra topololita to mpo'uli': "Hi'a toi-mi Ana' -ku to kupe'ahi'. Hi'a mpakagoe' nono-ku. Pe'epei-mi lolita-na!"
Matthew 17 6 Wae kara'epe-na ana'guru-na lolita toe, tetumpopo' -ramo hi tana' apa' me'eka' lia-ra.
Matthew 17 7 Tumai-i Yesus mpoganga-ra, na'uli' -raka: "Memata-mokoi, neo' me'eka'!"
Matthew 17 8 Kamenaa-ra, uma-pi ria hewa to rahilo-e we'i, muntu' Yesus-damo.
Matthew 17 9 Pana'u-ra ngkai lolo bulu' toe, Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Neo' ulu ni'uli' hi hema-hema napa to nihilo we'i duu' -na Aku', Ana' Manusia', rapotuwu' nculii' ngkai kamatea."
Matthew 17 10 Mepekune' -ramo ana'guru-na, ra'uli': "Napa pai' guru agama mpo'uli' nabi Elia ncala' -di to ri'ulu rata, pai' lako' rata-idi Magau' Topetolo' -e?"
Matthew 17 11 Na'uli' Yesus: "Makono mpu'u-di, Elia kana rata mperi'ulu, apa' hi'a to mporodo hawe'ea-na.
Matthew 17 12 Aga ku'uli' -kokoi, mpolia' rata-imile Elia-e, aga pangkeni ngata-ta uma mpo'incai-i. Ra'ewa lau-idi ntuku' konoa-ra. Wae wo'o mpai' Aku' Ana' Manusia' ra'ewa ntuku' konoa-ra."
Matthew 17 13 Ngkai ree, rapaha-mi ana'guru-na lolita Yesus-e we'i: to rarapai' -ki nabi Elia, hi'a-mi Yohanes Topeniu'.
Matthew 17 14 Kanculii' -ra Yesus hante ana'guru-na to tolu toera mpohirua' -raka ntodea, ria hadua tomane tumai mowingkotu' hi nyanyoa-na, mpo'uli' -ki:
Matthew 17 15 "Pue', poka'ahi' -ka-kuwo ana' -ku. Mohaki' limpuangaa-i, pai' jau-i molimpu' nakeni haki' -na. Jau-i modungka hi rala apu, jau wo'o-i modungka hi rala ue.
Matthew 17 16 Kukeni-imi hi ana'guru-nu, aga uma-di rapakulei' mpaka'uri' -i."
Matthew 17 17 Na'uli' Yesus: "Uma mowo-koie'! Ko'ia oa' -tano mepangala' -koie! Mesapuaka oa' -pidi-koi mposapuaka konoa Alata'ala! Ni'uli' -koina hangkuja tena-pi kahae-ku dohe-ni, hangkuja tena-pi kahae-na kupengkatarii kalente pepangala' -nie! Keni tumai ana' tetui!"
Matthew 17 18 Ngkai ree, Yesus mpopetibo' anudaa' to mpopedahi ana' toei. Palai-nami anudaa', pai' mo'uri' -imi-hawo topeda' toei.
Matthew 17 19 Oti toe, Yesus pai' ana'guru-na malai ngkai ree, pai' ana'guru-na mpekune' -i, ra'uli': "Guru, napa pai' uma kipakulei' mpopalai anudaa' toei-e we'i?"
Matthew 17 20 Na'uli' Yesus: "Wae moto-hawo-le, apa' hangkedi' rahi pepangala' -nie. Ku'uli' -kokoi: ane rii-ria-mi pepangala' -ta nau' hangkutuno' -wadi, uma ria to uma-na madupa'. Ma'ala ta'uli' -ki bulu' toe mai: `Mentoli-ko ngkai retu!' bate mentoli-ile. ((
Matthew 17 21 Aga seta to hewa toe we'i, sampale-i malai ane mosampaya pai' mopuasa' -koi.))"
Matthew 17 22 Nto'u Yesus hante topetuku' -na morumpu hi Galilea, na'uli' -mi Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Aku' Ana' Manusia', ratonu-a mpai' hi kuasa manusia'.
Matthew 17 23 Rapatehi-a mpai', aga hi eo katolu-na tuwu' nculii' -a." Peda' lia-mi nono topetuku' -na mpo'epe lolita-na.
Matthew 17 24 Karata-na Yesus hante topetuku' -na hi ngata Kapernaum, rata to mpesingarai' paja' Tomi Alata'ala hi Petrus pai' mpekune' -i: "Ha nabayari moto-hawo Guru-ni paja' Tomi Alata'ala-e, ba uma-di?"
Matthew 17 25 Na'uli' Petrus: "Nabayari moto!" Ngkai ree, nculii' -imi Simon Petrus hilou hi tomi po'ohaa' -ra. Rata hi ria, ko'ia-di napoka'alai mololita-e, ncaliu Yesus-mi mpekune' -i: "Simon, beiwa-kowo pomporata-nu: hema to kana mpobayari paja' pai' pepue' hi raja to mpokuasai ngata doo? Ntodea-na moto-di, ba pue' ngata to nakuasai-di?"
Matthew 17 26 Na'uli' Petrus: "Tantu pue' ngata to nakuasai to kana mpobayari." Na'uli' Yesus: "Ane wae, ntodea-na moto uma mingki' mpobayari. Wae wo'o kita' to jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala, uma-ta mingki' mpobayari paja' Tomi Alata'ala.
Matthew 17 27 Aga nau' wae, agina mobayari moto-tamo, bona neo' kedi' nono-ra hi kita'. Jadi', hilou-moko hi rano mopeka. Ala' bau' uru to lomo' -na nupeka. Nurata doi hi rala nganga-na hono' pobayari paja' hi kita' rodua. Ala' doi tetu, pai' nubayari-ki paja' Tomi Alata'ala."
Matthew 18 1 Hinto'u toe, tumai-ra ana'guru Yesus mpomohui' -i, ra'uli': "Pue', ane jadi' Magau' -poko mpai', hema to meliu kabohe tuwu' -na hi rala Kamagaua' -nu?"
Matthew 18 2 Yesus mpokio' hadua ana' to kedi', napopokore hi laintongo' -ra,
Matthew 18 3 pai' na'uli' -raka: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: ane uma nibalii' kehi-ni pai' jadi' hewa ana' to kedi' toii, uma-koi mpai' jadi' ntodea Alata'ala.
Matthew 18 4 Hema to mpakadingki' nono-na pai' jadi' hewa ana' to kedi' tohe'ii, hi'a-mi to bohe mpu'u tuwu' -na ngkai hawe'ea ntodea Alata'ala.
Matthew 18 5 Hema to mpotarima hadua ana' to kedi' hewa ana' toii sabana petuku' -na hi Aku', batua-na Aku' -mi to natarima.
Matthew 18 6 "Aga hema to mpopanawu' hadua ana' to kedi' alaa-na uma-ipi mepangala' hi Aku', bohe mpu'u pehuku' Alata'ala hi tauna tetui. Agina lau-pi hameha' watu po'ahaa' to bohe ratoe hi wuroko' -na pai' -i ratene' hi rala tahi'.
Matthew 18 7 Silaka tauna hi dunia' toi, apa' wori' to mpopanawu' -ra. Bate ria mpu'u-di to mepanawu' -e, aga silaka-ra tauna to mepanawu' toera.
Matthew 18 8 "Ane rapa' -na pale-ta hamali ba witi' -ta hamali to mpakeni-ta mojeko', pua' lau-mi pai' petadi. Agina hamali-damo pale-ta ba witi' -ta, asala mporata-ta katuwua' to lompe' dohe Alata'ala. Agina lau-pi toe, ngkai palea ntimalia pai' witia' ntimalia, hiaa' ka'omea-na ratadi-ta hi rala apu to jela' ncuu.
Matthew 18 9 Pai' ane rapa' -na mata-ta hamali to mpakeni-ta mojeko', jungki' pai' petadi. Agina hamali-wadi mata-ta pai' mporata katuwua' to lompe' moto-ta dohe Alata'ala, ngkai mataa ntimalia, hiaa' ka'omea-na ratadi-ta hi rala apu naraka.
Matthew 18 10 "Jadi', pelompehi mpu'u-koi, neo' -koi uma mposaile' ana' -ana' to kedi' hewa ana' tohe'ii, nau' hadua. Apa' mpu'u-mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: mala'eka to mpodoo-ra tida ncuu hi nyanyoa Tuama-ku to hi rala suruga. ((
Matthew 18 11 Apa' patuju-ku Aku' Ana' Manusia' tumai hi dunia', bona mpopali' tauna to molaa ngkai Alata'ala pai' mpohore-ra ngkai huku' jeko' -ra.))
Matthew 18 12 "Beiwa pomporata-ni? Ria hadua tauna to ria bima-na ha'atu ma'a-na. Ane moronto hama'a, napa to nababehi? Tantu napalahii bima-na to sio mpulu' sio hi panapa bulu', pai' -i hilou mpopali' to hama'a to moronto toei.
Matthew 18 13 Pai' ane narua' nculii' -ipi, mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi meliu-mi kagoe' -na mpokagoe' bima to hama'a toei, ngkai bima-na to sio mpulu' sio to uma-ra-rana moronto.
Matthew 18 14 Wae wo'o Tuama-ni hi rala suruga, uma napokonoi ane ria hadua ngkai ana' to kedi' toi to molaa ngkai Hi'a.
Matthew 18 15 "Ane ria ompi' hampepangalaa' -ta to masala' hi kita', hilou-ta mpohirua' -ki, pai' uli' -ki sala' -na. Tababehi toe hante uma ria to ngincai, muntu' kita' tau rodua-wadi. Ane napangala' lolita-ta, lompe' nculii' -mi pohintuwu' -ta.
Matthew 18 16 Aga ane uma-i dota mpangala' lolita-ta, po'ema' hadua ba rodua dohe-ta hilou mpololitai-i. Apa' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' owi te'uki' hewa toi: `Ane ria tauna to rapakilu mpobabehi sala', kana ria nte rodua ba tolu to jadi' sabi', bona monoa' -mi kara-kara-na.'
Matthew 18 17 Ane uma-i dota mpangala' lolita sabi' toera, bua' -imi hi hawe'ea ompi' hampepangalaa'. Ane uma oa' napangalai' nau' hawe'ea ompi' hampepangalaa' mpoparesai' -i, pelele' lau-imi-hana, taponcawa hewa tauna to uma mpo'incai Alata'ala lau-imi, pai' hewa tauna to dada'a kehi-ra.
Matthew 18 18 "Penonoi-koi! Napa to nibotuhi hi dunia', tetu wo'o to nabotuhi Alata'ala hi rala suruga: Ane koi' mpo'uli' neo', Alata'ala-mi to mpo'uli' neo'. Ane koi' mpo'uli' ma'ala moto, Alata'ala-mi to mpo'uli' ma'ala moto.
Matthew 18 19 Ku'uli' wo'o: ane ria-koi hi dunia' toi nte rodua to hintuwu' mekakae mperapi' ba napa-napa, posampaya-ni toe natompoi' Tuama-ku to hi rala suruga.
Matthew 18 20 Apa' hiapa tauna morumpu sabana Aku', nau' rodua ba tolu-ra-wadi, ria-a dohe-ra."
Matthew 18 21 Oti toe, Petrus mpomohui' Yesus pai' mpekune' -i, na'uli': "Pue', ane ompi' hampepangalaa' -ku masala' hi aku', hangkuja ngkani kana ku'ampungi-i? Nte pitu ngkani?"
Matthew 18 22 Na'uli' Yesus: "Uma wule' pitu ngkani-wadi. Nau' mo'atu-atu ngkani-nai masala' hi kita', kana ta'ampungi-i.
Matthew 18 23 Apa' Alata'ala hewa magau' to hi rala lolita rapa' toi: Ria hadua magau' doko' mpowile inta batua-na.
Matthew 18 24 Lomo' -na, ria hadua batua rakeni hi nyanyoa-na to mo'inta hi juta-na.
Matthew 18 25 Uma mpu'u-hawo nakulei' mpobayari inta-na toe. Jadi', mohawa' -mi magau' toei, na'uli': `Pobalu' lau-imi batua tetui hante ana' -na pai' tobine-na pai' hawe'ea rewa-na, pobayari-ki inta-na.'
Matthew 18 26 "Powingkotu' -nami batua toei hi nyanyoa magau', mpopepoka'ahi', na'uli': `Mosabara-ko Magau', kubayari moto-kuwo mpai' inta-ku!'
Matthew 18 27 "Ngkai ree, metumu' lau-mi ahi' -na magau' mpoka'ahi' batua-na toei. Nabahaka-imi pai' na'uli' -ki: `Inta-nu, uma-pi mingki' nubayari.'
Matthew 18 28 "Palai-na batua toei, napohirua' -ki hadua hingka batua-na to mo'inta hi hi'a hi ncobu-na-wadi. Napentoe doo-na toei, nabaga' pai' na'uli' -ki: `Bayari omea-mi inta-nu!'
Matthew 18 29 "Powingkotu' -nami-hawo doo-na toei mpopepoka'ahi', na'uli': `Mosabara-ko ulu bale, kubayari moto-kuwo mpai' inta-ku!'
Matthew 18 30 Aga uma napangalai' pomperapia' -na toe. Napopesua' lau-imi hi rala tarungku' duu' -na tebayari omea inta-na.
Matthew 18 31 "Karahilo-na batua to ntani' -na napa to jadi' tohe'e, peda' lia-mi-rawo nono-ra. Hilou-ramo hi magau' mpo'uli' kehi batua toei-e we'i.
Matthew 18 32 Mpo'epe toe we'i, kamoroe-nami magau'. Mpohubui-i tauna hilou mpokio' batua to dada'a gau' -na tohe'ei. Karata-na, na'uli' -ki: `Dada'a lia-ko! Inta-nu kupori-mi ngkai rala buku-ku, apa' moranempale-moko hi aku'.
Matthew 18 33 Napa-di-kona pai' uma nupoka'ahi' hingka batua-nu, hewa aku' mpoka'ahi' -koe!'
Matthew 18 34 Uma-pi mowo roe-na magau'. Batua to dada'a gau' -na toei napopesua' hi rala tarungku' duu' -na tebayari oti inta-na."
Matthew 18 35 Napohudu Yesus lolita rapa' toe, na'uli': "Wae wo'o Tuama-ku to hi rala suruga mpobabehi hi koi' -e, ane uma-koi mpo'ampungi doo-ni ngkai nono-ni mpu'u."
Matthew 19 1 Kahudu-na Yesus mpololita hawe'ea toe, malai-imi ngkai tana' Galilea hilou hi tana' Yudea to hi dipo ue Yordan.
Matthew 19 2 Wori' tauna mpotuku' -i, pai' to peda' napaka'uri'.
Matthew 19 3 Ria ba hangkuja dua to Parisi tumai mposori Yesus. Rapekune' -i: "Ntuku' atura agama-ta, ba ma'ala moto-hawo tomane mpogaa' -ki tobine-na nau' to uma kojerea'?"
Matthew 19 4 Natompoi' Yesus: "Kiwoi napa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' owi: lomo' -na Topejadi' mpajadi' hadua tomane pai' hadua tobine.
Matthew 19 5 Pai' oti toe na'uli': `Tomane kana mpalahii tina pai' tuama-na, pai' kana tuwu' hintuwu' hante tobine-na, bona hira' tau rodua toe jadi' hewa hadua lau-ra-damo.'
Matthew 19 6 Jadi', hi poncilo Alata'ala, tau hancamoko uma-pi rodua, hadua lau-ramo. Toe pai' ku'uli' -kokoi: ane ntoa' Alata'ala mpoposidai' -ra, manusia' uma ma'ala mpogaa' -ra."
Matthew 19 7 Mehono' -ra to Parisi: "Ane wae, napa pai' Musa mohawa' bona tomane mpowai' sura pogaa' hi tobine, ane doko' napogaa' -ki?"
Matthew 19 8 Na'uli' Yesus: "Musa mpiliu-koi mogaa' -le, apa' ngkai kamotu'a nono-ni, uma tuduia'. Aga kakoo-kono-na, uma hewa toe ngkai lomo' -na.
Matthew 19 9 Bona ni'inca: hema to mpogaa' -ki tobine-na pai' -i motobinei to ntani' -na, mobualo' -i-hana. Sampale-di ane mobualo' tobine-nae, ma'ala-mi napogaa' -ki."
Matthew 19 10 Ngkai ree, ana'guru-na mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Ane wae-di kamokoro-na ada poncamoko, agina lau-pi-hawo neo' ncamoko."
Matthew 19 11 Na'uli' Yesus: "Uma hawe'ea tauna bisa ntarima lolita tetu. Aga ria moto tauna to napakatantu Alata'ala bona uma-ra ncamoko.
Matthew 19 12 Ria tauna to uma ncamoko apa' lawi' hewa toe-hawo ngkai kaputu-ra. Ria wo'o to uma ncamoko apa' babehia tau ntani' -na. Ria wo'o to uma ncamoko apa' lawi' kadota-ra moto-rawo, bona mologa-ra mpobago bago Alata'ala. Hema to mpakule' mpotuku' tudui' toi, lompe' ane natuku'."
Matthew 19 13 Hangkani, ria tauna to mpokeni ana' -ra hi Yesus bona najama-ra pai' naposampayai. Aga ana'guru-na mpokaroe tauna toera.
Matthew 19 14 Yesus mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Pelele' moto-ra ana' tetura tumai hi Aku', neo' -ra nitagi. Apa' tauna to hewa toe-ramo to jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua' -na."
Matthew 19 15 Ngkai ree, najama-ramo ana' toera, pai' -ra nagane'. Oti toe, malai-imi ngkai ree.
Matthew 19 16 Hangkani, ria hadua tomane rata hi Yesus mpopekune' -i: "Guru, kehi napa to lompe' kana kubabehi bona mporata-a katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-nae?"
Matthew 19 17 Na'uli' Yesus: "Napa pai' nupekune' -a beiwa kehi to lompe' -e? Uma ria ntani' -na to lompe', hadua Alata'ala-wadi. Ane doko' mporata katuwua' to lompe' -ko, tuku' -mi parenta Alata'ala."
Matthew 19 18 Mepekune' tena-i tau tohe'ei: "Parenta to'uma?" Natompoi' Yesus: "Neo' mepatehi, neo' mobualo', neo' manako, neo' mosabi' boa',
Matthew 19 19 kana tabila' tina tuama-ta, pai' poka'ahi' doo-ta hewa kampoka'ahi' -ta woto-ta moto."
Matthew 19 20 Na'uli' kabilasa toei: "Hawe'ea parenta tetu lau, kutuku' omea-mi. Napa-pi to kana kubabehi?"
Matthew 19 21 Na'uli' Yesus: "Ane doko' -ko mpotuku' Alata'ala hante karoli' -roli' nono-nu, lou-moko ulu mpobalu' rewa-nu, pai' doi oli-na wai' -raka tokabu. Ane nubabehi hewa toe, bohe mpai' rasi' to nurata hi rala suruga. Oti toe, pai' tumai-moko mpotuku' -a."
Matthew 19 22 Mpo'epe toe we'i, kapeda' -nami nono-na pai' -i malai-mi, apa' wori' rewa-na.
Matthew 19 23 Toe pai' na'uli' Yesus hi ana'guru-na: "Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: mokoro rahi tauna to mo'ua' jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua' -na.
Matthew 19 24 Ku'uli' wo'o: mojoli-pi hama'a unta ntara hi wulou' jaru ngkai tauna to mo'ua' mengkoru hi Alata'ala bona Hi'a jadi' Magau' -ra."
Matthew 19 25 Kara'epe ana'guru-na lolita Yesus toe, rapokakonce lia, ra'uli': "Ei', ane wae-di, hema lau-damo to ma'ala mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-nae!"
Matthew 19 26 Yesus mponaa-ra pai' na'uli' -raka: "Ane hante pakulea' manusia' -le, uma ami' hema. Aga ane Alata'ala, uma ria to uma napakule'."
Matthew 19 27 Ngkai ree, na'uli' wo'o-mi-hawo Petrus: "Hiaa' kai', kipalahii omea-mi-kaina bona mpotuku' -ko. Hiwili napa mpai' to kirata?"
Matthew 19 28 Na'uli' Yesus: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: hi eo mpeno-na nto'u Alata'ala mpobo'ui omea, Aku' Ana' Manusia' mohura hi pohuraa to ncola moparenta. Nto'u toe mpai', koi' to mpotuku' -a toi-e, mohura wo'o-ko-koiwo hi pohuraa to hampulu' romeha', mpoparentai to Israel to hampulu' rontina.
Matthew 19 29 Hema-hema to mpalahii ompi' -na, tuama-na ba tina-na, ana' -na ba tomi-na ba bonea-na sabana mpotuku' -a, bate mporata-i mpai' ha'atu ngkani hiwili-na, pai' mporata wo'o-i katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na.
Matthew 19 30 Aga wori' tauna to bohe tuwu' -ra tempo toi jadi' kedi' tuwu' -ra hi eo mpeno. Pai' wori' wo'o tauna to kedi' tuwu' -ra tempo toi jadi' bohe tuwu' -ra hi eo mpeno."
Matthew 20 1 Na'uli' Yesus: "Ane Alata'ala jadi' Magau', kajadi' -na hewa lolita rapa' tohe'i: Hadua pue' bonea anggur hilou mpopali' tauna to dota mobago hi bonea-na. Mepupulo modao' -i mporua' tauna,
Matthew 20 2 na'uli' -raka: `Hilou-koi mobago hi bonea-ku, kuwai' -koi hore hampepa' doi pera' gaji' -ni ha'eo.' Rapo'io' -mi lolita-na toe, hilou mpu'u-ramo.
Matthew 20 3 Jaa sio, hilou wo'o-imi mpali' to ntani' -na, nahilo ba hangkuja dua tauna ntora-ntora hi wiwi' karajaa.
Matthew 20 4 Na'uli' -raka: `Hilou-koi mobago hi bonea-ku, kuwai' moto-koi gaji' to masipato'.' Hilou mpu'u-ramo-rawo.
Matthew 20 5 Tebua' eo, hilou wo'o-imi mpopali' tauna, na'uli' -raka: `Hilou-koi mobago hi bonea-ku.' Wae wo'o jaa tolu libe eo.
Matthew 20 6 "Ncimonou' -mi, ba neo' jaa lima, modao' wo'o-imi mporua' tauna to ntora. Napekune' -ra: `Napa pai' ntora-ntora mara-wadi-koi ha'eoa, uma-ko-koina mobago-e?'
Matthew 20 7 "Ratompoi' -i: `Apa' uma hema to mpopobago-kai.' "Na'uli' pue' bonea toei: `Ane wae, hilou-mokoi mobago hi bonea-ku.' Hilou mpu'u-ramo-rawo.
Matthew 20 8 "Limpa-mi eo, na'uli' -mi pue' bonea hi mantoro' -na: `Kio' -ramo topobago toera ria, pai' wai' -ramo gaji' -ra. Wai' ulu gaji' hi tauna to lako' ntepu'u mobago jaa lima we'i. Oti toe, wai' gaji' hi tauna to ntepu'u mobago jaa tolu, duu' rata hi tauna to mobago ngkai mepuloa.'
Matthew 20 9 "Tumai mpu'u-ramo to mobago ntepu'u jaa lima ncimonou', mporata-ramo gaji' himpau hampepa' doi pera'.
Matthew 20 10 Kawae-kawae-na duu' -na rata wo'o-ra-rawo to mobago ngkai mepuloa-e ngone. To mobago ngkai mepulo toera mpo'uli' hi rala nono-ra: `Tantu meliu mpai' to nawai' -taka kita', apa' ha'eoa-ta-tana mobago!' Ntaa' we'i, bate hampepa' doi pera' wo'o-wadi-rawo to rarata-e.
Matthew 20 11 Kampohilo-ra gaji' -ra tohe'e, ngkunuti-ramo mpongkunutii pue' bonea, ra'uli':
Matthew 20 12 `To lako' rata mobago hi ka'omea-na, muntu' hajaa-ra-wadi mobago. Hiaa' kai', mobago ha'eoa-ka-kaina, nahimai' eo to ngkerepa'. Napa-di pai' nubayari-ra hibaa-balia hante kai'?'
Matthew 20 13 "Hampetompoi' pue' bonea toei: `Uma-a masala' hi koi', bale. Ha uma pojanci-tami mporata-koi gaji' hampepa' doi pera' rala-na ha'eo?
Matthew 20 14 Ala' -mi-koiwo gaji' -ni pai' hilou-mokoi! Konoa-kumi mpowai' gaji' hi tauna to rata ka'omea-na hibalia hante to kuwai' -kokoi koi'.
Matthew 20 15 Ha uma ma'ala kubabehi ntuku' konoa-ku hante doi-ku? Napa pai' mohingi' -koi hi doo ane lompe' nono-ku hi hira'?'"
Matthew 20 16 Napohudu Yesus lolita rapa' toe, na'uli': "Wae wo'o mpai' hi eo mpeno-na: wori' tauna to kedi' tuwu' -ra tempo toi jadi' bohe tuwu' -ra hi eo mpeno. Pai' wori' wo'o tauna to bohe tuwu' -ra tempo toi jadi' kedi' tuwu' -ra hi eo mpeno."
Matthew 20 17 Nto'u toe, Yesus mako' mpotoa' ngata Yerusalem. Hi lengko ohea nakio' -ra ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua morumpu mopatani', pai' na'uli' -raka:
Matthew 20 18 "Epe-koi! Hilou-tamo tohe'i-e mpotoa' Yerusalem. Hi ria mpai', Aku' Ana' Manusia' ratonu hi imam pangkeni pai' guru agama, pai' rabotuhi bona rapatehi-a.
Matthew 20 19 Oti toe mpai', ratonu-a hi tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi, rapopo'ore', raweba', pai' rapatehi-a hi kaju parika'. Aga hi eo katolu-na tuwu' nculii' moto-a."
Matthew 20 20 Nto'u toe, rata tobine-na Zebedeus hante ana' -na rodua hi Yesus. Motingkua' -i hi nyanyoa-na apa' ria to naperapi'.
Matthew 20 21 Napekune' Yesus: "Napa to nuperapi' -e?" Na'uli' totina toei: "Pomperapia' -kule, bona ane jadi' Magau' -poko mpai', ana' -ku to rodua tohe'ira mohura pai' moparenta hangkaa-ngkania dohe-nu, hadua hi mali ka'ana-nu, hadua hi mali ki'ii-nu."
Matthew 20 22 Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Uma ni'incai napa to niperapi' tetu. Ha nipakule' mpai' mpokolo kaparia to kana kukolo-e?" Ratompoi' ana'guru to rodua toera: "Kipakule' moto!"
Matthew 20 23 Na'uli' Yesus: "Makono mpu'u, bate nikolo mpai' kaparia hewa to kukolo. Aga hema to mohura hi mali ka'ana-ku pai' hi mali ki'ii-ku, bela Aku' to mpakatantu. Tuama-ku-hana to mpakatantu hema to mporata bagia tetu."
Matthew 20 24 Kara'epe-na ana'guru-na to hampulu' pomperapia' doo-ra to rodua toera, kamoroe-rami mpokaroe-ra.
Matthew 20 25 Toe pai' Yesus mpokio' -ra omea pai' na'uli' -raka: "Ni'inca moto kasoa-ra topoparenta to uma mpo'incai Alata'ala mpoparentai ntodea-na. Tauna to bohe pangka' -ra mpewuku ntodea-na mpotuku' hawa' -na.
Matthew 20 26 Aga koi', neo' hewa toe kehi-ni. Hema-koi to doko' bohe pangka' -na, kana jadi' pahawaa'.
Matthew 20 27 Pai' hema to doko' bohe hanga' -na kana jadi' batua-ni.
Matthew 20 28 Kana nituku' po'ingku-ku, Aku' Ana' Manusia'. Patuju-ku tumai hi dunia', uma bona jadi' topohawa'. Pai' -a tumai-le, bona jadi' pahawaa', duu' -na mpewai' woto-ku rapatehi mpotolo' sala' tauna to wori'."
Matthew 20 29 Kamalai-ra Yesus pai' ana'guru-na ngkai ngata Yerikho, mo'iko-ra-damo tauna mpotuku' -i.
Matthew 20 30 Hi wiwi' ohea, ria rodua tauna to wero mohura. Kape'epe-ra towero toera Kayesus-na to liu, mekio' -ramo, ra'uli': "Pue', muli Magau' Daud! Poka'ahi' -ka-kaiwo!"
Matthew 20 31 Tauna to wori' hi ree mpokaroe-ra, ra'uli': "Ngkalino-koi!" Uma-rawo rapangalai', rahuduwukui lau-mi mejeu': "Pue', muli Magau' Daud, poka'ahi' -ka-kaiwo!"
Matthew 20 32 Mento'o-imi Yesus, pai' -i mpokio' -ra tumai, na'uli' -raka: "Napa to nipokono kubabehi-kokoi?"
Matthew 20 33 Ratompoi' -i: "Pue', doko' -ka-kaiwo pehilo!"
Matthew 20 34 Metumu' -mi ahi' -na Yesus, toe pai' naganga mata-ra. Ncaliu pehilo-ramo, pai' -ra mpotuku' Yesus.
Matthew 21 1 Mohu' -ramo hi Yerusalem, rata-ra hi ngata Betfage hi Bulu' Zaitun. Hi ree, Yesus mpohubui rodua ana'guru-na hilou meri'ulu,
Matthew 21 2 na'uli' -raka: "Hilou-koi hi ngata to tanyanyohi toe mai. Rata-koi mpai' hi ria, nihilo hama'a keledai to tehoo' pai' ana' -na mohu' dohe-na. Bongka koloro-na pai' keni-ra tumai.
Matthew 21 3 Ane ria to mpokamaro-koi, uli' -raka: `Apa' Pue' mparaluu-ra. Napoponculi' moto-kokoi mpai'.'"
Matthew 21 4 Tohe'e majadi' bona madupa' napa to na'uli' nabi owi, hewa toi:
Matthew 21 5 "Uli' -raka pue' ngata Sion: Hilo, etu-imi tumai Magau' -ni! Dingki' nono-na, mpohawi' -i hama'a keledai, mpohawi' -i hama'a ana' keledai to mongura."
Matthew 21 6 Jadi', hilou mpu'u-ramo ana'guru-na to rodua toera, rababehi hewa to nahubui-raka.
Matthew 21 7 Rakeni keledai to ntali ana' toera, ralampii hante baju-ra. Oti ralampii, mehawi' -imi Yesus.
Matthew 21 8 Hilou-ramo mpotoa' Yerusalem. Hi kaliua-na Yesus toe, wori' lia tauna mpokodo pohea-ra hi mata ohea, pai' hantongo' mpoho'a rau kaju pai' rakodo hi mata ohea bona mpobila' -i.
Matthew 21 9 Wori' tauna mpotuku' -i, ria-ra to meri'ulu, ria wo'o-ra to hi boko'. Ntora mogora-ra mpo'uli': Une' -imi muli Magau' Daud!" Pue' Ala mpogane' Magau' to tumai mpokeni hanga' -na!" Une' -imi Pue' Ala to hi rala suruga!"
Matthew 21 10 Pesua' -na Yesus hi ngata Yerusalem, konce-mi pue' ngata, ra'uli': "Hema-idie?"
Matthew 21 11 Ratompoi' tauna to dohe-na: "Yesus-le, nabi ngkai Nazaret tana' Galilea."
Matthew 21 12 Oti toe, mesua' -imi Yesus hi berewe Tomi Alata'ala, pai' -i mpopalai hawe'ea tauna to mobabalu' hi ree. Nabilingko-raka meja' -meja' posulaa' -ra doi, pai' nabilingko wo'o pohuraa topobabalu' danci mangkebodo.
Matthew 21 13 Na'uli' -raka: "Hi rala Buku Tomoroli' Alata'ala mpo'uli' hewa toi: `Tomi-ku mpai' rakahangai' tomi posampayaa.' Hiaa' koi' -koina, niponcawa tomi toperampaki-di!"
Matthew 21 14 Hi Tomi Alata'ala, tauna towero pai' topungku rata hi Yesus, pai' napaka'uri' -ra.
Matthew 21 15 Aga imam-imam pangkeni pai' guru-guru agama, moroe-ra mpohilo tanda mekoncehi to nababehi Yesus. Gigi nono-ra mpo'epe ana' to mogora hi rala Tomi Alata'ala to mpo'uli': "Une' -imi muli Magau' Daud!"
Matthew 21 16 Toe pai' ra'uli' mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Nu'epe wa napa to ra'uli' -e!" Na'uli' Yesus: "Ku'epe moto. Ko'ia-tano nibasa hi rala Buku Tomoroli' -e to mpo'uli': `Nutudui' -ramo ana' -ana' pai' ana'lei mpohowa' lolita pe'une' hi Iko.'"
Matthew 21 17 Ngkai ree, malai-imi Yesus mpalahii-ra hilou hi mali ngata, turu hi Betania.
Matthew 21 18 Kampeneo-na mepulo ngkii, hi pomako' -ra Yesus pai' ana'guru-na nculii' hilou hi Yerusalem, mo'oro' -imi Yesus.
Matthew 21 19 Mpohilo-i hi wiwi' ohea hangkaju kaju ara. Hilou-i hi tawu-na mpali' wua' -na, aga uma ria nau' hantakua, muntu' rau-na-wadi. Toe pai' Yesus mpototowi kaju toei, na'uli': "Ngkai eo toe lau, uma-poko mowua' -wua' kaju toi-ko!" Kamolaju-nami kaju ara toei.
Matthew 21 20 Wae karahilo-na ana'guru-na to jadi' toe, rapokakonce, ra'uli': "Beiwa pai' kaliliu molaju kaju ara toei-e mai?"
Matthew 21 21 Na'uli' Yesus: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi, ane nipangala' pai' uma-koi morara', ma'ala wo'o-ko-koiwo mpobabehi hewa to kubabehi hi kaju toe we'i. Pai' uma muntu' tohe'e, ma'ala-koi mpololitai bulu' tohe'i: `Te'ongko' -moko, pengkanawu' -ko hi rala tahi'!' bate majadi' tetu.
Matthew 21 22 Napa-napa to niperapi' hi rala posampaya-ni, ane nipangala', bate nitarima."
Matthew 21 23 Mesua' wo'o-imi Yesus hi rala Tomi Alata'ala pai' metudui'. Bula-na metudui', rata-ramo imam pangkeni hante totu'a to Yahudi mpekune' -i, ra'uli': "Uli' -kakai, ngkaiapa huraa-nu mpobabehi hawe'ea tetu hi Tomi Alata'ala! Hema to mpowai' -ko kuasa hewa tetu?"
Matthew 21 24 Na'uli' Yesus: "Aku', ria wo'o-kuwo pompekunea' -ku hi koi'. Ane nitompoi' -ka, bo ku'uli' -kokoi kangkaiapa-na kuasa-ku mpobabehi hawe'ea toe lau.
Matthew 21 25 Uli' -ka pe': ngkaiapa kuasa-na Yohanes Topeniu' mponiu' tauna? Ngkai Alata'ala-di, ba ngkai manusia' -di?" Momepololitai-ramo pangkeni to Yahudi toera, ra'uli': "Beiwa-tale' mpotompoi' -ie? Ane ta'uli' ngkai Alata'ala kuasa-na, na'uli' -taka mpai': `Ane wae, napa pai' uma-i nipangala'?'
Matthew 21 26 Hiaa' ane ta'uli' ngkai manusia' -wadi kuasa-na, mpoka'eka' -ta ntodea, apa' ntodea toera mpo'uli' Yohanes toe hadua nabi."
Matthew 21 27 Jadi', ratompoi' -i: "Uma ki'incai." Toe pai' na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Ane wae, uma wo'o-kuwo ku'uli' -kokoi kangkaiapa kuasa-ku mpobabehi toe lau."
Matthew 21 28 Napokaliliu Yesus lolita-na hi pangkeni agama Yahudi toera, na'uli': "Beiwa pomporata-ni tohe'i: Ria hadua tuama, rodua-ki ana' -na, paka' tomane. Hilou-i hi to tuaka, na'uli' -ki: `Uto', eo toe lau, hilou-ko mobago hi bonea.'
Matthew 21 29 "Natompoi': `Oja' -a Mama!' Aga ka'omea-na mobali' nono-na, hilou moto-i mobago hi bonea.
Matthew 21 30 "Ngkai ree, hilou wo'o-i hi ana' -na to tu'ai, na'uli' -ki: `Uto', hilou-ko mobago hi bonea.' "Natompoi' ana' toei: `Io', hilou moto-a Mama.' Ntaa' uma-idi hilou-e!"
Matthew 21 31 Ngkai ree, mepekune' -i Yesus hi pangkeni agama Yahudi, na'uli': "Jadi', ngkai ana' to rodua toera, hema to mpotuku' hawa' tuama-ra?" Ra'uli' pangkeni to Yahudi toera: "To lomo' -na." Na'uli' Yesus: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: tauna topojeko', hewa topesingara' paja' pai' tobine to uma tumotoa gau' -ra, hira' lau-mi to natarima Alata'ala jadi' ntodea-na hi rala Kamagaua' -na, bela koi'.
Matthew 21 32 Apa' Yohanes Topeniu' mpotudui' -koi ohea to monoa', aga uma-koi dota mpopangala' -i. Hiaa' topesingara' paja' pai' tobine to uma tumotoa gau' -ra, rapangala' -i-rana. Pai' nau' nihilo-mi toe, uma oa' nibalii' gau' -ni pai' uma oa' nipangala' -i."
Matthew 21 33 Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus mpo'uli' -raka pangkeni agama Yahudi: "Epe wo'o-koi lolita rapa' tohe'i. Ria hadua pue' bonea mpohu'ai bonea-na hante anggur. Nawala ntololikia-na, nababehi pompeaa' anggur, pai' natunya' wo'o pongko pompodooa. Oti toe, napewai' bonea-na rapobago hi ba hangkuja dua tauna, pai' hilou-imi hi ngata to molaa.
Matthew 21 34 Rata-mi tempo pohopua' wua' anggur, napahawa' -ra ba hangkuja dua batua-na hilou mperapi' bagia-na.
Matthew 21 35 Aga topobago bonea toera mpohoko' batua to napahawa': ria-ra to rapao', ria to rapana' watu, ria wo'o to rapatehi.
Matthew 21 36 Pue' bonea toei mpahawa' tena batua-na to ntani' -na, meliu kawori' -ra ngkai to lomo' -na. Aga rapohewa toe wo'o-ra-wadi.
Matthew 21 37 Ka'omea-na, na'uli': `Agina ana' -ku moto-mi kupahawa' hilou, bate rapengkorui-i mpai'.'
Matthew 21 38 "Ntaa' we'i, karahilo-na topobago bonea toera ana' pue' bonea tohe'ei, mohawa' -ramo ra'uli': `Etu-imi tumai ana' -na, hi'a mpai' to jadi' pue' bonea toi-e. Kita tapatehi-i, bona bonea toi kita' -mi mpai' pue' -na.'
Matthew 21 39 Karahoko' -nami ana' toei, radii' hilou hi mali bonea pai' rapatehi."
Matthew 21 40 Ngkai ree, Yesus mpo'uli' -raka pangkeni agama Yahudi: "Jadi', ane rata nculii' -ipi pue' bonea-e, napopai-ra topobago bonea-na toera-e?"
Matthew 21 41 Ratompoi' -i: "Tantu napatehi-ra tauna to dada'a toera, pai' bonea-na nawai' -raka tau ntani' -na to dota mpowai' -i bagia-na hi tempo-na."
Matthew 21 42 Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Tantu nibasa-mi lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpolowa pesapuaka-ni hi Aku', hewa toi moni-na: `Watu to ratadi topowangu tomi, watu toe lau-mi to jadi' poko parawatu. Tohe'e majadi' ntuku' konoa Pue' Alata'ala, uma mowo kalompe' -na hi poncilo-ta.'"
Matthew 21 43 Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus: "Jadi', apa' oja' -koi mpotarima-a jadi' Magau' -ni, wae-pi, bagia-ni hi rala Kamagaua' -na Alata'ala, ra'ala' ngkai koi' pai' rawai' -raka tauna to mpobabehi po'ingku to natao hi ntodea Alata'ala. ((
Matthew 21 44 Hewa kura to monawu' hi watu mopengka, pai' hewa kura to napitihi watu moreja', hewa toe wo'o mpai' tauna to mposapuaka-a.))"
Matthew 21 45 Kara'epe-na imam pangkeni pai' to Parisi lolita-lolita rapa' Yesus toe, ra'inca kahira' -na to natoa'.
Matthew 21 46 Toe pai' rapali' -mi ohea-ra mpohoko' -i. Aga uma-ra daho', apa' mpoka'eka' -ra ntodea, apa' ntodea mpo'uli' Yesus hadua nabi.
Matthew 22 1 Mololita tena-i Yesus hi pangkeni agama Yahudi toera, mpo'uli' -raka hanyala-pi lolita rapa'. Na'uli':
Matthew 22 2 "Alata'ala hewa magau' to hi rala jarita toi: Hadua magau' mpobabehi karamea hi poncamokoa ana' -na.
Matthew 22 3 Mohawa' -i hi pahawaa' -na hilou mpokio' tauna to rahinta' hewa toi: `Hilou-tamo ngkoni' hi posusaa' poncamokoa!' Aga hawe'ea to rakio' toera, uma-ra dota hilou.
Matthew 22 4 Toe pai' nahubui tena pahawaa' -na to ntani' -na, na'uli' -raka: `Uli' -raka to rahinta': pongkoni' taha' -mi, japi hante porewua to morudu' ntani' -na rasumale' -mi, rodo-mi omea. Kita-mi hilou hi posusaa' poncamokoa!'
Matthew 22 5 Aga hawe'ea to rakio' toera uma mposaile' pekio' toe. Hore-hore hilou hi pobagoa-ra moto-ra. Ria-ra to hilou hi bonea-ra, ria-ra to hilou hi bago-ra ntani' -na.
Matthew 22 6 To ntani' -na wo'o-ra mpohoko' pahawaa' magau' toe, rapao' pai' rapatehi.
Matthew 22 7 Kana'epe-na magau' napa to jadi' tohe'e, moroe lia-imi. Nahubui tantara-na hilou mpatehi topepatehi toera, pai' mposuwe ngata-ra.
Matthew 22 8 "Oti toe, nakio' wo'o-ramo pahawaa' -na, na'uli' -raka: `Susa' poncamokoa rodo-mi, aga tauna to kukio', uma-ra natao mpokaralai.
Matthew 22 9 Wae-pi, hilou-mokoi hi ohea kama, hema-hema to nirua', bawai-ramo tumai mpokaralai susa' poncamokoa.'
Matthew 22 10 Kahilou-rami-rawo pahawaa' toera hi ohea mporumpu hawe'ea tauna to liu, uma mpenara' ba to lompe' gau' -ra ba to dada'a. Ka'omea-na ihia' mpu'u-mi tomi posusaa' hante torata.
Matthew 22 11 "Mesua' -imi magau' toei mpokamata torata. Nahilo-hawo hi olo' torata, ria hadua to uma moheai pohea posusa'.
Matthew 22 12 Na'uli' magau': `Bale, napa-kona pai' tumai-ko hi posusaa' uma-ko moheai pohea posusa' -e?' Uma-i-hawo winihi.
Matthew 22 13 Ngkai ree, mohawa' -imi magau' mpo'uli' -raka pahawaa' -na: `Hilu' witi' -na, hoo' pale-na, petadi-i hi mali-na rala kabengia-na! Hi ria-i mpai' geo' pai' ntodohaka.'"
Matthew 22 14 Napohudu Yesus lolita rapa' -na hewa toi: "Wori' tauna to nakio' Alata'ala, aga hangkedi' -ra-wadi to napelihi jadi' ntodea-na."
Matthew 22 15 Ngkai ree, malai-ramo to Parisi ngkai Tomi Alata'ala. Mohawa' -ra mpali' akala beiwa-ra ma'ala mpo'opa kahala' lolita-na Yesus mpotompoi' pompekunea' -ra.
Matthew 22 16 Rarata-mi akala-ra: mpahawa' -ra ba hangkuja dua topetuku' -ra hante ba hangkuja dua tauna to tono' hi Magau' Herodes hilou hi Yesus. Ra'uli' mpo'uli' -ki: "Guru, ki'inca Guru tau manoa'. Monoa' lia tudui' -nu mpo'uli' napa konoa Alata'ala hi manusia'. Uma nupengkorui ba hema-hema, apa' uma-ko mpelence tauna.
Matthew 22 17 Toe pai' kiperapi' bona nu'uli' -kakai, beiwa pomporata-nu Guru: ntuku' atura agama-ta, ba ma'ala moto-ta mpobayari paja' hi Kaisar, ba uma-di?"
Matthew 22 18 Na'inca Yesus patuju nono-ra to dada'a toe, toe pai' na'uli' -raka: "Hilo mpu'u-koie' topebagiu! Napa pai' doko' ni'opa kahala' lolita-ku!
Matthew 22 19 Popehuwu-ka pe' doi to biasa nibayari-ki paja' -e." Ratonu-miki hampepa' doi pera'.
Matthew 22 20 Na'uli' Yesus: "Lence hema pai' hanga' hema to hi doi toi?"
Matthew 22 21 Ratompoi': "Lence pai' hanga' Kaisar." Na'uli' Yesus: "Ane wae-di, wai' -ki Kaisar napa to kasipato' -na rawai' -ki Kaisar, pai' wai' -ki Alata'ala napa to kasipato' -na rawai' -ki Alata'ala."
Matthew 22 22 Kara'epe-na petompoi' Yesus tohe'e, rapokakonce. Kamalai-rami mpalahii Yesus.
Matthew 22 23 Hi eo toe wo'o, ba hangkuja dua to Saduki rata hi Yesus. To Saduki toera, pangkeni agama Yahudi to mposapuaka tauna to mate tuwu' nculii' hi eo mpeno.
Matthew 22 24 Rata to Saduki toera mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Guru, nabi Musa metudui' hewa toi: Ane hadua tomane mate, hiaa' uma-ki ria ana' -na, pudupuhe-na kana mpotobine balu-na, bona ria-ki-hawo muli-na tomate toei.
Matthew 22 25 Jadi', ria pitu to ntali ompi' paka' tomane. To ulumua' motobinei, mate-i uma ria ana' -na. Balu-na napotobine tu'ai-na.
Matthew 22 26 Ko'ia wo'o rapoka'alai mo'anai', mate wo'o-imi-hawo to tu'ai toei. Wae oa' -mi majadi' hi katolu-na duu' -na hi kapitu-na.
Matthew 22 27 Ka'omea-na, mate wo'o-imi-hawo tobine toei.
Matthew 22 28 Jadi' hi eo mpeno-na, ane tuwu' nculii' mpu'u-di hawe'ea tomate-e, hema-ramo mpai' pue' tobine toei? Apa' hawe'ea-ra mpotobine-imi."
Matthew 22 29 Na'uli' Yesus: "Sala' rahi pekiri-ni tetu, apa' uma nipaha ihi' Buku Tomoroli', uma wo'o ni'incai baraka' -na Alata'ala.
Matthew 22 30 Apa' ane tuwu' nculii' -ramo tauna to mate, katuwu' -ra hewa katuwu' mala'eka hi rala suruga, uma-rapa motobinei ba motomanei.
Matthew 22 31 Ha ko'ia ria nibasa lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpakanoto katuwu' -ra nculii' tomate-e? Ria Lolita Alata'ala owi to mpo'uli' -kokoi hewa toi:
Matthew 22 32 `Aku' toi-mi Alata'ala to napue' Abraham, Alata'ala to napue' Ishak, Alata'ala to napue' Yakub.' Batua-na, nau' mahae-ramo mate Abraham, Ishak pai' Yakub, bate tuwu' moto-ra. Apa' bela tauna to mate to mepue' hi Alata'ala, tauna to tuwu' -hana to mpopue' -i."
Matthew 22 33 Kara'epe-na ntodea tudui' -na Yesus toe, rapokakonce.
Matthew 22 34 To Saduki uma-pi tepehono', apa' nadagi-ramo Yesus. Kara'epe-na to Parisi toe, moromu wo'o-ramo-rawo mpopali' akala-ra mpo'akalai Yesus.
Matthew 22 35 Hadua ngkai laintongo' -ra, hadua guru agama, mperao mpo'opa petompoi' Yesus hante pompekunea' -na, na'uli':
Matthew 22 36 "Guru, ngkai hawe'ea parenta hi rala Atura Pue', parenta to'uma to meliu kabohe-na?"
Matthew 22 37 Na'uli' Yesus: `Kana tapoka'ahi' Pue' -ta Pue' Alata'ala hante nono-ta mpu'u, tatonu hawe'ea katuwu' -ta hi Hi'a, pai' tapoka'ahi' -i hudu inca-ta.'
Matthew 22 38 Toe-mi parenta to meliu kabohe-na, pai' to lomo' -na mpu'u.
Matthew 22 39 Pai' parenta karonyala-na to hibalia hante to lomo' -na toe: `Kana tapoka'ahi' doo-ta hewa pompoka'ahi' -ta woto-ta moto.'
Matthew 22 40 Hawe'ea Atura Pue' pai' tudui' nabi-nabi mentoe hi parenta to ronyala toe."
Matthew 22 41 Bula-ra to Parisi ria-pidi morumpu hi retu, Yesus mpekune' -ra:
Matthew 22 42 "Beiwa pomporata-ni, hema-i Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Alata'ala-e? Muli hema-i?" Ratompoi': "Muli Magau' Daud."
Matthew 22 43 Na'uli' Yesus: "Ane wae-di, napa pai' Daud mpokahangai' -i Pue' -na? Hante petete' Inoha' Tomoroli', Daud mpotompo'wiwi Magau' Topetolo' hewa toi:
Matthew 22 44 Pue' Ala mpo'uli' -ki Pue' -ku: `Mohura-moko hi mali ngka'ana-ku, duu' -na kupopengkoru hawe'ea bali' -nu hi Iko.'
Matthew 22 45 Jadi', ane muli Daud mpu'u-idi Magau' Topetolo' -e, napa pai' Daud mpokahangai' -i Pue' -na?"
Matthew 22 46 Uma ria haduaa to mpotompoi' -i. Ntepu'u ngkai eo toe, uma-pi hema to daho' mpekune' ba napa-napa hi Yesus.
Matthew 23 1 Ngkai ree, Yesus mpololitai ntodea pai' topetuku' -na, na'uli':
Matthew 23 2 "Guru-guru agama pai' to Parisi mohura hi pohuraa Musa, apa' hira' to mpotudui' -koi Atura Musa.
Matthew 23 3 Toe pai' kana nituku' omea napa to ratudui' -kokoi. Aga neo' nipenau' po'ingku-ra, apa' hira' toe uma mpotuku' napa to ratudui' -kokoi.
Matthew 23 4 Hira' toe mpopokoloi ntodea hante parenta pai' ada to motomo, hiaa' hira' moto, uma-ra mpotulungi ntodea mpotuku' parenta pai' ada toe.
Matthew 23 5 "Wori' moto-hawo po'ingku-ra to lompe', aga patuju-ra mpobabehi po'ingku toe, bona rahilo doo-wadi. Mpopake' -ra tali posampaya to mopepa' -pepa', pai' rapokaloe wua' baju-ra, bona petuku' -ra hi Atura Musa ma'ala rahilo doo.
Matthew 23 6 Goe' -ra ane rapopohura-ra hi pohuraa to lompe' hi posusaa'. Goe' -ra rapopohura hi pohuraa karabilaa' hi tomi posampayaa.
Matthew 23 7 Goe' -ra ane ria tauna hi wiwi' karajaa motingkua' mpotabe-ra pai' mpokahangai' -ra `Guru.'
Matthew 23 8 "Aga koi', neo' -koi mpopebila' pai' doko' rakahangai' `Guru,' apa' hadua-wadi Guru-ni, pai' koi' omea ntali ompi' -wadi.
Matthew 23 9 Pai' neo' wo'o nipomolangko rahi ba hema-hema hi dunia' toi pai' mpokahangai' -ra `Tuama,' apa' Tuama-ni hadua-wadi, Hi'a-mi Tuama-ni to hi rala suruga.
Matthew 23 10 Pai' neo' wo'o-koi doko' rakahangai' `Pangkeni,' apa' Pangkeni-ni hadua-wadi, Hi'a-mi Magau' Topetolo'.
Matthew 23 11 Hema-koi to doko' bohe tuwu' -na, kana jadi' pahawaa' hi doo-na.
Matthew 23 12 Tauna to mpakalangko nono-ra, Pue' Ala bate mpodingkihi-ra, pai' tauna to mpakadingki' nono-ra, Pue' Ala mpomolangko-ra.
Matthew 23 13 "Pai' koi' guru agama pai' to Parisi! Bate mporata silaka-koi mpai'! Lompe' hi mali-na-wadi-koi! Tauna to doko' jadi' ntodea Alata'ala, nitagi-ra. Koi' moto uma dota jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala, pai' tau ntani' -na to doko' jadi' ntodea-na, nihalawai' lau-rada. ((
Matthew 23 14 "Silaka-koi, guru agama pai' to Parisi! Lompe' hi mali-na-wadi-koi! Nibagiu tobine tobalu pai' nihagoi tomi-ra. Pai' mosampaya-koi nipomoloe-loe, bona tewunii' gau' -ni to dada'a tetu. Motomo lia mpai' huku' -ni.))
Matthew 23 15 "Silaka-koi, guru agama pai' to Parisi! Lompe' hi mali-na-wadi-koi! Mako' molaa-koi medipo tahi' modao' hi role-na, bona ngalai' ria nte hadua tauna to jadi' topetuku' -ni. Pai' ane ria-pi topetuku' -ni, nitudui' -ra mpotuku' pebagiu-ni, alaa-na meliu kadada'a gau' -ra ngkai koi', pai' meliu kamasipato' -ra rahuku' hi naraka ngkai koi'.
Matthew 23 16 "Bate silaka-koi mpai'! Koi' hewa to wero to doko' mpotete' doo! Metudui' -koi hewa toi: Ane ria tauna to mpobabehi pojanci pai' mosumpa-i mpokahangai' Tomi Alata'ala, ni'uli' uma-i tehoo' hante sumpa-na toe. Hiaa' ane mpokahangai' -i bulawa to hi rala Tomi Alata'ala, tehoo' -i hante sumpa-na toe.
Matthew 23 17 Wojo mpu'u-koi, hewa to wero-koi! Ha ni'uli' -koina bulawa to meliu ngkai Tomi Alata'ala! Hiaa' bo Tomi Alata'ala toe-di to mpomoroli' bulawa to hi rala-na.
Matthew 23 18 Metudui' wo'o-koi hewa toi: Ane tauna mosumpa mpokahangai' meja' pontunua pepue' to hi rala Tomi Alata'ala, uma-i tehoo' hante sumpa-na toe. Aga ane mpokahangai' -i pepue' to ratunu hi lolo meja' toe, ni'uli' bate tehoo' -i hante sumpa-na.
Matthew 23 19 Hewa to wero mpu'u-koi! Ha ni'uli' -koina, pepue' to meliu ngkai meja' pontunua pepue'? Uma-e', apa' meja' toe-di to mpomoroli' pepue' to hi lolo-nae.
Matthew 23 20 Ane tauna mosumpa mpokahangai' meja' pontunua pepue', batua-na mpokahangai' -i meja' toe pai' hawe'ea to ratunu hi lolo-na.
Matthew 23 21 Pai' ane tauna mosumpa mpokahangai' Tomi Alata'ala, batua-na mpokahangai' -i Tomi Alata'ala pai' Alata'ala to mo'oha' hi tomi toe.
Matthew 23 22 Pai' ane tauna mosumpa mpokahangai' suruga, batua-na mpokahangai' -i pohuraa Alata'ala, pai' mpokahangai' wo'o-i Alata'ala to mohura hi pohuraa toe.
Matthew 23 23 "Silaka-koi, guru agama pai' to Parisi! Lompe' hi mali-na-wadi-koi! Ntahawe' hinu'a to kedi', hewa tarangkada', ngkoromonyi' pai' wunga bonea, nipopepue' hampobagiahampulu' hi Alata'ala. Hiaa' parenta hi rala Atura Pue' to bohe mpu'u, hewa po'ingku to monoa', ma'ahi' hi doo, pai' mpo'ihii' janci, uma nisaile'. Kakoo-kono-na, ke parenta to bohe toe-hanale to kana nituku' -e, pai' neo' wo'o nilipo' mpotuku' parenta to kedi'.
Matthew 23 24 Koi' hewa towero to mpotete' doo. Koi' hewa tauna to mpolali koromu' nete' ngkai ue ininu-ni, hiaa' hama'a unta, to bohe lia, ni'ome' lau.
Matthew 23 25 "Silaka-koi, guru agama pai' to Parisi! Lompe' hi mali-na-wadi-koi! Koi' hewa tauna to mpobohoi' sangkiri' pai' piri hi mali-na-wadi, hiaa' hi rala-na babo' moto. Ada agama to kahiloa hi mali-na-wadi nituku' lia. Hiaa' hi rala nono-ni jampa pai' mpokahina anu doo-koi.
Matthew 23 26 Hewa towero mpu'u-koi, koi' to Parisi! Bohoi' ulu rala-na sangkiri', bona lompe' wo'o to hi mali-na.
Matthew 23 27 "Silaka-koi, guru agama pai' to Parisi! Lompe' hi mali-na-wadi-koi! Hewa daeo' to rasapuru' bula-koi: hi mali-na lompe' -damo hiloa-na, hiaa' bo hi rala-na paka' wuku kiu pai' wori' nyala to merungkui.
Matthew 23 28 Wae wo'o koi': ane hi pogau' to hi mali-na to rahilo doo, monoa' -koi. Hiaa' hi rala nono-ni topebagiu-koi pai' dada'a kehi-ni.
Matthew 23 29 "Silaka-koi, guru agama pai' to Parisi! Lompe' hi mali-na-wadi-koi! Nipenasa-damo mpakalompe' daeo' -ra nabi-nabi pai' tauna to monoa' owi.
Matthew 23 30 Molangko nono-ni, ni'uli': `Ane ke rapa' -na tuwu' -makai hingkala'ia hante totu'a-kai owi, ke uma-ka-kaina mpodohei-ra mpatehi nabi-nabi.'
Matthew 23 31 Jadi', nipangaku' moto kakoi' -na muli-ra to mpatehi nabi-nabi, pai' kehi ntu'a-ni tetu bate ni'uhi.
Matthew 23 32 Wae-pi, pokaliliu lau-mi mpobabehi jeko' hewa to rababehi ntu'a-ni tetu!
Matthew 23 33 "He topebagiu, he koi' to bengku' gau' -ni! Ha ni'uli' -koina tewi'iha-koi mpai' ngkai huku' -ni hi rala naraka-e?
Matthew 23 34  
Matthew 23 35 Ntu'a-ni owi mpopatehi wori' tauna to monoa' ingku-ra, ntepu'u ngkai kampopatehi-ra Habel, tauna to monoa' ingku-na owi, rata-rata hi kampopatehi-ni Zakharia ana' Berekia, to nipatehi hi berewe Tomi Alata'ala hi olo' tomi to moroli' pai' meja' pontunua pepue'. Jadi', hi koi' to tuwu' tempo toi, kupahawa' wo'o mpai' nabi, tauna to pante pai' guru to mpotudui' -koi lolita-ku. Hantongo' -ra mpai' nipatehi, hantongo' -ra niparika', ria wo'o-ra to niweba' hi rala tomi posampayaa-ni, ria wo'o-ra to nidapa' hilou hi ngata-ngata petiboa' -ra. Ka'omea-na mpai', koi' to tuwu' tempo toi-mi to mpokolo hawe'ea kasalaa' totu'a-ni to mpatehi tauna to monoa' owi.
Matthew 23 36 Wae mpu'u-di! Koi' to tuwu' tempo toi bate rahuku' sabana hawe'ea kasalaa' -ra totu'a-ni toe.
Matthew 23 37 "Ee to Yerusalem! to Yerusalem! Nipatehi-ra-koina nabi-nabi, pai' nipana' watu-ra-koina tauna to nasuro Alata'ala hi koi'. Wori' ngkani-mi kupehuka' ngkupui-koi, hewa hama'a manu' tina mpo'urui ana' -na hi une' pani' -na, aga uma-koi dota.
Matthew 23 38 Bona ni'inca: tomi pepuea' -ni toi napalahii-kokoi mpai' Alata'ala.
Matthew 23 39 Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi, uma-apa nihiloi, duu' -na rata tempo-na ni'uli': `Une' -imi to rata mpokeni hanga' Pue' Ala!'"
Matthew 24 1 Malai-imi Yesus ngkai Tomi Alata'ala. Tumai-ramo ana'guru-na mpotudo' -ki kalompe' pompowangu-na tomi toe.
Matthew 24 2 Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Nihilo wa hawe'ea tohe'e-e lau? Bona ni'inca: uma mpai' ria hamehaa' watu to bate pomeduncu-na. Bate ragero omea mpai'."
Matthew 24 3 Oti toe, hilou-imi Yesus mohura hi Bulu' Zaitun. Bula-na mohura, rata-ramo ana'guru-na nto'u uma ria tau ntani' -na, pai' -ra mpekune' -i: "Uli' -kakai ba nto'uma kadupa' -na to nu'uli' toe-e we'i, pai' napa mpai' to jadi' tanda karata-nu pai' kahudua dunia' toi."
Matthew 24 4 Natompoi' Yesus: "Pelompehi, neo' -koi ma'ala rabagiu.
Matthew 24 5 Apa' wori' mpai' to mehupa' to mpo'uli' kahira' -na Magau' Topetolo'. Wori' mpai' tauna to rabagiu.
Matthew 24 6 Mpo'epe-koi mpai' kareba panga'ea ngkai kalaa-na, ni'epe wo'o moni panga'ea to mohu'. Aga neo' me'eka', apa' hawe'ea toe kana jadi' ulu, aga kajadia' toe uma mpobatuai karata-nami kahudua dunia'.
Matthew 24 7 Nto'u toe mpai', wori' ngata mosipanga'ei, magau' hadua mpo'ewa magau' kahadua-na, pai' hiapa-apa ria oro' pai' linu.
Matthew 24 8 Aga hawe'ea toe lau lako' pontepu'ua-na-pidi, hewa pontodohaka hadua tobine to neo' mo'ana'.
Matthew 24 9 "Nto'u toe mpai', rahoko' -koi pai' ratonu hi tauna to mposesa' pai' mpopatehi-koi. Tauna humalili' dunia' mpokahuku' -koi sabana petuku' -ni hi Aku'.
Matthew 24 10 Wori' tauna ngkala'ura ngkai petuku' -ra hi Aku'. Ria to mpewai' doo-ra hi bali' -ra. Wori' tauna momepokahuku'.
Matthew 24 11 Pai' mehupa' wo'o wori' nabi boa' to mpobagiu wori' tauna.
Matthew 24 12 Nto'u toe, kada'aa tauna katedoo-donihia, duu' -na mere' -mi ahi' tauna to wori'.
Matthew 24 13 Aga tauna to tida mepangala' hi Aku' duu' hi ka'omea-na, hira' -mi to mporata kalompea' hi eo mpeno.
Matthew 24 14 Pai' Kareba Lompe' to mpo'uli' beiwa Alata'ala jadi' Magau', bate rapalele hi humalili' dunia', bona hawe'ea manusia' ma'ala mpo'epe. Oti toe-di pai' lako' rata kahudua dunia'.
Matthew 24 15 "Owi nabi Daniel mpolowa karata-na to rahanga' `Topegerohi to dada'a.' (Hema to mpobasa lolita pelowa toe, penotohi batua-na!) Jadi', ane nihilo to nalowa Daniel toe mokore hi tomi to moroli',
Matthew 24 16 agina tauna to mo'oha' hi Yudea metibo' hilou hi bulu' -na.
Matthew 24 17 Tauna to mohura hi parawa-na, neo' -pi leba' mesua' hi rala tomi-na mpo'ala' rewa-na.
Matthew 24 18 Tauna to hi bonea, neo' -pi nculii' hi ngata mpo'ala' pohea-na. Kaliliu metibo'!
Matthew 24 19 Mpe'ahii' -ra mpai' tobine to nto'u-ra motina'i pai' to mpentii' ana' -ra nto'u toe, apa' mokoro mpai' petibo' -ra.
Matthew 24 20 Mekakae-koi hi Alata'ala bona eo petiboa' -ni toe neo' nto'u tempo lengi' ba nto'u eo pepuea'.
Matthew 24 21 Apa' uma mowo pesesa' to mporumpa' manusia' nto'u toe, ko'ia ria jadi' ngkai lomo' kajadia' dunia' duu' -na rata tempo toi, pai' uma wo'o-pi mpai' ria jadi' hi eo boko' -na.
Matthew 24 22 Aga naredehi moto mpai' Alata'ala tempo kaparia toe, apa' ane uma naredehi tempo-na, bate uma ria haduaa to tuwu'. Jadi', apa' napoka'ahi' -ra tauna to napelihi, toe pai' naredehi mpai' tempo kaparia toe.
Matthew 24 23 "Nto'u toe mpai', ane ria to mpo'uli' -kokoi: `Hilo, Magau' Topetolo' ohe'i-imi,' ba `Ohe'e-i mai,' neo' nipangalai'.
Matthew 24 24 Apa' mehupa' mpai' wori' tauna to boa' to mpo'uli' kahira' -na Magau' Topetolo', ba to mpo'uli' kahira' -na nabi. Mpobabehi-ra tanda to mekoncehi lia pai' tanda to mobaraka', bona mpobagiu-ra wori' tauna. Ane ke ma'ala, ntahawe' tauna to napelihi Alata'ala rabagiu wo'o.
Matthew 24 25 Kiwoi-koi! Ku'uli' ami' -mikokoi kako'ia-na jadi'.
Matthew 24 26 "Jadi', ane ria to mpo'uli' -kokoi: `Hilo, Magau' Topetolo' oe-i ria hi papada to wao'!' neo' -koi hilou. Ane ra'uli': `Hilo, oe-i ria hi rala tomi!' neo' nipangalai'.
Matthew 24 27 Apa' ane rata nculii' -apa mpai' Aku' Ana' Manusia', karata-ku kahiloa hobo' hi dunia', hewa pehini kila' to mehupa' hi mata'eo pai' mehini hilou hi kasoloa.
Matthew 24 28 Ane ria anu mate, incana moto apa' wori' danci morumpu mpokoni'. Wae wo'o mpai' karata-ku nculii' hi dunia', uma-a tumai ngkawuni, incana moto mpai'.
Matthew 24 29 "Ane timpaliu-damo tempo kaparia toe, hawe'ea anu to mobaraka' hi langi' ralengo. Eo mobali' mobengi, wula uma-pi mehini, betue' roda' ngkai langi'.
Matthew 24 30 Nto'u toe-damo mpai', mehupa' -mi tanda hi langi' to mpobatuai karata-ku Aku' Ana' Manusia'. Pai' hawe'ea manusia' hi dunia' motantangi', apa' rahilo-a hi lolo raoa mana'u tumai hi rala limu', mobaraka' -a pai' uma mowo pehini-ku.
Matthew 24 31 Sangkakala to bohe ratuwui', pai' kuhubui mala'eka-ku hilou mporumpu tauna to kupobagia ngkai humalili' dunia', ngkai wuntu-na hamali rata hi wuntu-na hamali.
Matthew 24 32 "Petonoi-koi napa to kutudui' -kokoi hante lolita rapa' kaju ara. Ane nihilo rau-na mela' pai' mohulu-i, ni'inca-mi kaneo' -na mara eo.
Matthew 24 33 Wae wo'o ane nihilo-damo hawe'ea kajadia' toe we'i lou, ni'inca-mi neo' madupa' mpu'u-mi to ku'uli' we'i.
Matthew 24 34 Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: hawe'ea toe we'i bate madupa' kako'ia-na mate omea tauna to tuwu' tempo toi.
Matthew 24 35 Langi' pai' dunia' mogero mpai', tapi' lolita-ku bate-bate-na duu' kahae-hae-na.
Matthew 24 36 "Aga ane eo pai' jaa kadupa' -na hawe'ea toe, wuwu Tuama-ku-wadi to mpo'inca. Uma ria to ntani' -na to mpo'inca. Bangku' mala'eka to hi rala suruga-hawoe', uma wo'o-rawo ra'incai. Bangku' Aku' Ana' -nae', uma wo'o-kuwo ku'incai.
Matthew 24 37 Hewa to majadi' hi tempo nabi Nuh owi, hewa toe wo'o mpai' to jadi' hi eo karata-ku Aku' Ana' Manusia'.
Matthew 24 38 Hi tempo nabi Nuh owi, kako'ia-na rata ue mowo', manusia' lempe' moto, uma ra'incai napa to neo' mporumpa' -ra. Ntora ngkoni' pai' nginu-ra-wadi, rapoponcamoko pai' mepoponcamoko moto-ra, kawae-kawae-na duu' -na nabi Nuh mesua' hi rala sakaya bohe.
Matthew 24 39 Karata-nami ue mowo' mpoliu' -ra, lako' monoto-rada napa to majadi'. Wae wo'o mpai' kalempe' -ra manusia' nto'u Aku' Ana' Manusia' nculii' tumai hi dunia'.
Matthew 24 40 Nto'u toe mpai', rodua tauna mo'ema' mobago hi bonea, hadua ra'ala', to hadua rapalahii.
Matthew 24 41 Rodua tobine to motongke' momanyu, hadua ra'ala', to hadua rapalahii.
Matthew 24 42 Toe pai' ku'uli' mo'inga' -inga' -koi, apa' uma ni'incai nto'uma Pue' -ni rata.
Matthew 24 43 "Poinono lolita rapa' -ku toi: ane na'inca ami' -mi pue' tomi jaa hangkuja ngkabengia topanako rata, bate mo'inga' -inga' -i-hawo, uma napelele' -ra mesua' hi rala tomi-na.
Matthew 24 44 Hewa toe wo'o kana rodo ami' -mokoi mpopea-a, apa' uma ni'incai tempo karata-ku Aku' Ana' Manusia'.
Matthew 24 45 "Rapa' -na ria hadua batua to monoto nono-na pai' to tida mpobago bago maradika-na. Batua toei na'ongko' maradika-na jadi' topohawa' mpohawai' batua ntani' -na pai' mpowai' -ra pongkoni' -ra butu eo-na.
Matthew 24 46 Uma mowo kamarasi' -na ane maradika-na rata nculii' ngkai pomakoa' -na pai' mporata-i bula-na mpobago bago-na.
Matthew 24 47 Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi, maradika-na mpo'ongko' -i pai' mpowai' -i kuasa mpewili' hawe'ea ka'uaa' -na.
Matthew 24 48 "Aga ane dada'a-di kehi-na batua toei, na'uli' hi rala nono-na: `Uma-ile sohi' tumai maradika-e.'
Matthew 24 49 Ngkai ree, natepu'u-mi mpoweba' hingka batua-na, pai' -i ntora ngkoni' pai' nginu hante tauna topalangu-langu.
Matthew 24 50 Ntaa' we'i, bula-na lempe' moto hewa toe, muu-mule' rata-mi maradika-na hi eo pai' hi jaa to uma na'incai.
Matthew 24 51 Batua toei raweba' ntarurua', pai' rapetadi hi mali-na, rapohewa topebagiu. Hi ria-i geo' pai' ntodohaka.
Matthew 25 1 "Ane rata nculii' -apa mpai' jadi' Magau', kajadia' hewa lolita rapa' toi: Hampulu' toronaa mopatuju hilou mpotomu topemua', hore-hore ngkeni hulu' -ra.
Matthew 25 2 Lima-ra to wojo, lima-ra to monoto nono-ra.
Matthew 25 3 Lima toronaa to wojo toera, ngkeni moto-ra hulu' -ra, aga uma-ra ngkeni lana.
Matthew 25 4 Lima toronaa to monoto nono-ra mpokeni hulu' -ra hante lana talaa-ra.
Matthew 25 5 Apa' mahae rahi karata topemua', tetunu' -ramo toronaa toera, ka'omea-na leta' omea-ramo.
Matthew 25 6 "Mentongo' bengi-mi, lako' ria-di tauna to mekio', ra'uli': `Etu-imi tumai topemua'! Mai-mokoi mpotomu-i.'
Matthew 25 7 Pemata-rami toronaa to hampulu' toera, hore-hore mporodo hulu' -ra.
Matthew 25 8 Toronaa to wojo mpo'uli' -raka ema' -ra to monoto nono-ra: `Bale, mai-kaiwo lana-ni hangkedi', neo' mate-mi-kaina hulu' -kai.'
Matthew 25 9 "Ratompoi' to monoto nono-ra toera: `Uma-kaiwo hono'! Hilou-mokoi ulu me'oli hi topobalu' lana.'
Matthew 25 10 Hilou-ramo-rawo toronaa to wojo toera mpo'oli lana. Lingku' -ra hilou, rata mpu'u-imi topemua'. Lima toronaa to monoto toera, apa' rodo ami' -mi-rana hulu' -ra, kaliliu mesua' -ramo dohe topemua' rala tomi posusaa', pai' wobo' ra'unca-mi.
Matthew 25 11 "Oti toe rata wo'o-ramo-rawo toronaa to wojo toera. Mekio' -ra ngkai mali-na, ra'uli': `Pue'! Pue'! Bea-kaka-kaiwo wobo'!'
Matthew 25 12 "Na'uli' topemua': `Uma-koi ku'incai.'"
Matthew 25 13 Napohudu Yesus lolita rapa' -na toe hewa toi: "Toe pai' kana mo'inga' -inga' -koi, apa' uma ni'incai nto'uma-a rata.
Matthew 25 14 "Ane rata nculii' -apa mpai' jadi' Magau', kajadi' -na hewa lolita rapa' tohe'i: Hadua maradika mopatuju hilou hi ngata to molaa. Kako'ia-na me'ongko', mpokio' -i pahawaa' -na napontonui doi-na, bona lingku' -na rapopodaga rapali' -ki donihi-na.
Matthew 25 15 Nawai' -ra hore-hore ntuku' pakulea' -ra. Hadua nawai' lima ncobu doi bulawa, to hadua roncobu, pai' to hadua wo'o hancobu. Pai' -i me'ongko' -mi.
Matthew 25 16 Pahawaa' to mporata lima ncobu doi bulawa toei, kaliliu napopodaga mpali' donihi-na, narata mpu'u-mi donihi-na lima ncobu wo'o.
Matthew 25 17 Wae wo'o pahawaa' to mporata roncobu, narata wo'o-hawo donihi-na roncobu.
Matthew 25 18 Aga pahawaa' to mporata hancobu-wadi, hilou-i mpokae tana' napontawui doi maradika-na.
Matthew 25 19 "Mahae ngkai ree, nculii' -imi maradika toei, pai' nakio' -ra pahawaa' -na, napongincai pompewili' -ra doi-na.
Matthew 25 20 Pahawaa' to mporata lima ncobu doi bulawa, tumai-i mpotonu hi maradika-na hampulu' ncobu, na'uli': `Maradika, to nutonu-ka wengi lima ncobu. Hilo, oi-mi ana' -na, lima ncobu wo'o.'
Matthew 25 21 "Na'uli' maradika-na: `Lompe' -mi! Nupopomako' lompe' pobago to kuwai' -koko. Wae-pi, apa' lawi' monoa' -ko hi to hangkedi', kusarumaka lau-moko hi to wori'. Mai-moko, mo'oha' hante aku', pai' goe' -moko hangkaa-ngkania hante aku'.'
Matthew 25 22 "Pahawaa' to mporata roncobu doi bulawa, rata wo'o-imi-hawo, na'uli': `Maradika, roncobu wengi to nuwai' -ka. Hilo, oi-mi ana' -na roncobu wo'o.'
Matthew 25 23 "Na'uli' maradika toei: `Lompe' -mi! Nupopomako' lompe' pobago to kuwai' -koko. Wae-pi, apa' lawi' monoa' -ko hi to hangkedi', kusarumaka lau-moko hi to wori'. Mai-moko, mo'oha' hante aku', pai' goe' -moko hangkaa-ngkania hante aku'.'
Matthew 25 24 "Oti toe, rata wo'o-imi-hawo pahawaa' to mporata hancobu, na'uli': `Maradika, ku'inca kaseke-nu. Nupepae to bela-kowo hinu'a-nu, nu'ala' to uma nukarokoi.
Matthew 25 25 Me'eka' -a, toe pai' hilou-a mpowuni doi-nu hi rala tana'. Jadi', ohe'i-mi doi-nu nculii'.'
Matthew 25 26 "Na'uli' -mi maradika toei: `Iko pahawaa' to dada'a pai' to lose! Ane nu'inca kampepae-ku to bela hinu'a-ku, ane nu'inca kampo'ala' -ku to uma kukarokoi,
Matthew 25 27 napa pai' uma nupopesua' lau doi-ku hi bank, bona ane rata-apa, kurua' nculii' hante ana' -na!'
Matthew 25 28 Na'uli' wo'o-mi maradika toei hi pahawaa' kahadua-na: `Ala' doi to hi hi'a, wai' -ki to ria-ki hampulu' ncobu.
Matthew 25 29 Apa' tauna to rasarumaka hante anu to rawai' -ki, rawai' tena-i-pidi bona kawoo-woria' -ki. Aga tauna to uma rasarumaka, anu hangkedi' to ria hi hi'a, ra'alai' lau-imi.
Matthew 25 30 Pai' pahawaa' to uma motuju tetui, petadi-imi hi mali-na hi kabengia-na. Hi ria-i ntora geo' pai' ntodohaka.'
Matthew 25 31 "Aku' Ana' Manusia', ane rata nculii' -apa mpai', mehini mpu'u-mi baraka' -ku, pai' radohei-a hawe'ea mala'eka-ku. Mohura-a mpai' moparenta hewa Magau' hi pohuraa to ncola.
Matthew 25 32 Hawe'ea manusia' morumpu hi nyanyoa-ku pai' kugaa' -ra jadi' rontuda, hewa hadua topo'ewu mpogaa' bima ngkai kebe'.
Matthew 25 33 Tauna to mpobabehi konoa Alata'ala kupahantuda hi mali ka'ana-ku, pai' tauna topesapuaka hi mali ki'ii-ku.
Matthew 25 34 "Pai' Aku' Magau', ku'uli' -raka to hi mali ka'ana-ku: `Mai-mokoi to nagane' Tuama-ku! Mesua' -mokoi hi rala Kamagaua' -ku, po'ohaa' -ni kuporodo ami' -mikokoi ngkai lomo' kajadi' dunia'.
Matthew 25 35 Apa' nto'u-ku mo'oro', niwai' -a pongkoni'. Ngkamara-a, niwai' -a ue ininu. Liu-a hi tomi-ni, nipopehani-a.
Matthew 25 36 Uma ria pohea-ku, niwai' -a pohea. Peda' -a, nikinomo-a. Hi rala tarungku' -a, nipencuai' -a.'
Matthew 25 37 "Metompoi' -ra to hi mali ka'ana-ku, ra'uli': `Pue', nto'uma-ko kihilo mo'oro' pai' kiwai' -ko koni', ba ngkamara pai' kiwai' -ko ue?
Matthew 25 38 Nto'uma-ko liu hi tomi-kai, pai' kipopehani-ko? Nto'uma-ko kihilo uma ria pohea-nu, pai' kiwai' -ko pohea?
Matthew 25 39 Nto'uma-ko kihilo peda' ba hi rala tarungku', pai' tilou-kai mpencuai' -ko?'
Matthew 25 40 "Pai' Aku' Magau', kutompoi' -ra: `Bona ni'inca: napa to nibabehi mpotulungi ompi' -ku tohe'ira lau, nau' hadua ompi' -ku to kedi' lia katuwu' -na, batua-na, hibalia nibabehi hi Aku' -mi.'
Matthew 25 41 "Oti toe mpai', ku'uli' -raka to hi mali ki'ii-ku: `Malai-mokoi ngkai rei, koi' to natotowi Tuama-ku! Mesua' -mokoi hi rala apu to jela' ncuu, to raporodo ami' -miki Magau' Anudaa' pai' mala'eka to mpotuku' -i.
Matthew 25 42 Apa' nto'u-ku mo'oro', uma-a niwai' koni'. Ngkamara-a, uma-a niwai' ue ininu.
Matthew 25 43 Liu-a hi tomi-ni, uma-a nipopehani. Uma ria pohea-ku, uma-a niwai' pohea. Peda' -a, hi rala tarungku' -a, uma-a nipencuai'.'
Matthew 25 44 "Ra'uli' wo'o-mi-rawo mpai' mpo'uli' -ka: `Pue', nto'uma-ko kihilo mo'oro' ba ngkamara ba hewa tauna toliu, ba uma-ko moheai, ba peda' ba ratarungku', pai' uma-ko kitulungi?'
Matthew 25 45 "Pai' Aku' Magau', kutompoi' -ra: `Bona ni'inca: apa' uma-koina nitulungi-ra tauna to kedi' tuwu' -ra tohe'i-era lau, batua-na, Aku' -mi to uma nitulungi tetu-e.'"
Matthew 25 46 Napohudu Yesus lolita-na, na'uli': "Hawe'ea tauna to dada'a toera lau ratadi hi rala naraka pai' rahuku' duu' kahae-hae-na, pai' tauna to monoa' mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na."
Matthew 26 1 Kahudu-na Yesus mpololita hawe'ea tohe'e, na'uli' mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na:
Matthew 26 2 "Ni'inca wa karo'eo-na-damo eo bohe Paskah? Pai' Aku' Ana' Manusia' rapewai' hi pale bali' -ku bona raparika'."
Matthew 26 3 Nto'u toe, imam pangkeni pai' totu'a to Yahudi morumpu hi tomi Imam Bohe to rahanga' Kayafas.
Matthew 26 4 Mohawa' -ramo, ra'uli': "Beiwa akala-ta mpolede pai' mpohoko' Yesus bona rapatehi-ie?
Matthew 26 5 Agina neo' ulu tahoko' -i nto'u eo bohe, nee-neo' mpai' bara' ntodea."
Matthew 26 6 Nto'u Yesus hi ngata Betania, hilou-i hi tomi hadua tauna to rahanga' Simon topohaki' poko'.
Matthew 26 7 Bula-na hi ree, rata hadua tobine ngkeni hameha' butolo' ihia' lana honga to masuli' lia oli-na. Bula-na Yesus ngkoni', tumai tobine toei mpotua lana honga toe hi woo' -na tanda pebila' -na.
Matthew 26 8 Karahilo-na ana'guru-na napa to nababehi tobine toei, moroe-ramo, ra'uli': "Napa-hawo pai' rakerei lana to masuli' oli-na hewa tetu?
Matthew 26 9 Ke agina rapobalu' lau bona oli-na rawai' -raka tokabu."
Matthew 26 10 Na'inca Yesus pekiri-ra, toe pai' na'uli' -raka: "Napa pai' nipedahi nono-na tobine toei! To nababehi hi Aku' toe-le, lompe'.
Matthew 26 11 Apa' tokabu-hana, ria oa' loga-ni mpotulungi-ra apa' ria oa' -ra doo-ni. Aga Aku', uma-a mpai' ria oa' doo-ni.
Matthew 26 12 Natuai-a hante lana toe, mpakasadia ami' woto-ku hi karatana-ku mpai'.
Matthew 26 13 Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: hi humalili' dunia', hiapa-apa Kareba Lompe' rapalele, napa to nababehi tobine toei we'i bate ralolita, uma mpai' ralipo' -lipo'."
Matthew 26 14 Nto'u toe, hadua ngkai ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua, to rahanga' Yudas Iskariot, hilou hi imam pangkeni.
Matthew 26 15 Na'uli' -raka: "Ane kutonu Yesus hi rala pale-ni, napa to niwai' -ka?" Rabila' -mi doi pera' tolu mpulu', pai' rawai' -ki.
Matthew 26 16 Ngkai ree, Yudas mpopali' loga to lompe' mpobalu' Yesus hi bali' -na.
Matthew 26 17 Hi eo to lomo' -na hi Posusa' Roti to Uma Raragii, rata-ramo ana'guru-na hi Yesus, ra'uli' -ki: "Hiapa konoa-nu kiporodo pongkoni' Paskah to takoni' -e mpai'?"
Matthew 26 18 Na'uli' -raka: "Hilou-mokoi hi rala ngata hi tomi ni'anu, uli' -ki hewa toi: `Na'uli' Guru: Rata-mi tempo-ku, doko' -a mo'eo bohe Paskah hi tomi-nu hante ana'guru-ku.'"
Matthew 26 19 Ana'guru Yesus toera, hilou mpu'u-ramo hewa to nahubui-raka, pai' -ra mporodo-mi pongkoni' Paskah.
Matthew 26 20 Kamobengi-na, Yesus hante ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua mohura ngkoni'.
Matthew 26 21 Bula-ra ngkoni' toe, na'uli' -mi Yesus: "Pe'epei-koi: hadua ngkai olo' -ni mpobalu' -a mpai' hi bali' -ku."
Matthew 26 22 Mpo'epe tohe'e, peda' -mi nono-ra ana'guru-na, pai' mepekune' -ramo hadua bo hadua hi Yesus, ra'uli': "Bela-hawo aku' to nutoa' -e Pue'?"
Matthew 26 23 Na'uli' Yesus: "Tauna to mpololo' roti hi banga' uta hangkaa-ngkania hante Aku', hi'a-mi to mpobalu' -a.
Matthew 26 24 Makono mpu'u, Aku' Ana' Manusia' bate mate hewa to ralowa hi rala Buku Tomoroli' -e. Aga mpe'ahii' tauna to mpobalu' -a tetui. Ke lompe' lau-pi ane uma-i na'ote tina-na."
Matthew 26 25 Ngkai ree, na'uli' wo'o-mi-hawo Yudas, to mpobalu' -ie mpai': "Bela-hawo aku' to nutoa' -e Guru?" Na'uli' Yesus: "Hewa to nu'uli' tetu-midi!"
Matthew 26 26 Bula-ra ngkoni', na'ala' -mi Yesus roti pai' naposampayai mpo'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala. Oti toe, napihe-pihe pai' natonu-raka ana'guru-na, na'uli': "Ala' -mi, koni' -mi. Toi-mi woto-ku."
Matthew 26 27 Oti toe na'ala' wo'o sangkiri' to ihia' anggur, na'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala pai' natonu-raka, na'uli': "Nginu-mokoi omea,
Matthew 26 28 apa' toi-mi raa' -ku to rabowo ane mate-a mpai'. Raa' -ku toi mpai' mporohoi pojanci to mpoposidai' Alata'ala hante manusia', bona jeko' tauna to wori' ra'ampungi.
Matthew 26 29 Bona ni'inca: ntepu'u ngkai wae lau, uma-apa nginu anggur duu' -na rata tempo-na Tuama-ku jadi' Magau' hi dunia' bo'u. Nto'u toe mpai' mpo'inu-a anggur to bo'u hangkaa-ngkania hante koi' hi rala Kamagaua' -na."
Matthew 26 30 Oti toe morona' -ramo hanyala rona' pe'une'. Kahudu-ra morona', malai-ramo ngkai ngata hilou hi Bulu' Zaitun.
Matthew 26 31 Na'uli' -mi Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Bengi toe mpai' lau, hawe'ea-ni, molengo pepangala' -ni hi Aku', apa' ria te'uki' Lolita Alata'ala to mpo'uli' hewa toi: `Kupatehi topo'ewu toei, pai' bima inewu-na pagaa' -gaa' -ramo.'
Matthew 26 32 Aga ane tuwu' nculii' -apa mpai', meri'ulu-a hilou hi tana' Galilea, bona hirua' hi ria-ta-damo mpai'."
Matthew 26 33 Ngkai ree, na'uli' -mi Petrus: "Nau' hawe'ea tauna molengo pepangala' -ra hi Iko Pue', aku' uma!"
Matthew 26 34 Na'uli' Yesus: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -koko: kako'ia-na turua' manu' bengi toe mpai' lau, mpolia' tolu ngkani-moko mposapu kanu'inca-ku."
Matthew 26 35 Na'uli' Petrus: "Nau' -a mate hangkaa-ngkania dohe-nu, uma mpu'u kusapu kaku'inca-nu!" Wae wo'o-rawo pololita-ra ana'guru-na to ntani' -na.
Matthew 26 36 Oti toe, rata-ramo hi pampa to rahanga' Getsemani. Hi ree-i mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Koi', mohura hi rei-mokoi. Aku', lou hi ree-a mai ulu mosampaya."
Matthew 26 37 Aga Petrus pai' ana' Zebedeus to rodua, nabawai-ra hilou dohe-na. Nto'u toe, susa' pai' mokaratu-mi nono-na.
Matthew 26 38 Na'uli' -raka: "Susa' lia nono-ku, hewa to neo' mate-ama ku'epe. Rehe'i-mokoi ulu, dohei-a mojaga."
Matthew 26 39 Oti toe hilou-imi molaa hangkedi', pai' -i motumpa, mosampaya, na'uli': "Tuama-ku, ane ma'ala, pomolaa-ka-kuwo kaparia to neo' mporumpa' -a toi. Aga bela konoa-ku Aku' to jadi', agina konoa-nu Iko moto."
Matthew 26 40 Oti toe, nculii' -imi hi ana'guru-na to tolu toera, narata-ra bula-ra leta' moto. Na'uli' mpo'uli' -ki Petrus: "Hilo! Hajaa-wadi uma nidadahi mojaga dohe-ku?
Matthew 26 41 Mojaga pai' mosampaya-mokoi bona neo' -koi mporata pesori. Hi rala nono-ni dota moto-koi mpobabehi to makono, aga uma nidadahi apa' manusia' bate lente."
Matthew 26 42 Ngkai ree, hilou wo'o-imi mosampaya, na'uli': "Tuama-ku, ane kaparia toi uma ma'ala rawi'iha-ka, bate konoa-numi to majadi'."
Matthew 26 43 Oti toe, nculii' wo'o-imi mporata ana'guru-na, leta' wo'o-ra-wadi apa' mopoke' mata-ra.
Matthew 26 44 Hangkani wo'o-ipi Yesus mpalahii-ra hilou mosampaya katolu ngkani-na. Posampaya-na toe hibalia hante posampaya-na to we'i.
Matthew 26 45 Ka'oti-na mosampaya toe, nculii' wo'o-imi hi ana'guru-na to tolu toera, pai' na'uli' -raka: "Turu pai' leta' oa' -pada-koi? Hilo-dile, rata-mi tempo-na Aku' Ana' Manusia' rapobalu' pai' ratonu hi tauna to dada'a.
Matthew 26 46 Memata-mokoi! Hilo, etu-imi tumai tauna to mpobalu' -a. Kita-mi lou."
Matthew 26 47 Bula-na Yesus mololita-pidi, rata-imi Yudas, hadua ngkai ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua. Pai' dohe-na wori' wo'o tau ntani' -na to ngkeni piho' pai' sumampu. Hira' toe rapahawa' imam pangkeni pai' totu'a to Yahudi.
Matthew 26 48 Yudas mpo'uli' ami' -miraka tanda bona ra'inca kato'uma-nai Yesus, na'uli': "Hema mpai' to ku'eki, Hi'a-mi Yesus. Hoko' -imi!"
Matthew 26 49 Jadi', karata-ra hi ree, kahilou-nami Yudas mpohirua' -ki Yesus, na'uli': "Wori' tabe, Guru!" pai' na'eki-i ntuku' ada-ra to Yahudi.
Matthew 26 50 Na'uli' Yesus: "Toe-tanoe pai' tumai-koe, bale!" Katumai-rami tauna to wori' mpohoko' Yesus.
Matthew 26 51 Ngkai ree, hadua tauna to dohe Yesus mpowute' piho' -na natime-ki batua Imam Bohe, bela mpoholu tilinga-na.
Matthew 26 52 Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Unco' nculii' piho' -nu! Apa' hema to mpohenta piho' mpopatehi doo, bate rapatehi wo'o-i-hawo mpai' hante piho'.
Matthew 26 53 Ha uma nu'incai, ane mpopetulungi-a hi Tuama-ku, napesahui mpahawa' tumai hampulu' rontuda tantara mala'eka-na, ba melabi tena!
Matthew 26 54 Aga ane ta'ewa-ra to mpohoko' -a toi-e, uma mpai' madupa' lolita to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' owi to mpo'uli' hawe'ea toe lau kana majadi' hi Aku'."
Matthew 26 55 Nto'u toe, na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus mpo'uli' -raka tauna to wori' toera: "Ha toperampaki-a toi-e, pai' mingki' tumai-koi ntali piho' pai' sumampu mpohoko' -ae! Butu eo-na mohura moto-a hi rala Tomi Alata'ala metudui', napa pai' uma-a nihoko' nto'u toe?
Matthew 26 56 Aga to hewa toi-le kana majadi', bona madupa' -mi napa to ra'uki' nabi-nabi owi hi rala Buku Tomoroli'." Oti toe, metibo' -ramo hawe'ea ana'guru-na mpalahii-i.
Matthew 26 57 Ngkai ree, tauna to mpohoko' Yesus mpokeni-i hilou hi tomi Imam Bohe Kayafas. Hi ria morumpu-ramo guru-guru agama pai' totu'a to Yahudi.
Matthew 26 58 Petrus metuku' ngkawao-wadi, duu' -na rata hi berewe tomi Imam Bohe. Mesua' -i hi berewe pai' -i mohura dohe topojaga, apa' doko' na'inca ba napa mpai' to majadi' hi Yesus.
Matthew 26 59 Nto'u toe, imam pangkeni pai' hawe'ea topohura agama morumpu hi tomi Kayafas. Mpali' -ra sabi' boa' to mpakilu Yesus, bona ngalai' rahuku' mate-i.
Matthew 26 60 Aga nau' wori' sabi' boa' to mpo'uli' napa to nababehi Yesus, uma raruai' to masipato' rahuku' mate-ki. Ka'omea-na, ria rodua sabi' to tumai hi nyanyoa topohura to hibalia lolita-ra,
Matthew 26 61 ra'uli': "Tauna toii, ria-i-hana mpo'uli': `Tomi Alata'ala ma'ala kugero, pai' rala-na tolu eo kuwangu nculii'.'"
Matthew 26 62 Kamokore-nami Imam Bohe pai' -i mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Ha uma nutompoi' -ra to mpakilu-ko toe-e?"
Matthew 26 63 Aga Yesus, uma-i winihi. Na'uli' wo'o-mi Imam Bohe: "Hante hanga' Alata'ala to Tuwu', uli' -kakai to makono! Makono mpu'u ka'Iko-na Magau' Topetolo', Ana' Alata'ala-e?"
Matthew 26 64 Na'uli' Yesus: "Io', hewa to nu'uli' tetu-e. Pai' ku'uli' tena: rata mpai' tempo-na nihilo-a Aku' Ana' Manusia', mohura pai' moparenta hi mali ka'ana Alata'ala to Mobaraka', pai' nihilo wo'o-a mpai' mana'u tumai ngkai suruga hi rala limu'."
Matthew 26 65 Mpo'epe toe we'i, Imam Bohe mpoheu' baju-na ngkai kamoroe-na, pai' na'uli': "Tau toii mpopohibalia woto-na hante Alata'ala! Uma-pi mingki' ria sabi'. Ni'epe moto-mi-koiwo lolita-na mpokedi' Alata'ala.
Matthew 26 66 Beiwa-mi-koiwo pompowile-nie?" Ratompoi' topohura: "Kana rahuku' mate-imile!"
Matthew 26 67 Ngkai ree, ra'uelikui lio-na pai' -i raweba'. Ria wo'o to mpohopo' -i, pai' ra'uli' -ki:
Matthew 26 68 "Ee Magau' Topetolo'! Pe'uli' pe' ba hema to mpohopo' -koe!"
Matthew 26 69 Nto'u toe, Petrus mohura hi berewe. Nto'u pohura-na toe, tumai hadua tobine to mobago hi tomi Imam Bohe, na'uli' -ki Petrus: "Ba iko wo'o-di doo-na Yesus to Galilea toei-e mai?"
Matthew 26 70 Aga nasapu Petrus hi nyanyoa-ra omea, na'uli': "Uma-kuna ku'incai napa to nu'uli'!"
Matthew 26 71 Ngkai ree hilou wo'o-imi Petrus mokore mohu' hi wobo' wala. Ria wo'o hadua tobine mpohilo-i pai' mpo'uli' -raka tauna to hi ree: "Hi'a toi wo'o-le to dohe Yesus to Nazaret toei-e mai."
Matthew 26 72 Nasapu wo'o-wadi Petrus hante mosumpa, na'uli': "Uma-kuna ku'incai-i tau tetui!"
Matthew 26 73 Uma mahae ngkai ree, tauna to mokore hi ree mpomohui' Petrus, ra'uli' -ki: "Iko mpu'u-di hadua doo-nae! Incana ngkai kotu basa-nu Katogalilea-nu."
Matthew 26 74 Mosumpa tena-i Petrus mpotuna' woto-na, na'uli': "Uma mpu'u-kuwo ku'incai-i!" Nto'u toe turua' -mi manu'.
Matthew 26 75 Nakiwoi-mi Petrus lolita Yesus ngone to mpo'uli' -ki: "Kako'ia-na turua' manu', mpolia' tolu ngkani-moko mposapu kanu'inca-ku." Kamalai-nami Petrus hilou hi mali-na, pai' -i geo' ngkai kapeda' nono-na.
Matthew 27 1 Mepupulo ngkii, hawe'ea imam pangkeni pai' totu'a to Yahudi mpobotuhi: Yesus kana rapatehi.
Matthew 27 2 Jadi', rahoo' -imi pai' rakeni hilou rabua' hi Gubernur Pilatus.
Matthew 27 3 Ane Yudas, to mpobalu' Yesus hi bali' -na toei, kana'inca-na karahuku' mate-na mpai' Yesus, soho' -mi nono-na. Kahilou-nami hi imam pangkeni pai' totu'a to Yahudi, napoponculi' -raka doi pera' to tolu mpulu' mpepa',
Matthew 27 4 pai' na'uli': "Mojeko' -ama! Mpobalu' -a-kuna tauna to uma masala', alaa-na rahuku' mate-i!" Ratompoi' -i: "Napa ki'uli' kai'! Iko moto-kowo pue' sala'!"
Matthew 27 5 Ngkai ree, Yudas mpetadi doi tohe'e hi rala Tomi Alata'ala, pai' -i hilou mengkahunca'.
Matthew 27 6 Imam pangkeni mpotima' doi toe, pai' ra'uli': "Doi toi, doi posula' raa'. Ntuku' atura agama, doi to hewa tohe'e uma ma'ala rapuna' hi rala peti' pompunaa' doi pepue' hi Tomi Alata'ala."
Matthew 27 7 Hibalia-mi pohawa' -ra, doi toe ra'oli-ki tana' to rahanga' Tana' Topobabehi Kura, bona tana' toe rapontanai-raka tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi.
Matthew 27 8 Toe pai' tana' toe rahanga' Tana' Raa' duu' tempo toi.
Matthew 27 9 Hante babehia-ra toe, madupa' -mi napa to nalowa nabi Yeremia owi, hewa toi moni-na: "Ntuku' ada to Israel, oli hadua batua tolu mpulu' doi pera'. Jadi', ra'ala' -mi tolu mpulu' doi pera' toe,
Matthew 27 10 pai' ra'oli-ki tana' topobabehi kura. Tohe'e majadi' ntuku' hawa' Pue' Alata'ala hi aku'."
Matthew 27 11 Ane Yesus we'i, karakeni-na hi Gubernur Pilatus, mokore-i hi nyanyoa-na. Pilatus mpekune' -i: "Ha Iko mpu'u-mi Magau' to Yahudi-e?" Na'uli' Yesus: "Wae mpu'u, hewa to nu'uli' tetu."
Matthew 27 12 Imam pangkeni pai' totu'a to Yahudi mpodulu mpakilu-i. Aga uma-i winihi.
Matthew 27 13 Toe pai' Pilatus mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Ha uma nu'epei hawe'ea to rapakilu-kokoe?"
Matthew 27 14 Uma hamelaa nahono' Yesus, alaa-na napokakonce lia Gubernur.
