Mark 12 6 "Uma-pi hema to napahawa' pue' bonea toei, metoro hadua ana' woto-na to nape'ahi' -damo. Ka'omea-na napahawa' ana' -na toe hilou hi to mpodoo bonea-na, na'uli': `Bate rapengkorui-ile mpai'.'
Mark 12 7 "Ntaa' we'i, to mpodoo bonea toera, mohawa' -ramo ra'uli': `Etu-mi tumai ana' -na, hi'a mpai' to jadi' pue' bonea toi-e. Kita tapatehi-i, bona bonea-na toi kita' -mi pue' -na.'
Mark 12 8 Karahoko' -nami ana' toei, rapatehi pai' ratadi hi mali bonea."
Mark 12 9 Ngkai ree, Yesus mpo'uli' -raka pangkeni to Yahudi: "Jadi', napa-mi to nababehi pue' bonea toei? Bate tumai-ile mpopatehi-ra to mpodoo bonea-na, pai' bonea-na nawai' -raka tau ntani' -na.
Mark 12 10 Tantu nibasa-mi lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpolowa pesapuaka-ni hi Aku', hewa toi moni-na: `Watu to ratadi topowangu tomi, watu toe lau-mi to jadi' poko parawatu.
Mark 12 11 Tohe'e majadi' ntuku' konoa Pue' Ala, uma mowo kalompe' -na hi poncilo-ta.'"
Mark 12 12 Kara'epe-na pangkeni to Yahudi lolita-na Yesus tohe'e, doko' rahoko' -i apa' ra'inca kahira' -na to natoa' hante lolita rapa' toe. Aga uma-ra daho' mpohoko' -i, apa' mpoka'eka' -ra ntodea. Jadi', malai-ramo mpalahii-i.
Mark 12 13 Ngkai ree, pangkeni to Yahudi mpohubui ba hangkuja dua to Parisi pai' tauna to tono' hi Magau' Herodes hilou hi Yesus. Patuju-ra doko' mpahala'nawu' -i hante pompekunea' -ra.
Mark 12 14 Karata-ra hi Yesus, ra'uli' -ki: "Guru, ki'inca Guru tau monoa'. Metudui' -ko hante kalonto' -lonto' -na mpo'uli' napa konoa Alata'ala hi manusia'. Uma nupengkorui ba hema-hema, apa' uma-ko mpelence tauna. Toe pai' kipekune' -ko: ntuku' atura agama-ta, ba ma'ala moto-ta mpobayari paja' hi Kaisar, ba uma-di? Kana tabayari, ba uma mingki' tabayari?"
Mark 12 15 Na'inca Yesus patuju nono-ra to tewunii'. Toe pai' na'uli' -raka: "Napa pai' nipali' kahala'kedoa' pololita-kue? Keni pe' tumai doi to biasa nibayari-ki paja', doko' kuhilo."
Mark 12 16 Ngkai ree, ratonu-miki hampepa' doi pera'. Na'uli': "Lence hema pai' hanga' hema to hi doi toi?" Ra'uli': "Lence pai' hanga' Kaisar."
Mark 12 17 Na'uli': "Ane wae-di, wai' -ki Kaisar napa to masipato' rawai' -ki Kaisar. Pai' wai' -ki Alata'ala napa to masipato' rawai' -ki Alata'ala." Konce-ramo mpo'epe tompoi' -na toe.
Mark 12 18 Oti toe, ba hangkuja dua to Saduki rata hi Yesus. To Saduki toera, pangkeni agama Yahudi to mposapuaka tauna to mate tuwu' nculii' hi eo mpeno. Karata to Saduki toera, ra'uli' -ki Yesus:
Mark 12 19 "Guru, nabi Musa mpo'uki' hi rala buku atura hewa toi: ane hadua tomane mate hiaa' uma-ki ria ana' -na, pudupuhe-na kana mpotobine balu-na bona ria-ki-hawo muli-na.
Mark 12 20 Jadi', ria pitu to ntali ompi' paka' tomane. To ulumua' motobinei, mate-i uma ria ana' -na.
Mark 12 21 Tu'ai-na mpotobine balu-na. Mate wo'o-i-wadi-hawo, hiaa' ko'ia-i mo'anai'. Wae wo'o to majadi' hi katolu-na,
Mark 12 22 duu' rata hi kapitu-na. Mate omea-ramo hante uma ria ana' -ra. Ka'omea-na, mate wo'o-imi-hawo tobine toei.
Mark 12 23 Jadi', hi eo mpeno, ane tuwu' nculii' mpu'u-di hawe'ea tomate-e, hema-ramo mpai' pue' tobine toei, apa' pitu-ramo to mpotobine-i."
Mark 12 24 Na'uli' Yesus: "Sala' mpu'u pekiri-ni tetu-e, apa' uma nipaha ihi' Buku Tomoroli', uma wo'o ni'incai baraka' -na Alata'ala.
Mark 12 25 Apa' ane tuwu' nculii' -ramo tauna to mate, katuwu' -ra hewa katuwu' mala'eka hi rala suruga, uma-rapa motobinei ba motomanei.
Mark 12 26 Ha ko'ia ria nibasa lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpakanoto katuwu' -ra nculii' tomate-e? Hi rala buku Atura Musa, tabasa tutura-na beiwa Alata'ala mpololitai nabi Musa ngkai rala julumpu to jela'. Nto'u toe, Abraham, Ishak pai' Yakub mahae-ramo mate. Aga nau' wae, Alata'ala mpo'uli' -ki Musa hewa toi: `Aku' toi-mi Alata'ala to napue' Abraham, Alata'ala to napue' Ishak, Alata'ala to napue' Yakub.'
Mark 12 27 Jadi', ngkai lolita-na Alata'ala toe, monoto-mi ta'inca katuwu' -ra moto Abraham, Ishak pai' Yakub. Apa' bela tauna to mate to mepue' hi Alata'ala, tauna to tuwu' -hana to mpopue' -i. Sala' rahi-koina pekiri-ni tetu-e."
Mark 12 28 Nto'u toe, hadua guru agama Yahudi rata hi Yesus. Na'epe pomehono' -ra to Saduki hante Yesus we'i, pai' na'uli' hi rala nono-na: "Lompe' mpu'u tompoi' -na Yesus tetui!" Toe pai' mepekune' wo'o-imi-hawo hi Yesus, na'uli': "Parenta to'uma to poko-na ngkai hawe'ea parenta?"
Mark 12 29 Na'uli' Yesus: "Toi-mi parenta to poko-na: `Pe'epei-koi to Israel! Pue' -ta Pue' Alata'ala hadua-na-wadi.
Mark 12 30 Kana tapoka'ahi' -i hante nono-ta mpu'u, tatonu hawe'ea katuwu' -ta hi Hi'a, tapoka'ahi' -i hudu inca-ta pai' hudu pakulea' -ta.'
Mark 12 31 Pai' tohe'i-mi parenta karonyala-na: `Kana tapoka'ahi' doo-ta hewa pompoka'ahi' -ta woto-ta moto.' Uma ria parenta ntani' -na to meliu kabohe-na ngkai to ronyala tohe'i."
Mark 12 32 Na'uli' -mi guru agama toei hi Yesus: "Makono mpu'u-di Guru! Makono lia to nu'uli' tetu-e. Pue' Ala bate hadua-na-wadi, uma ria ntani' -na.
Mark 12 33 Pai' kana tapoka'ahi' -i hante nono-ta mpu'u, hante hawe'ea pekiri-ta pai' hudu pakulea' -ta. Pai' kana tapoka'ahi' doo-ta hewa woto-ta moto. Toe to meliu kalompe' -na ngkai hawe'ea porewua pai' rewa ntani' -na to tapopepue' hi Alata'ala."
Mark 12 34 Na'epe Yesus kamonoto tompoi' -na tauna toei. Toe pai' na'uli' -ki: "Neo' jadi' ntodea hi rala Kamagaua' Alata'ala mpu'u-moko!" Ngkai ree, uma-pi hema to daho' mpekune' ba napa-napa hi Yesus.
Mark 12 35 Nto'u-na Yesus metudui' hi Tomi Alata'ala, na'uli': "Napa pai' guru agama mpo'uli' Magau' Topetolo' muli-na Magau' Daud?
Mark 12 36  
Mark 12 37 Hiaa' bo Daud moto mpokahangai' -i Pue' -na. Hante petete' Inoha' Tomoroli' Daud mpotompo'wiwi Magau' Topetolo' hewa toi: Pue' Ala mpo'uli' -ki Pue' -ku: `Mohura-moko hi mali ngka'ana-ku duu' -na kupopengkoru hawe'ea bali' -nu hi Iko.'
Mark 12 38 Nto'u-na Yesus mpotudui' ntodea, na'uli' -raka: "Pelompehi-koi, neo' -koi mpenau' kehi-ra guru agama. Goe' -ra modao' mpopake' baju to moloe, pai' goe' -ra ane tauna hi wiwi' karajaa motingkua' mpotabe-ra.
Mark 12 39 Goe' -ra rapopohura hi pohuraa karabilaa' hi tomi posampayaa. Goe' -ra ane rapopohura-ra hi pohuraa to lompe' hi posusaa'.
Mark 12 40 Mpobagiu-ra tobine tobalu, pai' -ra mpohagoi tomi-ra. Rawunii' kadada'a gau' -ra tohe'e hante mosampaya rapomoloe-loe. Motomo lia mpai' huku' -ra."
Mark 12 41 Yesus mohura mohu' peti' pompunaa' doi pepue', pai' -i mponaa tauna to mpopuna' doi pepue' -ra hi rala-na. Wori' tauna to mo'ua' mpopuna' doi uma hangke-ngkedi'.
Mark 12 42 Nto'u toe, rata wo'o-hawo hadua tobine tobalu to mpe'ahii' tuwu' -na, napuna' wo'o-hawo doi pepue' -na. To napuna' tohe'e, rompepa' doi ngkala, hangkedi' lia oli-na.
Mark 12 43 Yesus mpokio' ana'guru-na pai' na'uli' -raka: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: tobalu to mpe'ahii' tuwu' -na tohe'e mai, meliu pewai' -na ngkai pewai' to rapuna' hawe'ea tau ntani' -na.
Mark 12 44 Apa' hira' mewai' ngkai labi ka'uaa' -ra. Tapi' tobine toei, nau' hewa apa-mi kampe'ahii' -na, napewai' omea-mi to ria hi hi'a, nau' kakono-na to naparaluu-hawo hi katuwu' -na eo-eo-na."
Mark 13 1 Oti toe, malai-imi Yesus ngkai rala Tomi Alata'ala. Ria hadua ngkai ana'guru-na mpo'uli' -ki: "Guru, hilo mpu'u-konae' tomi toe-e! Hilo watu-na! Uma mowo kancola-na!"
Mark 13 2 Na'uli' Yesus: "Nuhilo wa tomi to bohe toe-e lau? Uma mpai' ria hamehaa' watu to bate pomeduncu-na. Bate ragero omea mpai'."
Mark 13 3 Oti toe, hilou-imi Yesus hi Bulu' Zaitun pai' -i mohura mposinyanyohi-ki Tomi Alata'ala. Petrus, Yakobus, Yohanes pai' Andreas tumai mpololitai-i nto'u uma ria tau ntani' -na.
Mark 13 4 Ra'uli': "Uli' -kakai ba nto'uma kadupa' -na to nu'uli' toe-e we'i, pai' napa mpai' to jadi' tanda ane hawe'ea toe neo' madupa' -pi."
Mark 13 5 Na'uli' Yesus: "Pelompehi, neo' -koi ma'ala rabagiu.
Mark 13 6 Apa' wori' mpai' tauna to mehupa' to mpo'uli' kahira' -na Magau' Topetolo', alaa-na wori' mpai' tauna to rabagiu.
Mark 13 7 Mpo'epe-koi mpai' kareba panga'ea ngkai kalaa-na, ni'epe wo'o moni panga'ea to mohu'. Aga neo' me'eka', apa' hawe'ea toe kana jadi' ulu, tapi' kajadia' toe uma mpobatuai karata-nami kahudua dunia'.
Mark 13 8 Nto'u toe mpai', wori' ngata mosipanga'ei, magau' hadua mpo'ewa magau' kahadua-na. Hiapa-apa ria linu pai' oro'. Aga hawe'ea toe lau lako' pontepu'ua-na-pidi, hewa pontodohaka hadua tobine to neo' mo'ana'.
Mark 13 9 "Aga koi' tohe'i, mo'inga' -inga' -koi! Apa' koi' mpai' bate rahoko' pai' rakeni hi topohura agama. Raweba' -koi hi rala tomi posampayaa. Rabua' -koi hi topoparenta pai' hi magau' sabana petuku' -ni hi Aku'. Nto'u toe mpai', ria loga-ni mpo'uli' -raka pepangala' -ni hi Aku'.
Mark 13 10 Pai' Kareba Lompe' kana raparata hi humalili' dunia' kako'ia-na Eo Kiama.
Mark 13 11 Ane rahoko' -koi pai' rakeni hi topohura, neo' -koi me'eka' ba napa mpai' petompoi' -ni. Ane rata-damo tempo-ni mololita, uli' -mi-hana napa to natu'u Pue' Ala hi rala nono-ni. Apa' napa to ni'uli' nto'u toe, bela ngkai pekiri-ni moto. Lolita-ni tetu mehupa' ngkai Inoha' Tomoroli'.
Mark 13 12  
Mark 13 13 "Rata mpai' tempo-na hawe'ea tauna mpokahuku' -koi sabana petuku' -ni hi Aku'. Ria mpai' tauna to mpewai' ompi' -ra ba ana' -ra moto bona rapatehi sabana petuku' -ra hi Aku'. Ria wo'o ana' to mpo'ewa totu'a-ra pai' mpopatehi-ra. Aga tauna to tida mepangala' hi Aku' duu' hi ka'omea-na, mporata-ra kalompea' hi eo mpeno.
Mark 13 14 "Owi nabi Daniel mpolowa karata-na to rahanga' `Topegerohi to dada'a.' (Hema to mpobasa lolita pelowa toe, penotohi mpu'u batua-na!) Jadi', ane nihilo to nalowa Daniel toe mokore hi pokorea to ratagi-ki, agina tauna to mo'oha' hi Yudea metibo' hilou hi bulu' -na.
Mark 13 15 Tauna to mohura hi parawa-na neo' -pi leba' mesua' hi rala tomi-na mpo'ala' ba napa-napa.
Mark 13 16 Tauna to hi bonea, neo' -pi nculii' hi ngata mpo'ala' pohea-na. Kaliliu metibo'!
Mark 13 17 Mpe'ahii' -ra mpai' tobine to nto'u-ra motina'i pai' to mpentii' ana' -ra nto'u toe, apa' mokoro mpai' petibo' -ra.
Mark 13 18 Mekakae-koi hi Alata'ala bona eo petiboa' -ni toe neo' nto'u tempo lengi'.
Mark 13 19 Apa' nto'u toe mpai' rata pesesa' to ko'ia ria hangkania jadi' ngkai lomo' -na Alata'ala mpajadi' dunia' rata tempo tohe'i, pai' uma wo'o-pi-hawo mpai' ria jadi' hi eo boko' -na.
Mark 13 20 Aga naredehi moto mpai' Pue' Ala tempo kaparia toe, apa' ane uma naredehi tempo-na, bate uma ria haduaa to tuwu'. Jadi', apa' napoka'ahi' -ra tauna to napelihi pai' to napobagia, toe pai' naredehi mpai' tempo kaparia toe.
Mark 13 21 "Nto'u toe mpai', ane ria to mpo'uli' -kokoi: `Hilo, Magau' Topetolo' ohe'i-imi,' ba `Hilo, ohe'e-i mai Magau' Topetolo',' neo' nipangalai'.
Mark 13 22 Apa' mehupa' mpai' wori' tauna to boa' to mpo'uli' kahira' -na Magau' Topetolo', ba to mpo'uli' kahira' -na nabi. Mpobabehi-ra tanda mekoncehi pai' tanda to mobaraka', bona mpobagiu-ra wori' tauna. Ane ke ma'ala, ntahawe' tauna to napelihi Alata'ala rabagiu wo'o.
Mark 13 23 Aga koi' tohe'i, mo'inga' -inga' -koi! Ku'uli' ami' -mikokoi hawe'ea tohe'e kako'ia-na jadi'.
Mark 13 24  
Mark 13 25 "Jadi', nto'u toe mpai', ane timpaliu-pi tempo kaparia toe, hawe'ea anu to mobaraka' hi langi' ralengo. Eo mobali' mobengi, wula uma-pi mehini, betue' roda' ngkai langi'.
Mark 13 26 Nto'u toe-damo mpai', hawe'ea tauna mpohilo-a, Aku' Ana' Manusia', mana'u tumai hi rala limu'. Uma mowo kabaraka' -ku pai' pehini-ku nto'u toe.
Mark 13 27 Kuhubui mala'eka-ku hilou mporumpu tauna to kupobagia ngkai humalili' dunia', ngkai wuntu dunia' pai' ngkai wuntu langi'.
Mark 13 28 "Petonoi-koi napa to kutudui' -kokoi hante lolita rapa' kaju ara. Ane nihilo rau-na mela' pai' mohulu-i, ni'inca-mi kaneo' -na mara eo.
Mark 13 29 Wae wo'o ane nihilo-damo kajadia' toe we'i lou, ni'inca-mi neo' madupa' mpu'u-mi to ku'uli' we'i.
Mark 13 30 Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: hawe'ea toe we'i bate madupa' kako'ia-na mate omea tauna to tuwu' tempo toi.
Mark 13 31 Langi' pai' dunia' mogero mpai', tapi' lolita-ku bate-bate-na duu' kahae-hae-na.
Mark 13 32 "Aga ane eo pai' jaa kadupa' -na hawe'ea toe, muntu' Tuama-ku-wadi to mpo'inca. Uma ria to ntani' -na to mpo'inca. Bangku' mala'eka to hi suruga-hawoe', uma wo'o-rawo ra'incai. Bangku' Aku' Ana' -nae', uma wo'o-kuwo ku'incai.
Mark 13 33 Toe pai' kana mo'inga' -inga' pai' mojaga-koi, apa' uma ni'incai tempo kadupa' -na.
Mark 13 34 Ane rata nculii' -apa mpai', kajadi' -na hewa lolita rapa' tohe'i. Hadua pue' tomi mopatuju hilou hi ngata to molaa. Kako'ia-na me'ongko', nahubui pahawaa' -na mpewili' tomi-na, hore-hore nawai' -ra bago-ra. Hi tompodoo wobo' na'uli' -ki: `Mo'inga' -inga' -koe'!'
Mark 13 35  
Mark 13 36 Jadi', kana mo'inga' mpu'u-ra, apa' uma ra'incai ba nto'uma karata-na pue' tomi, ba ncimonou' -di ba ntongo' bengi-di ba mepulo ngkii ba nto'u eo mehupa'. Nee-neo' mpai' rata ncorobaa-imi pai' narata-ra bula-ra leta'. Wae wo'o kana mo'inga' -inga' -koi, apa' uma ni'incai nto'uma-a rata.
Mark 13 37 Napa to ku'uli' -kokoi tohe'i, ku'uli' wo'o hi hawe'ea tauna: Mo'inga' -inga' -hawoe'!"
Mark 14 1 Ro'eo-damo rata-mi Eo Paskah pai' Posusa' Roti to uma Raragii. Imam pangkeni pai' guru agama bula-ra mpali' akala-ra mpolede Yesus bona rapatehi bongo-i.
Mark 14 2 Ra'uli': "Aga neo' ulu tababehi nto'u eo bohe, nee-neo' mpai' bara' ntodea."
Mark 14 3 Nto'u Yesus hi ngata Betania, hilou-i hi tomi hadua tauna to rahanga' Simon topohaki' poko'. Bula-na hi ree, rata hadua tobine ngkeni hameha' butolo' ihia' lana honga to masuli' lia oli-na, to rababehi ngkai rali' kaju to mohonga. Bula-na Yesus ngkoni', tobine toei mpopengka butolo' toe pai' natua hi woo' Yesus bona mpobila' -i.
Mark 14 4 Ba hangkuja dua to hi ree, moroe-ra mpohilo napa to nababehi tobine toei. Momepololitai-ramo ra'uli': "Napa-mi-hawo kalaua-na lana honga rakerei mara hewa toe!
Mark 14 5 Ke agina lau-pi-hawo rapobalu' nte oli tolu atu labi doi pera', pai' doi oli-na rawai' -raka tokabu." Toe pai' moroe-ra mpokaroe tobine toei.
Mark 14 6 Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Pelele' moto-i-hana. Napa pai' nipedahi nono-na? To nababehi hi Aku' toe-le, lompe'.
Mark 14 7 Apa' tokabu-hana, ria oa' -ra dohe-ni. Ane dota-koi ntulungi-ra, ria oa' loga-ni. Aga Aku', uma-a mpai' ria oa' dohe-ni.
Mark 14 8 Tobine toei mpobabehi napa to nakule' mpobabehi. Natuai-a hante lana honga mporodo ami' -mi woto-ku hi karatana-ku mpai', kako'ia-na rata tempo-na.
Mark 14 9 Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: hi humalili' dunia', hiapa-apa Kareba Lompe' rapalele, napa to nababehi tobine toei bate ralolita, uma mpai' ralipo' -lipo'."
Mark 14 10 Nto'u toe, hadua ngkai ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua, to rahanga' Yudas Iskariot, hilou hi imam pangkeni, mpo'uli' -raka patuju-na mpobalu' Yesus hi hira'.
Mark 14 11 Goe' -ramo mpo'epe patuju-na toe, pai' rajanci-ki rawai' -i doi. Ngkai ree, Yudas mpopali' loga to lompe' mpobalu' Yesus hi bali' -na.
Mark 14 12 Rata-mi eo to lomo' -na hi Posusa' Roti to Uma Raragii, nto'u bima Paskah rasumale'. Nto'u toe, ana'guru-na Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Hiapa-kai mporodo pongkoni' Paskah to takoni' -e mpai'? Hiapa konoa-nu?"
Mark 14 13 Yesus mpohubui rodua ana'guru-na, na'uli' -raka: "Hilou-mokoi hi rala ngata. Ria mpai' to mpohirua' -kokoi hadua tomane to ngkeni pontomua' -na oti ntomu'. Tuku' -imi.
Mark 14 14 Ane mesua' -i hi rala tomi, uli' -ki pue' tomi: `Na'uli' Guru: Hiapa-kuwo pobabehia-ku Posusa' Paskah hante ana'guru-ku?'
Mark 14 15 Pue' tomi toe mpai' mpotudo' -kokoi hameha' kamar to hi lolo-na to bohe. Kamar toe teporodo ami' -mi, hono' -mi rewa-na. Hi retu-mokoi mpai' mporodo-taka pongkoni' Paskah-ta."
Mark 14 16 Hilou mpu'u-ramo ana'guru-na to rodua toera mesua' rala ngata. Rarata mpu'u-mi hewa to na'uli' -raka, pai' -ra mporodo-mi pongkoni' Paskah.
Mark 14 17 Mobengi-mi, rata-imi Yesus hante ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua.
Mark 14 18 Bula-na mohura ngkoni', na'uli' -mi: "Pe'epei-koi: Ria hadua ngkai koi', to ngkoni' hante Aku' toe lau, to mpobalu' -a mpai' hi bali' -ku."
Mark 14 19 Mpo'epe tohe'e, kapeda' -nami nono-ra ana'guru-na, pai' mepekune' -ramo hadua bo hadua hi Yesus, ra'uli': "Bela-hawo aku' to nutoa' -e Pue'?"
Mark 14 20 Na'uli' Yesus: "To mpobalu' -ale, hadua ngkai koi' to hampulu' rodua tohe'i-e, to mpodulu' -ka.
Mark 14 21 Makono mpu'u, Aku' Ana' Manusia' bate mate hewa to ralowa hi rala Buku Tomoroli' -e. Aga mpe'ahii' tauna to mpobalu' -a tetui. Ke lompe' lau-pi ane uma-i na'ote tina-na."
Mark 14 22 Bula-ra ngkoni', na'ala' -mi Yesus roti pai' naposampayai, mpo'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala. Oti toe, napihe-pihe pai' natonu-raka, na'uli': "Ala' -mi, koni' -mi. Toi-mi woto-ku."
Mark 14 23 Oti toe na'ala' wo'o sangkiri' to ihia' anggur, na'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala pai' natonu-raka. Nginu omea-ramo ngkai sangkiri' toe.
Mark 14 24 Na'uli' -raka: "Toi-mi raa' -ku to rabowo ane mate-a mpai' bona mpotolo' wori' tauna. Raa' -ku toi mporohoi pojanci to mpoposidai' Alata'ala hante manusia'.
Mark 14 25 Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: ntepu'u ngkai wae lau, uma-apa nginu anggur duu' -na rata tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia'. Nto'u toe-damo mpai', pai' lako' ku'inu anggur to bo'u hi rala Kamagaua' -na."
Mark 14 26 Oti toe, morona' -ramo hanyala rona' pe'une'. Kahudu-ra morona', malai-ramo ngkai ngata hilou hi Bulu' Zaitun.
Mark 14 27 Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Hawe'ea-ni mpai', molengo pepangala' -ni hi Aku', apa' ria te'uki' Lolita Alata'ala to mpo'uli' hewa toi: `Kupatehi topo'ewu toei, alaa-na bima-na pagaa' -gaa' -ramo.'
Mark 14 28 Aga ane tuwu' nculii' -apa mpai', meri'ulu-a hilou hi tana' Galilea, bona hirua' hi ria-ta-damo mpai'."
Mark 14 29 Na'uli' Petrus: "Nau' hawe'ea tauna molengo pepangala' -ra hi Iko Pue', aku' uma!"
Mark 14 30 Na'uli' Yesus: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -koko: Bengi toe mpai' lau, kako'ia-na turua' manu' karongkani-na, mpolia' tolu ngkani-moko mposapu kanu'inca-ku."
Mark 14 31 Aga hangkedi' kanaperohoi-na Petrus lolita-na, na'uli': "Nau' -a mate hangkaa-ngkania dohe-nu, uma mpu'u kusapu kaku'inca-nu!" Wae wo'o-rawo lolita-ra ana'guru-na to ntani' -na.
Mark 14 32 Rata-ramo hi pampa to rahanga' Getsemani. Hi ree na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Koi', mohura hi rei-mokoi mpopea-a, bula-ku hilou mosampaya."
Mark 14 33 Aga Petrus, Yakobus pai' Yohanes nabawai hilou dohe-na. Nto'u toe pepa-mi na'epe pai' mokaratu-mi nono-na.
Mark 14 34 Na'uli' -raka: "Susa' lia nono-ku, hewa to neo' mate-ama ku'epe. Rehe'i-mokoi ulu mojaga."
Mark 14 35 Oti toe, hilou-imi molaa hangkedi', pai' -i motumpa hi tana' mosampaya. Rala posampaya-na merapi' -i bona ane ma'ala uma-i-hawo mporata kaparia toe.
Mark 14 36 Na'uli': "Tuama-ku! Uma ria to uma majadi' ane Iko Mama mpo'uli'. Wi'iha-ka-kuwo kaparia to neo' mporumpa' -a toi. Aga bela konoa-ku Aku' to jadi', agina konoa-nu Iko moto."
Mark 14 37 Oti toe, nculii' -imi hi ana'guru-na to tolu, narata-ra bula-ra leta' moto. Na'uli' mpo'uli' -ki Petrus: "Simon! Ba leta' -dako-konae! Hajaa-wadi uma nudadahi mojaga?
Mark 14 38 Mojaga pai' mosampaya-mokoi, bona neo' -koi mporata pesori. Hi rala nono-ni dota moto-koi mpobabehi to makono, aga uma nidadahi apa' manusia' bate lente."
Mark 14 39 Ngkai ree, hilou wo'o-imi mosampaya. Posampaya-na toe hibalia hante posampaya-na to lomo' -na.
Mark 14 40 Oti toe, nculii' wo'o-imi mporata ana'guru-na, leta' wo'o-ra-wadi apa' mopoke' rahi mata-ra. Nakehele-ra, aga uma-ra winihi apa' uma ra'incai ba napa to ra'uli' -ki.
Mark 14 41 Hilou wo'o-imi mosampaya katolu ngkani-na, pai' oti toe, nculii' wo'o-imi hi ana'guru-na, na'uli' -raka: "Turu pai' leta' oa' -pada-koi? Naporae' -mi! Rata-mi tempo-na Aku' Ana' Manusia' rapobalu' pai' ratonu hi tauna to dada'a.
Mark 14 42 Memata-mokoi! Hilo, etu-imi tumai to mpobalu' -a. Kita-mi lou."
Mark 14 43 Bula-na Yesus mololita-pidi, rata mpu'u-imi Yudas, hadua ngkai ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua. Pai' dohe-na wori' wo'o tau ntani' -na to ngkeni piho' pai' sumampu. Hira' toe rapahawa' imam pangkeni, guru agama pai' totu'a to Yahudi.
Mark 14 44 Yudas mpo'uli' ami' -miraka tanda bona ra'inca kato'uma-nai Yesus, na'uli': "Hema mpai' to ku'eki, Hi'a-mi. Hoko' -imi, keni-i hilou, jaga lompe' -i."
Mark 14 45 Jadi', karata-ra hi ree, kahilou-nami Yudas mpohirua' -ki Yesus, na'uli': "Guru!" pai' -i na'eki ntuku' ada-ra to Yahudi.
Mark 14 46 Katumai-rami tauna to wori' mpohoko' Yesus.
Mark 14 47 Ngkai ree, hadua tauna to mokore mohu' Yesus mpowute' piho' -na natime-ki batua Imam Bohe, bela mpoholu tilinga-na.
Mark 14 48 Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka tauna to mpohoko' -i: "Ha toperampaki-a toi-e, pai' mingki' tumai-koi ntali piho' pai' sumampu mpohoko' -ae!
Mark 14 49 Butu eo-na ria moto-a dohe-ni hi Tomi Alata'ala metudui', napa pai' uma-a nihoko' nto'u toe? Aga tohe'i kana jadi', bona madupa' -mi to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli'."
Mark 14 50 Ngkai ree, metibo' -ramo hawe'ea ana'guru-na mpalahii-i.
Mark 14 51 Ria wo'o hadua kabilasa mpotuku' Yesus nto'u toe, motapui' -i-wadi hante abe' to bula. Ria-ra to doko' mpohoko' -i,
Mark 14 52 toe pai' naroncu-mi abe' -na, pai' -i metibo' molawa.
Mark 14 53 Ngkai ree, Yesus rakeni hilou hi tomi Imam Bohe. Hi ria, morumpu-ramo hawe'ea imam pangkeni, guru agama pai' totu'a to Yahudi to ntani' -na.
Mark 14 54 Petrus metuku' ngkawao-wadi, duu' -na rata hi berewe tomi Imam Bohe. Hi ria mohura-i moneru dohe topojaga.
Mark 14 55 Nto'u toe, imam pangkeni pai' hawe'ea topohura agama mpali' sabi' to mpakilu Yesus, bona ngalai' rahuku' mate-i. Aga uma raruai' sala' -na.
Mark 14 56 Wori' moto sabi' to mpopakilu-i, aga uma hibalia lolita-ra.
Mark 14 57 Ria ba hangkuja dua to mokore pai' to mosabi' boa', ra'uli':
Mark 14 58 "Tauna toii, ki'epe-i-kaina mpo'uli' hewa toi: `Kugero Tomi Alata'ala to nawangu manusia', pai' rala-na tolu eo kuwangu to ntani' -na, to bela manusia' mpowangu.'"
Mark 14 59 Hiaa' posabi' -ra toe, uma wo'o-wadi hibalia.
Mark 14 60 Kamokore-nami Imam Bohe hi nyanyoa hawe'ea topohura, pai' na'uli' -ki Yesus: "Ha uma nutompoi' -ra to mpakilu-ko toe-e?"
Mark 14 61 Aga Yesus, uma-i winihi, uma-i metompoi' nau' hamelaa. Hangkani-pi Imam Bohe mpekune' -i: "Ha Iko mpu'u-mi Magau' Topetolo', Ana' Alata'ala to Moroli'?"
Mark 14 62 Na'uli' Yesus: "Aku' -mi, pai' nihilo moto-a mpai', Aku' Ana' Manusia', mohura pai' moparenta hi mali ka'ana Alata'ala to Mobaraka', pai' nihilo wo'o-a mana'u tumai ngkai suruga hi rala limu'."
Mark 14 63 Mpo'epe toe we'i, Imam Bohe mpoheu' baju-na ngkai kamoroe-na, pai' na'uli': "Uma-pi mingki' ria sabi'!
Mark 14 64 Ni'epe moto-mi-koiwo lolita-na mpokedi' Alata'ala. Beiwa-mi-koiwo kabotu' -ni?" Hibalia-mi kabotu' -ra omea, ra'uli': "Bate masala' -imile, kana rahuku' mate-i!"
Mark 14 65 Ngkai ree, ria-ra to mpo'uelikui-i, ria wo'o to mpopo'ore' -i: rakaramuai lio-na, raweba' -i, pai' ra'uli' -ki: "Ee nabi! Pe'uli' pe' ba hema to mpoweba' -koe!" Topojaga wo'o-hawo, mehopo' wo'o-ramo-rawo.
Mark 14 66 Nto'u toe, Petrus hi berewe-pidi. Bula-na hi berewe toe, tumai hadua tobine topobago hi tomi Imam Bohe.
Mark 14 67 Kampohilo-na Petrus moneru, nanaa-i pai' na'uli' -ki: "Ba iko wo'o-di hadua doo-na Yesus to Nazaret toei-e mai?"
Mark 14 68 Aga nasapu Petrus, na'uli': "Uma ku'incai-i, pai' uma kupaha ba napa to nu'uli'!" Ngkai ree moderu' -imi hilou mohu' hi wobo' wala. Turua' -mi manu'.
Mark 14 69 Pehilo wo'o-imi tobine toei, na'uli' -raka tauna to hi ree: "Hi'a tetu wo'o-di doo-na Yesus toei-e mai."
Mark 14 70 Aga nasapu mperii wo'o-wadi Petrus. Uma mahae ngkai ree, tauna to mokore hi ree mpo'uli' wo'o-miki: "Iko mpu'u-di doo-nae! Apa' to Galilea wo'o-ko-kowo."
Mark 14 71 Kamosumpa-nami Petrus mpotuna' woto-na, na'uli': "Uma mpu'u ku'incai tauna to ni'uli' tetui!"
Mark 14 72 Nto'u toe, turua' -mi manu' karongkani-na. Nakiwoi-mi Petrus lolita-na Yesus ngone to mpo'uli' -ki: "Kako'ia-na turua' manu' karongkani-na, mpolia' tolu ngkani-moko mposapu kanu'inca-ku." Kageo' -nami Petrus kaka'utu-utu.
Mark 15 1 Mepupulo ngkii, hawe'ea topohura agama nte imam pangkeni pai' guru agama pai' totu'a to Yahudi to ntani' -na, mohawa' wo'o-ramo. Rahoo' -imi Yesus, rakeni hilou rabua' hi Gubernur Pilatus.
Mark 15 2 Mepekune' -i Pilatus: "Ha Iko mpu'u-mi Magau' to Yahudi-e?" Na'uli' Yesus: "Wae mpu'u, hewa to nu'uli' tetu."
Mark 15 3 Wori' nyala pepakilu to raparata imam pangkeni hi Pilatus.
Mark 15 4 Toe pai' mepekune' wo'o-i-pidi: "Uma-ko dota metompoi' -e? Wori' nyala-mi to raparata kehi-nu."
Mark 15 5 Aga Yesus bate uma-pi winihi, alaa-na napokakonce mpu'u Pilatus.
Mark 15 6 Butu eo bohe Paskah, Pilatus biasa-na mpobahaka hadua tauna to ratarungku', ba hema to raperapi' ntodea.
Mark 15 7 Hi mpae toe, ria hi rala tarungku' hadua to me'ewa hi topoparenta, to rahanga' Barabas. Barabas pai' doo-na, ria-ramo mpopatehi tauna rala pe'ewa-ra hi topoparenta.
Mark 15 8 Jadi', morumpu-ramo ntodea, raperapi' hi Pilatus bona nabahaka hadua to ratarungku' hewa to biasa nababehi butu mpae-na.
Mark 15 9 Napekune' -ra: "Beiwa, dota-koi ane kubahaka-kokoi Magau' to Yahudi toii?"
Mark 15 10 Pilatus mpo'uli' hewa toe, apa' na'inca ka'uma-na-hawo masala' -i Yesus; imam pangkeni mpotonu Yesus hi hi'a ngkai kamohingi' -ra-wadi.
Mark 15 11 Aga imam pangkeni mpo'ukei' ntodea, ra'uli' -raka: "Perapi' -koi bona nabahaka-taka Barabas!" Merapi' Barabas mpu'u-ramo.
Mark 15 12 Ngkai ree, na'uli' wo'o-mi Pilatus mpo'uli' -raka ntodea: "Ane rapa' -na Barabas to kubahaka-kokoi, kupopai-imi tauna to ni'uli' magau' -ni to Yahudi-e?"
Mark 15 13 Pejeu' -rami ntodea, ra'uli': "Parika' -i!"
Mark 15 14 Napekune' Pilatus: "Hiaa' napa sala' -na?" Rapesukui lau-mi mejeu': "Parika' -imi!"
Mark 15 15 Pilatus doko' ngala' nono ntodea, toe pai' nabahaka-miraka Barabas. Oti toe, nahubui-mi tantara-na mpoweba' Yesus pai' natonu-miraka bona raparika'.
Mark 15 16 Oti toe, tantara mpokeni Yesus hilou hi po'ohaa' -ra to hi rala tomi Gubernur, pai' -ra mpokio' hawe'ea doo-ra tumai.
Mark 15 17 Ra'uncoi' -imi hante baju to mperelei to hewa baju magau'. Rababehi hameha' songko ngkai walaa to morui to hewa songko magau', pai' rasongkoi-ki.
Mark 15 18 Oti toe, pai' -i rapopo'ore', ra'uli' -ki: "Wori' tabe, Magau' to Yahudi!"
Mark 15 19 Woo' -na rapao' hante lua', ra'uelikui-i, pai' motingkua' -ra ntani' hewa to mpobila' -i.
Mark 15 20 Ka'oti-na rapopo'ore' hewa toe, raroncu-mi baju to mperelei-e we'i, pai' ra'uncoi' nculii' -imi pohea-na ami'. Oti toe, rakeni-imi hilou hi mali ngata bona raparika'.
Mark 15 21 Hi lengko ohea, hirua' -ra hante hadua tauna to lako' rata hi ngata, pai' rapewuku-ki hi'a-mi mpopaha'a kaju parika' -na Yesus. Hanga' -na Simon to Kirene, tuama-ra hira' Aleksander pai' Rufus.
Mark 15 22 Ko'ia mahae, rata-ramo hi po'ohaa' to rahanga' Golgota, batua-na Bulu' Banga'woo'.
Mark 15 23 Hi ree, Yesus rapopo'inui anggur to ragalo pokuli' to rahanga' mur, aga uma-i dota mpo'inu.
Mark 15 24 Oti toe, tantara mpoparika' -i, pai' -ra mpobagi-bagi pohea-na hante mpotene' undi hewa pompenoa' -ra, ba hema-ra to mporata.
Mark 15 25 Nto'u karaparika' -na toe, jaa sio mepulo.
Mark 15 26 Hi kaju parika' -na hi ntoto woo' -na, ria ukia' to mpo'uli' napa to rapakilu-ki, hewa toi moni-na: MAGAU' TO YAHUDI.
Mark 15 27 Ria wo'o rodua toperampaki raparika' dohe-na, hadua mali ka'ana-na hadua mali ki'ii-na. ((
Mark 15 28 Jadi', napa to rababehi toe, madupa' -mi lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli': "Magau' Topetolo' rapohewa tauna to dada'a."))
Mark 15 29 Tauna to liu hi ree, ngkololi-ra mpopo'ore' -i, ra'uli': "Hahi� Nu'uli' -kona mpogero-ko Tomi Alata'ala pai' nuwangu nculii' rala-na tolu eo!
Mark 15 30 Ane wae-di, tulungi moto-mi woto-nu! Mana'u-moko ngkai kaju parika' tetu!"
Mark 15 31 Wae wo'o imam pangkeni hante guru agama ntora mpopo'ore' -i. Momepololitai-ramo ra'uli': "Tau ntani' -na natulungi-ramo. Woto-na moto-pi uma nakulei' ntulungi.
Mark 15 32 Hiaa' bo ra'uli' Hi'a Magau' Topetolo', Magau' to Israel! Ane tahilo mpu'u-i mana'u ngkai kaju parika' -na toe mai, lako' tapangala' -idi." Ntahawe' tauna to raparika' dohe-na, meruge' wo'o-ra-rawo.
Mark 15 33 Tebua' -mi eo, muu-mule' mobengi hobo' hi ngata toe rala-na tolu jaa.
Mark 15 34 Jaa tolu ncimonou', mekio' -imi Yesus napasimuku mpo'uli': "Alata'ala-ku, Alata'ala-ku! Napa pai' nupalahii-a?" Hi rala basa Yahudi hewa toi moni-na: "Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakhtani?"
Mark 15 35 Ba hangkuja dua to mokore mohu' hi kaju parika' -na mpo'epe pe'au-na toe, ra'uli': "Epe-dile! Mpokio' nabi Elia-i."
Mark 15 36 Hadua mokeno hilou mpo'ala' hampu'u wunga to hewa lomo', nabangkahi hi rala ue anggur to mo'onco, natu'u hi wuntu hompea pai' napopoju'ui-ki Yesus bona na'inu. Na'uli': "Popea, tahilo ba tumai mpu'u-i Elia mpopana'u-i ngkai kaju parika'!"
Mark 15 37 Ngkai ree, kame'au-nami Yesus napesukui, pai' modupe' -mi inoha' -na.
Mark 15 38 Nto'u toe, kain porini-olo' to tetoe hi rala Tomi Alata'ala mobika' ntongo' ngkai lolo-na rata hi une' -na.
Mark 15 39 Tadulako tantara to mokore mponyanyohi kaju parika' toe mpohilo beiwa kamate-na Yesus. Na'uli': "Ana' Alata'ala mpu'u-i-tawo'!"
Mark 15 40 Ria wo'o hi ree ba hangkuja dua tobine to menaa ngkawao. Hanga' -na to hadua, Maria Magdalena. To hadua wo'o, Maria tina-ra Yakobus to tu'ai pai' Yoses. Pai' hadua wo'o, Salome.
Mark 15 41 Tobine toe-ramo to mpotuku' pai' mpotulungi Yesus bula-na hi tana' Galilea. Pai' wori' wo'o-pidi tobine to ntani' -na to mpotuku' Yesus tumai ngkai Galilea rata hi Yerusalem.
Mark 15 42 Eo karaparika' -na Yesus toe, eo pomporodoa, batua-na, eo kako'ia-na eo pepuea', pai' ntuku' ada to Yahudi ntepu'u ncimonou' toe, rapalii' -mi mobago. Jadi', neo' limpa-mi eo,
Mark 15 43 tumai-mi hadua tauna to rahanga' Yusuf to Arimatea. Yusuf toei, hadua topohura agama Yahudi to rabila', mahae moto-imi-hana mpopea tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia'. Yusuf mpedahoi' hilou hi Pilatus mperapi' woto-na Yesus.
Mark 15 44 Konce-i Pilatus mpo'epe kasohi' -na mate Yesus. Toe pai' nakio' -mi tadulako tantara napompekunei' ba mahae-imi Yesus mate.
Mark 15 45 Kana'epe-na Pilatus lolita tadulako tohe'e, napiliu-imi Yusuf mpo'ala' woto Yesus.
Mark 15 46 Yusuf mpo'oli kain to bula bona nahompui' -ki. Napopana'u-mi woto-na ngkai kaju parika' pai' naputu' hante kain toe. Oti toe natu'u hi rala daeo' to ralonga' hi panapa bulu' watu, pai' naluli' hameha' watu na'unca-ki wobo' daeo' toe.
Mark 15 47 Maria Magdalena pai' Maria tina-na Yoses mpetonoi kahiapa-na woto-na Yesus ratu'u.
Mark 16 1 Katimpaliu-na eo pepuea', Maria Magdalena, Maria tina-na Yakobus, pai' Salome, hilou-ra mpo'oli anu mohonga. Patuju-ra, doko' hilou mpolanai woto-na Yesus hante to mohonga toe.
Mark 16 2 Jadi', mepupulo ngkii eo Mingku, lako' moweka', hilou-ramo hi daeo'.
Mark 16 3  
Mark 16 4 Hi lengko ohea momepololitai-ramo, ra'uli': "Hema-mi-tawo to mpotulungi-ta mpoderu' watu po'unca wobo' daeo'?" Apa' watu toe ria bohe lia. Ntaa' we'i, karata-ra hi daeo', rahilo-rawo tederu' -mi watu.
Mark 16 5 Pesua' -rami hi rala daeo', mpohilo-ra hadua kabilasa mohura tono' mali ka'ana-na, moheai hante pohea to bula. Konce tobine toera mpohilo-i.
Mark 16 6 Na'uli' kabilasa toei: "Neo' -koi konce! Mpali' Yesus to Nazaret-koi, to mate raparika'. Tuwu' nculii' -imi! Uma-ipi ria hi rehe'i. Hilo karatu'ua-na wengi.
Mark 16 7 Wae-e lau, hilou-mokoi, uli' -raka Petrus pai' ana'guru-na to ntani' -na katuwu' -na nculii' -mi. Uli' -raka hewa toi: Hilou meri'ulu-i hi tana' Galilea. Hi ria-damo mpai', pai' -i nihilo, hewa to oti na'uli' -kokoi wengi."
Mark 16 8 Pehupa' -ra tobine toera ngkai rala daeo', pokeno-rami metibo', apa' wulunga pai' moridi' -ramo. Uma-ra ulu mpololitai hema-hema, apa' ngkai kame'eka' -ra.
Mark 16 9 Pemata-na Yesus ngkai kamatea mepupulo ngkii hi eo Mingku, lomo' -na mpopehuwu-i woto-na hi Maria Magdalena. Maria tohe'ei, ria-i Yesus mpopalai pitu seta to mpohawi' -i.
Mark 16 10  
Mark 16 11 Hilou-imi Maria hi topetuku' -na Yesus, narata-ra bula-ra geo' pai' peda' nono-ra. Na'uli' -raka: "Tuwu' nculii' -imi-hana Pue', kuhilo-imi we'i!" Aga uma raparasaya hawe'ea to najarita Maria toe.
Mark 16 12 Oti toe, Yesus mpopehuwu wo'o-mi woto-na hi rodua topetuku' -na bula-ra mako' hilou hi mali ngata. Nto'u toe, lence-na mobali', alaa-na uma ra'incai Kayesus-na.
Mark 16 13 Ponculi' -rami to rodua toera mpo'uli' -raka doo-ra kampohilo-ra Yesus. Aga uma wo'o raparasaya.
Mark 16 14 Ngkai ree, mehupa' wo'o-imi hi ana'guru-na to hampulu' hadua bula-ra ngkoni'. Nakamaro-ra apa' kura' pepangala' -ra pai' motu'a nono-ra. Nau' ria-mi tauna to mpohilo-i, uma oa' -ra dota mparasaya katuwu' -na nculii' mpu'u-imi.
Mark 16 15 Na'uli' -raka: "Hilou-mokoi hi humalili' dunia', mpopalele Kareba Lompe' hi hawe'ea tauna.
Mark 16 16 Hema to mepangala' pai' raniu', tehore-ra ngkai huku' jeko' -ra. Aga hema to uma mepangala' bate rahuku'.
Mark 16 17 Pai' hema to mepangala', kuwai' -ra kuasa mpobabehi tanda-tanda to hewa toi: Hante hanga' -ku mpopalai-ra seta. Mololita-ra hante basa to uma ra'incai ngkai baraka' Inoha' Tomoroli'.
Mark 16 18 Ria-ra to ngkamu ule, ba paia-na nginu rasu, aga uma moto-ra moapa. Mpojama-ra tauna to peda', bona mo'uri' -ra topeda'."
Mark 16 19 Ka'oti-na Pue' Yesus mpololitai-ra, te'ongko' -imi hilou hi suruga, pai' -i mohura hi mali ka'ana Alata'ala.
Mark 16 20 Ngkai ree, topetuku' -na hilou mpopalele Kareba Lompe' hiapa-apa. Pue' mobago hangkaa-ngkania dohe-ra, pai' nawai' -ra kuasa mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi bona mporohoi kamakono-na Kareba to rakeni.
Luke 1 1 Teofilus to rabila': Wori' -mi tauna mperao mpo'uki' dala ngkatuwu' -na Yesus, hewa to jadi' ba hangkuja mpae to liu hi laintongo' -ta.
Luke 1 2 To ra'uki' tohe'e, hibalia hante tutura to raparata-taka tauna to mpohilo mata moto-mi hawe'ea to jadi' toe ngkai lomo' -na pai' to jadi' pangkeni Lolita Pue'.
Luke 1 3 Jadi', ka'oti-ku mpewulihi' hawe'ea-na ngkai tawu-na hante kanoto-noto-na, ku'uli' agina aku' wo'o-kuwo mpo'uki' tutura-na ntuku' pomeduncu-na.
Luke 1 4 Patuju-ku, bona nu'inca kamakono-na mpu'u napa to oti-mi ratudui' -koko.
Luke 1 5 Nto'u Magau' Herodes moparenta hi tana' Yudea, ria hadua imam to rahanga' Zakharia. Zakharia toei, ngkai posantina imam muli Abia. Hanga' tobine-na, Elisabet, muli imam wo'o-i-hawo.
Luke 1 6 Tau hancamoko toera, monoa' ingku-ra hi poncilo Alata'ala, apa' ratuku' hawe'ea parenta pai' atura Pue' hante uma ria kasalaia' -na.
Luke 1 7 Aga uma-ra mo'anai', apa' Elisabet lalo, pai' tu'a-ramo roduaa-ra.
Luke 1 8 Hangkani, megoli-mi tempo-na imam-imam muli Abia to mpokamu bago Alata'ala, pai' Zakharia mpobago bago imam hi Tomi Alata'ala.
Luke 1 9 Ntuku' ada-ra, mpenoa' -ra ba hema-ra to rapelihi mesua' hi rala Tomi Alata'ala mpotunu dupa'. Zakharia-mi to mpela pompenoa' -ra.
Luke 1 10 Jadi', bula ntodea mosampaya hi mali-na, Zakharia mesua' hi rala Tomi Alata'ala mpotunu dupa'.
Luke 1 11 Nto'u toe, mehupa' -mi hadua mala'eka Pue' hi mali ngka'ana meja' pontunua dupa'.
Luke 1 12 Kanahilo-na Zakharia mala'eka toei, konce pai' me'eka' lia-imi.
Luke 1 13 Na'uli' mala'eka toei: "Zakharia, neo' -ko me'eka', apa' Pue' Ala mpo'epe pomperapia' -nu. Elisabet tobine-nu mo'ana' mpai', hadua ana' tomane. Ana' tetui kana nuhanga' Yohanes.
Luke 1 14 Uma mpai' mowo kagoe' -nu mpokagoe' ana' -nu tetui. Wori' tauna mpokagoe' kaputu-na.
Luke 1 15 Hi'a jadi' tau bohe hi poncilo Pue'. Uma-i ma'ala nginu anggur ba napa-napa to melanguhi, pai' Inoha' Tomoroli' mpokuasai-i ngkai lomo' kaputu-na.
Luke 1 16 Wori' muli Israel natete' nculii' bona mepangala' -ra hi Alata'ala to rapue' ntu'a-ra owi.
Luke 1 17 Ana' -nu tetui mpai' jadi' suro to mako' meri'ulu ngkai Pue' hante kuasa pai' kabaraka' -na nabi Elia owi. Napopohintuwu' ana' -ana' hante tuama-ra. Pai' tauna to uma mpotuku' Pue' natete' nculii' hi ohea to monoa' bona monoto nono-ra. Hawe'ea toe nababehi bona mporodo nono ntodea, bona sadia-ramo mpotarima Pue'."
Luke 1 18 Na'uli' Zakharia mpo'uli' -ki mala'eka: "Hiaa', beiwa kaku'inca-na kamakono-na to nu'uli' tetu-e? Apa' tu'a-amadie, pai' tobine-ku tu'a wo'o-imi-hawo."
Luke 1 19 Natompoi' mala'eka toei: "Aku' toi Gabriel, pahawaa' Alata'ala to ngkai suruga. Alata'ala mposuro-a tumai mpoparata-koko kareba toe.
Luke 1 20 Napa to ku'uli' -koko toe we'i, bate madupa' ane rata-pi mpai' tempo-na. Aga iko-kona, apa' uma nuparasaya lolita-kue, wae-pi ngkai wae lau, uma-poko howa' mololita duu' -na madupa' mpu'u lolita-ku."
Luke 1 21 Bula-na Zakharia hi rala Tomi Alata'ala, kapea-pea-ramo ntodea hi mali-na. Ingu' -ra apa' mahae rahi-i.
Luke 1 22 Pehupa' -na hi mali-na, uma-ipi howa' mpololitai-ra. Muntu' mohuka' -i-damo pai' bate uma-i howa' mololita. Toe pai' ra'inca-mi ntodea karia-na to nahilo hi rala Tomi Alata'ala.
Luke 1 23 Hudu-mi pobago-na Zakharia hi Tomi Alata'ala, nculii' -imi hilou hi tomi-na.
Luke 1 24 Ko'ia mahae ngkai ree, motina'i mpu'u-imi Elisabet. Lima mula kahae-na Elisabet uma mehupa' -hupa' ngkai rala tomi-na, pai' na'uli':
Luke 1 25 "Tohe'i-e ahi' -na Pue' hi aku'. Natulungi-a mo'anai', bona uma-apa me'ea' sabana kalalo-ku."
Luke 1 26 Kahono' -na ono mula Elisabet motina'i, Alata'ala mpohubui mala'eka Gabriel hilou hi tana' Galilea, hi ngata to rahanga' Nazaret,
Luke 1 27 bona mpohirua' -ki hadua toronaa to rahanga' Maria. Toronaa toei, bula-na mokamae' hante hadua kabilasa to rahanga' Yusuf, muli Magau' Daud owi.
Luke 1 28 Karata-na mala'eka hi ria, na'uli' -ki Maria: "Wori' tabe! Pue' mpogane' -ko pai' mpodohei-ko!"
Luke 1 29 Konce-i Maria mpo'epe lolita mala'eka toei, pai' -i mopekiri ba napa batua petabe-na toe.
Luke 1 30 Na'uli' wo'o-mi mala'eka: "Neo' -ko me'eka' Maria, apa' iko-mi to napokono Alata'ala bona mporata pegane' -na.
Luke 1 31 Motina'i-ko mpai', pai' -ko mo'ana', hadua ana' tomane. Ana' tetu mpai' kana nuhanga' Yesus.
Luke 1 32 Hi'a mpai' jadi' tauna to bohe tuwu' -na, pai' -i rahanga' Ana' Alata'ala to hi suruga. Pai' Pue' Alata'ala mpo'ongko' -i jadi' Magau', hewa Magau' Daud, ntu'a-na owi.
Luke 1 33 Hi'a jadi' magau' to mpoparentai hawe'ea muli Yakub duu' kahae-hae-na, pai' poparenta-na uma ria kahudua-na."
Luke 1 34 Na'uli' Maria mpo'uli' -ki mala'eka: "Beiwa-hawo kajadi' -na to nu'uli' tetu-e? Apa' ko'ia-a-kuwo motomanei."
Luke 1 35 Na'uli' mala'eka: "Inoha' Tomoroli' mpai' mana'u hi iko, pai' kabaraka' Alata'ala to hi suruga ngkamoui-ko. Toe pai' ana' to putu toe mpai' rahanga' moroli', Ana' Alata'ala.
Luke 1 36 Epe-dile: ompi' -nu Elisabet-ele, to tu'a lia-imi pai' to ra'uli' doo lalo-ie, motina'i ono mula-imi-hawo! Mo'ana' -i mpai', hadua ana' tomane.
Luke 1 37 Apa' napa-napa to na'uli' Alata'ala bate kana madupa'."
Luke 1 38 Na'uli' Maria: "Aku' toi batua-na Pue', mengkoru-ama hi hawa' -na, bona napadupa' patuju-na hi aku', hewa to nu'uli' -ka tetu." Oti toe, malai-imi mala'eka mpalahii Maria.
Luke 1 39 Ngkai ree, pe'ongko' -nami Maria hilou hi ngata to hi bulu' -na hi tana' Yudea.
Luke 1 40 Karata-na hi tomi Zakharia, pesua' -nami pai' -i mpotabe Elisabet.
Luke 1 41 Kana'epe-na Elisabet petabe-na Maria toe, pongkale-nami ana' to hi rala puanaka-na, pai' Elisabet, nakuasai Inoha' Tomoroli' -imi.
Luke 1 42 Mekio' -imi napesukui mpo'uli' -ki Maria: "Iko-mi-kona to nagane' Alata'ala meliu ngkai hawe'ea tobine ntani' -na, pai' Alata'ala mpogane' ana' to nupotina'i-ki tetu.
Luke 1 43 Ha hema-a-kuwo aku' toi-e, pai' iko tina-na Pue' -ku tumai mpokinomo-a!
Luke 1 44 Wae kaku'epe-na petabe-nu, ana' to hi rala-ku ncaliu mongkale nakeni kagoe' -na.
Luke 1 45 Morasi' mpu'u-ko, apa' nupangala' lolita Pue', apa' napa to na'uli' -koko bate madupa'."
Luke 1 46 Na'uli' Maria: Mpo'une' -a Pue' hante nono-ku mpu'u.
Luke 1 47 Goe' lia-a, apa' Alata'ala Magau' Tompohore-a ngkai huku' jeko' -ku.
Luke 1 48 Nakiwoi-awa-kuwo, aku' batua-na to mpe'ahii'. Ngkai wae lau, hawe'ea tauna mpo'uli' ka'aku' -na tobine to nagane' Alata'ala.
Luke 1 49 Apa' Alata'ala to mokuasa mpopehuwu kabaraka' -na hi aku'. Moroli' hanga' -na!
Luke 1 50 Ma'ahi' -i hi hawe'ea tauna to mengkoru hi Hi'a, duu' rata hi muli-muli-ra.
Luke 1 51 Nababehi anu mobaraka' hante kuasa-na: Tauna to molangko nono-ra nagaro' bona uma oko patuju-ra.
Luke 1 52 Magau' -magau' napohu ngkai pangka' -ra. Tauna to dingki' tuwu' -ra napomolangko.
Luke 1 53 Tauna to mo'oro' nabohui hante pongkoni' to lompe'. Tauna topo'ua' napopalai hante ngkeni woto mara.
Luke 1 54  
Luke 1 55 Napopohiloi ahi' -na hi kita' muli Israel, batua-na owi. Natulungi-ta hewa to najanci hi ntu'a-ta owi. Uma nalipo' pojanci-na hi Abraham pai' hi muli-na duu' kahae-hae-na."
Luke 1 56 Ba tolu mula kahae-na Maria mo'oha' hante Elisabet, pai' lako' nculii' -idi hilou hi tomi-na.
Luke 1 57 Rata-mi tempo-na Elisabet mo'ana'. Mo'ana' mpu'u-imi, hadua ana' tomane.
Luke 1 58 Tongki-ra pai' ompi' -ra mpo'epe beiwa Pue' mpopohiloi ahi' -na hi Elisabet hi kanawai' -na ana' -na toe, toe pai' goe' wo'o-ramo-rawo hangkaa-ngkania hante Elisabet.
Luke 1 59 Ntuku' ada-ra to Yahudi, kahono' -na walu eo umuru-na ana' toei, tumai-ramo tongki pai' ompi' -ra mpotini' -i ntuku' ada-ra to Yahudi. Patuju-ra doko' mpohanga' -i Zakharia, mpongkona' -ki tuama-na moto, ntuku' ada-ra.
Luke 1 60 Tapi' na'uli' Elisabet mpo'uli' -raka: "Neo' waetu! Bate Yohanes hanga' -na."
Luke 1 61 Hampetompoi' -ra: "Hiaa' bo uma-hanale ria ompi' -ni to rahanga' tetu-e!"
Luke 1 62 Ngkai ree, rahuka' -ki Zakharia rapompekunei' ba napa to doko' nahanga' -ki ana' -na.
Luke 1 63 Zakharia mperapi' hameha' po'ukia' pai' na'uki': "Hanga' -na Yohanes." Konce omea-ramo.
Luke 1 64 Nto'u toe, muu-mule' howa' nculii' -imi mololita, pai' -i mpo'une' -une' Alata'ala.
Luke 1 65 Me'eka' omea-ramo tongki-ra, pai' kareba toe molele hobo' hi bulu' -na Yudea.
Luke 1 66 Hawe'ea to mpo'epe kareba toe mokanono, ra'uli': "Ha jadi' napa-i mpai' ana' toei?" Apa' Pue' mpodohei-i hante baraka' -na.
Luke 1 67 Ane Zakharia, tuama ana' toei, Inoha' Tomoroli' mpokuasai-i, pai' -i mpohowa' lolita Alata'ala, na'uli':
Luke 1 68 "Mai-tamo kita' muli Israel, mpo'une' Alata'ala Pue' -ta! Apa' hompo-imi tumai mpotulungi-ta kita' ntodea-na. Tumai-i mpobahaka-ta ngkai bali' -ta.
Luke 1 69 Nawai' -tamo Tadulako to mobaraka' to mpokeni kalompea'. Tadulako toei, muli Magau' Daud, batua-na owi.
Luke 1 70 Ngkai owi hante wiwi nabi-nabi to moroli', Pue' mpojanci
Luke 1 71 kanabahaka-ta mpai' ngkai bali' -ta, nabahaka-ta ngkai kuasa-ra to mpokahuku' -ta.
Luke 1 72 Napopohiloi mpu'u-mi ahi' -na hi ntu'a-ta owi. Napadupa' -mi janci-na to moroli'.
Luke 1 73  
Luke 1 74 Mojanci pai' mosumpa-i hi Abraham ntu'a-ta owi, kanabahaka-ta ngkai kuasa bali' -ta, bona ma'ala-ta mpopue' -i hante uma ria ka'ekaa' -ta,
Luke 1 75 bona kita' jadi' topetuku' -na to moroli' pai' to monoa' hi poncilo-na, duu' kahae-hae-na.
Luke 1 76 Hiaa' ane iko, ana' -ku, iko mpai' rahanga' nabi Pue' Ala to hi suruga. Apa' iko-mi mpai' to mako' meri'ulu ngkai Pue', bona mporodo ohea-na.
Luke 1 77 Iko mpai' to mpopo'incai ntodea-na ohea bona Alata'ala mpowai' -ra kalompea' pai' mpo'ampungi jeko' -ra.
Luke 1 78 Apa' ma'ahi' lia Alata'ala Pue' -ta. Toe pai' hompo-imi tumai mpotulungi-ta. Tumai-i ngkai suruga hewa eo mebere'.
Luke 1 79 Tumai-i mpobajahi nono tauna to hi rala kabengia-na pai' to me'eka' mpoka'eka' kamatea. Natete' -ta hi ohea to mpotoa' kalompea' tuwu'."
Luke 1 80 Ana' Zakharia toei, kaboo-bohea kamonoo-notoa nono-na. Mo'oha' -i hi papada to wao', duu' -na rata tempo-na natepu'u-mi mpokeni Lolita Pue' hi muli Israel.
Luke 2 1 Nto'u toe, rata hawa' ngkai Kaisar Agustus, mpohawai' bona hawe'ea tauna hi humalili' kamagaua' Roma ra'uki' hanga' -ra bona ra'inca kadea-ra.
Luke 2 2 Pobilaa' tauna to lomo' -na tohe'i rababehi nto'u-na Kirenius jadi' gubernur hi tana' Siria.
Luke 2 3 Hawe'ea tauna hilou mpope'uki' hanga' -ra, hore-hore hi ngata totu'a-ra.
Luke 2 4  
Luke 2 5 Wae wo'o Yusuf me'ongko' ngkai ngata Nazaret, mpo'ema' Maria kamae' -na to bula-na motina'i-mi. Me'ongko' -ramo ngkai tana' Galilea, manake' hilou hi tana' Yudea, mpotoa' ngata Betlehem, ngata kaputua Magau' Daud owi. Yusuf kana mpope'uki' hanga' -na hi ria, apa' hi'a muli Magau' Daud.
Luke 2 6 Nto'u-ra hi Betlehem toe, rata-mi tempo-na Maria mo'ana'.
Luke 2 7 Mo'ana' mpu'u-imi, hadua ana' tomane, ana' ulumua' -na. Ana' -na toei naputu' pai' napopoturu hi rala paiwa', apa' ihia' -mi tomi torata.
Luke 2 8 Hi mali ngata Betlehem, ria ba hangkuja dua topo'ewu. Bula-ra mpodoo bima-ra hi papada ngkabengia toe,
Luke 2 9 muu-mule' mehupa' -mi hadua mala'eka Pue' mpohirua' -raka, pai' kabaraka' Pue' mehini mpohinii-ra, alaa-na me'eka' lia-ramo.
Luke 2 10 Na'uli' mala'eka toei mpo'uli' -raka: "Neo' -koi me'eka', apa' katumai-ku toi mpokeni kareba lompe' hi koi', kareba to mpakagoe' lia hawe'ea tauna.
Luke 2 11 Eo toe lau hi ngata Magau' Daud, putu-mi Magau' Tompohore-koi ngkai huku' jeko' -ni, Hi'a-mi Kristus, Pue'.
Luke 2 12 Toi-mi pompetonoi-na bona ni'inca kamakono-na lolita-ku: mporua' -koi mpai' hadua ana'lei raputu' pai' rapopoturu hi rala paiwa'."
Luke 2 13 Hampinisi mata mehupa' wo'o-mi wori' mala'eka to ngkai suruga dohe mala'eka to lomo' -na we'i. Mpo'une' -ra Alata'ala, ra'uli':
Luke 2 14 "Mai-tamo mpo'une' Alata'ala to hi suruga! Pai' hi dunia', tauna to napokono mporata kalompea' tuwu'."
Luke 2 15 Ngkai ree, nculii' -ramo mala'eka hilou hi suruga, pai' mohawa' -ramo topo'ewu toera, ra'uli': "Kita-mi hilou hi Betlehem mpohilo kajadia' to na'uli' -taka Pue'."
Luke 2 16 Kahilou-rami, pai' rarua' mpu'u-mi Maria pai' Yusuf, hante ana'lei-ra to turu hi rala paiwa'.
Luke 2 17 Karahilo-na ana' toei, ralolita-mi napa to na'uli' -raka mala'eka mpotompo'wiwi-i.
Luke 2 18 Konce omea tauna to mpo'epe lolita topo'ewu toera.
Luke 2 19 Aga Maria mpotimamahi hawe'ea to jadi' toe hi rala nono-na, pai' ntora napenonoi.
Luke 2 20 Nculii' -ramo topo'ewu toera, pai' halengko ohea mpo'une' pai' mpobila' Alata'ala-ramo, apa' hawe'ea to ra'epe pai' to rahilo, bate hewa to na'uli' -raka mala'eka.
Luke 2 21 Ntuku' ada-ra to Yahudi, kahono' -na walu eo umuru-na, Ana' toei ratini' pai' rahanga' -i Yesus, hanga' to nahanga' -ki mala'eka kako'ia-na napotina'i-ki tina-na.
Luke 2 22 Oti toe, rata-mi tempo-na Yusuf pai' Maria kana mpobabehi ada ka'oti-na mo'ana', ntuku' Atura Pue' to na'uki' Musa. Nto'u toe, ana'lei-ra toe rakeni hilou hi Yerusalem bona ratonu hi Pue',
Luke 2 23 hewa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Atura Pue': "Butu dua ana' tomane to ulumua' kana ratonu hi Pue' bona jadi' bagia-na."
Luke 2 24 Rakeni wo'o pepue' -ra, ntuku' hawa' to te'uki' hi rala Buku Atura Pue': hamoko korokou ba roma'a ana' mangkebodo.
Luke 2 25 Hi Yerusalem nto'u toe, ria hadua tauna to rahanga' Simeon. Simeon toei, tau monoa' to mengkoru hi Alata'ala. Inoha' Tomoroli' mpodohei-i, pai' -i ncarumaka kaneo' -na rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala mpotulungi muli Israel.
Luke 2 26 Hangkani, Inoha' Tomoroli' mpo'uli' -ki hewa toi: "Ko'ia-ko mate ane ko'ia nuhiloi Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Pue' Ala."
Luke 2 27 Jadi', nto'u-na Yusuf pai' Maria mpokeni Yesus ana'lei-ra hi Tomi Alata'ala bona ratonu hi Alata'ala ntuku' Atura Musa, Inoha' Tomoroli' mpopakeni Simeon mesua' hi Tomi Alata'ala.
Luke 2 28 Kana'ala' -nami ana'lei toei, napanawi pai' -i mpo'une' Alata'ala, na'uli':
Luke 2 29 "O Pue', nau' mate-ama, uma-pi beiwa. Oha-mi nono-ku, apa' madupa' -mi janci-nu.
Luke 2 30 Hante mata-ku moto-mi mpohilo Topetolo' to ngkai Iko Pue',
Luke 2 31 to nuporodo hi hawe'ea manusia'.
Luke 2 32 Topetolo' toei, hewa baja to mponotohi nono tauna to bela-ra muli Israel. Pai' -i mpokeni karabilaa' hi kai' muli Israel to nupobagia."
Luke 2 33 Tina pai' tuama ana' toei konce mpo'epe lolita Simeon mpotompo'wiwi ana' -ra.
Luke 2 34 Simeon mpogane' -ra, pai' na'uli' -ki Maria: "Ngkai Ana' -nu toii, wori' mpai' muli Israel monawu' mporata silaka, aga wori' wo'o to tehore bona mporata kalompea'. Hi'a-mi to napelihi pai' nasuro tumai Pue' Ala, aga wori' tauna mposapuaka-i mpai',
Luke 2 35 alaa-na telohu-mi ihi' nono-ra. Hiaa' iko Maria, narumpa' -ko-hana mpai' kasusaa' nono, hewa to rajalo piho'."
Luke 2 36  
Luke 2 37 Nto'u karata-ra Yusuf pai' Maria hi Tomi Alata'ala toe, ria wo'o-hawo hi ree hadua nabi tobine to tu'a lia-mi. Hanga' -na Hana, ana' Fanuel, ngkai posantina-na Asyer. Nto'u toe, umuru-na walu mpulu' opo' mpae. Pitu mpae-i-wadi motomanei. Ngkai ree, balu-imi pai' uma-ipi motomanei. Tida oa' -i hi Tomi Alata'ala, hi eo-na hi bengi-na ntora mosampaya pai' mopuasa' -i mepue' hi Pue' Ala.
Luke 2 38 Jadi', nto'u Yusuf pai' Maria hi Tomi Alata'ala toe, rata wo'o-imi-hawo Hana, mpo'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala, pai' ntora mpotompo'wiwi Ana' toei hi hawe'ea tauna to mpopea tempo-na Alata'ala mpobahaka to Yerusalem ngkai bali' -ra.
Luke 2 39 Ka'oti-ra Yusuf pai' Maria mpobabehi hawe'ea to ratuntu' hi rala Buku Atura Pue', nculii' -ramo hilou hi ngata Nazaret hi tana' Galilea.
Luke 2 40 Ana' -ra toei, kaboo-bohea pai' karoo-rohoa. Monoto lia nono-na, pai' Alata'ala mpogane' -i.
Luke 2 41 Butu mpae-na, tina pai' tuama-na Yesus hilou hi Yerusalem mpokaralai eo bohe to Yahudi to rahanga' Eo Paskah.
Luke 2 42 Hono' -mi hampulu' rompae umuru-na Yesus, hilou wo'o-ramo ngkaralai eo bohe toe hewa kabiasaa-ra.
Luke 2 43 Katimpaliu-na eo bohe toe, nculii' -ramo hilou mpotoa' ngata-ra. Aga Yesus-hana, uma-i mpotuku' -ra. Hi ria-i-pidi hi Yerusalem, aga uma ra'incai totu'a-na.
Luke 2 44 Ra'uli' -rawo, metuku' moto-i dohe doo hampomakoa' -ra. Ha'eo-ramo momako', lako' rapali' -idi hi doo-ra pai' ompi' -ra.
Luke 2 45 Aga uma-i raruai'. Toe pai' nculii' -ra hi Yerusalem mpopali' -i.
Luke 2 46 Tolu eo-ramo mepali', lako' rarua' -idi hi Tomi Alata'ala. Mohura-i hi laintongo' guru agama, mpe'epei pai' mepekune'.
Luke 2 47 Hawe'ea tauna to mpo'epe-i mpo'uli': "Uma mowo kapante-nae'! Uma mowo kamonoto tompoi' -na!"
Luke 2 48 Konce tina pai' tuama-na mpohilo-i. Na'uli' tina-na: "Uto', napa-di-kona pai' nupohewa toe-kaie! Kai' tuama-nu, sese' -kai mpopali' -ko!"
Luke 2 49 Na'uli' -raka: "Ha napa pai' nipali' -a? Ha uma ni'incai kana hi rala tomi Tuama-kua?"
Luke 2 50 Tapi' uma rapaha batua lolita-na.
Luke 2 51 Oti toe, hidohea-ramo nculii' hilou hi Nazaret, pai' bate mengkoru-i hi hawa' tina pai' tuama-na. Tina-na mpotimamahi hawe'ea to jadi' toe hi rala nono-na.
Luke 2 52 Yesus kaboo-bohea pai' kamonoo-notoa nono-na. Alata'ala mpokono-i, wae wo'o manusia'.
Luke 3 1 Hi kahampulu' lima mpae-na poparenta Kaisar Tiberius hi ngata Roma, Pontius Pilatus jadi' gubernur hi tana' Yudea pai' Herodes Antipas to moparenta hi Galilea. Filipus ompi' -na Herodes moparenta hi Iturea pai' hi Trakhonitis, pai' Lisanias moparenta hi Abilene.
Luke 3 2 To jadi' Imam Bohe nto'u toe, Hanas pai' Kayafas. Hi mpae tohe'e, Alata'ala mpoparata lolita-na hi Yohanes ana' Zakharia hi papada to wao'.
Luke 3 3 Jadi', momako' -imi Yohanes mure' -nca'u ue Yordan mpoparata Lolita Alata'ala hi ntodea, na'uli': "Medea-mokoi ngkai jeko' -ni, pai' kana tumai-koi kuniu', bona Alata'ala mpo'ampungi jeko' -ni."
Luke 3 4 Yohanes toei mpopadupa' napa to te'uki' hi rala sura nabi Yesaya owi, moni-na hewa toi: Ria tauna to mekio' hi papada to wao', na'uli': `Neo' rata-imi Pue'! Porodo ami' -miki ohea-na! Nipakalempe ami' -mi ohea to natara mpai'!
Luke 3 5 To lobu' -na kana ra'ihii', to molangko pai' to pabulu' -bulu' kana rapohimpaya'. To pahiku-hiku rapomonoa', pai' to moloke' -loke' rapokalempe.
Luke 3 6 Oti toe, hawe'ea manusia' mpohilo Alata'ala mpohore ntodea-na ngkai jeko' -ra.'"
Luke 3 7 Wori' tauna tumai mpopeniu' hi Yohanes. Na'uli' Yohanes mpo'uli' -raka: "He koi' to bengku' gau' -ni! Napa pai' tumai-koie? Ba ni'uli' -koina, ma'ala mpai' nipasalewa roe Pue' Ala to neo' mporumpa' -koi?
Luke 3 8 Ane bongko medea-mokoi ngkai jeko' -ni, babehi-mokoi gau' to lompe'. Pai' neo' nipoperaha kamuli-na Abraham-koi! Bona ni'inca: muli Abraham bisa napajadi' Alata'ala ngkai watu-watu toe lau.
Luke 3 9 Neo' rata-mi pehuku' Alata'ala! Pehuku' -na hewa pati to rodo ami' -mi hi tawu kaju. Butu ngkaju-na to uma lompe' wua' -na, bate ratoki pai' ratene' hi rala apu."
Luke 3 10 Ntodea mpekune' Yohanes, ra'uli': "Ane wae, napa-kaiwo to kana kibabehi?"
Luke 3 11 Na'uli' Yohanes: "Hema-koi to rontonga' baju-ni, hantonga' wai' -raka-rawo to uma nakariai. Pai' tauna to ria pongkoni' -ra, bagii-ra-rawo to uma ria pongkoni' -ra."
Luke 3 12 Rata wo'o-ra-rawo topesingara' paja' mpopeniu' hi Yohanes. Mepekune' -ra, ra'uli': "Guru, napa-kaiwo to kana kibabehi-e?"
Luke 3 13 Natompoi' -ra: "Neo' -koi mesingara' melabi ngkai to rapakatantu topoparenta."
Luke 3 14 Rata wo'o-ra-rawo tantara mpekune' -i, ra'uli': "Hiaa' beiwa wo'o-ka-kaiwo kai'! Napa-kaiwo to kana kibabehi-e?" Na'uli' -raka: "Neo' -koi mporampaki rewa doo, pai' neo' mpo'ekahi ntodea bona rawai' -koi doi. Hangkuja-mi-hawo gaji' -ni, tarima-mi hante kagoea' nono."
Luke 3 15 Nto'u toe, ntodea ntora mpopea karata-na Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Alata'ala. Hawe'ea-ra mepekune' hi rala nono-ra, meka' ba lue' Yohanes lau-mi Magau' Topetolo' to rapopea toe.
Luke 3 16 Toe pai' Yohanes mpo'uli' -raka omea: "Ane aku' -le, mponiu' -koi hante ue-wadi, tanda kamedea-ni ngkai jeko' -ni. Tapi' tumai-i mpai' to meliu kuasa-na ngkai aku'. Bangku' jadi' pahawaa' -na to mpobongka koloro sapatu' -na, uma-a-kuwo natao. Hi'a mpai' to mponiu' -koi hante Inoha' Tomoroli' pai' hante apu.
Luke 3 17 Hi'a ma'ala rarapai' -ki tauna to mpowiri' pae. Nagaa' pae to mo'ihi ngkai to lopa' -na duu' -na me'itu'. Pae to mo'ihi napuna' hi rala wilulu-na, pai' to lopa' -na nasuwe hi rala apu to jela' ncuu duu' kahae-hae-na."
Luke 3 18 Hewa toei Yohanes mpokeni Kareba Lompe' hi ntodea, pai' naparesai' -ra nte wori' nyala tudui' -na.
Luke 3 19 Pai' nakamaro wo'o kasalaa' -na Herodes Antipas, topoparenta hi tana' Galilea, apa' Herodes mpo'ago pai' mpotobine Herodias, tobine ompi' -na moto. Yohanes mpokamaro-i sabana gau' -na toe, pai' sabana hawe'ea gau' -na to dada'a ntani' -na.
Luke 3 20 Jadi', kana'epe-na Herodes pekamaro Yohanes toe, uma-di nabalii' gau' -na to dada'a, nadonihii lau-di: nahoko' lau-imi Yohanes pai' -i natarungku'.
Luke 3 21 Kako'ia-na Yohanes ratarungku', bula-na meniu' -pidi mponiu' ntodea, Yesus wo'o-hawo tumai mpopeniu'. Ka'oti-nai raniu', bula-na mosampaya, muu-mule' tebea-mi langi',
Luke 3 22 pai' Inoha' Tomoroli' mana'u tumai dungku hi Yesus, lence-na hewa danci mangkebodo. Pai' Alata'ala mololita ngkai suruga mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Iko toi-mi Ana' -ku to kupe'ahi'. Iko-mi to mpakagoe' nono-ku."
Luke 3 23 Nto'u umuru Yesus kira-kira tolu mpulu' mpae, natepu'u-mi pobago-na. Ntuku' pomporataa tauna, Yesus ana' Yusuf, Yusuf ana' Eli,
Luke 3 24 Eli ana' Matat, Matat ana' Lewi, Lewi ana' Malkhi, Malkhi ana' Yanai, Yanai ana' Yusuf,
Luke 3 25 Yusuf ana' Matica, Matica ana' Amos, Amos ana' Nahum, Nahum ana' Hesli, Hesli ana' Nagai,
Luke 3 26 Nagai ana' Maat, Maat ana' Matica, Matica ana' Simei, Simei ana' Yosekh, Yosekh ana' Yoda,
Luke 3 27 Yoda ana' Yohanan, Yohanan ana' Resa, Resa ana' Zerubabel, Zerubabel ana' Sealtiel, Sealtiel ana' Neri,
Luke 3 28 Neri ana' Malkhi, Malkhi ana' Adi, Adi ana' Kosam, Kosam ana' Elmadam, Elmadam ana' Er,
Luke 3 29 Er ana' Yesua, Yesua ana' Eliezer, Eliezer ana' Yorim, Yorim ana' Matat, Matat ana' Lewi,
Luke 3 30 Lewi ana' Simeon, Simeon ana' Yehuda, Yehuda ana' Yusuf, Yusuf ana' Yonam, Yonam ana' Elyakim,
Luke 3 31 Elyakim ana' Melea, Melea ana' Mina, Mina ana' Matata, Matata ana' Natan, Natan ana' Daud,
Luke 3 32 Daud ana' Isai, Isai ana' Obed, Obed ana' Boas, Boas ana' Salmon, Salmon ana' Nahason,
Luke 3 33 Nahason ana' Aminadab, Aminadab ana' Admin, Admin ana' Arni, Arni ana' Hezron, Hezron ana' Peres, Peres ana' Yehuda,
Luke 3 34 Yehuda ana' Yakub, Yakub ana' Ishak, Ishak ana' Abraham, Abraham ana' Terah, Terah ana' Nahor,
Luke 3 35 Nahor ana' Serug, Serug ana' Rehu, Rehu ana' Peleg, Peleg ana' Eber, Eber ana' Salmon,
Luke 3 36 Salmon ana' Kenan, Kenan ana' Arpakhsad, Arpakhsad ana' Sem, Sem ana' Nuh, Nuh ana' Lamekh,
Luke 3 37 Lamekh ana' Metusalah, Metusalah ana' Henokh, Henokh ana' Yared, Yared ana' Mahalaleel, Mahalaleel ana' Kenan,
Luke 3 38 Kenan ana' Enos, Enos ana' Set, Set ana' Adam, Adam ana' Alata'ala.
Luke 4 1 Pe'ongko' -na Yesus ngkai ue Yordan, Inoha' Tomoroli' mpokuasai-i pai' mpakeni-i hilou hi papada to wao'.
Luke 4 2 Mo'oha' -i hi ria opo' mpulu' bengi, pai' -i nasori Magau' Anudaa'. Kahae-na toe, uma ria hanyalaa to nakoni'. Timpaliu opo' mpulu' bengi toe, mo'oro' -imi.
Luke 4 3 Na'uli' Magau' Anudaa' mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Ane Ana' Alata'ala mpu'u-ko, wae-pi hubui watu toe mewali pongkoni'!"
Luke 4 4 Natompoi' Yesus: "Hi rala Buku Tomoroli' te'uki' hewa toi: `Manusia' uma tuwu' ngkai pongkoni' -wadi.'"
Luke 4 5 Oti toe, Magau' Anudaa' mpokeni-i hilou hi kalangkoa-na. Hampinisi mata-wadi napopohiloi-i hawe'ea kamagaua' hi dunia',
Luke 4 6 pai' na'uli' -ki: "Kuasa mpoparentai hawe'ea kamagaua' toera lau pai' hawe'ea ka'uaa' -na, kuwai' -koko Iko omea-mi mpai', apa' aku' omea pue' -na, pai' ma'ala kupewai' hi hema konoa-ku.
Luke 4 7 Jadi', ane mepue' -ko hi aku', kuwai' -koko Iko omea-mi toe lau."
Luke 4 8 Natompoi' Yesus: "Hi rala Buku Tomoroli' te'uki' hewa toi: `Kana mepue' -ta hi Pue' -ta, Pue' Ala. Muntu' Hi'a-wadi to natao tapengkorui.'"
Luke 4 9 Oti toe, Magau' Anudaa' mpopakeni-i hilou hi Yerusalem, napopokore-i hi lolo wumu Tomi Alata'ala, pai' na'uli' -ki: "Ane Ana' Alata'ala mpu'u-ko, mengkanawu' -ko pe' ngkai rei!
Luke 4 10 Uma-ko mpai' moapa, apa' ria te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli': `Pue' Ala mpohubui mala'eka-na mpetalawai' -ko, bona neo' -ko silaka.
Luke 4 11 Rahorongko-ko, bona witi' -nu uma dungku hi watu.'"
Luke 4 12 Natompoi' Yesus: "Te'uki' wo'o hewa toi: `Neo' tasori Pue' -ta, Pue' Ala.'"
Luke 4 13 Ka'oti-na Magau' Anudaa' mposori Yesus hante hawe'ea pesori toe, malai-imi mpopea loga to lompe'.
Luke 4 14 Oti toe, Yesus nakuasai Inoha' Tomoroli', pai' -i nculii' hilou hi tana' Galilea. Hi humalili' Galilea, molele-mi kareba to mpo'uli' napa to nababehi.
Luke 4 15 Metudui' -i hi tomi-tomi posampayaa to Yahudi, pai' hawe'ea tauna mpo'une' -i.
Luke 4 16 Hilou-imi Yesus hi Nazaret, ngata kabohea-na. Pai' hewa kabiasaa-na, mesua' -imi hi tomi posampayaa hi Eo Sabat, eo pepuea' -ra to Yahudi. Mokore-imi bona mpobasa Buku Tomoroli'.
Luke 4 17 Ratonu-ki sura nabi Yesaya. Napali' duu' -na mporua' lolita tohe'i:
Luke 4 18 "Inoha' Pue' Ala hompo hi Aku', apa' nawati' -ama mpokeni Kareba Lompe' hi tauna to mpe'ahii' tuwu' -ra. Nasuro-a mpo'uli' -raka to ratawani: `Tebahaka-mokoi!' Nasuro-a mpo'uli' -raka towero: `Pehilo-mokoi!' Nahubui-a mpobahaka-ra to rapobatua.
Luke 4 19 Nahubui-a mpopalele kareba-na, karata-nami tempo-na Pue' mpopohiloi ahi' -na hi ntodea-na."
Luke 4 20 Ka'oti-na nabasa toe we'i, nalulu nculii' -mi sura toe, natonu-ki pue' bago, pai' -i mohura bona metudui'. Hawe'ea tauna to hi rala tomi posampayaa toe mpodulu mponaa-i doko' mpo'epe lolita-na.
Luke 4 21 Na'uli' -miraka: "Eo toe lau, madupa' -mi lolita Buku Tomoroli' toe, nto'u kani'epe-na kubasa we'i."
Luke 4 22 Konce omea-ramo to mpo'epe-i, ra'uli': "Lompe' lia pololita-na! Uma mowo kanoto-na! Hiaa' bo ana' Yusuf-i-wadi-hawo."
Luke 4 23 Ngkai ree, na'uli' mpo'uli' -raka: "Bate ria-koi mpai' to mpo'uli' -ka walatu tohe'i: `Ee dokter, paka'uri' moto-mi-kowo woto-nu! Ane bongko nabi mpu'u-ko, anu mekoncehi to ki'epe nubabehi hi Kapernaum, babehi wo'o hi rehe'i hi ngata-nu moto.'"
Luke 4 24 Na'uli' tena-raka Yesus: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi, uma ria nabi to rabila' hi ngata-na moto.
Luke 4 25 Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: napa to jadi' tempo toi, bate hewa to jadi' hi tempo-na nabi Elia owi. Nto'u toe, tolu mpae ono mula hangaa mara eo, alaa-na rata oro' bohe hi hawe'ea ngata. Wori' moto tobine tobalu hi tana' Israel to mpe'ahii' tuwu' -ra nto'u toe.
Luke 4 26 Tapi' Pue' Ala uma mpohubui Elia mpotulungi haduaa ngkai tobalu toera. To nahubui-ki hilou hi ngata Sarfat, mpotulungi hadua tobine tobalu to Sidon, bela-i-hana to Israel.
Luke 4 27 Wae wo'o nto'u nabi Elisa owi, wori' moto topohaki' poko' hi tana' Israel. Aga uma-ra haduaa to napaka'uri' nabi Elisa. Muntu' Naaman, tauna to Siria."
Luke 4 28 Mpo'epe lolita-na Yesus toe we'i, moroe lia-ramo hawe'ea tauna to hi rala tomi posampayaa.
Luke 4 29 Pokore-rami mpopalai-i hilou hi mali ngata, pai' rakeni hilou hi bingke-na, apa' ngata-ra hi lolo bulu'. Patuju-ra ke mpotulaka-i hi bingke-na bona mate-i.
Luke 4 30 Ntaa' we'i, Yesus mako' mpe'olo' tauna to wori', pai' nculi' palai-nami.
Luke 4 31 Oti toe, Yesus hilou hi ngata Kapernaum hi tana' Galilea. Karata-na hi ree, metudui' wo'o-i hi tomi posampayaa hi Eo Sabat.
Luke 4 32 Konce-ramo tauna to mpo'epe tudui' -na, apa' mololita-i hewa tauna to mokuasa.
Luke 4 33 Ria wo'o hi ree hadua tauna to napesuai' seta to dada'a lia. Mejeu' -imi na'uli':
Luke 4 34 "Ee Yesus to Nazaret� Doko' nupopai-dakaie? Ba doko' nuropuhi-dakaie? Ku'inca moto-kole, ka'Iko-na Suro to moroli' ngkai Alata'ala-e."
Luke 4 35 Yesus mpo'uli' -ki seta toei: "Ngkaba'i-ko! Palai-ko ngkai tauna tetui!" Seta to mpesuai' tau toei mpodungka-i hi laintongo' ntodea, pai' -i malai, aga uma-i napopai-pai.
Luke 4 36 Konce omea-ramo tauna to mpohilo, pai' momepololitai-ramo, ra'uli': "Uma mowo kabaraka' lolita-nae'! Napake' kuasa-na mpopalai anudaa', malai mpu'u-ramo-rana."
Luke 4 37 Ngkai ree, molele-mi kareba hiapa-apa hi tana' Galilea, to mpo'uli' napa to nababehi Yesus.
Luke 4 38 Oti toe, malai-imi Yesus ngkai rala tomi posampayaa, hilou hi tomi Simon. Nto'u toe, piniana-na Simon tobine ngkelengi' gaga. Jadi' merapi' -ra hi Yesus bona natulungi-i-hawo.
Luke 4 39 Lou-imi Yesus mokore hi ncori poturua-na, pai' na'uli': "Palai-ko haki'!" Ncaliu mo'uri' -imi, pai' memata-i mpolayani-ra.
Luke 4 40 Limpa-mi eo, wori' tauna tumai hi Yesus, mpokeni hawe'ea ompi' -ra to peda' hante wori' nyala haki' -ra. Naganga-ra butu dua-na pai' napaka'uri' -ra.
Luke 4 41 Pai' wori' wo'o seta napopalai ngkai tauna to rapesuai'. Seta to napopalai toera, kaka'au-au-ra, ra'uli': "Iko-mi Ana' Alata'ala!" Aga natagi mpu'u-ra bona neo' -ra mololita, apa' ra'inca Kahi'a-na Magau' Topetolo'.
Luke 4 42 Kamepulo-na, malai-imi Yesus ngkai ngata toe, hilou hi kawaoa' -na. Wori' tauna mpali' -i, duu' -na rarua' -i. Merapi' -ra bona neo' -ipi mpalahii-ra.
Luke 4 43 Tapi' na'uli' mpo'uli' -raka: "Kana hilou wo'o-a hi ngata-ngata ntani' -na, mpoparata-raka kareba lompe' to mpo'uli' neo' rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia'. Apa' toe-mi patuju-na Alata'ala mposuro-a tumai."
Luke 4 44 Ngkai ree, Yesus hilou mpokeni Lolita Pue' hi tomi posampayaa hobo' hi tana' Yudea.
Luke 5 1 Hangkani, bula-na Yesus mokore hi wiwi' rano Genesaret, wori' tauna mome'upi' doko' mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala.
Luke 5 2 Mpohilo-i romeha' sakaya hi wiwi' rano. Nto'u toe, topebau' mencore ngkai sakaya-ra hilou hi role-na mpobohoi' jala' -ra.
Luke 5 3 Hilou-imi Yesus mpohawi' sakaya to hameha', sakaya-na Simon, pai' naperapi' bona Simon mpotoko sakaya ngkai wiwi' rano hangkedi'. Oti toe, pai' mohura-imi hi rala sakaya mpotudui' ntodea.
Luke 5 4 Kahudu-na metudui', na'uli' mpo'uli' -ki Simon: "Toko tena hilou hi kanalaa-na, pai' tene' jala' -ni bona mporata-koi bau'."
Luke 5 5 Na'uli' Simon: "Guru, hamengia-makai ngone mobago, aga uma hama'aa ihi' jala' -kai. Aga nau' wae, kutene' moto, lawi' nuhubui-kai."
Luke 5 6 Ngkai ree, karatene' -na jala' -ra, wori' mpu'u-mi bau' to mesua' hi rala-na, alaa-na ntepu'u morenta-mi jala' -ra.
Luke 5 7 Mekawe-ra hi doo-ra to hi rala sakaya kahameha' -na bona tumai mengawa'. Tumai mpu'u-ramo-rawo pai' ra'ihii' -mi sakaya romehaa', duu' -na neo' matala nakeni katomo-na.
Luke 5 8 Kanahilo-na Simon Petrus kabaraka' -na Yesus toe, powingkotu' -nami hi nyanyoa-na, na'uli': "Neo' -apa numohui', Pue'! Apa' aku' toi tauna topojeko'."
Luke 5 9 Simon mololita hewa toe, apa' hi'a pai' hawe'ea doo-na wilingkoroa mpohilo kawori' bau' to nawoko' jala' -ra.
Luke 5 10 Wilingkoroa wo'o-ra-rawo Yakobus pai' Yohanes, rodua ana' Zebedeus to mobago dohe Simon. Ngkai ree, na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki Simon: "Neo' me'eka'. Ntepu'u wae lau, uma-poko mebau'. Kuwai' -moko pobago to bo'u: mpotudui' tauna jadi' topetuku' -ku."
Luke 5 11 Oti toe, radii' sakaya-ra hi role-na, rapalahii omea-mi, pai' mpotuku' Yesus-ramo.
Luke 5 12 Hangkani, bula-na Yesus hi rala ngata, rata hadua tauna to mohaki' poko' hobo' woto-na. Kampohilo-na Yesus, powingkotu' -nami, lio-na dungku hi tana'. Merapi' -i hi Yesus, na'uli': "Pue', ane ma'ala, paka'uri' -a-kuwo!"
Luke 5 13 Yesus mpojama-i pai' na'uli' -ki: "Ma'ala moto. Kupaka'uri' -moko!" Hampinisi mata, mo'uri' -imi.
Luke 5 14 Oti toe, Yesus mpotagi-i, na'uli': "Neo' nulolita to jadi' tohe'i hi hema-hema. Hilou-moko ulu mpopehuwu woto-nu hi imam, bona nahilo kamo'uri' -numi, pai' keni pepue' -nu ntuku' parenta to na'uki' Musa, bona monoa' hi hawe'ea tauna kamo'uri' -nu mpu'u-mi."
Luke 5 15 Ntaa' molele lau-midi kareba-na hiapa-apa-e, alaa-na mo'iko tauna mpotuku' Yesus doko' mpo'epe lolita-na pai' mpopepaka'uri'.
Luke 5 16 Tapi' Yesus biasa hilou hi kawaoa' -na pai' mosampaya.
Luke 5 17 Rala-na ha'eo nto'u Yesus metudui', ria ba hangkuja dua to Parisi pai' guru agama mohura hi ree. Ria-ra ngkai ngata-ngata hi tana' Galilea, Yudea, pai' ngkai ngata Yerusalem wo'o. Baraka' ngkai Pue' Ala ria hi Yesus bona mepaka'uri'.
Luke 5 18 Nto'u toe, tumai-ra ba hangkuja tauna mpokowa' hadua topungku to turu hi rala pokowaa'. Rapali' ohea-ra mesua' hi tomi doko' mpokeni doo-ra hi Yesus.
Luke 5 19 Aga uma-ra teliu mesua', apa' bihi' rahi tauna. Toe pai' ngkahe' tuka' -ramo mpokeni doo-ra hilou hi lolo tomi, rahungka' ata' pai' ra'ulu-i ntali pokowaa' -na hilou hi nyanyoa Yesus hi laintongo' ntodea.
Luke 5 20 Kanahilo-na Yesus kabohe pepangala' -ra, na'uli' -mi hi topungku toei: "Ompi', te'ampungi-mi jeko' -nu."
Luke 5 21 Mololita-ramo guru agama pai' to Parisi toera hi rala nono-ra, ra'uli': "Hema rahi-idi tauna toei mai, pai' daho' -i mpo'uli' hibalia tuwu' -na hante Alata'ala-e? Uma ria haduaa to ma'ala mpo'ampungi jeko', muntu' Alata'ala-wadi."
Luke 5 22 Na'inca moto Yesus napa to hi rala nono-ra. Toe pai' na'uli' -raka: "Napa pai' nipekiri hewa tetu-e?
Luke 5 23 Aku' Ana' Manusia', ria mpu'u kuasa-ku hi dunia' mpo'ampungi jeko'. Tapi' ane ku'uli' -ki topungku toei mai: `Te'ampungi-mi jeko' -nu,' uma ni'incai ba te'ampungi mpu'u-di jeko' -nae ba uma-di. Aga ane ku'uli': `Memata pai' mako' -moko,' nihilo mpai' kadupa' -na ba ka'uma-na.
Luke 5 24 Jadi', kupopohiloi-koi karia-na kuasa-ku mpo'ampungi jeko'." Ngkai ree, kamewili' -na hi topungku toei, na'uli' -ki: "Ku'uli' -koko, memata-moko, ongko' -mi pokowaa' -nu, pai' nculii' -moko."
Luke 5 25 Pemata-na mpu'u-mi topungku toei, rasabii' tauna to wori', na'ongko' poturua-na, pai' -i nculii' hilou hi tomi-na. Pai' hi lengko ohea ntora mpo'une' Alata'ala-imi.
Luke 5 26 Konce lia hawe'ea tauna mpohilo tohe'e, pai' -ra mpo'une' Alata'ala. Hante mogalo me'eka' wo'o-ra, ra'uli': "Uma mowo kajadia' to tahilo eo toe we'i lau!"
Luke 5 27 Oti toe, malai-imi Yesus, pai' hi lengko ohea mpohilo-i hadua topesingara' paja' bula-na mohura hi kantoro' -na, hanga' -na Lewi. Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Tuku' -ama."
Luke 5 28 Pokore-nami mpalahii omea, pai' -i mpotuku' Yesus.
Luke 5 29 Lewi mpobabehi karamea bohe hi tomi-na, mpotorata Yesus. Wori' wo'o topesingara' paja' pai' tau ntani' -na rakio' ngkoni' dohe-ra.
Luke 5 30 Mpohilo toe, ba hangkuja dua pangkeni agama pai' guru agama to mpotuku' tudui' Parisi, ntora ngkunuti. Ra'uli' mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na Yesus: "Napa pai' ngkoni' pai' nginu-ko-koina hangkaa-ngkania hante topesingara' paja' pai' topojeko' -e?"
Luke 5 31 Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Tauna to uma peda', uma mingki' rapokulii'. Tauna to peda' -wadi-hawo to paraluu rapokulii'.
Luke 5 32 Uma-a tumai mpokio' -ra to monoa' ingku-ra. Katumai-ku toi-le, mpokio' topojeko' -a bona medea-ra ngkai jeko' -ra."
Luke 5 33 Nto'u toe, ria to mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Topetuku' -na Yohanes Topeniu', jau-ra-hana mopuasa' pai' mosampaya. Wae wo'o topetuku' -ra to Parisi. Hiaa' topetuku' -nu Iko-kona, ngkoni' pai' nginu oa' -ra-wadi. Napa pai' uma-ra mopuasa' -e?"
Luke 5 34 Yesus mpotompoi' -ra hante lolita rapa' toi, na'uli': "Tauna hi posusaa' poncamokoa, ha mopuasa' -ra-rana bula-ra mpo'emai' topemua'? Uma-hawo.
Luke 5 35 Tapi' rata mpai' tempo-na, topemua' ra'ala' ngkai laintongo' -ra. Nto'u toe-damo, pai' lako' mopuasa' -rada."
Luke 5 36 Oti toe, Yesus mpo'uli' lolita rapa' toi, na'uli' -raka: "Uma ria tauna to mpotai' hanceu' pontaia' ngkai baju to bo'u pai' natelepei-ki baju to hae. Apa' ane wae, narenta lau-mi baju to bo'u. Pai' uma wo'o mpai' lompe' lence-na pontaia' to bo'u toe hi baju to hae.
Luke 5 37 Wae wo'o, uma ria tauna to mpotua anggur to bo'u hi rala pontu'ua to hae. Apa' ane dede' -i mpai', mopengka lau-mi pontu'ua to hae toe, alaa-na mobowo anggur, pai' mpadaa' wo'o-mi pontu'ua-na.
Luke 5 38 Anggur to bo'u bate kana ra'ihii' hi pontu'ua to bo'u wo'o-wadi-hawo.
Luke 5 39 "Uma ria tauna to dota nginu anggur to bo'u ane oti-i-damo mpo'inu to hae. Apa' na'uli' mpai': `Anggur to hae to motomo'.'"
Luke 6 1 Hangkani Yesus pai' ana'guru-na ntara rala bonea nto'u Eo Sabat, eo pepuea' -ra to Yahudi. Bula-ra mpotara bonea toe, ana'guru-na mpotepo' wua' gandum, raporo bona molepa' kuluma-na, pai' raru'a.
Luke 6 2 To Parisi to hi ree mpokamaro-ra, ra'uli': "Napa pai' nitiboki atura agama-ta? Mobago-dako-koina hi eo pepuea'!"
Luke 6 3 Na'uli' -raka Yesus: "Ha uma ria nibasa napa to nababehi Magau' Daud pai' doo-doo-na owi nto'u-ra mo'oro' -e?
Luke 6 4 Mesua' -i hi rala tomi pepuea', pai' nakoni' roti to rapopepue' hi Alata'ala, pai' nabagi wo'o-raka doo-na. Ntuku' ada agama-ta, imam-wadi-hana to ma'ala mpokoni' roti toe. Aga nau' wae, gau' -na Daud toe uma-hawo naposala'."
Luke 6 5 Ngkai ree, na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus: "Aku' Ana' Manusia', ria kuasa-ku mpo'uli' napa to ma'ala rababehi hi eo pepuea'."
Luke 6 6 Hangkani wo'o nto'u Eo Sabat, hilou-i metudui' hi tomi posampayaa. Hi tomi posampayaa toe, ria hadua tauna to mate pale ka'ana-na.
Luke 6 7 Ba hangkuja dua to Parisi pai' guru agama to hi ree mpolelemata-i Yesus, meka' ba mepaka'uri' -i mpai' hi Eo Sabat. Patuju-ra, mpali' kedo' bona rapakilu-i mobago hi Eo Sabat.
Luke 6 8 Aga na'inca moto Yesus anu hi nono-ra. Toe pai' na'uli' mpo'uli' -ki tauna to mate pale-na hamali toei: "Mai-moko mokore hi laintongo' rei!" Hilou mpu'u-imi-hawo mokore hi ree.
Luke 6 9 Ngkai ree, na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Kupekune' -koi ulu. Ntuku' atura agama-ta, to'uma to ma'ala tababehi hi Eo Sabat: mpobabehi to lompe' -di ba to dada'a? Mpotulungi doo ba mpatehi doo?"
Luke 6 10 Mogolili Yesus mponaa-ra omea, pai' na'uli' -ki topeda' toei: "Tanoa pale-nu!" Kanatanoa-na pale-na, mo'uri' -imi.
Luke 6 11 Ngkai ree, uma mowo karoe-ra guru agama pai' to Parisi. Toe pai' mohawa' -ramo mpali' reke-ra, ba rapopai-i Yesus.
Luke 6 12 Nto'u toe, Yesus hilou hi bulu' -na, pai' mosampaya-i hamengia hi Alata'ala.
Luke 6 13 Kabaja-na, nakio' -ramo topetuku' -na pai' napelihi hampulu' rodua ngkai laintongo' -ra. To hampulu' rodua toera, nahanga' suro-na.
Luke 6 14  
Luke 6 15  
Luke 6 16 Hanga' -ra: Simon (Yesus mpohanga' -i Petrus); pai' Andreas ompi' -na Simon; Yakobus; Yohanes; Filipus; Bartolomeus; Matius; Tomas; Yakobus ana' Alfeus; Simon to rahanga' to Zelot; Yudas ana' Yakobus; pai' Yudas Iskariot, to mpobalu' Yesus hi bali' -nae mpai'.
Luke 6 17 Oti toe, mana'u-imi Yesus ngkai lolo bulu' hante ana'guru-na, pai' -ra mento'o hi lempe-na. Hi ree, wori' -mi topetuku' -na mpopea-i, pai' wori' lia tauna morumpu. Tauna toera ngkai humalili' tana' Yudea, ngkai ngata Yerusalem pai' ngkai ngata Tirus pai' Sidon to hi wiwi' tahi'.
Luke 6 18 Patuju-ra tumai, doko' mpo'epe lolita Yesus pai' mpopepaka'uri'. To napesuai' seta tumai wo'o pai' napaka'uri' -ra.
Luke 6 19 Wori' tauna mpali' ohea doko' mpoganga Yesus, apa' ria baraka' to mehupa' ngkai woto-na to mpaka'uri' -ra omea.
Luke 6 20 Yesus mponaa topetuku' -na pai' na'uli' -raka: Morasi' -koi tokabu, apa' koi' to jadi' ntodea Alata'ala, pai' Hi'a jadi' Magau' -ni.
Luke 6 21 Morasi' -koi to mo'oro' tempo toi, apa' rabohui moto-koi mpai'. Morasi' -koi to geo' tempo toi, apa' goe' moto-koi mpai'.
Luke 6 22 "Morasi' -koi ane rapokahuku' -koi, rapopalai-koi, raruge' pai' rapomohoa hanga' -ni sabana petuku' -ni hi Aku' Ana' Manusia'.
Luke 6 23 Apa' wae wo'o gau' ntu'a-ra mpobalinai' nabi-nabi to owi. Jadi', ane rapohewa toe-koi, mohajo-koi pai' pakagoe' moto nono-ni, apa' bohe mpai' rasi' to nirata hi rala suruga.
Luke 6 24 "Aga silaka-koi topo'ua' tempo toi, apa' mpolia' nirata-mi-koina kagoea' -ni.
Luke 6 25 Silaka-koi to bohu tempo toi, apa' mo'oro' -koi mpai'. Silaka-koi to goe' tempo toi, apa' susa' pai' geo' -koi mpai'.
Luke 6 26 Silaka-koi ane hawe'ea tauna mpo'une' -koi, apa' wae wo'o ntu'a-ra owi mpo'une' nabi-nabi to boa'.
Luke 6 27 "Aga hi koi' to mpo'epe lolita-ku wae-e lau, ohe'i hawa' -ku: Kana tapoka'ahi' bali' -ta, mo'ingku lompe' hi tauna to mpokahuku' -ta.
Luke 6 28 Gane' -ra to mpokamo-ta, posampayai-ra to dada'a hi kita'.
Luke 6 29 Ane ria tauna to mpohopo' kulimpi-ta hamali, neo' rapehawai. Tonu lau wo'o-ki to hamali. Ane ria to mpo'agoi-ta abe' -ta, wai' wo'o lau-i baju-ta.
Luke 6 30 Ane ria to mperapii' -ta, wai' -ra-rawo. Ane ria to mpo'agoi ba napa-napa rewa-ta, neo' raperapi' nculii'.
Luke 6 31 Napa po'ingku to tapokono rababehi doo hi kita', toe wo'o to kana tababehi hi doo.
Luke 6 32 "Ane tapoka'ahi' muntu' tauna to mpoka'ahi' -ta-wadi, uma mpai' nagane' -ta Alata'ala. Bangku' tauna to dada'a gau' -ra, ma'ahi' moto-ra hi tauna to mpoka'ahi' -ra.
Luke 6 33 Ane lompe' po'ingku-ta muntu' hi tauna to lompe' po'ingku-ra hi kita', uma mpai' nagane' -ta Alata'ala. Bangku' tauna to dada'a, bate lompe' po'ingku-ra hi tauna to lompe' po'ingku-ra hi hira'.
Luke 6 34 Ane kita' mpewai' doi-ta rahenta muntu' hi tauna to ta'inca bisa mpoponculi' -taka, uma mpai' nagane' -ta Alata'ala. Bangku' tauna to dada'a, dota wo'o-ra-rawo rapohentai doi hingka todada'a-ra, apa' ncarumaka-ra rapoponculi' moto-raka mpai'.
Luke 6 35 "Neo' hewa tetu! Kana tapoka'ahi' bali' -ta, mo'ingku lompe' hi hira'. Wai' -ra hema to doko' mpohentai-ta, pai' neo' ncarumaka ponculia' -na. Ane wae po'ingku-ta, bohe mpai' rasi' to tarata hi eo mpeno, pai' tatuku' -mi po'ingku Pue' Ala to hi suruga. Apa' manara-i Pue' hi tauna to uma mpo'incai mpo'uli' tarima kasi pai' hi tauna to dada'a.
Luke 6 36 Kana ma'ahi' -ta, hewa kama'ahi' -na Pue' Ala Tuama-ta.
Luke 6 37 "Neo' -ta mpotudo' sala' doo, bona uma wo'o mpai' Pue' Ala mpotudo' sala' -ta. Neo' mpo'uli' tauna to masala' kana rahuku', bona uma wo'o mpai' Pue' Ala mpohuku' -ta. Ampungi sala' doo, Pue' Ala wo'o mpai' mpo'ampungi sala' -ta.
Luke 6 38 Kana tawai' doo-ta, Pue' Ala wo'o mpowai' -ta. Nawai' -ta pewai' to lompe' lia, to oti-mi ralengo pai' ra'oo', duu' -na moloju'. Apa' pohuka' to tapake' hi doo, tetu wo'o-hawo mpai' to rapopohuka' -taka."
Luke 6 39 Pai' na'uli' wo'o Yesus lolita rapa' tohe'i: "Ane towero mpotete' hingka towero-na, bate moluli' -ra mpai' hi rala kinali.
Luke 6 40 Pai' uma ria ana' sikola to meliu karabila' -na ngkai guru-na. Ane hudu-miki posikola-na, pai' lako' hibalia-idi hante guru-na.
Luke 6 41 "Napa pai' mponaa-ta gege' hi mata doo, hiaa' wince' kaju to hi mata-ta moto uma ta'incai karia-na!
Luke 6 42 Beiwa-ta ma'ala mpo'uli' -ki doo: `Ompi', mai kulali gege' -nu,' bo uma moto tahiloi wince' kaju to hi mata-ta. Neo' mpetolompei' kehi! Kana talali ulu wince' kaju to hi mata-ta, bona monoto mata-ta mpolali gege' doo.
Luke 6 43 "Uma ria kaju to lompe' mowua' to dada'a. Wae wo'o uma ria kaju to dada'a mowua' to lompe'.
Luke 6 44 Butu nyala kaju ra'inca kalompe' -na hi powua' -na. Wua' ara uma rahopu' ngkai walaa to morui. Wua' anggur uma rahopu' ngkai jilata.
Luke 6 45 Wae wo'o manusia'. Tauna to lompe', bate mpohowa' lolita to lompe' -ra, apa' lawi' nono-ra ihia' to lompe'. Tauna to dada'a, dada'a wo'o lolita-ra, apa' nono-ra ihia' to dada'a. Apa' napa ihi' nono-ta, toe wo'o-mi to howa' hi wiwi-ta.
Luke 6 46 "Napa pai' nikio' -a `Pue'! Pue'!' bo uma-di nituku' hawa' -kue!
Luke 6 47 Tauna to tumai hi Aku' mpo'epe pai' mpotuku' tudui' -ku, hira' hewa tauna hi rala lolita rapa' tohe'i:
Luke 6 48 Hadua tauna mpowangu tomi, nakae tana' napomonala pai' nahu'a parawatu to moroho. Rata uda bohe pai' ue mowo' mporumpa' tomi toe, aga uma-i molengo apa' moroho parawatu-na.
Luke 6 49 Aga tauna to mpo'epe lolita-ku pai' uma ratuku', hira' hewa hadua tauna to mpowangu tomi hi lolo tana' -wadi hante uma ria parawatu-na. Rata ue mowo' mporumpa' tomi toe, kamodungka-nami, pai' gaga kagero-na."
Luke 7 1 Kahudu-na Yesus mpotudui' ntodea hawe'ea toe, hilou-imi hi ngata Kapernaum.
Luke 7 2 Hi ngata toe, ria hadua tadulako tantara to Roma, ria-ki batua-na to napoka'ahi' lia. Batua-na toei peda' danca, neo' mate.
Luke 7 3 Kana'epe-na tadulako toei karia-na Yesus hi ngata-na, nahubui ba hangkuja dua pangkeni to Yahudi hilou mpopetulungi hi Yesus, bona tumai-i mpaka'uri' batua-na.
Luke 7 4 Karata-ra hi Yesus, merapi' mpu'u-ra, ra'uli': "Tadulako toei ria, natao lia nutulungi,
Luke 7 5 apa' napoka'ahi' -ta kita' to Yahudi, pai' ria-i mpowai' -kai doi mpowangu tomi posampayaa-kai."
Luke 7 6 Ngkai ree, hilou mpu'u-imi Yesus dohe-ra. Kamohu' -na Yesus hi tomi-na, tadulako toei mpohubui wo'o-ramo ba hangkuja dua doo-na hilou mpohirua' -ki Yesus mpo'uli' -ki hewa toi: "Tuama, uma-ko mingki' tumai hi tomi-ku, apa' aku' toi bela-a to Yahudi, uma-a natao nupencuai'.
Luke 7 7 Toe pai' uma-a daho' tilou hi Iko Tuama, apa' uma-a natao mpohirua' -koko. Nau' lolita hamela-wadi nu'uli', bate mo'uri' -i mpai' batua-ku.
Luke 7 8 Apa' aku' toi-e, pahawaa' wo'o-a-wadi-kuwo, pai' ria wo'o-ra-kuwo to kuhawai'. Ane rapa' -na ria hawa' -ku hi hadua tantara mpo'uli' -ki: `Hilou-ko!' bate hilou-i. Ane mekio' -a hi tantara kahadua-na: `Mai-ko!' bate tumai-i. Ane ku'uli' -raka batua-ku: `Babehi toe!' bate rababehi. Wae wo'o-kowo Iko Tuama, napa to nu'uli' hi retu, bate madupa' hi rei."
Luke 7 9 Konce-i Yesus mpo'epe lolita ngkai tadulako toei. Toe pai' me'ili' -imi hi ntodea to mpotuku' -i, pai' na'uli' -raka: "Uma mowo pepangala' -na tau toei ria! Nau' hi to Yahudi muli Israel, ko'ia ria haduaa kurata to bohe pepangala' -na hewa tauna toei ria."
Luke 7 10 Oti toe, nculii' -ramo suro toera hi tomi tadulako. Karata-ra hi ria, mpolia' mo'uri' -imi batua-na.
Luke 7 11 Uma mahae ngkai toe, hilou-imi Yesus hi ngata to rahanga' Nain, hante ana'guru-na pai' wori' tau ntani' -na dohe-ra.
Luke 7 12 Mohu' -ramo hi wobo' wuntu ngata, rahilo-rawo wori' tauna mehupa' ngkai rala ngata, mpokowa' tomate. Tomate toei, hadua kabilasa, ana' hadudua, tina-na balu-mi. Wori' pue' ngata mpodohei tina-na hilou hi daeo'.
Luke 7 13 Kanahilo-na Pue' Yesus tobine toei, metumu' -mi ahi' -na pai' na'uli' -ki: "Neo' -pi-hawo geo'!"
Luke 7 14 Hilou-imi mpoganga pokowa', mentoda' -ramo to mokowa'. Na'uli' Yesus: "Kabilasa! Kuhubui-ko memata!"
Luke 7 15 Kabilasa to mate toei we'i, kaliliu mohura-imi pai' -i mololita. Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki tina-na: "Oi-mi ana' -nu, totina."
Luke 7 16 Tauna to mpohilo kajadia' toe, me'eka' omea-ramo, pai' -ra mpobila' Alata'ala, ra'uli': "Hadua nabi to mobaraka' mehuwu-mi hi laintongo' -ta! Hompo mpu'u-imi Alata'ala tumai mpotulungi ntodea-na!"
Luke 7 17 Kareba toe molele hobo' hi tana' Yudea pai' ntololikia-na.
Luke 7 18 Ana'guru-na Yohanes Topeniu' mpoparata-ki hawe'ea to nababehi Yesus toe. Toe pai' mpokio' -i rodua ana'guru-na,
Luke 7 19 pai' nahubui-ra hilou hi Pue' Yesus, na'uli' -raka: "Hilou-mokoi hi Yesus pai' uli' -ki retu: `Ba Iko-mi Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Alata'ala, ba ria-pidi to ntani' -na to kipopea?'"
Luke 7 20 Hilou mpu'u-ramo suro to rodua toera, pai' ra'uli' -ki Yesus: "Pai' -kai tumai Guru, nahubui-kai Yohanes mpekune' -ta, ba kita' -midi Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Pue' Ala, ba ria-pidi to ntani' -na to kipopea."
Luke 7 21 Nto'u toe wo'o-hawo, Yesus mpaka'uri' wori' topeda' ngkai haki' -ra, napopalai anudaa' ngkai tauna to rahawi', pai' napaka'uri' towero bona pehilo-ra.
Luke 7 22 Na'uli' -mi Yesus mpo'uli' -raka suro Yohanes toera hewa toi: "Nculii' -mokoi, uli' -ki Yohanes hi retu napa to nihilo pai' to ni'epe: towero pehilo-mi, tokejo momako' monoa' -mi, topohaki' poko' mo'uri', towongo pe'epe, tomate kupotuwu' nculii', pai' Kareba Lompe' kuparata-raka to mpe'ahii' tuwu' -ra.
Luke 7 23 Marasi' -ra tauna to uma morara' nono-ra hi Aku'."
Luke 7 24 Palai-ra suro Yohanes toera, mololita-imi Yesus hi ntodea, mpotompo'wiwi Yohanes. Na'uli': "Napa patuju-ni hilou mpohirua' -ki Yohanes Topeniu' hi tana' to wao'? Ba doko' -koi mpohilo tauna to morara' nono-na, to hewa pimpi to molue nawui ngolu' hilou tumai? Uma-hawoe'.
