Luke 7 25 Jadi', hilou doko' mpohilo napa-dikoie? Ba doko' mpohilo tauna to ncola pohea-na? Uma wo'o, apa' po'ohaa' tauna to ncola pohea-ra pai' to mo'ua' katuwu' -ra, hi tomi magau' -ra-wadi-hana.
Luke 7 26 Jadi', hilou doko' mpohilo napa-dikoie? Ba doko' mpohilo nabi-dikoi? Ane tetu, makono lia. Apa' Yohanes tetui meliu ngkai nabi to ntani' -na.
Luke 7 27 Apa' hi'a tetu-mi to mporodo nono-ra ntodea mpotarima-a, hewa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' owi. Na'uli' Alata'ala: `Hi'a toi-mi suro-ku, kuhubui-i meri'ulu ngkai Iko, bona mporodo ohea-nu.'"
Luke 7 28 Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus: "Pe'epei lompe': ngkai hawe'ea tauna to putu hi rala dunia' toi, uma ria haduaa to meliu kabohe tuwu' -na ngkai Yohanes. Aga ngkai wae lau, marasi' mpu'u-ra tauna to jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua' -na. Nau' to kedi' lia tuwu' -ra, meliu kamarasi' -ra ngkai Yohanes."
Luke 7 29 Hawe'ea tauna, nte to mpesingarai' paja', mpo'epe lolita Yesus toe mpotompo'wiwi Yohanes. Mpo'epe toe, ratarima-mi Lolita Alata'ala, apa' oti-ramo mpopeniu' hi Yohanes.
Luke 7 30 Hiaa' to Parisi pai' guru agama-rana, oja' -ra mpotarima patuju Alata'ala hi tuwu' -ra, bo oja' -ra mpopeniu' hi Yohanes.
Luke 7 31 Na'uli' wo'o Yesus: "Uma mowo tauna to tuwu' tempo toi! Toi-mi lolita rapa' -ku to kurapai' -raka:
Luke 7 32 Hira' hewa ana' to mohura hi wiwi' karajaa, to ntora momekio' hi doo-ra, ra'uli': `Kibawai-koi molalowe, uma-koi dota goe' dohe-kai. Kibawai-koi motantangi', uma wo'o-koi dota geo' dohe-kai.'
Luke 7 33  
Luke 7 34 Batua-na: Yohanes Topeniu' uma nipokonoi, Aku' wo'o uma nipokonoi. Katumai-na Yohanes, mopuasa' -i pai' uma-i nginu to melanguhi. Nipoka'oja' -i, ni'uli': `Kahawia' -i-hanale!' Hiaa' katumai-ku Aku' Ana' Manusia', nginu-a, ngkoni' -a. Nipoka'oja' wo'o-a-wadi, ni'uli': `Hilo-i! Tojampa, topalangu-langu, bale-ra topesingara' paja' pai' doo-ra topojeko'!'
Luke 7 35 Aga nau' wae, ta'inca kamonoto-na patuju Alata'ala ane tanaa gau' hawe'ea topetuku' -na."
Luke 7 36 Ria hadua to Parisi, hanga' -na Simon, mpohinta' Yesus ngkoni' hi tomi-na. Hilou mpu'u-imi Yesus hi tomi-na, mohura pai' -ra ngkoni'.
Luke 7 37 Hi rala ngata toe, ria hadua tobine topojeko', uma tumotoa gau' -na. Kana'epe-na karia Yesus ngkoni' hi tomi to Parisi toei, tumai-i ngkeni hameha' butolo' ihia' lana honga.
Luke 7 38 Tumai-imi mpomohui' witi' Yesus, pai' -i geo'. Nasiii' witi' -na Yesus hante ue mata-na. Oti toe nabongka wuluwoo' -na, napomporihi-ki witi' -na, na'eki pai' natuai hante lana honga.
Luke 7 39 Nahilo to Parisi babehia tobine toei. Mololita bongo-imi hi rala nono-na, na'uli': "Ane bongko nabi mpu'u-i tau toei, ke na'inca kahema-na tobine to mpoganga-i toe, ka'uma-na tumotoa gau' -na."
Luke 7 40 Ngkai ree, na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki to Parisi toei: "Simon, ria to doko' ku'uli' -koko." Na'uli' Simon: "Uli' -mile Guru."
Luke 7 41 Na'uli' Yesus: "Ria rodua tauna to mo'inta hi tauna to ma'ala rapohentai doi. Hadua mpohenta lima atu doi pera', to hadua lima mpulu' -wadi.
Luke 7 42 Ngkai ka'uma-napi rakulei' mpobayari inta-ra, na'uli' -mi tauna to rapohentai toei: `Uma-pi mingki' nibayari inta-ni.' Jadi', hema ngkai hira' to rodua toera to meliu ahi' -ra hi popa'intaa-ra?"
Luke 7 43 Natompoi' Simon: "Ba tauna to wori' inta-na tu?" Na'uli' Yesus: "Makono tompoi' -nu."
Luke 7 44 Oti toe, pai' me'ili' -imi hi tobine toei pai' na'uli' -ki Simon: "Ha nuhilo tobine toei-e? Karata-ku hi tomi-nu we'i, uma nuporodo ue pobohoi' witi' -ku, ntuku' ada-ta hi torata. Hiaa' tobine toei, nabohoi' -hana witi' -ku hante ue mata-na pai' naporihi hante wuluwoo' -na.
Luke 7 45 Iko, uma-a nutabe hante pe'eki ntuku' ada-ta. Hiaa' tobine toei, uma nabahakai mpo'eki witi' -ku ngkai lomo' -ku rata duu' toe lau.
Luke 7 46 Iko, uma nulanai woo' -ku ntuku' ada-ta hi torata. Hiaa' tobine toei mpobowohi witi' -ku hante lana honga to masuli' oli-na.
Luke 7 47 Jadi', bo ma'ahi' lia-ie, toe pai' monoa' -mi kata'inca-na, jeko' -na to wori' te'ampungi-mi. Aga tauna to hangkedi' -wadi te'ampungi jeko' -na, hangkedi' wo'o-wadi-hawo ahi' -na."
Luke 7 48 Oti toe na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki tobine toei: "Te'ampungi-mi jeko' -nu."
Luke 7 49 Mpo'epe toe, momepololitai-ramo tauna to mpohimpongkoni' -raka, ra'uli': "Hema-idie tau tetui-e, pai' daho' -i mpo'ampungi jeko' -e?"
Luke 7 50 Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus hi tobine toei: "Tebahaka-moko ngkai huku' jeko' -nu sabana pepangala' -nu hi Aku'. Hilou-moko hante kalompea' tuwu' -nu."
Luke 8 1 Oti toe, Yesus mpodaoi' wori' ngata mpopalele Kareba Lompe', na'uli': "Neo' rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia'." Ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua mpodohei-i.
Luke 8 2 Ria wo'o ba hangkuja dua tobine to mpodohei-ra. Tobine toera, tobine to napaka'uri' Yesus ngkai haki' -ra ba ngkai anudaa' to mpohawi' -ra. To hadua, Maria to biasa-na rahanga' Magdalena. Ria-i hangkani Yesus mpopalai pitu anudaa' ngkai Maria toei.
Luke 8 3 To hadua wo'o, Yohana tobine-na Khuza, topohawa' hi rala tomi Magau' Herodes. Ria wo'o Susana, pai' wori' -pidi tobine ntani' -na. Tobine toera mpake' doi-ra moto mpotulungi Yesus pai' ana'guru-na.
Luke 8 4 Uma ria kaputua tauna ngkai ngata ntani' -na tumai hi Yesus. Wori' -mi tauna to morumpu, Yesus mpololitai-ra hante lolita rapa' toi, na'uli':
Luke 8 5 "Ria hadua topohawu' hilou mohawu'. Rala mpohawu' -na toe, ria hawua' -na monawu' hi mata ohea, alaa-na rapopongko tauna pai' natilo' danci.
Luke 8 6 Ria wo'o to monawu' hi tana' to watua. Tuwu' moto hinawu' toe, aga kaliliu molaju apa' bangi tana' -na.
Luke 8 7 Ria wo'o to monawu' hi laintongo' rui. Tuwu' rui hangkaa-ngkania hante hinawu', alaa-na rui mpo'upi' hinawu' duu' -na mate.
Luke 8 8 Ria wo'o hawua' to monawu' hi tana' to morudu'. Tuwu' hinawu' toe, morudu' lia, wua' -na ha'atu ngkani ngkai hinawu' -na." Oti lolita rapa' -na toe, na'uli' -mi Yesus: "Hema-koi to tilingaa, pe'epei lompe'!"
Luke 8 9 Ana'guru-na mpekune' Yesus ba napa-i batua lolita rapa' toe.
Luke 8 10 Na'uli' Yesus: "Owi, Alata'ala ko'ia mpopo'incai manusia' beiwa-i mpai' jadi' Magau' hi dunia'. Aga hewa toe lau, napopo'incai-mokoi tudui' toe. Aga ane ntodea-hana, kutudui' -ra hante lolita rapa', bona madupa' lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli': `Pe'epe moto-ra, aga uma oa' ra'incai batua-na. Pehilo moto-ra, aga hewa to uma oa' monoto rahilo.'
Luke 8 11 "Tohe'i-mi batua lolita rapa' -ku we'i: Hawua' to rahawu', tetu-mi Lolita Alata'ala.
Luke 8 12 Hawua' to monawu' hi mata ohea mpobatuai tauna to mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala, aga Magau' Anudaa' mpohilingai' nono-ra, alaa-na uma-ra mepangala', pai' uma-ra tebahaka ngkai huku' jeko' -ra.
Luke 8 13 "Hawua' to monawu' hi watu mpobatuai tauna to mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala pai' ratarima hante goe' nono-ra. Mepangala' moto-ra, aga pepangala' -ra tetu uma moroho, hewa hinu'a to uma morali'. Toe pai' ane rata-damo pesori, mo'ungkere' -ramo, uma-rapa mepangala'.
Luke 8 14 "Hawua' to monawu' hi laintongo' rui mpobatuai tauna to mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala, aga ntora mpenonoi katuwu' -ra hi rala dunia', doko' mo'ua' pai' doko' mporata kagoea'. Hawe'ea toe mposesei' -ra, alaa-na uma-ra kaliliu mpotuku' Lolita Alata'ala, pai' uma ria kalaua-na hi katuwu' -ra.
Luke 8 15 "Hawua' to monawu' hi tana' to morudu' mpobatuai tauna to mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala, pai' lolita toe rakakamu hante kanoa' pai' karoli' nono-ra. Ntaha-ra mpotuku' Lolita Alata'ala, duu' -na ria kalaua-na hi katuwu' -ra.
Luke 8 16 "Uma ria tauna to mposuwe palita pai' napopoi' ba natu'u hi une' poturua. Palita bate natu'u hi pontu'ua-na bona hini-na rahilo tauna to mesua'.
Luke 8 17 Apa' hawe'ea to tewuni kana rapopehuwu. Pai' hawe'ea to kalerua kana rahungke pai' jadi' kahiloa.
Luke 8 18 "Toe pai' ku'uli', pelompehi-koie' beiwa-koi mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala. Apa' tauna to mpotarima Lolita Alata'ala, ranotohi nono-ra bona kawoo-woria' to ra'inca. Aga tauna to uma dota mpotarima Lolita Alata'ala, nau' ria hangkedi' to ra'inca, ra'alai' lau-ra."
Luke 8 19 Hangkani, tina pai' ompi' -na Yesus tumai doko' mpohirua' -ki, aga uma-ra teliu apa' wori' rahi tauna.
Luke 8 20 Ria hadua to mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Guru, tina-nu pai' ompi' -nu, oe-ra ria hi mali-na, doko' mpohirua' -koko."
Luke 8 21 Tapi' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Ane to kupotina pai' to kupo'ompi' -le, tauna to mpo'epe pai' mpotuku' Lolita Alata'ala."
Luke 8 22 Rala-na ha'eo, Yesus hante ana'guru-na mohawi' sakaya. Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Hilou-tamo hi dipo rano." Me'ongko' -ramo.
Luke 8 23 Bula-ra mosakaya, leta' -imi Yesus. Muu-mule' rata-mi ngolu' bohe hi rano mporumpa' -ra. Sakaya-ra napesua' ue, alaa-na neo' matala-ramo.
Luke 8 24 Ana'guru-na hilou hi Yesus mpolike-i, ra'uli': "Guru! Guru! Mate-ta toi-e!" Pemata-nami Yesus pai' -i mpotagi ngolu' pai' balumpa to mekoroi' toe. Mento'o-mi ngolu', pai' rano molino nculii'. Rodo omea-mi.
Luke 8 25 Ngkai ree, na'uli' -mi Yesus hi ana'guru-na: "Napa pai' uma-a nipangala' -e?" Konce pai' me'eka' -ramo, pai' momepololitai-ramo, ra'uli': "Hema mpu'u-idi tau toii-e? Bangku' ngolu' pai' balumpa nahawai', ratuku' mpu'u-diki-hana hawa' -nae!"
Luke 8 26 Kaliliu-ramo mosakaya, duu' -na rata hi tana' Gerasa to hi dipo rano ngkai tana' Galilea.
Luke 8 27  
Luke 8 28  
Luke 8 29 Ria hi ree hadua pue' ngata to rapesuai' seta to wori'. Mahae-imi tauna toei uma moheai pai' uma-i mo'oha' hi tomi. Hi daeo' -wadi po'ohaa' -na. Jau-i kahawia'. Nau' rahilu' -i hante koloro pai' rante pai' radongo ncuu, ma'ala oa' nadupe' pohilu' -na pai' metibo' hilou hi kawaoa' -na, apa' nakeni karoho seta to mpohawi' -i. Nto'u Yesus mehompo ngkai sakaya hilou hi role-na, tumai-imi tauna to kahawia' toei mpohirua' -ki. Kampohilo-na Yesus, pe'au-nami pai' -i mowingkotu' hi nyanyoa-na. Yesus mpohubui seta toera malai. Na'uli' tau toei mpesukui: "Ee Yesus, Ana' Alata'ala to hi suruga! Napa-di-kona pai' tumai-koe? Kuperapi' bona neo' -a-kuwo nusesa'!"
Luke 8 30 Yesus mpekune' -i: "Hema hanga' -nu?" Natompoi': "Legion." ("Legion" tohe'e, batua-na "moncobu," apa' wori' seta to mpohawi' -i.)
Luke 8 31 Raperapi' mpu'u seta toera bona neo' -ra nawuso hilou hi rala wulou'laa to uma tepetudu kanala-na.
Luke 8 32 Uma molaa ngkai ree, ria wori' wawu mojume hi panapa bulu'. Seta toera merapi' hi Yesus, ra'uli': "Piliu-ka-kaiwo mesua' hi wawu toera mai." Napiliu moto-ra.
Luke 8 33 Malai mpu'u-ramo seta ngkai rala tauna toei, kaliliu mesua' hi wawu. Pesua' -ra hi wawu toe, mparampuli-ramo-rawo wawu hilou mengkajuala' hi rano, mate bonga-ramo hi rala ue.
Luke 8 34 Karahilo-na to mpodoo wawu kajadia' toe, mokeno-ramo hilou hi ngata pai' bonea to mohu' mpoparata kajadia' toe.
Luke 8 35 Toe pai' tumai-ramo pue' ngata doko' mpohilo napa to jadi'. Karata-ra hi Yesus, rahilo-rawo tauna to biasa-na napesuai' seta, mohura rodo-imi hi ncori Yesus. Moheai-i pai' monoto-mi nono-na. Me'eka' -ramo.
Luke 8 36 Tauna to mpohilo kajadia' toe mpotutura beiwa Yesus mpaka'uri' tauna to kahawia'.
Luke 8 37 Ngkai ree, hawe'ea tauna hi tana' Gerasa toe merapi' hi Yesus bona malai-imi ngkai ngata-ra, apa' me'eka' lia-ra. Jadi' mohawi' sakaya-imi nculii' hilou hi dipo-na.
Luke 8 38 Ane tauna to napaka'uri' Yesus, merapi' -i bona ma'ala-i hilou dohe-na. Tapi' uma-i napiliu, na'uli' -ki:
Luke 8 39 "Nculii' -moko hilou hi tomi-nu pai' uli' -raka retu napa to nababehi Alata'ala hi iko." Hilou mpu'u-imi mpopalele hi rala ngata napa to nababehi Yesus hi woto-na.
Luke 8 40 Karata-na Yesus nculii' hi dipo rano, goe' -ramo tauna to wori' mpotomu-i, apa' hawe'ea-ra ntora mpopea-i.
Luke 8 41 Nto'u toe, rata hadua pangkeni tomi posampayaa hi ngata toe, hanga' -na Yairus. Mowingkotu' -i hi nyanyoa Yesus, naperapi' bona hilou-i hi tomi-na.
Luke 8 42 Apa' ria ana' -na tobine hadudua-wadi, umuru-na hampulu' rompae, peda' neo' mate. Hilou mpu'u-i Yesus dohe-na. Bula-ra momako' hilou hi tomi-na Yairus, mome'upi' -damo tauna to wori' mpo'upi' Yesus.
Luke 8 43 Hi olo' ntodea, ria hadua tobine, hampulu' rompae-imi ntora moraa', pai' uma ria katontoa' -na, nau' wori' -mi to mpokulii' -i.
Luke 8 44 Tumai-imi tobine toei mpomohui' Yesus ngkai tilingkuria-na pai' naganga wuntu baju-na. Hampinisi mata mentoda' -mi poraa' -na.
Luke 8 45 Mepekune' -imi Yesus: "Hema to mpoganga-ae?" Mancapu omea-ra. Na'uli' Petrus: "Guru, apa' wori' rahi tauna mpotipuhi-ta, mome'iho' -ra-damo mpo'upi' -ko."
Luke 8 46 Na'uli' Yesus: "Bate ria-di to mpoganga-ae! Ku'inca-le, apa' ria kabaraka' to malai ngkai woto-ku."
Luke 8 47 Na'inca tobine toei ka'uma-na tewunii' babehia-na. Jadi' moridi' -i tumai mowingkotu' hi nyanyoa Yesus. Napangaku' hi ntodea kahi'a-na to mpoganga baju Yesus pai' kamo'uri' -nami ngkai haki' -na.
Luke 8 48 Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Ana' -ku, mo'uri' -moko sabana pepangala' -nu hi Aku'. Nculii' -moko hante kalompea' tuwu' -nu."
Luke 8 49 Bula-na Yesus mololita-pidi, rata-mi suro ngkai tomi Yairus to mpo'uli' -ki Yairus: "Mate-mi ana' -nu. Neo' -pi mposusai' Guru."
Luke 8 50 Kana'epe-na Yesus lolita toe, na'uli' mpo'uli' -ki Yairus: "Neo' mere' nono-nu. Pangala' -mi-hana, mo'uri' moto-i mpai' ana' -nu."
Luke 8 51 Karata-ra hi tomi Yairus, Yesus uma mpiliu kabua' -bua' tauna mesua' dohe-na. Muntu' Petrus, Yohanes, Yakobus hante tina pai' tuama ana' toei-wadi to ma'ala mesua'.
Luke 8 52 Hawe'ea tauna to morumpu hi tomi Yairus geo' pai' motantangi', mpotantangii' ana' to mate toei. Na'uli' Yesus: "Neo' -pi-hawo geo'. Uma-ile mate-e, leta' -i-wadi-hawo."
Luke 8 53 Mpo'epe toe, rapotawai-i-wadi, apa' ra'inca kamate-na mpu'u-mi.
Luke 8 54 Oti toe, Yesus mpokamu pale-na ana' toei pai' na'uli' -ki: "Memata-moko ana'!"
Luke 8 55 Mo'inoha' nculii' -imi ana' toei, pai' kaliliu memata-imi. Na'uli' Yesus: "Wai' -i pongkoni'."
Luke 8 56 Konce mpu'u-ramo totu'a-na. Aga Yesus mpotagi-ra, bona neo' ra'uli' hi hema-hema napa to jadi' toe.
Luke 9 1 Yesus mpokio' ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua morumpu, pai' nawai' -ra kuasa pai' kabaraka' mpopalai hawe'ea seta pai' mpaka'uri' topohaki'.
Luke 9 2 Napahawa' -ra hilou mpaka'uri' topeda' pai' mpopalele kareba-na: "Neo' rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia'."
Luke 9 3 Kako'ia-ra me'ongko', na'uli' -raka: "Neo' -koi ngkeni napa-napa hi pomakoa' -ni. Neo' ngkeni boku ba pongkoni' ba doi. Neo' ngkeni rontonga' baju ba lua'.
Luke 9 4 Ane ratarima-koi hi rala tomi hantomi, mo'oha' hi ree-mokoi duu' -ni kaliliu hilou hi ngata ntani' -na.
Luke 9 5 Ane rata-koi hi ngata pai' uma-koi ratarima, wae kanipalahii-na ngata tetu, tonta awu to mentaka' hi palanta' witi' -ni, tanda kanahuku' -ra mpai' Alata'ala."
Luke 9 6 Ka'oti-na Yesus mpotudui' -ra, me'ongko' -ramo hilou hi ngata-ngata. Hiapa pomakoa' -ra, mpokeni-ra Kareba Lompe' pai' mpaka'uri' topeda'.
Luke 9 7 Nto'u toe, topoparenta hi Galilea, Herodes Antipas. Kana'epe-na Herodes hawe'ea to nababehi Yesus toe, napoka'ingu' lau-mi. Apa' ria to mpo'uli': "Yesus toei lou, Yohanes Topeniu' tuwu' nculii' -imi."
Luke 9 8 Ria wo'o to mpo'uli' Yesus toei nabi Elia owi mehupa' nculii'. Ria wo'o to mpo'uli' Yesus toei hadua nabi to owi memata nculii'.
Luke 9 9 Na'uli' Herodes: "Ane Yohanes Topeniu', kuhubui-mi wengi tauna mpopata' wuroko' -na. Hiaa' Yesus toe-e lou, hema mpu'u-i-hawo? Wori' -mi ku'epe to mpotompo'wiwi-i." Toe pai' Herodes doko' mpohirua' -ki Yesus.
Luke 9 10 Rata nculii' -ramo suro Yesus to hampulu' rodua toera, pai' ratutura-ki Yesus hawe'ea to rababehi. Oti toe, Yesus mpo'ema' -ra hilou hi kawaoa' -na mohu' hi ngata Betsaida.
Luke 9 11 Ntaa' ra'inca-di ntodea kahilou-rae. Toe pai' metuku' -ramo mpotuku' Yesus. Karata-ra hi Yesus, natarima moto-ra pai' natudui' -ra tudui' to mpotompo'wiwi Kamagaua' -na Alata'ala. Pai' hema-hema to mohaki' napaka'uri'.
Luke 9 12 Neo' limpa-mi eo, rata-ramo ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Guru, agina tahubui-ramo ntodea toera lau hilou mpali' pongkoni' -ra pai' poturua-ra hi ngata pai' bonea to mohu'. Apa' wao' -hana hi rehe'i lau."
Luke 9 13 Na'uli' Yesus: "Koi' -mi to mpopokoni' -ra." Ra'uli' ana'guru-na: "Beiwa-mi-kaina! Apa' muntu' lima meha' roti pai' rongkaju bau' uru-wadi to ria hi kai' -e. Ha kana hilou-kai mpo'oli pongkoni' to rapokoni' -raka tauna to wori' toera lau?"
Luke 9 14 (Kawori' -ra kira-kira lima ncobu paka' tomane-pidi.) Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Hubui-ra mohura mopantuda-ntuda, nte lima mpulu' tauna hantuda."
Luke 9 15 Ratuku' -mi ana'guru-na napa to nahubui-raka Yesus.
Luke 9 16 Mohura-ra omea, na'ala' -mi Yesus roti to lima meha' pai' uru to rongkaju, pai' -i ngkongoa' hi langi' mosampaya. Oti toe napihe-pihe-mi roti pai' nabibe' -bibe' bau', pai' nawai' -raka ana'guru-na bona rabagi hi ntodea.
Luke 9 17 Ngkoni' omea-ramo duu' -ra bohu. Ka'oti-ra ngkoni', ana'guru-na mporumpu toro koni'. Metoro-pi hampulu' roluncu.
Luke 9 18 Rala-na ha'eo, Yesus mosampaya hadudua-na, pai' rata ana'guru-na dohe-na. Napekune' -ra, na'uli': "Ntuku' ponguli' ntodea, hema-a Aku' toi-e?"
Luke 9 19 Ratompoi': "Ria to mpo'uli' Yohanes Topeniu' -ko tuwu' nculii'. Aga ria wo'o to mpo'uli' nabi Elia-ko. Ria wo'o to mpo'uli' Iko hadua nabi to owi tuwu' nculii'."
Luke 9 20 Napekune' tena-ra: "Hiaa' koi' -koiwo mpo'uli', hema-a Aku' toi-e?" Natompoi' Petrus: "Iko-mi Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Alata'ala!"
Luke 9 21 Ngkai ree, Yesus mpotagi mpu'u-ra, na'uli': "Neo' ulu ni'uli' hi hema-hema ka'Aku' -na Magau' Topetolo'."
Luke 9 22 Na'uli' wo'o-mi: "Aku' Ana' Manusia' kana mporata wori' kaparia. Rasapuaka-a mpai' totu'a ngata, imam pangkeni hante guru agama. Rapatehi-a mpai', aga hi eo katolu-na tuwu' nculii' moto-a."
Luke 9 23 Ngkai ree, Yesus mpololitai hawe'ea tauna, na'uli': "Hema to doko' mpotuku' -a kana mpobahaka konoa-na moto, pai' kana napaha'a kaju parika' -na butu eo-na-- batua-na: kana natuku' hawa' -ku nau' napopate-ki. Oti toe-di pai' lako' ma'ala-i mpotuku' -a.
Luke 9 24 Hema to mpentaei konoa-na moto, uma-i mpai' mporatai katuwua' to lompe'. Aga hema to mpobahaka konoa-na moto sabana petuku' -na hi Aku', nau' napopate-ki, hi'a-mi mpai' to mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na.
Luke 9 25 Napa kalaua-na tarumpu hawe'ea ka'uaa' dunia', tapi' kao' -ta moto morugi apa' uma taratai katuwua' to lompe' hi eo mpeno-na.
Luke 9 26 "Hema to me'ea' mpangaku' petuku' -na hi Aku' pai' mpoka'ea' tudui' -ku, Aku' wo'o mpai' me'ea' mpangaku' kahi'a-na topetuku' -ku ane rata-apa mpai' ngkai suruga. Nto'u toe mpai', Aku' Ana' Manusia' mana'u tumai hante mala'eka-mala'eka to moroli', mehini-a hante baraka' -ku pai' hante baraka' -na Tuama-ku.
Luke 9 27 Pe'epei to ku'uli' -kokoi tohe'i: ria-koi mpai' hi rehe'i to ko'ia mate kako'ia-na nihilo Alata'ala jadi' Magau'."
Luke 9 28 Kira-kira hamingku ngkai pololita-na toe, Yesus mpobawai Petrus, Yohanes pai' Yakobus manake' hilou hi lolo bulu', lou mosampaya.
Luke 9 29 Bula-na Yesus mosampaya, mobali' -mi lence-na, pai' pohea-na mewali mengea' meringkila'.
Luke 9 30 Muu-mule' ria rodua tauna to mpololitai-i, hira' nabi Musa pai' Elia.
Luke 9 31 Mehini pai' ncola wo'o-ra-rawo to rodua toera. Mololita-ra, mpotompo'wiwi kamate-na Yesus to napadupa' mpai' hi ngata Yerusalem.
Luke 9 32 Nto'u toe, Petrus pai' doo-na leta' luru'. Kamolike-ra, rahilo-rawo Yesus mehini ncola hante tauna to rodua to dohe-na.
Luke 9 33 Kaneo' -ra me'ongko' -mi to rodua toera, na'uli' Petrus: "Guru, lompe' lia-ta mo'oha' hi rehe'i! Agina kibabehi-damo tolu bamaru' hi rehe'i. Hameha' bagia-nu Guru, hameha' bagia-na Musa, pai' hameha' wo'o bagia-na Elia." (Aga uma-hawo na'incai kahompoa lolita-na.)
Luke 9 34 Bula-na mololita-pidi Petrus, rata-mi limu' mpokamoui-ra. Me'eka' -ramo mpohilo limu' to mpoputu' -ra.
Luke 9 35 Mpo'epe-ra topololita ngkai rala limu' to mpo'uli': "Hi'a toi-mi Ana' -ku to kupelihi. Pe'epei-mi lolita-na!"
Luke 9 36 Kamolino-na topololita, rahilo-rawo ana'guru-na, hadudua-na Yesus-damo. Pana'u-ra ngkai bulu' toe, ana'guru-na to tolu toera mengkalino-wadi, uma-ra ulu mpololita hi hema-hema napa to rahilo hi lolo bulu' toe.
Luke 9 37 Kamepulo-na mana'u-ramo ngkai lolo bulu', pai' wori' tauna mpohirua' -ki Yesus.
Luke 9 38 Ria hadua tomane hi laintongo' tauna to wori' to mekio', na'uli': "Guru! Tulungi-a! Pehiloi-ka-kuwo ana' -ku. Hadudua hi'a-wadi-ka-kuwo ana' -ku.
Luke 9 39 Ane napesuai' anudaa' -i, kaka'au-au-i pai' kakapadi-padi-i, duu' -na mowura' nganga-na. Neo' uma ria palaia-na anudaa' toe mpopedahi-i.
Luke 9 40 Kuperapi' -ramo ana'guru-nu mpopalai anudaa' toe, aga uma rakulei'."
Luke 9 41 Na'uli' Yesus: "Uma mowo-koie'! Ko'ia oa' -tano mepangala' -koie! Mesapuaka oa' -pidi-koi mposapuaka konoa Alata'ala! Ni'uli' -koina hangkuja tena-pi kahae-ku dohe-ni, hangkuja tena-pi kahae-na kupengkatarii kalente pepangala' -nie! Keni tumai ana' -nu!"
Luke 9 42 Bula-na ana' toei momako' hilou hi Yesus, modungka-imi napakeni seta to mpohawi' -i, pai' kakapadi-padi woto-na. Yesus mpopetibo' anudaa', pai' mpaka'uri' ana' toei. Oti toe na'uli' -ki tuama-na: "Ala' -mi ana' -nu. Mo'uri' -imi."
Luke 9 43 Konce omea-ramo tauna mpohilo baraka' Alata'ala to bohe tohe'e.
Luke 9 44 "Penonoi lompe' -e' lolita-ku toi: Aku' Ana' Manusia' bate ratonu mpai' hi kuasa manusia'."
Luke 9 45 Aga ana'guru-na uma mpo'incai patuju-na, apa' tewunii' -raka batua-na, alaa-na uma rapaha. Hiaa' uma wo'o-ra daho' mpekune' -i ba napa batua lolita-na toe.
Luke 9 46 Ana'guru-na Yesus momehono', ba hema-ra to meliu kabohe tuwu' -ra.
Luke 9 47 Na'inca Yesus napa to hi rala nono-ra. Toe pai' na'ala' hadua ana' to kedi' napopokore hi ncori-na,
Luke 9 48 pai' na'uli' -raka: "Hema to mpotarima ana' to kedi' toi sabana petuku' -na hi Aku', batua-na Aku' -mi to natarima. Pai' hema to mpotarima-a, mpotarima wo'o-imi Pue' Ala to mposuro-a. Hema-koi to tuwu' mengkadingki', hi'a-mi to bohe mpu'u tuwu' -na."
Luke 9 49 Na'uli' Yohanes: "Guru, ria kihilo hadua tauna mpopalai seta hante hanga' -nu, aga kitagi-i apa' bela-i topetuku' -ta."
Luke 9 50 Na'uli' Yesus: "Neo' -i ratagi, apa' tauna to uma mpo'ewa-ta, batua-na hira' -mi to tono' hi kita'."
Luke 9 51 Mohu' -mi tempo-na Yesus me'ongko' hilou hi suruga, napomonoa' -mi bate mpotoa' -i Yerusalem.
Luke 9 52 Nahubui ba hangkuja dua topetuku' -na meri'ulu ngkai Hi'a. Mesua' -ra to rahubui toera hi ngata to Samaria bona mporodo hawe'ea-na kako'ia-na Yesus rata.
Luke 9 53 Aga pue' ngata toera, oja' -ra mpotarima Yesus, apa' ra'inca kampotoa' -na Yerusalem.
Luke 9 54 Yakobus pai' Yohanes mpo'epe karapoka'oja' -ra pue' ngata toera. Toe pai' ra'uli' -ki Yesus: "Pue', ane nupokono, kiperapi' apu ngkai langi' mpomampuhi pue' ngata toera lau!"
Luke 9 55 Tapi' Yesus mpe'ili' -ra pai' mpotagi-ra.
Luke 9 56 Oti toe, kaliliu-ramo hilou hi ngata ntani' -na.
Luke 9 57 Hi pomakoa' -ra toe, ria hadua tauna to mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Hiapa kahiloua-nu Pue', doko' kutuku' -ko."
Luke 9 58 Yesus mpotompoi' -i, na'uli': "Bangko' ria pulo'u-ra, pai' danci ria peta-ra, aga Aku' Ana' Manusia' uma-kuna ria tomi-ku kupoturui."
Luke 9 59 Oti toe, pai' na'uli' Yesus hi kahadua-na: "Tuku' -a." Aga natompoi' tau toei: "Pue', piliu-a-kuwo ulu nculii' hi tomi-ku. Ane mate-damo tuama-ku pai' -i ratana, bo kutuku' -moko."
Luke 9 60 Yesus mpotompoi' -i hante walatu toi, na'uli': "Pelele' moto-ramo tomate mpotana hingka tomate-ra. Aga iko-kona, hilou-moko mpopalele kareba Kamagaua' Alata'ala."
Luke 9 61 Ria wo'o kahadua-na mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Pue', dota moto-a mpotuku' -ko. Aga piliu-a ulu nculii' mpalakana hi ompi' -ku."
Luke 9 62 Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Tauna to ntepu'u-mi mopajeko', uma-hawo lompe' ane kaka'ili' -ili' -i. Tauna to hewa toe kehi-ra, uma-ra natao jadi' topobago hi rala Kamagaua' -na Alata'ala."
Luke 10 1 Oti toe, Pue' Yesus mpelihi wo'o-mi pitu mpulu' topetuku' to ntani' -na pai' nahubui-ra momako' rodua-rodua meri'ulu ngkai Hi'a hilou hi butu-butu ngata to natara mpai'.
Luke 10 2 Na'uli' mpo'uli' -raka: "Tauna to doko' mpo'epe Kareba Lompe' ma'ala rarapai' -ki pae to taha'. Wori' pae to kana rapepae, aga topepae uma-ra wori'. Toe pai' kana mekakae-koi hi pue' bonea, niperapi' bona nahubui tauna hilou mepae hi bonea-na.
Luke 10 3 "Hilou-mokoi, aga pelompehi, apa' kuhubui-koi hilou hi olo' tauna to dada'a. Koi' mpai' hewa bima hi olo' serigala.
Luke 10 4 Neo' ngkeni karepe' doi ba boku ba sapatu' ropasa. Neo' mengkahae mpololitai tauna hi lengko ohea.
Luke 10 5 "Ane mesua' -koi hi rala tomi hantomi, ncaliu ni'uli': `Kalompea' ngkai Pue' rata hi koi' pue' tomi!'
Luke 10 6 Ane lompe' nono-ra pue' tomi mpotarima-koi, bate nagane' mpu'u-ra mpai' Pue' Ala. Aga ane uma-rada dota mpotarima-koi, uma-ra mpai' mporata rasi' ngkai pegane' -ni tetu.
Luke 10 7 Hantomi lau-wadi po'ohaa' -ni, neo' -koi pantoli-ntoli hi kahantomi-na bula-ni mpokeni Kareba Lompe' hi ngata tetu. Pongkoni' napa to rawai' -kokoi, koni' -mi-hana, apa' topobago masipato' mpotarima gaji' -na.
Luke 10 8 "Ane mesua' -koi hi rala ngata pai' -koi ratarima, koni' -mi-hana napa to ratonu-kokoi.
Luke 10 9 Paka'uri' topeda' to hi rala ngata, pai' uli' -raka pue' ngata: `Rata-mi tempo-na, Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi laintongo' -ni.'
Luke 10 10 Aga ane mesua' -koi hi rala ngata pai' uma-koi ratarima, hilou-mokoi hi karajaa pai' mpo'uli':
Luke 10 11 `Nau' awu ngata-ni to mentaka' hi palanta' witi' -kai, kitonta bona nihilo. Aga kiwoi-koie': neo' rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau'!'"
Luke 10 12 Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus hi topetuku' -na: "Ku'uli' -kokoi, hi Eo Kiama, meliu pehuku' -na Alata'ala mpohuku' pue' ngata toera ngkai pehuku' -na hi pue' ngata Sodom owi.
Luke 10 13 "Silaka-koi to Yahudi to mo'oha' hi ngata Korazim pai' hi Betsaida! Wori' moto-mi tanda mekoncehi kubabehi hi ngata-ni, aga uma oa' -koi medea ngkai jeko' -ni. Ane rapa' -na tanda mekoncehi toe rababehi hi rala ngata Tirus pai' Sidon, ke mahae-ramo-rana medea ngkai jeko' -ra, nau' bela-ra to Yahudi. Ke mpo'ala' karu' -ramo rapohea, pai' mohura-ra mpohawui' woto-ra hante awu, tanda kasoho' nono-ra.
Luke 10 14 Jadi', hi Eo Kiama mpai', meliu-pi pehuku' -na Alata'ala hi koi' ngkai pehuku' -na hi to Tirus pai' to Sidon.
Luke 10 15 "Pai' koi' wo'o to Kapernaum! Ha ni'uli' -koina na'ongko' napomolangko-koi mpai' Alata'ala-e? Uma-e'! Natadi pai' nahuku' lau-dakoi mpai'."
Luke 10 16 Oti toe, Yesus mololita tena hi topetuku' -na, na'uli': "Tauna to mpotarima lolita-ni, batua-na lolita-ku Aku' to ratarima. Tauna to mposapuaka-koi, batua-na Aku' to rasapuaka. Pai' tauna to mposapuaka-a, mposapuaka wo'o-ra Pue' Ala to mposuro-a."
Luke 10 17 Ba hangkuja kahae-na ngkai toe, nculii' -ramo topetuku' to pitu mpulu' toera. Goe' mpu'u-mi nono-ra, ra'uli' -ki Yesus: "Pue', bangku' seta wo'o mengkoru hi kai' pai' metibo' -ra, ane kipopalai-ra hante hanga' -nu."
Luke 10 18 Na'uli' Yesus: "Kuhilo-di Magau' Anudaa' -e monawu' ngkai langi' hewa kila'!
Luke 10 19 Jadi', bona ni'inca: kuwai' -mokoi kuasa, bona ma'ala-koi mpolisa ule ba lipa pai' mpodagi hawe'ea karohoa bali' -ta. Uma hema to mposerohi-koi.
Luke 10 20 Aga nau' wae, neo' nipokagoe' kamengkoru-ra seta hi koi'. Agina mpokagoe' -koi kate'uki' -nami hanga' -ni hi rala suruga."
Luke 10 21 Nto'u toe Yesus nakuasai Inoha' Tomoroli', pai' -i mololita ngkai kagoe' nono-na, na'uli': "O Mama, Pue' langi' pai' dunia'! Mpo'uli' -a tarima kasi, apa' hawe'ea toe lau nupopohiloi-raka tauna to uma pe'incai, tapi' nuwunii' -raka tauna to nginca pai' tauna to pante. Apa' wae-mi konoa-nu Mama.
Luke 10 22 "Hawe'ea-na natonu-maka Tuama-ku. Uma ria haduaa to mpo'inca kahema-ku Aku' Ana' Alata'ala, muntu' Tuama-ku to mpo'inca-a. Wae wo'o uma ria to mpo'incai hema-i Tuama-ku, muntu' Aku' Ana' -na to mpo'inca-i, pai' hema-hema to kupopo'incai kahema-nai Tuama-ku."
Luke 10 23 Ngkai ree, bona neo' ra'epe doo, me'ili' -imi hi ana'guru-na, na'uli' -raka: "Morasi' mpu'u-koi, apa' nihilo-mi-koina hawe'ea tohe'i.
Luke 10 24 Apa' wori' moto nabi pai' magau' owi to doko' mpohilo napa to nihilo koi' toi, aga uma-rana rahiloi. Doko' lia-ra mpo'epe napa to ni'epe-mi koi', aga uma-rana ra'epei."
Luke 10 25 Ria hadua guru agama Yahudi to doko' mpemai-mai kasala' petompoi' Yesus. Napekune' -i: "Guru, napa-hawo to kana kubabehi bona mporata-a katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na?"
Luke 10 26 Na'uli' Yesus: "Napa to te'uki' hi rala Atura Pue'? Beiwa to nubasa?"
Luke 10 27 Natompoi' guru agama toei: `Kana tapoka'ahi' Pue' -ta Pue' Alata'ala hante nono-ta mpu'u, tatonu hawe'ea katuwu' -ta hi Hi'a, tapoka'ahi' -i hudu pakulea' -ta, pai' hudu inca-ta.' Pai' `Kana tapoka'ahi' doo-ta hewa pompoka'ahi' -ta woto-ta moto.'"
Luke 10 28 Na'uli' Yesus: "Kono-mi petompoi' -nu. Babehi-mi hewa tetu, mporata moto-ko mpai' katuwua' to lompe'."
Luke 10 29 Aga guru agama toei uma dota radagi, mpoperaha-i kamonoa' po'ingku-na. Toe pai' na'uli': "Hiaa' hema doo-ku to kana kupoka'ahi' -e?"
Luke 10 30 Natompoi' Yesus: "Ria hadua tomane to mako' ngkai Yerusalem mana'u hilou hi ngata Yerikho. Hi lengko ohea-i mpohirua' -ki toperampaki. Ra'agoi-i rewa-na pai' pohea-na, pai' -i rapao' duu' -na neo' mate, pai' rapalahii moto-imi hi ohea.
Luke 10 31 Ko'ia mahae ngkai ree, ria wo'o-hawo hadua imam ntara hi ohea toe. Kanahilo-na tauna to weho toei, napelelii' pai' kaliliu moto-i.
Luke 10 32 Wae wo'o, hadua topobago hi Tomi Alata'ala liu hi ree. Kanahilo-na tauna to weho toei, napelelii' wo'o-i-wadi-hawo pai' -i kaliliu.
Luke 10 33 "Uma mahae ngkai ree, liu wo'o-hawo hadua to Samaria to bula-na hi pomakoa' -na. Kanahilo-na tauna to weho toei, metumu' -mi ahi' -na.
Luke 10 34 Kahilou-nami mpomohui' -i, nabohoi' weho-na hante lana pai' anggur pai' nawewe. Oti toe napopehawi' -i hi keledai-na pai' nakeni-i hilou hi tomi torata, pai' napodoo-i hi ree.
Luke 10 35 Kamepulo-na na'ala' rompepa' doi pera', nawai' -ki pue' tomi pai' na'uli' -ki: `Pewili' -i-hawo ulu tauna toei hi rehe'i. Nculii' moto-a mpai' pai' kubayari omea ongkoso' -nu ane ria pelabia-na ngkai tetu.'"
Luke 10 36 Hudu-mi jarita-na toe, napekune' Yesus hi guru agama toei, na'uli': "Ntuku' pomporataa-nu, ngkai to tolu toera, hema-ra to ma'ahi' hi doo to rarampaki toei?"
Luke 10 37 Natompoi' guru agama toei: "Tauna to mpotulungi-i." Na'uli' Yesus: "Koi' -moko, babehi wo'o-kowo hewa tetu."
Luke 10 38 Rala pomakoa' -ra toe, Yesus pai' ana'guru-na mehani hi ngata. Hi rala ngata toe, ria hadua tobine to rahanga' Marta to mpotorata Yesus.
Luke 10 39 Ria wo'o ompi' -na Marta, tobine wo'o-wadi, hanga' -na Maria. Maria toei mohura mohu' hi witi' -na Yesus ntora mpe'epei lolita-na.
Luke 10 40 Hiaa' Marta-hana, sese' -i-damo mpo'urusi torata. Kahilou-nami Marta hi Yesus pai' na'uli' -ki: "Pue', ha nupokono ompi' -ku tetui mpelele' -a mobago hadudua-ku! Uli' -ki pe' mpongawa' -ae."
Luke 10 41 Na'uli' Pue' Yesus: "Ee' Marta! Sese' pai' kawuhe rahi-ko mpenonoi to wori' nyala.
Luke 10 42 Hiaa' kakono-na, to paraluu nubabehi hanyala lau-wadi, toe-mi mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala. Ane Maria, napelihi-mi bagia to lompe', pai' bagia toe uma mpai' ra'alai' ngkai hi'a."
Luke 11 1 Hangkani Yesus mosampaya. Kahudu-na mosampaya, hadua ana'guru-na mpo'uli' -ki: "Pue', tudui' wo'o-ka-kaiwo mosampaya, hewa Yohanes Topeniu' mpotudui' ana'guru-na."
Luke 11 2 Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Ane mosampaya-koi, uli' hewa tohe'i: Mama, pomperapia' -kai bona hawe'ea tauna mpobila' hanga' -nu to moroli', bona Iko jadi' Magau' hi dunia'.
Luke 11 3 Wai' -kai pongkoni' to kiparaluu eo-eo-na.
Luke 11 4 Ampungi jeko' -kai, apa' kai' wo'o mpo'ampungi hawe'ea tauna to masala' hi kai'. Pai' neo' -kai nupelele' rasori."
Luke 11 5 Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Rapa' -na hilou-ta hi doo-ta mentongo' bengi pai' ta'uli' -ki: `Bale, wai' -a-kuwo pongkoni' tolu mputu'.
Luke 11 6 Apa' ria bale-ku to lako' rata, hiaa' uma-kuna ria napa-napa to kuwai' -ki.'
Luke 11 7 "Ha natompoi' -ta mpai' hewa tohe'i: `Neo' -a nusaleroi. Wobo' tehohoki-mi. Ana' -ku leta' omea-ramo dohe-ku. Uma-a bisa memata mpowai' -ko ba napa-napa.'
Luke 11 8 Uma mpai' hewa toe tompoi' -na. Nau' bale-ta uma dota memata pai' mpowai' -ta napa-napa, aga apa' uma tabahakai pai' uma-ta me'ea' mperapii' -i, memata oa' -i mpowai' -ta napa to taparaluu.
Luke 11 9 "Jadi' ku'uli' -kokoi: Perapi' -mi hi Alata'ala, nawai' moto-ta mpai'. Pali' kaparaluua-ta hi Alata'ala, tarata moto mpai'. Neo' tabahakai mpopebea wobo', Alata'ala mpobea moto-taka mpai' wobo' -na.
Luke 11 10 Apa' hema to merapi' bate rawai'. Hema to mpali' bate mporata. Hema to mpopebea wobo', bate rabea-ki wobo'.
Luke 11 11 Ha ria-koi to mpowai' ule hi ana' -ni ane merapi' -i bau'?
Luke 11 12 Ba mpowai' -i pehede' ane merapi' -i ntolumanu'? Tantu uma.
Luke 11 13 Nau' hewa apa-mi kadada'a-nie, ni'inca moto mpowai' to lompe' hi ana' -ni. Peliu-liu-nami Tuama-ni to ria hi rala suruga! Bate nawai' Inoha' Tomoroli' hi tauna to merapi' hi Hi'a."
Luke 11 14 Rala-na ha'eo, Yesus mpopalai seta ngkai hadua tauna to uma howa' mololita. Wae kanawuso-na seta toe, howa' -imi tauna toei mololita. Konce-ramo ntodea.
Luke 11 15 Aga ria wo'o-ra to mpo'uli': "Kuasa-na tetu-le ngkai Beelzebul, magau' hawe'ea seta. Toe-hawo pai' ria baraka' -na mpopalai seta-e."
Luke 11 16 Ria wo'o-ra hantongo' to doko' mposori Yesus. Merapi' -ra hi Yesus bona napopohiloi-ra anu mekoncehi bona monoa' ra'inca kangkai Alata'ala-na mpu'u-i.
Luke 11 17 Ntaa' na'inca-di Yesus napa to hi rala nono-rae. Toe pai' na'uli' -raka: "Ane rapa' -na ria hadua magau', pai' ntodea hi rala kamagaua' -na ntora mome'ewa, bate mogero mpai' kamagaua' -na toe. Wae wo'o tau hantomi to ntora motuda', bate pagaa' -gaa' -ra mpai'.
Luke 11 18 Wae wo'o hi kamagaua' -na seta. Ane seta mpo'ewa hingka seta-na, bate mogero mpai' kamagaua' -na seta. Hiaa' ni'uli' -koina, mpopalai-a seta hante baraka' Beelzebul, magau' seta.
Luke 11 19 Aga ria wo'o doo-ni moto to mpopalai seta. Hante kuasa napa doo-ni tetu mpopalai seta? Tantu hante kuasa Alata'ala. Jadi', ngkai pobabehi doo-ni moto, monoto-mi kamasala' pebalihi-ni tetu.
Luke 11 20 Tapi' Aku', mpopalai-a seta hante baraka' Alata'ala. Ngkai toe, monoa' -mi ni'inca karata-nami tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi laintongo' -ni.
Luke 11 21 "Seta ma'ala rarapai' -ki tauna to parimuku. Ane tauna to parimuku mpodongo tomi-na hante rewa panga'e-na, uma moapa ihi' tomi-na.
Luke 11 22 Aga ane tumai hadua to meliu karoho-na mpo'ewa-i pai' mpodagi-i, nahagoi-i hawe'ea rewa panga'e-na to nasarumaka pai' nabagi-bagi ihi' tomi-na hi doo-doo-na. Jadi', ane Aku' mpopalai seta, batua-na meliu kuasa-ku ngkai seta.
Luke 11 23 "Hema to uma tono' hi Aku', kakono-na bali' -ku-imi. Hema to uma mpotulungi-a mobago, hi'a to mpobalinai' bago-ku.
Luke 11 24 "Rapa' -na ria anudaa' to mpohawi' tauna. Malai-imi anudaa' toei, pai' -i modao' -dao' hi kawaoa' -na mpali' po'ohaa' -na. Apa' uma ria naruai', na'uli' -mi: `Agina nculii' lau-ama hi po'ohaa' to kupalahii-mi toe wengi ria.'
Luke 11 25 Ponculi' -na hilou hi tauna to napalahii-e wengi, nahilo-hawo uma ria to mpo'ohai' -i. Tauna toei hewa tomi to molela' tepehaii, hinapa' hiloa-na.
Luke 11 26 Toe pai' hilou ncala' -i mpokio' pitu hingka anudaa' -na to meliu kadada'a-ra ngkai hi'a. Tumai-ramo mesua' hi tauna to napalahii toe-e wengi, pai' mo'oha' -ramo hi ree. Ka'omea-na tampai kampe'ahii' tauna toei ngkai lomo' -na."
Luke 11 27 Bula-na Yesus mololita, hadua tobine hi laintongo' ntodea mpo'uli' mpesukui: "Morasi' mpu'u-i-hana tobine to mpo'ote pai' to mpentii' -ko!"
Luke 11 28 Na'uli' Yesus: "Aga to morasi' mpu'u-le, tauna to mpo'epe pai' mpotuku' Lolita Alata'ala."
Luke 11 29 Nto'u tauna to wori' mpotipuhi Yesus, napokaliliu lolita-na, na'uli': "Dada'a lia tauna to tuwu' tempo toi. Merapi' -ra bona kupopohiloi-ra tanda mekoncehi. Aga uma hanyalaa tanda mekoncehi to rapopohiloi-raka. Sampale to rapopohiloi-raka mpai', tanda hewa to jadi' hi nabi Yunus owi.
Luke 11 30 Hewa Yunus jadi' tanda to rapokakonce pue' ngata Niniwe owi, wae wo'o Aku' Ana' Manusia' jadi' tanda to rapokakonce tauna to tuwu' tempo toi.
Luke 11 31 Hi Eo Kiama mpai', raja bine ngkai Selatan rapotuwu' nculii' hangkaa-ngkania hante koi' to tuwu' tempo toi, pai' -i mpotudo' sala' -ni. Apa' momako' -i tumai ngkai ngata to molaa lia, doko' mpu'u-i mpo'epe lolita Magau' Salomo to pante lia. Hiaa' ria-mi hi laintongo' -ni to meliu kabohe tuwu' -na ngkai Salomo, aga uma oa' nipangalai' lolita-na.
Luke 11 32 Wae wo'o hi Eo Kiama mpai', pue' ngata Niniwe rapotuwu' nculii' hangkaa-ngkania hante koi' to tuwu' tempo toi, pai' -ra mpotudo' sala' -ni. Apa' hira', medea-ramo-rana ngkai jeko' -ra kampo'epe-ra pololita nabi Yunus. Hiaa' ria-mi hi laintongo' -ni to meliu kabohe tuwu' -na ngkai Yunus, aga uma oa' nipangalai' lolita-na.
Luke 11 33 "Uma ria tauna mposuwe palita pai' nawuni ba napopoi' hante kura. Palita bate ratu'u hi pontu'ua-na bona hini-na rahilo tauna to mesua'.
Luke 11 34 Mata-ta ma'ala rarapai' -ki hulu'. Ane lompe' mata-ta, monoto pehilo-ta. Aga ane mogawu mata-ta, hewa mobengi pehilo-ta.
Luke 11 35 Wae wo'o-hawo hante nono-ta. Kana tapelompehi mpu'u: ane Pue' mpobajahi nono-ta, neo' tapomobengi nculii'.
Luke 11 36 Ane Pue' mpobajahi nono-ta duu' -na uma-pi ria kabengia-na, mobaja mpu'u katuwu' -ta omea, hewa tomi to nabajahi palita."
Luke 11 37 Hudu-mi Yesus mololita, ria hadua to Parisi mpokio' -i lou ngkoni' hi tomi-na. Hilou mpu'u-imi ngkoni'.
Luke 11 38 Konce to Parisi toei mpohilo Yesus ngkoni', apa' uma-i leba' mowano ntuku' ada agama-ra.
Luke 11 39 Toe pai' Pue' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Koi' to Parisi-le hewa tauna to mpobohoi' sangkiri' pai' piri hi mali-na-wadi, hiaa' hi rala-na babo' moto. Ada agama to kahiloa hi mali-na nituku' lia, hiaa' hi rala nono-ni, dada'a-koi pai' mpokahina anu doo-koi.
Luke 11 40 Wojo mpu'u-koi! Ha woto-ta-wadi to napajadi' Pue'? Ha uma napajadi' wo'o nono-ta?
Luke 11 41 Napa to hi rala sangkiri' pai' piri-ni wai' -raka to mpe'ahii' tuwu' -ra. Ane hewa toe-mi po'ingku-ni, hawe'ea jadi' moroli' hi koi'.
Luke 11 42 "Silaka-koi to Parisi! Ntahawe' hinu'a to kedi' hewa tarangkada' pai' kula' pai' hinu'a ntani' -na nipopepue' hampobagiahampulu' hi Alata'ala. Hiaa' parenta to bohe, hewa po'ingku to monoa' hi doo-ni pai' ahi' hi Pue' Ala, uma nisaile'. Kakoo-kono-na, ke parenta to bohe toe-hanale to kana nituku' -e, pai' neo' wo'o nilipo' mpotuku' parenta to kedi'.
Luke 11 43 "Silaka-koi to Parisi! Apa' goe' -koi mohura hi pohuraa karabilaa' hi tomi posampayaa, pai' goe' -koi ane tauna hi wiwi' karajaa motingkua' mpotabe-koi.
Luke 11 44 Silaka-koi, apa' koi' hewa daeo' to uma ka'incanaa, to uma ria pompetonoi-na. Tauna mpolisa daeo' toe, aga uma ra'incai karia-na anu pope hi rala-na. Lompe' -koi hi mali-na, tapi' dada'a hi rala nono-ni."
Luke 11 45 Hadua guru agama Yahudi mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Guru, hante lolita-nu tetu, kai' wo'o to nusalai'!"
Luke 11 46 Mehono' Yesus: "Silaka wo'o-dakoi guru agama! Apa' nipopokoloi ntodea hante parenta pai' ada to motomo. Hiaa' uma-koi dota mpotulungi-ra ngkolo kinolo toe. Nau' hangkaju karawe-ni uma nihuko-raka.
Luke 11 47 Silaka-koi! Nipenasa-damo mpakalompe' daeo' -ra nabi to owi, hiaa' ntu'a-ni moto-mi to mpatehi nabi toera.
Luke 11 48 Hante pobabehi-ni tetu, nipangaku' moto-mi kanipokono-na kehi ntu'a-ni tetu. Hira' mpatehi nabi to owi, pai' koi' mpakalompe' daeo' -ra.
Luke 11 49 Aga monoto lia patuju-na Alata'ala, na'uli' hewa toi: `Kupahawa' mpai' nabi-ku pai' suro-ku hilou hi tauna toera. Hantongo' -ra mpai' rapatehi, hantongo' -ra rasesa'.'
Luke 11 50 Ka'omea-na mpai', koi' to tuwu' tempo toi rahuku' sabana hawe'ea nabi to rapatehi ngkai lomo' kajadi' dunia',
Luke 11 51 ntepu'u ngkai karapatehi-na Habel owi, rata-rata hi karapatehi-na nabi Zakharia, to rapatehi hi berewe Tomi Alata'ala hi olo' meja' pontunua pepue' pai' tomi to moroli'. Wae mpu'u-di! Koi' to tuwu' tempo toi bate rahuku' sabana hawe'ea kasalaa' totu'a-ni toe.
Luke 11 52 "Silaka-koi guru agama! Kakoo-kono-na, ke koi' -di to mpotudui' ntodea ohea bona mpo'inca Alata'ala. Ntaa' koi' moto uma dota mpotuku' ohea toe, pai' nilawa' lau wo'o-di tauna to doko' mpotuku' -e."
Luke 11 53 Malai-imi Yesus ngkai ree. Pai' ntepu'u tempo toe, gigi mpu'u-mi nono-ra guru agama pai' to Parisi. Toe pai' rapemai-mai-i hante wori' nyala pompekunea' -ra,
Luke 11 54 pai' ralelemata ncuu-i, mpali' kasalaa' hi pololita-na.
Luke 12 1 Ngkai kamoncobu-ncobu-ra tauna to morumpu doko' mpohilo Yesus, mome'upi' -ra alaa-na momepopongko ngkawiti'. Nto'u toe, Yesus mpololitai ana'guru-na, na'uli': "Mo'inga' -inga' -koi hi ragi-ra to Parisi. Batua-na, neo' nituku' kehi-ra. Apa' hira' toe lompe' hi mali-na-wadi dada'a moto hi rala nono-ra.
Luke 12 2 Tapi' hawe'ea kehi-ra to tewunii' bate kahiloa mpai'. Pai' hawe'ea to hi rala nono-ra bate telohu mpai'.
Luke 12 3 Jadi', napa to ni'uli' hi bengi-na bate ralohu hi eo-na. Pai' napa to niwara' -ki doo hi rala tomi to tehohoki, bate ratolele hobo' hi rala ngata.
Luke 12 4 "Ompi' -ompi', pe'epei lompe' lolita-ku: neo' -koi mpoka'eka' manusia' to doko' mpopatehi-koi, apa' hudu ree-wadi pakulea' -ra.
Luke 12 5 Sampale-di to kana nipoka'eka', Alata'ala. Apa' mokuasa-i mpatehi-koi, pai' mokuasa wo'o-i mpotadi-koi hi rala naraka. Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi, Hi'a-mi to kana nipoka'eka'.
Luke 12 6 "Lima ma'a rone biasa-na rapobalu' nte rompepa' doi see-wadi. Aga nau' wae, uma ria hama'aa to uma nakiwoi Pue' Ala.
Luke 12 7 Peliu-liu-nami koi'. Bangku' kawori' wuluwoo' -ni nabila' pai' na'inca omea. Jadi' neo' -koi me'eka'. Meliu-pi pompewili' -na Alata'ala hi koi' ngkai pompewili' -na rone to wori'.
Luke 12 8 "Pe'epei lompe' lolita-ku: hema to mpangaku' hi doo kahi'a-na topetuku' -ku, hi'a wo'o mpai' kupangaku' hi nyanyoa hawe'ea mala'eka Alata'ala, ku'uli': `Tau toei topetuku' -ku.'
Luke 12 9 Aga hema to mposapu-a hi doo, hi'a wo'o mpai' kusapu hi nyanyoa mala'eka Alata'ala, ku'uli': `Bela-i topetuku' -ku.'
Luke 12 10 "Tauna to ncapuaka-a, Aku' Ana' Manusia', ma'ala-pidi te'ampungi sala' -na. Aga tauna to mporuge' Inoha' Tomoroli', uma-pi ma'ala ampungia sala' -na.
Luke 12 11 "Ane rakeni-koi hi tomi posampayaa pai' rapakilu-koi hi topohura agama ba topoparenta sabana petuku' -ni hi Aku', neo' -koi me'eka' ba beiwa mpai' tompoi' -ni ba napa mpai' to kana ni'uli'.
Luke 12 12 Apa' hinto'u toe mpai', Inoha' Tomoroli' moto mpotudui' -koi napa to kana ni'uli'."
Luke 12 13 Ria hadua ngkai laintongo' ntodea mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Guru, uli' -ki ompi' -ku bona nawai' -a-kuwo bagia-ku ngkai sosora totu'a-kai."
Luke 12 14 Na'uli' Yesus: "Ompi', hema to mpo'ongko' -a jadi' topohura to mpobagi-kokoi sosora totu'a-ni?"
Luke 12 15 Oti toe na'uli' -raka tauna to wori': "Mo'inga' -inga' -koi pai' pelompehi, bona neo' -koi mpokahina ba apa-apa rewa dunia'. Apa' nau' wori' rewa-ta, uma ngkai rewa toe pai' lompe' tuwu' -ta."
Luke 12 16 Ngkai ree, Yesus mpololitai-ra hante hanyala lolita rapa', na'uli': "Ria hadua topo'ua' to tebua' lompe' -ki polia' -na.
Luke 12 17 Na'uli' -mi hi rala nono-na: `Napa-le' to kubabehi-e? Uma-pi liu poropo' -ku kupontimamahii wua' polia' -ku.
Luke 12 18 Aa, kurata reke! Kukero lau-di poropo' -ku, pai' kuwangu to meliu kabohe-na, bona hi retu-mi mpai' pontimamahia hawe'ea pae-ku pai' rewa-ku.
Luke 12 19 Oti toe mpai', uma-apa mobago, apa' wori' -mi timamahia-ku, hono' nte ba hangkuja mpae kupake'. Wae-pi, ntora-ama, ngkoni', nginu, pai' ntora goe' -a-damo!'
Luke 12 20 "Ntaa' we'i Alata'ala mpo'uli' -ki tauna toei: `He towojo! Bengi toe mpai' lau, ra'alai' -moko inoha' -nu. Jadi', hawe'ea to nurumpu tetu, hema-mi mpai' pue' -na?'
Luke 12 21 "Wae-mi katuwu' tauna to doko' mporumpu ka'uaa' hi dunia', tapi' mpe'ahii' tuwu' -ra hi poncilo Alata'ala."
Luke 12 22 Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Toe pai' ku'uli' -kokoi, neo' -koi sese' mpopekiri tuwu' -ni. Neo' ni'uli': `Napa-le' to takoni' -e? Napa-le' to tapohea-e?'
Luke 12 23 Apa' katuwu' -ni meliu ngkai pongkoni' pai' pohea.
Luke 12 24 Penonoi-dile danci kaa' -e. Uma-ra molia', uma-ra mepae, uma ria poropo' -ra ba wilulu-ra. Aga nau' wae, Alata'ala mpowai' moto-ra pongkoni'. Peliu-liu-nami koi', apa' hi poncilo Alata'ala meliu tuwu' -ni ngkai katuwu' danci, pai' meliu pompewili' -na hi koi' ngkai pompewili' -na hi danci.
Luke 12 25 Napa wo'o kalaua-na wori' rahi pekiri-ni? Apa' nau' sese' ncuu-ta mpopekiri, uma-ta bisa mpodonihii umuru-ta nau' kampa' hamengi.
Luke 12 26 Jadi', ane to kedi' toe uma nipakulei' mpobabehi, napa pai' wori' rahi pekiri-ni?
Luke 12 27 Penonoi-dile katuwu' wunga-e. Uma-ra mobago, uma-ra mpobabehi pohea-ra. Tapi' ku'uli' -kokoi, bangku' Magau' Salomo-hawoe' hante hawe'ea ka'uaa' -na, pohea-na uma hewa kancola wunga toera lau.
Luke 12 28 Kowo' hi papada tuwu' eo toe lau, mepulo rasuwe oti. Aga nau' wae, Alata'ala mpakancola moto kowo' toe. Peliu-liu-nami koi'! Meliu pompewili' Alata'ala hi koi'. Jadi', napa pai' uma nipangala' pompewili' -nae?
Luke 12 29 Jadi' neo' -koi sese' rahi mpenonoi napa to nikoni' ba napa to ni'inu. Neo' -koi me'eka'.
Luke 12 30 Hawe'ea tetu lau to ntora rapali' tauna to uma mpo'incai Alata'ala. Hiaa' Tuama-ni hi suruga mpo'inca kaparaluua-ni.
Luke 12 31 Kana mengkoru-ta hi Alata'ala bona Hi'a jadi' Magau' -ta. Ane toe tababehi, to ntani' -ntani' -na nawai' moto-ta mpai'.
Luke 12 32 "Koi' to mpotuku' -a, uma-koi hangkuja-na. Aga nau' wae, neo' -koi me'eka'. Apa' Alata'ala Tuama-ni mpopelihi-mokoi ngkai kabula rala-na, napajadi' -koi ntodea-na hi rala Kamagaua' -na.
Luke 12 33 Toe pai' ku'uli', pobalu' -mi rewa-ni, pai' oli-na wai' -raka tokabu. Babehi-mokoi karepe' to uma bisa moheu'. Batua-na, babehi kehi to lompe'. Apa' kehi to lompe' toe ma'ala rarapai' -ki rewa to nitimamahi hi suruga, to uma ria karontoa-na, apa' uma ria to mpanako pai' uma ria anutuwu' to mposerohi.
Luke 12 34 Apa' hiapa pontimamahia rewa-ta, retu wo'o nono-ta.
Luke 12 35  
Luke 12 36 "Neo' -koi lempe', mo'inga' -inga' oa' -koi mpopea karata-ku. Agina-koi hewa batua to mpopea karata-na maradika-ra ngkai posusaa' poncamokoa. Batua toera, sadia-mi pohea-ra, pai' palita-ra rapobaa ncuu, bona ane rata-ipi mpai' maradika-ra pai' -i mpopebea wobo', kaliliu rabea-ki.
Luke 12 37 Morasi' batua to narata maradika-ra bula-ra mojaga pai' mpopea karata-na. Apa' maradika toei mpai' mpehoo' abe' hi hope' -na, napopohura-ra pai' natonui-ra.
Luke 12 38 Morasi' mpu'u-ra batua to narata maradika-ra rodo moto-ra mpopea-i, nau' mentongo' bengi ba paia-na liu mentongo' bengi.
Luke 12 39 "Poinono lolita rapa' -ku toi: Ane na'inca ami' -mi pue' tomi jaa hangkuja topanako rata, bate mojaga-i bona neo' -ra mesua'.
Luke 12 40 Hewa toe wo'o kana rodo ami' -mokoi mpopea-a, apa' uma ni'incai tempo karata-ku Aku' Ana' Manusia'."
Luke 12 41 Napekune' Petrus hi Yesus: "Pue', ba hi kai' -wadi lolita rapa' tetu-e, ba hi ntodea wo'o-di?"
Luke 12 42 Na'uli' Pue': "Rapa' -na ria hadua batua to monoto nono-na pai' to tida mpobago bago maradika-na. Batua toei na'ongko' maradika-na jadi' topohawa' to mpohawai' batua ntani' -na pai' mpobagi-raka pongkoni' -ra butu eo-na.
Luke 12 43 Uma mowo kamorasi' -na ane maradika-na rata nculii' ngkai pomakoa' -na pai' mporata-i bula-na mpobago bago-na.
Luke 12 44 Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi, maradika-na mpo'ongko' -i pai' mpowai' -i kuasa mpewili' hawe'ea ka'uaa' -na.
Luke 12 45 Aga silaka mpai' batua to mpo'uli': `Uma-ile sohi' rata maradika-e.' Natepu'u-mi mpoweba' hingka batua-na ba tobine ba tomane, pai' -i ntora ngkoni' pai' nginu duu' -na palangu-langu.
Luke 12 46 Ntaa' we'i, bula-na lempe' moto hewa toe, muu-mule' rata-mi maradika-na hi eo pai' hi jaa to uma na'incai. Batua toei raweba' ntarurua' pai' rapetadi hi mali-na, raponcawa tauna to uma mepangala' hi Alata'ala.
Luke 12 47 "Batua to mpo'inca moto konoa maradika-na, tapi' uma-i mo'inga' -inga' pai' uma nababehi konoa maradika-na, batua toei bate raweba' mperegea.
Luke 12 48 Aga batua to uma-hawo mpo'incai konoa maradika-na, pai' -i mpobabehi to natao raweba' -ki, raweba' moto-i, aga huka' -na-wadi. Apa' hema to rawai' wori', wori' wo'o to ratuntu' ngkai hi'a. Hema to ratonui wori', rapomperapii' wori' wo'o-i.
Luke 12 49 "Katumai-ku toi, tumai mpobaa apu hi dunia'. Pai' konoa-ku bona apu toe sohi' rapobaa-mi.
Luke 12 50 Ria-pidi pontodohakaa to kana kutodohaka, pai' uma oa' rodo nono-ku ane pontodohakaa toe ko'ia madupa'.
Luke 12 51 Ha ni'uli' -koina katumai-ku toi, tumai mpopohintuwu' tauna? Uma-e'! Katumai-ku toi, tumai mpoposisala tauna.
Luke 12 52 Ntepu'u ngkai tempo toi, tau hantina to nte lima rala-na hantomi mosisala: tolu hamali, rodua hamali.
Luke 12 53 To tuama mpo'ewa ana' -na tomane, ana' tomane mpo'ewa tuama-na. To tina mpo'ewa ana' -na tobine, pai' ana' tobine mpo'ewa tina-na. To piniana mpo'ewa minia-na, pai' to minia mpo'ewa piniana-na."
Luke 12 54 Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus hi tauna to wori': "Ane nihilo limu' mehupa' tono' hi kasoloa, ni'uli' udaa mpai'. Udaa mpu'u.
Luke 12 55 Ane mewui ngolu' ngkai tono' selatan, ni'uli' mara eo mpai', pai' bate wae mpu'u.
Luke 12 56 He koi' to lompe' hi mali-na-wadi! Ni'inca lia mpelence tanda hi langi' pai' hi dunia'. Napa-di pai' uma ni'incai mpelence napa to nababehi Pue' Ala tempo toi!
Luke 12 57 "Napa pai' uma oa' nipakanoto nono-ni pai' mpangaku' napa to monoa'!
Luke 12 58 Ane rapa' -na ria to doko' mpakilu-ta hi totu'a ngata, agina tahuduwukui mpo'oti kara-kara-ta bula-ta hi lengko ohea-pidi. Nee-neo' mpai' nakeni mpu'u-ta hi topohura, pai' topohura mpai' mpotonu-ta hi polisi, pai' polisi mpopesua' -ta hi rala tarungku'.
Luke 12 59 Mpu'u ku'uli': uma-tapa tebahaka ngkai rala tarungku' ane da koo-ko'ia oti tabayari waya' -ta."
Luke 13 1 Nto'u toe wo'o-hawo, ria tauna mpololitai Yesus, mpololita ba hangkuja dua to Galilea to rapatehi ntuku' hawa' Pilatus bula-ra mpotonu pepue' -ra hi Pue' Ala.
Luke 13 2 Mpotompoi' lolita toe, na'uli' -mi Yesus: "Ba ni'uli' -koina wae, pai' hewa toe rahi kamate-ra to Galilea toera, apa' meliu jeko' -ra ngkai hawe'ea to Galilea to ntani' -na?
Luke 13 3 Uma-e' waetu! Ku'uli' -kokoi: ane uma-koi medea ngkai jeko' -ni, bate rahuku' wo'o-koiwo mpai' omea.
Luke 13 4 Wae wo'o to hampulu' walu to mate nadungkahi tomi to molangko hi Siloam. Apa' oo-raka kamate-rae, meka' ba lue' ni'uli' melabi-rana sala' -ra ngkai hawe'ea to Yerusalem?
Luke 13 5 Uma-e' waetu! Ku'uli' -kokoi: ane uma-koi medea ngkai jeko' -ni, bate rahuku' wo'o-koiwo mpai' omea."
Luke 13 6 Oti toe, Yesus mpo'uli' -raka lolita rapa' toi. Na'uli': "Ria hadua tauna to mpohu'a kaju ara hi pampa-na. Hangkani hilou-imi mpongoa' -ngoa' ba ria wua' -na. Ntaa' uma-di ria hamehaa' -e.
Luke 13 7 Toe pai' na'uli' mpo'uli' -ki tompodoo pampa-na: `Hilo, tolu mpae-mi ntora tumai-a mpehiloi kaju toei ba ria wua' -na, uma oa' ria. Toki lau-mi! Napa kalaua-na tuwu' hi rehe'i mpe'oti mara rudu' tana'.'
Luke 13 8 "Na'uli' tompodoo pampa toei: `Pelele' -mi ulu tuwu' hampae toi-pi Maradika. Kukawahi-damo, pai' kutaui' tana' to morudu' ngkai mali-na.
Luke 13 9 Meka' ba lue' mowua' -i-hawo mpai' mpae boko'. Ane uma oa' -i mowua', tatoki-imi.'"
Luke 13 10 Hangkani, Yesus metudui' hi tomi posampayaa nto'u Eo Sabat, eo pepuea' -ra to Yahudi.
Luke 13 11 Hi ree, ria hadua tobine, hampulu' walu mpae-imi peda', apa' napesuai' seta-i. Tobine toei bungku', uma nakulei' mokore monoa'.
Luke 13 12 Kanahilo-na Yesus tobine toei, nakio' -i pai' na'uli' -ki: "Ina', mo'uri' -moko, uma-pi ria haki' to mpohoo' -ko."
Luke 13 13 Oti toe najama tobine toei, kaliliu mokore monoa' -imi, pai' -i mpo'une' Alata'ala.
Luke 13 14 Ngkai ree, kamoroe-nami pangkeni tomi posampayaa toei, apa' Yesus mpaka'uri' tauna hi Eo Sabat. Toe pai' na'uli' mpo'uli' -raka tauna to wori': "Ono eo, eo pobagoa-ta. Hi eo toe, ma'ala-koi tumai mpopepaka'uri', neo' hi Eo Sabat!"
Luke 13 15 Na'uli' Pue' Yesus: "He koi' to lompe' hi mali-na-wadi! Hi Eo Sabat, hema-ta to uma mpobahaka japi ba jara' -ta, takeni hilou hi mali gimpu pai' tapoponginu?
Luke 13 16 Hiaa' hi rehe'i, ria hadua tobine muli Abraham, hampulu' walu mpae-imi nahoo' Magau' Anudaa'. Ha uma-hana ma'ala tabahaka-i ngkai pohoo' -na hi Eo Sabat?"
Luke 13 17 Lolita-na Yesus tohe'e mpo'eai' bali' -na. Tapi' ane ntodea, goe' -ra-rana mpohilo hawe'ea anu mekoncehi to nababehi.
Luke 13 18 Ngkai ree, na'uli' Yesus: "Ane Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia', beiwa kajadi' -na? Kajadi' -nale, hewa lolita rapa' tohe'i:
Luke 13 19 Ria hadua tauna ngala' unto' hawi, lou nahawu' hi pampa-na. Unto' toe tuwu' kaboo-bohea, duu' -na jadi' hangkaju kaju, pai' danci mpobabehi peta-ra hi ra'a-na."
Luke 13 20 Oti toe, na'uli' wo'o-mi: "Ane Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia', kajadi' -na hewa lolita rapa' tohe'i:
Luke 13 21 Hadua tobine mpo'ala' ragi hangkedi', nagalo hante lunu to wori'. Mahae-hae, woke' -mi omea."
Luke 13 22 Rala pomakoa' -na hilou hi Yerusalem, Yesus mpotara ngata to bohe pai' ngata to kedi', mpotudui' tauna.
Luke 13 23 Ria hadua tauna mpekune' -i: "Pue', ba hangkedi' -wadi tauna to mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-nae?" Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka ntodea:
Luke 13 24 "Mporata katuwua' to lompe' -le, ma'ala rarapai' -ki tauna to mesua' ntara hi wobo' to jopi'. Pari-pari-koi mesua' ntara wobo' to jopi' toe. Apa' wori' -hana mpai' to mpali' ohea-ra mesua', aga uma-rapa ma'ala mesua'.
Luke 13 25 Apa' rata mpai' tempo-na, mokore-imi pue' tomi toe hilou mpo'unca wobo'. Ane rapa' -na mokore hi mali-na-pidi-koi nto'u toe, mpopebea wobo' -koi, ni'uli': `Pue', bea-kaka-kaiwo!' "Natompoi' -koi mpai': `Uma-koi ku'incai, ba to ngkaiapa-koi.'
Luke 13 26 "Ni'uli' -ki: `Ei'! Ngkoni' pai' nginu-madakaie dohe-nue Pue'! Ria-moko metudui' hi rala ngata-kai!'
Luke 13 27 "Na'uli' -kokoi mpai': `Uma-koi ku'incai ba to ngkaiapa-koi. Palai-koi ngkai rei, koi' paka' to mo'ingku dada'a.'
Luke 13 28 "Nto'u toe mpai', geo' pai' ntodohaka-mokoi, apa' nihilo Abraham, Ishak pai' Yakub hante hawe'ea nabi, mohura goe' -goe' -ra hi rala Kamagaua' Alata'ala, hiaa' koi' ra'uncahi hi mali-na.
Luke 13 29 Wori' wo'o mpai' tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi to jadi' ntodea Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua' -na. Tumai-ra ngkai tono' mata'eo pai' ngkai kasoloa pai' ngkai humalili' dunia', mohura goe' -goe' omea-ra mpai' mpokaralai posusaa' hi rala Kamagaua' Alata'ala.
Luke 13 30 Ka'omea-na mpai', wori' tauna to kedi' tuwu' -ra tempo toi jadi' bohe tuwu' -ra hi eo mpeno. Pai' wori' tauna to bohe tuwu' -ra tempo toi jadi' kedi' tuwu' -ra hi eo mpeno."
Luke 13 31 Nto'u toe wo'o, ria ba hangkuja dua to Parisi rata hi Yesus pai' mpo'uli' -ki: "Malai-moko ngkai rei, apa' Magau' Herodes doko' mpopatehi-ko."
Luke 13 32 Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Koi', uli' -ki tope'akalai tetui hewa tohe'i: Eo toe lau pai' mepulo, mobago-a-pidi, mpopalai seta pai' mpaka'uri' topeda'. Pai' hi eo katolu-na, kupohudu-mi pobago-ku.
Luke 13 33 Aga eo toe mpai' lau, mepulo pai' romengi mpai', bate kana kaliliu-ama mpotoa' Yerusalem. Apa' uma-hawo masipato' hadua nabi rapatehi hi ngata ntani' -na, kana hi ngata Yerusalem.
Luke 13 34 "Ee to Yerusalem! to Yerusalem! Nipatehi-ra-koina nabi-nabi, pai' nipana' watu-ra-koina tauna to nasuro-kokoi Alata'ala. Wori' ngkani-mi kupehuka' ngkupui-koi, hewa hama'a manu' tina mpo'urui ana' -na hi une' pani' -na, aga uma-koi dota.
Luke 13 35 Jadi', bona ni'inca: Tomi pepuea' -ni napalahii-kokoi mpai' Pue' Ala. Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi, uma-apa nihiloi, duu' -na rata tempo-na ni'uli': `Une' -imi to rata mpokeni hanga' Pue' Ala!'"
Luke 14 1 Hangkani nto'u Eo Sabat, Yesus hilou ngkoni' hi tomi hadua pangkeni to Parisi. Bula-na hi ree, ralelemata-i mpopali' sala' -na.
Luke 14 2 Muu-mule' rata hadua tauna to mohaki' ngkumowu, mowoto witi' pai' pale-na.
Luke 14 3 Yesus mpekune' -ra guru agama pai' to Parisi, na'uli': "Ntuku' atura agama-ta, ma'ala-ta mpaka'uri' topeda' hi Eo Sabat, ba uma-di?"
Luke 14 4 Guru agama pai' to Parisi toera, oja' -ra mpotompoi' -i. Ngkai ree, Yesus mpojama topeda' toei, napaka'uri' pai' nahubui-i hilou.
Luke 14 5 Oti toe na'uli' -raka: "Ane rapa' -na ria ana' -ta ba japi-ta monawu' hi rala buwu hi Eo Sabat, ha uma sahu ta'ore' -i tumai, nau' hi eo pepuea' -e?"
Luke 14 6 Aga uma hema to daho' mpohono' -i.
Luke 14 7 Hi tomi to Parisi toe, Yesus mpohilo ria torata to doko' mohura hi pohuraa karabilaa'. Toe pai' natudui' -ra hante lolita rapa' toi.
Luke 14 8 Na'uli': "Ane rakio' -ko hilou hi posusaa' poncamokoa, neo' mohura hi pohuraa karabilaa'. Meka' ba ria-di mpai' to rakio' to meliu karabila' -na ngkai iko.
Luke 14 9 Tumai mpai' pue' tomi mpo'uli' -koko hewa toi: `Wai' -ki hi'a-hana pohuraa tetu!' Me'ea' -ko mpai' hilou mohura hi kadingkia' -na.
Luke 14 10 Jadi', ane rakio' -ko hilou hi posusaa', agina mohura-ko hi kadingkia' -na, bona pue' tomi mpai' mpo'uli' -koko: `Bale, mai-ta mohura hi pohuraa to lompe' toe mai.' Ane hewa toe, rabila' lau-moko hi mata ntodea.
Luke 14 11 Hawe'ea to mpomolangko nono-ra, Pue' Ala mpodingkihi-ra, pai' hawe'ea to mpakadingki' nono-ra, Pue' Ala mpomolangko-ra."
Luke 14 12 Oti toe, mololita wo'o-imi Yesus mpololitai pue' tomi. Na'uli': "Ane takio' tauna ngkaralai posusa' -ta, ba ngkoni' mpo'eo ba ngkabengia, neo' mpokio' bale-ta, ompi' -ta, ba topo'ua' rala ngata. Apa' bate rakio' wo'o-ta mpai', alaa-na tehiwili-mi kehi-ta.
Luke 14 13 Jadi' ane tababehi posusa', kio' tauna tokabu, tokeru, topungku pai' towero.
Luke 14 14 Ane wae pobabehi-ta, Pue' Ala mpogane' -ta mpai', apa' tauna to hewa toe uma mpokulei' mpohiwili kehi-ta. Kehi-ta tetu nahiwili moto mpai' Pue' Ala hi Eo Kiama, nto'u kanapotuwu' -ra nculii' tauna to monoa' hi poncilo-na."
Luke 14 15 Bula-ra ngkoni' toe, hadua torata mpo'epe lolita-na Yesus, pai' na'uli' -ki: "Marasi' tauna to mpokaralai posusa' hi rala Kamagaua' -na Alata'ala."
Luke 14 16 Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki tauna toei: "Hangkani ria hadua tauna to mpobabehi susa' bohe, pai' mpokio' wori' tauna.
Luke 14 17 Sadia-mi omea, nahubui pahawaa' -na hilou mpo'uli' -raka to rakio': `Mai-tamo hilou hi posusaa', apa' sadia-mi omea.'
Luke 14 18 Aga tauna to rakio' toera, motance omea-ra. To lomo' -na mpo'uli': `Lako' me'oli tana' -a, pai' kana hilou ulu kupehiloi. Merapi' ampu-a, uma-a tilou.'
Luke 14 19 To hadua-na mpo'uli': `Lako' mpo'oli japi-a lima moko, hilou kuperao mpake' -ra mopajeko'. Merapi' ampu-a, uma-a tilou!'
Luke 14 20 To ntani' -na wo'o mpo'uli': `Aku' lako' oti ncamoko-a. Uma-a bisa tilou.'
Luke 14 21 "Pahawaa' toei nculii' hilou hi pue' susa' mpowoli' lolita-ra toe. Uma-pi mowo kamoroe-na pue' susa', na'uli' -ki pahawaa' -na: `Pesahui hilou hi karajaa pai' hi porompengaa ohea hi rala ngata. Bawai-ramo tumai tokabu, tokeru, towero, pai' topungku.' Hilou mpu'u-imi-hawo pahawaa' toei mpotuku' hawa' pue' susa'.
Luke 14 22 "Karata-na nculii', na'uli' mpo'uli' -ki pue' susa': `Tuama, hawa' -nu kupopomako' -mi, aga ko'ia ihia' tomi-nu, ria-pidi pohuraa.'
Luke 14 23 "Na'uli' pue' susa': `Hilou tena-ko hi ohea bohe pai' ohea to kedi' hi mali ngata, pewuku-ra tauna tumai, bona tomi-ku ihia' hobo'.
Luke 14 24 Mpu'u ku'uli', ngkai hawe'ea tauna to kukio' toera lou, uma haduaa-ra to mpokoni' ba apa-apa hi posusa' -ku.'"
Luke 14 25 Wori' tauna mpotuku' Yesus rala pomakoa' -na. Yesus mewili' hi tauna toera pai' na'uli' -raka:
Luke 14 26 "Tauna to doko' mpotuku' -a, aga uma meliu pe'ahi' -na hi Aku' ngkai pe'ahi' -na hi tina-na, tuama-na, tobine-na, ana' -na, ompi' -na, ba paiana woto-na moto-mi, uma-i ma'ala jadi' topetuku' -ku.
Luke 14 27 Tauna to jadi' topetuku' -ku kana mpopaha'a kaju parika' -na-- batua-na kana sadia-i mporata kaparia ba paiana rapatehi sabana petuku' -na hi Aku'. Jadi', tauna to uma dota mpopaha'a kaju parika' -na pai' mpotuku' -a, uma-i ma'ala jadi' topetuku' -ku.
Luke 14 28 "Ane ria to doko' mpowangu tomi bohe, napohura-ki ulu mporeke ongkoso' pompowangu-na, ba hono' mpai' doi-na ba uma-di.
Luke 14 29 Apa' ane mpolia' natu'u-mi parawatu-na pai' uma hudu nawangu apa' naka'otii doi-na, hawe'ea tauna to mpohilo mpotawai-i,
Luke 14 30 ra'uli': `Ii, ni'anu-di doko' mpowangu tomi bohe, ntaa' uma-di hono' doi-nae!'
Luke 14 31 "Wae wo'o, ane hadua magau' to ria tantara-na hampulu' ncobu manga'e hante hadua magau' to ria tantara-na rompulu' ncobu, kana napekiri ncala', ba rakule' mpo'ewa-ra ba uma-di.
Luke 14 32 Ane na'inca ka'uma-na mpai' hompe tantara-na, molaa-pidi bali' -na, nahubui-mi suro hilou mpali' kahintuwuaa'."
Luke 14 33 Yesus mpokaliliu lolita-na, na'uli': "Wae wo'o koi', ane uma-koi mpobahaka hawe'ea to ria hi koi', uma-koi ma'ala jadi' topetuku' -ku.
Luke 14 34 "Poi', wori' kalaua-na. Aga ane mobali' -mi kapoi' -na alaa-na uma-pi mopoi', napa tena to ma'ala mpakapoi' -i?
Luke 14 35 Uma ntoto-pi ria tuju-na, ba raruduhi-ki hinu'a ba rapopai-pai. Agina ratadi lau-imi. Hema-koi to tilingaa, pe'epei lompe'!"
Luke 15 1 Rala-na ha'eo, wori' topesingara' paja' pai' tau ntani' -na to ra'uli' ntodea dada'a kehi-ra rata mpo'epe lolita Yesus.
Luke 15 2 To Parisi pai' guru agama mporuge' -i, ra'uli': "Ii, tau toe-idi mai mpobale-raka topojeko', pai' ngkoni' dohe-rae."
Luke 15 3 Toe pai' Yesus mpololitai-ra hante lolita rapa' toi.
Luke 15 4 Na'uli': "Rapa' -na ria doo-ta to ria-ki bima-na ha'atu ma'a. Ane moronto hama'a, napa to nababehi? Bate napalahii bima-na to sio mpulu' sio hi papada, pai' -i hilou mpali' bima-na to moronto duu' -na narua'.
Luke 15 5 Ane narua' -pi, uma mowo kagoe' -na. Ngkai kagoe' -na napololopongko' bima-na toei, pai' nakeni nculii' hilou hi tomi-na.
Luke 15 6 Oti toe, pai' -i mpokio' bale-na pai' tongki-na, na'uli' -raka: `Mai-mokoi goe' dohe-ku. Apa' bima-ku to moronto kurua' nculii' -imi.'
Luke 15 7 Wae wo'o, ane hadua topojeko' medea ngkai jeko' -na, meliu kagoe' -ra ihi' suruga mpokagoe' -i ngkai kagoe' -ra mpokagoe' sio mpulu' sio tauna to monoa' po'ingku-ra, to uma-ra-rana mingki' medea.
Luke 15 8 "Rapa' -na ria hadua tobine to ria-ki hampulu' mpepa' doi pera' -na. Ane moronto hampepa', napa to nababehi? Mposuwe palita-i pai' -i mpehaii tomi-na, pai' napali' hiapa-apa karontoa-na, duu' -na narua'.
Luke 15 9 Wae kanarua' -na, nakio' -ramo bale-na pai' tongki-na, na'uli' -raka: `Mai-mokoi goe' dohe-ku. Apa' kurua' nculii' -mi doi-ku to moronto.'
Luke 15 10 Wae wo'o-ra mala'eka Alata'ala mpokagoe' hadua tauna topojeko' to medea ngkai jeko' -na."
Luke 15 11 Na'uli' tena Yesus: "Ria hadua tuama to ria-ki rodua ana' -na tomane.
Luke 15 12 Tokahudu mpo'uli' -ki tuama-ra: `Mama, wai' ami' -ama-kuna bagia-ku ngkai rewa-nu.' Jadi', nabagi mpu'u-mi rewa-na hi ana' -na to rodua toera.
Luke 15 13 "Ba hangkuja eo olo' -na ngkai ree, ana' -na tokahudu mpobalu' bagia-na, pai' -i hilou hi ngata to molaa. Hi ria-i mpo'oti mara doi-na hante kehi to uma tumotoa.
Luke 15 14 Ka'oti doi-na omea, ria-mi oro' hi ngata toe, duu' -na mpe'ahii' -mi tuwu' -na.
Luke 15 15 Hilou-imi hi pue' ngata doko' ngkoni' gaji'. Pue' ngata toei mpohubui-i mpodoo wawu-na.
Luke 15 16 Ngkai kamo'oro' -na, mehina-imi-hawo doko' mpokoni' kano wawu. Hiaa' uma hema to mpowai' -i pongkoni'.
Luke 15 17 "Ka'omea-na, mokanono-imi, na'uli': `Topobago hi tomi tuama-kule, melabi lia pongkoni' -ra. Hiaa' aku' -mi-kuna hi rehe'i, neo' mate modupu' -ama.
Luke 15 18 Wae-pi, nculii' -ama hilou hi tuama-ku, ku'uli' -damo-ki: Mama, masala' -ama hi Pue' Ala pai' hi Mama wo'o.
Luke 15 19 Uma-apa natao nukio' ana' -nu Mama. Agina nuponcawa batua-nua-damo.'
Luke 15 20 Kame'ongko' -nami hilou hi tuama-na. "Molaa-i-pidi ngkai tomi-na, pehilo-mi tuama-na. Ngkai kama'ahi' -na, pokeno-nami hilou mpohirua' -ki ana' -na, nakupui pai' na'eki.
Luke 15 21 Na'uli' -mi to ana': `Mama, masala' -ama hi Pue' Ala pai' hi Mama wo'o. Uma-apa natao nukio' ana' -nu....'
Luke 15 22 "Aga tuama-na mpokio' topobago-na, pai' na'uli' -raka: `Pesahui, ala' pohea to lompe' lia, pai' heai-i. Uncoi' karawe-na hante hinci, pai' sapatui' wo'o-i.
Luke 15 23 Oti toe, hilou-koi mpohoko' ana' japi to morudu' pai' nisumale'. Ngkoni' -ta goe' -goe'!
Luke 15 24 Apa' ana' -ku tohe'ii, ma'ala-mi ta'uli' mate-imi, aga tuwu' nculii' -imi. Moronto-i, aga kurua' nculii' -imi.' Kamosusa' -rami.
Luke 15 25 "Nto'u toe, lingku' ana' -na to ulumua' hi bonea. Ponculi' -na ngkai bonea, mohu' -mi hi tomi, na'epe-hawo to molalowe pai' moni karamea.
Luke 15 26 Nakio' hadua topobago-ra, napompekunei' ba moapa-ra hi tomi.
Luke 15 27 Na'uli' topobago toei: `Tu'ai-nule, rata nculii' -imi-hawo! Tuama-nu mpehubui mposumale' ana' japi to morudu', apa' ana' -na to moronto narua' nculii' -mi hante kalompea' -na.'
Luke 15 28 "Kamoroe-nami ana' to ulumua' toei, oja' -i mesua' hi rala tomi. Tuama-na hilou mpobawai-i mesua'.
Luke 15 29 Tapi' na'uli' to ana': `Mompae-mpae-ama mobago huduwuku-ku mpobago-koko Mama. Uma-kuna hangkania-a mposapuaka hawa' -nu. Hiaa' ntahawe' hama'a kebe' -kuwo, ko'ia-kuna ria nuwai' -a bona kubabehi-kuwo kagoea' hante bale-ku.
Luke 15 30 Hiaa' ana' -nu tetui to mpe'oti hinyai' rewa-nu hante tobine to ele', wae kanculii' -na nusumale' lau-ki japi to morudu'!'
Luke 15 31 "Na'uli' tuama-na: `Ana', iko-le tida dohe-ku oa' -ko-kona. Ihi' tomi-kule, iko wo'o pue' -na.
Luke 15 32 Hiaa' toto-na lia-ta mosusa' goe' -goe', apa' tu'ai-nu to mate-imi-hana, tuwu' nculii' -imi. Moronto-imi, tapi' tarua' nculii' -imi-hawo.'"
Luke 16 1 Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Ria hadua topo'ua', pai' ria-ki hadua topobago-na to ngkakamu doi-na. Ria to mpakilu topobago toei hi topo'ua', ra'uli': `Ntora napewai' mara-hana doi-nu!'
Luke 16 2 Toe pai' topo'ua' toei mpokio' topobago-na, na'uli' -ki: `Napa-di to ku'epe to rapakilu-koko toi-e? Wae lau, popehuwu-ka hawe'ea buku popa'intaa. Ngkai eo toe lau, uma-pi iko to ngkakamu ka'uaa' -ku!'
Luke 16 3 "Mokanono-imi topobago toei, na'uli': `Napa-le' to kubabehi-e? Naleso' -ama mpai' sepu' -ku ngkai bago-ku. Momangki uma kukulei'. Kakarapi' -rapi', me'ea' -a.'
Luke 16 4 Ngkai ree na'uli': `Aa, ria akala-ku! Apa' neo' raleso' -ama ngkai bago-kue, agina mpali' ncala' -a bale-ku wori' -wori', bona hira' mpai' mpotarima-a hi tomi-ra.'
Luke 16 5 "Jadi' ngkai ree, nakio' -mi butu dua tauna to mo'inta hi sepu' -na. Hi to lomo' -na na'uli': `Hangkuja inta-nu hi sepu' -ku?'
Luke 16 6 "Metompoi' tauna toei: `Tolu ncobu lite lana.' "Na'uli' topobago toei: `Oi sura popa'intaa-nu. Mohura-moko, uki' pesahui, hancobu lima atu lite-wadi!'
Luke 16 7 "Oti toe, pai' na'uli' -ki karodua-na: `Hiaa' iko, hangkuja-kowo inta-nu?' "Natompoi' -hawo: `Hancobu karu' pae.' "Na'uli' topobago toei: `Ohe'i sura inta-nu, uki' -mi walu atu karu' -wadi.'
Luke 16 8 "Kana'epe-na topo'ua' napa to nababehi topobago-na to bengku' gau' -na tetui, na'une' lau-imi, apa' pante-i-hana mpali' akala-na bona lompe' katuwu' -na. Apa' tauna to uma mpo'incai Pue' Ala, meliu kapante-ra mpo'urusi katuwu' -ra hante hingka doo-ra, ngkai kapante-ra tauna to hi rala kabajaa-na Pue' Ala mpo'urusi katuwu' -ra hi eo mpeno.
Luke 16 9 "Toe pai' ku'uli' -kokoi: Kana tapake' ka'uaa' hi dunia' tohe'i mpotulungi doo, bona ane uma-pi mpai' mokalaua ka'uaa' dunia' toi, ratarima lompe' -ta hi po'ohaa' to tida duu' kahae-hae-na.
Luke 16 10 Tauna to ma'ala rasarumaka hante rewa to hangkedi', ma'ala wo'o-i rasarumaka hante rewa to wori'. Tauna to uma monoa' kehi-na hante rewa to hangkedi', uma wo'o mpai' monoa' kehi-na hante rewa to wori'.
Luke 16 11 Jadi', ane uma lompe' pompewili' -ta hi ka'uaa' dunia' tohe'i, hema to mposarumaka-ta hi poko ka'uaa' to hi suruga?
Luke 16 12 Ane uma lompe' pompewili' -ta hi rewa to rasarumaka-taka hi dunia' toi, hema mpai' to mpowai' -ta rewa to jadi' anu-ta moto hi suruga?
Luke 16 13 "Uma-hawo ria hadua topobago mobago hi rodua tua. Apa' hadua mpai' nape'ahi', hadua napokahuku'. Hadua natuku' -ki hawa' -na, hadua nasapuaka. Wae wo'o koi', uma-koi bisa mpotuku' konoa Alata'ala, pai' hamali-koi ntora mporumpu rewa dunia'."
Luke 16 14 To Parisi mpo'epe hawe'ea lolita Yesus toe. Rapotawai lau-i-wadi, apa' hira' toe-mi to mpokahina doi.
Luke 16 15 Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Koi' tetu-mi mpemanoa' po'ingku-ni hi poncilo manusia'. Aga Alata'ala mpo'inca ihi' nono-ni. Apa' napa to rabila' manusia', napokahuku' Alata'ala.
Luke 16 16 "Napa to te'uki' hi rala Atura Musa pai' sura nabi bate-na rapake' -pidi duu' rata hi tempo Yohanes Topeniu'. Ngkai tempo toe, rapalele-mi Kareba Lompe' to mpo'uli' Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia'. Pai' wori' tauna mpohuduwukui doko' jadi' ntodea-na hi rala Kamagaua' -na toe.
Luke 16 17 Tapi' butu mela to te'uki' hi rala Atura Pue' bate kana madupa'. Mojoli-pi langi' pai' dunia' mokero, ngkai hamela lolita hi rala Atura Pue' uma madupa'.
Luke 16 18 "Hema to mpogaa' -ki tobine-na pai' ncamoko hante tobine ntani' -na, mobualo' -i-hana. Pai' tauna to mpotobine kabulisa doo, mobualo' wo'o-i-hawo.
Luke 16 19 "Ria hadua topo'ua'. Pohea-na hewa pohea magau', paka' to masuli' oli-na. Tuwu' -na butu eo-na hewa toposusa' -damo.
Luke 16 20 Hi wobo' -na ratu'u hadua tauna to kabu, hanga' -na Lazarus. Woto-na hobo' paka' waka'.
Luke 16 21 Doko' -i-hawo ngkoni' rupu' to mohewu' ngkai meja' topo'ua' toei. Wae-mi-hawo kampe'ahii' -na, rata wo'o-pi dike' mpojilai' waka' -na.
Luke 16 22 "Rala-na ha'eo, mate-imi tokabu toei, pai' mala'eka mpokeni-i hilou hi pohuraa to lompe' hi ncori Abraham. Topo'ua' toei, mate wo'o-imi-hawo, pai' -i ratana.
Luke 16 23 Hi po'ohaa' tomate, ntora ntodohaka-i. Hampengoa' -na ngkai ree, nahilo-hawo molaa lia, oe-imi mai Abraham, hante Lazarus mohura hi ncori-na.
Luke 16 24 Pekio' -nami topo'ua' toei, na'uli': `Mama Abraham! Poka'ahi' -a-kuwo! Hubui-i Lazarus mpotubu' karawe-na hi rala ue pai' tumai natudohi-ka-kuwo jila' -ku. Pepa rahi-mi ku'epe rala apu tohe'i!'
Luke 16 25 "Na'uli' Abraham: `Kiwoi-dile ana': Bula-nu tuwu' -pidi hi rala dunia', iko mporata hawe'ea to lompe', hiaa' Lazarus-hana mporata-i paka' to dada'a. Tempo toi, tetanta'u-imi hi rehe'i, pai' iko-kowo, mporata pepa-moko.
Luke 16 26 Hiaa' etu, hi olo' -ta ria tumata to bohe lia. Tauna ngkai rehe'i uma bisa tilou hi retu, pai' tauna ngkai retu uma bisa tumai hi rehe'i.'
Luke 16 27 "Ngkai ree, na'uli' wo'o topo'ua' toei: `Ane wae-di Mama, kuperapi' bona nuhubui-i Lazarus hilou hi tomi tuama-ku.
Luke 16 28 Apa' ria-ra-pidi lima ompi' -ku. Hubui-i Lazarus mpopo'ingai' -ra bona neo' -ra mpai' tumai hi po'ohaa' pontodohakaa toi.'
Luke 16 29 "Na'uli' Abraham: `Ria-miraka sura to na'uki' Musa pai' nabi-nabi ntani' -na. Mpotuku' napa to te'uki' hi rala sura toe-ra-damo-rawo.'
Luke 16 30 "Na'uli' topo'ua' toei: `Ane muntu' toe-wadi, uma hono'! Kana ria tomate tuwu' nculii' hilou mpololitai-ra, pai' lako' medea-rada ngkai jeko' -ra!'
Luke 16 31 "Na'uli' Abraham: `Ane lolita nabi Musa pai' nabi ntani' -na uma rapangalai', uma oa' -ra mpai' mepangala', nau' gati ria mpu'u tomate tuwu' nculii'.'"
Luke 17 1 Yesus mpololitai ana'guru-na, na'uli': "Bate ria to mpopanawu' tauna alaa-ra mojeko'. Aga silaka-ra tauna to mepanawu' toera!
Luke 17 2 Agina lau-pi hameha' watu po'ahaa' ratoe hi wuroko' -ra, pai' -ra ratene' hi rala tahi', ngkai mpopanawu' -ra nau' hadua tauna to hangkedi' pepangala' -na duu' -na mpobabehi jeko'.
Luke 17 3 Toe pai' kana mo'inga' -inga' -ta! "Ane ompi' -ta mpobabehi to sala' hi kita', tudui' -i. Ane soho' -pi nono-na, ampungi-i.
Luke 17 4 Nau' pitu ngkani rala-na ha'eo-i masala' hi kita', pai' butu ngkani-na tumai-i merapi' ampu, ampungi-i-hawo."
Luke 17 5 Ra'uli' suro Pue' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Pue', pakaroho-kaka-kaiwo pepangala' -kai!"
Luke 17 6 Na'uli' Pue' Yesus: "Ane rii-ria-mi pepangala' -ni nau' hangkutuno' -wadi, ma'ala ni'uli' -ki kaju to bohe tohe'i: `Mowuka-moko ngkai rei, mentoli-ko ree mai hi rala tahi'!' bate mentoli mpu'u-i ntuku' hawa' -ni.
Luke 17 7 "Rapa' -na ria batua-ta to molia' ba to mpodoo porewua. Ane nculii' -i ngkai pehompoa-na, napa to ta'uli' -ki? Ba ta'uli' wae: `Sahu tumai ngkoni''?
Luke 17 8 Uma-hawo. Tantu ta'uli' -ki hewa tohe'i: `Porodo-mi pongkoni' -ku! Moheai-ko to uma babo'. Peka'au-a bula-ku nginu pai' ngkoni'. Oti-a-damo ngkoni', pai' lako' ngkoni' -dako-kowo.'
Luke 17 9 Uma-hawo mingki' ta'uli' tarima kasi hi batua-ta, apa' muntu' mpotuku' hawa' -i-wadi.
Luke 17 10 Wae wo'o koi'. Ane oti-mi nituku' hawe'ea to napahawa' -kokoi Alata'ala, uli' -mi-hana: `Kai' -kaiwo-le, batua biasa-wadi-ka-kaiwo. To kibabehi-le, muntu' to rapahawa' -kakai.'"
Luke 17 11 Rala pomakoa' -na hilou hi Yerusalem, Yesus ntara hi sipa' tana' to Samaria pai' to Galilea.
Luke 17 12 Kamesua' -na hi rala ngata, rata-mi hampulu' topohaki' poko' mpohirua' -ki. Ngkai molaa-ra-wadi mekio',
Luke 17 13 ra'uli': "Yesus! Guru! Poka'ahi' -ka-kaiwo!"
Luke 17 14 Kanahilo-ra Yesus, na'uli' -miraka: "Hilou-mokoi mpopehuwu woto-ni hi imam." Hilou mpu'u-ramo. Bula-ra momako', mo'uri' -ramo.
Luke 17 15 Kanahilo-na to hadua mo'uri' -imi, kanculii' -nami hilou hi Yesus, mpo'une' -une' Alata'ala napesukui.
Luke 17 16 Karata-na hi Yesus, motingkua' -imi mpo'uli' tarima kasi. Hi'a toei to Samaria.
Luke 17 17 Na'uli' Yesus: "Ha uma hampulu' to kupaka'uri' -e? Hiapa-ramo to sio?
Luke 17 18 Beiwa pai' muntu' hadua toei-wadi to nculii' mpo'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala-e? Hiaa' bela-i he'e to Yahudi!"
Luke 17 19 Ngkai ree, na'uli' wo'o-mi mpo'uli' -ki tauna toei: "Mokore-moko, pai' -ko hilou-mi. Mo'uri' -moko sabana pepangala' -nu hi Aku'."
Luke 17 20 Ba hangkuja dua to Parisi mpekune' Yesus, nto'uma Alata'ala tumai jadi' Magau' hi dunia'. Na'uli' Yesus: "Kamagaua' Alata'ala-le uma ntepu'u hante tanda-tanda to kahiloa.
Luke 17 21 Uma mpai' ria to mpo'uli': `Hilo, ohe'i-mi Kamagaua' -na Alata'ala,' ba `Etu-mi mai Kamagaua' Alata'ala,' apa' Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi laintongo' -ni."
Luke 17 22 Oti toe, Yesus mpololitai ana'guru-na. Na'uli': "Rata mpai' tempo-na, doko' lia-koi mpohilo-a nau' kampa' ha'eo, aga uma-apa nihiloi.
Luke 17 23 Nto'u toe mpai', ria to mpo'uli' -kokoi: `Magau' Topetolo' oe-imi ria!' Ba ria to mpo'uli': `Ohe'i-imi!' Aga neo' -koi hilou mpotuku' -ra!
Luke 17 24 Apa' ane rata nculii' mpu'u-apa mpai', karata-ku incana hobo' hi dunia'. Hewa kila' mpohinii raoa ngkai wuntu-na hamali rata hi wuntu-na hamali, hewa toe wo'o mpai' hi eo karataa-ku, Aku' Ana' Manusia'.
Luke 17 25 Aga lomo' -lomo' -na, kana rasesa' -a pai' rasapuaka tauna to tuwu' tempo toi.
Luke 17 26 "Hewa to majadi' hi tempo nabi Nuh owi, hewa toe wo'o mpai' to jadi' hi eo karata-ku Aku' Ana' Manusia'.
Luke 17 27 Hi tempo nabi Nuh, tauna ntora ngkoni', nginu, rapoponcamoko pai' mepoponcamoko, kawae-kawae-na duu' -na nabi Nuh mesua' hi rala sakaya bohe pai' ue mowo' mpopatehi-ra omea.
Luke 17 28 Wae wo'o kalempe' tauna owi hi ngata Sodom nto'u Lot mo'oha' hi ria. Tauna ntora ngkoni', nginu, mobabalu', molia' pai' mpowangu tomi.
Luke 17 29 Ntaa' palai-na Lot ngkai Sodom, hompo-mi apu pai' watu to morea' ngkai langi' mpopatehi-ra omea.
Luke 17 30 Wae wo'o mpai' kalempe' -ra manusia' hi eo karata-ku nculii' hi dunia' mpopehuwu kabaraka' -ku.
Luke 17 31 "Hi eo toe mpai', sohi' metibo' -koi! Tauna to mohura hi parawa, neo' -pi leba' mesua' hi rala tomi mpo'ala' rewa-na. Wae wo'o tauna to hi bonea, neo' -pi leba' nculii' mpo'ala' napa-napa hi rala ngata.
Luke 17 32 Kiwoi-dile napa to jadi' hi tobine-na Lot-e!
Luke 17 33 Hema to mpentaei konoa-na moto, uma-i mpai' mporatai katuwua' to lompe'. Aga hema to mpobahaka konoa-na sabana petuku' -na hi Aku', nau' napopate-ki, hi'a lau-mi mpai' to mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na.
Luke 17 34 "Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: Hi eo ponculia' -ku mpai', tauna rodua to more'eli turu ngkabengia, hadua ra'ala', to hadua rapalahii.
Luke 17 35 Rodua tobine to motongke' momanyu, hadua ra'ala', to hadua rapalahii. ((
Luke 17 36 Rodua tauna mo'ema' mobago hi bonea, hadua ra'ala', to hadua rapalahii.))"
Luke 17 37 Hudu lolita Yesus toe, ana'guru-na mpekune' -i, ra'uli': "Hiapa mpai' kajadia' tetu-e, Pue'?" Yesus mpotompoi' -ra hante walatu toi: "Ane ria anu mate, incana moto apa' wori' danci morumpu mpokoni'. Wae wo'o mpai' karata-ku nculii': uma-a tumai ngkawuni, incana moto mpai'."
Luke 18 1 Oti toe, Yesus mpo'uli' hanyala lolita rapa', mpotudui' ana'guru-na bona tida-ra mosampaya pai' neo' mere' nono-ra.
Luke 18 2 Na'uli': "Rala ngata hamola', ria hadua topobotuhi to uma mengkoru hi Alata'ala pai' uma wo'o-i mposaile' ba hema-hema.
Luke 18 3 Hi ngata toe wo'o, ria hadua tobine tobalu. Wori' ngkani-imi hilou mponyanyo topobotuhi toei ngkeni kara-kara-na, na'uli': `Tulungi-a-kuwo mposinyanyo-ki bali' -ku.'
Luke 18 4 "Lomo' -lomo' -na, topobotuhi toei uma dota mpotulungi-i. Aga ka'oo-omea-na na'uli' hi rala nono-na: `Nau' uma-a mengkoru hi Alata'ala pai' uma wo'o-a mposaile' ba hema-hema,
Luke 18 5 agina kutulungi lau-imi tobalu toei, apa' najojo rahi tumai mposaleroi-a. Apa' ane uma kutulungi-i, uma oa' mpai' nabahakai tumai, alaa-na kupo'oha lau wo'o-kuwo mpai'.'"
Luke 18 6 Oti toe, na'uli' Pue' Yesus: "Pe'epei-koi napa to na'uli' topobotuhi toei. Nau' uma monoa' nono-na, dota moto-i mpotulungi tobalu to ntora mperapii' -i.
Luke 18 7 Peliu-liu-nami Alata'ala doko' mpotulungi topetuku' -na to mekakae ncuu hi eo-na pai' hi bengi-na. Ba ni'uli' -koina, napeka'au ncala' pai' lako' natulungi-rae?
Luke 18 8 Uma-hawoe'! Bate napesahui moto-hawo mpotulungi-ra. Aga ane rata nculii' -apa mpai', Aku' Ana' Manusia', ha ria-ra-pidi kurua' tauna to mepangala' hi rala dunia' toi?"
Luke 18 9 Oti toe, Yesus mpo'uli' hanyala-pi lolita rapa'. Lolita rapa' toi mpotoa' tauna to mpo'uli' hira' -wadi to monoa', pai' -ra mporuge' doo.
Luke 18 10 Na'uli' Yesus: "Rodua tauna hilou hi Tomi Alata'ala, lou mosampaya. To hadua to Parisi, to hadua topesingara' paja'.
Luke 18 11 To Parisi toei mokore pai' mosampaya hi rala nono-na, na'uli': `Oo Alata'ala, mpo'uli' -a tarima kasi, apa' uma-a hewa tau ntani' -na-- toperampaki, to bengku' nono-ra, topobualo', ba hewa topesingara' paja' toei mai.
Luke 18 12 Aku', mopuasa' -a rongkani rala-na hamingku. Pai' hampobagiahampulu' ngkai hawe'ea pomporataa-ku kuwai' -koko Pue'.'
Luke 18 13 "Hiaa' topesingara' paja' toei-hawo, mokore ngkawao-i-wadi, pai' uma-i daho' ngkongoa' hi langi'. Ntora mporera' hunamu-nai, pai' na'uli': `Oo Alata'ala! Poka'ahi' -a-kuwo, tauna topojeko' toi-a!'"
Luke 18 14 Ngkai ree, napohudui Yesus lolita-na, na'uli': "Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: kanculii' -ra hi tomi, topesingara' paja' toe-imi to jadi' monoa' hi poncilo-na Alata'ala, bela to Parisi toei. Apa' hawe'ea to mpomolangko nono-ra, Pue' Ala mpodingkihi-ra. Pai' hawe'ea to mpakadingki' nono-ra, Pue' Ala mpomolangko-ra."
Luke 18 15 Hangkani, ria tauna to mpokeni ana'lei-ra hi Yesus bona najama pai' nagane' -ra. Mpohilo toe we'i, moroe-ramo ana'guru-na, mpokaroe-ra to mpokeni ana' -ra toe.
Luke 18 16 Aga Yesus mpokio' ana' toera pai' na'uli' mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Pelele' moto-ra ana' tetura tumai hi Aku', neo' -ra nitagi. Apa' tauna to hewa toe-ramo to jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua' -na.
Luke 18 17 Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: Ane uma-koi mengkoru hi Alata'ala hewa ana', uma-koi mpai' jadi' ntodea-na hi rala Kamagaua' -na."
Luke 18 18 Hangkani, hadua pangkeni to Yahudi mpekune' Yesus, na'uli': "Guru to lompe', napa to kana kubabehi bona mporata-a-kuwo katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-nae?"
Luke 18 19 Na'uli' Yesus: "Napa pai' nu'uli' tauna to lompe' -a? Uma ria ntani' -na to lompe', hadua Alata'ala-wadi.
Luke 18 20 Nu'inca moto parenta to te'uki' hi rala Atura Pue': `Neo' mobualo', neo' mepatehi, neo' manako, neo' mosabi' boa', pai' kana tabila' tina pai' tuama-ta.'"
Luke 18 21 Na'uli' tau toei: "Hawe'ea parenta tetu lau, kutuku' omea-mi ngkai kakedia' -ku."
Luke 18 22 Mpo'epe toe, na'uli' -mi Yesus: "Hanyala-pi to kana nubabehi. Pobalu' -mi hawe'ea rewa-nu pai' doi oli-na bagi-raka tokabu. Ane nubabehi hewa toe, bohe mpai' rasi' to nurata hi rala suruga. Oti toe, pai' tumai-moko mpotuku' -a."
Luke 18 23 Kana'epe-na lolita tohe'e, peda' -mi nono-na, apa' mo'ua' lia-i.
Luke 18 24 Nahilo-mi Yesus kapeda' nono-na. Toe pai' na'uli': "Mokoro rahi tauna to wori' rewa-ra mengkoru hi Alata'ala bona Hi'a jadi' Magau' -ra.
Luke 18 25 Mojoli-pi hama'a unta ntara hi wulou' jaru ngkai tauna to mo'ua' mengkoru hi Alata'ala bona Hi'a jadi' Magau' -ra."
Luke 18 26 Konce-ramo tauna to mpo'epe lolita Yesus tohe'e, ra'uli': "Ane wae-di, hema lau-damo to ma'ala mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-nae?"
Luke 18 27 Na'uli' Yesus: "Ane hante pakulea' manusia' -le, uma ami' hema. Aga nakule' moto Alata'ala mpobabehi to meliu ngkai pakulea' manusia'."
Luke 18 28 Ngkai ree, na'uli' Petrus: "Hiaa' kai', kipalahii-mi-kaina rewa-kai, pai' kituku' -ko."
Luke 18 29 Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: hema-hema to mpalahii tomi-na, tobine-na, ompi' -na, totu'a-na ba ana' -na apa' mpotuku' hawa' Alata'ala Magau' -na,
Luke 18 30 tauna toe-mi to mporata wori' ngkani hiwili-na hi dunia' toi. Pai' hi eo mpeno mporata wo'o-i katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na."
