Luke 18 31 Yesus mpokio' ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua mopahantani' pai' na'uli' -raka: "Epe-koi! Hilou-tamo tohe'i-e mpotoa' Yerusalem. Hi ria mpai' hawe'ea to ra'uki' nabi-nabi owi to mpolowa Ana' Manusia' kana madupa' hi Aku'.
Luke 18 32 Ratonu-a mpai' hi tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi. Rapopo'ore' -a, raruge', ra'uelikui,
Luke 18 33 raweba', pai' -a rapatehi. Aga hi eo katolu-na, tuwu' nculii' moto-a."
Luke 18 34 Aga hawe'ea to na'uli' toe, bate uma rapaha ana'guru-na. Apa' batua-na tewunii' -raka, uma ra'incai kahompoa lolita-na.
Luke 18 35 Mohu' -mi Yesus hi ngata Yerikho, ria hadua tauna to wero mohura hi wiwi' ohea karapi' -rapi'.
Luke 18 36 Kampo'epe-na wori' tauna liu, napekune': "Napa-die?"
Luke 18 37 Ra'uli' -ki: "Yesus to Nazaret-le liu oe-e lou!"
Luke 18 38 Mpo'epe toe we'i, pekio' -nami towero toei, na'uli': "Yesus, muli Magau' Daud! Poka'ahi' -a-kuwo!"
Luke 18 39 Tauna to momako' ri'ulu ngkai Yesus mpokaroe-i, ra'uli': "Ngkalino-ko!" Aga hangkedi' kanapesukui-na mekio', na'uli': "Muli Magau' Daud, poka'ahi' -a-kuwo!"
Luke 18 40 Ngkai ree, mentoda' -imi Yesus pai' na'uli': "Keni tumai towero toei mai!" Rakeni mpu'u-miki. Karata-na hi ree, Yesus mpekune' -i, na'uli': "Napa to nupokono kubabehi-koko?"
Luke 18 41 Natompoi' towero toei: "Pue', bona pehilo-a-kuwo!"
Luke 18 42 Na'uli' Yesus: "Ane wae, pehilo-moko! Kupaka'uri' -ko sabana pepangala' -nu hi Aku'."
Luke 18 43 Ncaliu pehilo mpu'u-imi. Ngkai ree, ntora mpotuku' Yesus-imi, pai' mpo'uli' wori' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala. Hawe'ea tauna to mpohilo kajadia' toe, mpo'une' Alata'ala-ramo.
Luke 19 1 Nto'u karata-na Yesus hi ngata Yerikho, momako' ncuu-i ntara rala ngata toe.
Luke 19 2 Hi ngata toe, ria hadua topo'ua' to mpokapalai' topesingara' paja', hanga' -na Zakheus.
Luke 19 3 Doko' -i-hawo mpohilo beiwa lence-na Yesus. Aga uma-i bisa mpohilo apa' wori' rahi tauna, bo hi'a he'e tauna to dingki'.
Luke 19 4 Jadi', pokeno-nami mpori'uluhi ntodea, pai' -i ngkahe' kaju ara bona ma'ala-i-hawo mpopanto' Yesus ane liu-ipi hi ree.
Luke 19 5 Kaliu-na Yesus hi ree, pengoa' -nami pai' na'uli': "Zakheus, pesahui mana'u! Apa' eo toe lau, kana mehani-a hi tomi-nu."
Luke 19 6 Napesahui mpu'u-mi-hawo Zakheus mana'u, pai' goe' -i mpotarima Yesus hi tomi-na.
Luke 19 7 Kapehilo-ra ntodea hilou-i Yesus hi tomi Zakheus, ngkunuti-ramo, ra'uli': "Ii, napa-di pai' mencua' hi tomi topojeko' -i-hanae!"
Luke 19 8 Bula-na Pue' Yesus hi tomi Zakheus, mokore-imi Zakheus mpo'uli' -ki: "Pue', bagi ntongo' ngkai rewa-ku kuwai' -raka tokabu, pai' hema-hema to kubagiu, kupoponculi' opo' ngkani ngkai to kubagiu-raka."
Luke 19 9 Na'uli' Yesus: "Hi eo toe lau, tauna hi tomi toi tebahaka ngkai huku' jeko' -ra, apa' Zakheus toii, muli Abraham wo'o-i-hawo.
Luke 19 10 Apa' toe-mile pai' tumai-ae, Aku' Ana' Manusia'. Tumai-a mpopali' tauna to molaa ngkai Alata'ala, pai' mpohore-ra ngkai huku' jeko' -ra."
Luke 19 11 Neo' rata-imi Yesus hi Yerusalem, toe pai' wori' tauna mpo'uli' neo' rata mpu'u-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia'. Jadi', bula ntodea mpe'epei lolita-na, na'umpui' wo'o-mi lolita-na hante hanyala lolita rapa'.
Luke 19 12 Na'uli': "Ria hadua maradika mopatuju hilou hi ngata to molaa, lou ralanti' jadi' magau' pai' nculii'.
Luke 19 13 Jadi', kako'ia-na me'ongko', mpokio' -i hampulu' pahawaa' -na pai' nawai' -ra hore-hore hampepa' doi bulawa. Na'uli' maradika toei: `Mobabalu' -koi hante doi to kuwai' -kokoi tetu lingku' -ku hilou.'
Luke 19 14 Aga hi ngata maradika toe, ria wo'o-rawo tauna to mpokahuku' -i. Pe'ongko' -na maradika tohe'e, rapahawa' suro hilou mpotuku' -i pai' mpo'uli': `Oja' -ka-kaina maradika tetu jadi' magau' -kai!'
Luke 19 15 "Aga ra'ongko' moto-i jadi' magau', pai' nculii' -imi hilou hi ngata-na. Karata-na hi ngata, nakio' -ramo pahawaa' -na mpohirua' -ki, napongincai kahangkuja-nami rasi' to rarata.
Luke 19 16 To lomo' -na rata pai' na'uli': `Magau', doi bulawa to hampepa' to nuwai' -ka, ria-mi ana' -na hampulu'.'
Luke 19 17 "Na'uli' magau' toei: `Lompe' -mi, iko pahawaa' to lompe'. Wae-pi, apa' monoa' -ko hi to hangkedi', ku'ongko' -moko jadi' topohawa' to mpohawai' hampulu' ngata.'
Luke 19 18 "Pahawaa' karodua-na rata wo'o pai' mpo'uli': `Magau', doi bulawa to hampepa' to nuwai' -ka, jadi' lima mpepa' -mi.'
Luke 19 19 "Na'uli' wo'o-mi magau' hi karodua-na tohe'ei: `Iko wo'o ku'ongko' jadi' topohawa' hi lima ngata.'
Luke 19 20 "Ngkai ree, rata wo'o-imi-hawo pahawaa' kahadua-na. Na'uli': `Oi-mi doi-nu Magau'. Kutimamahi lompe', kuputu' hante lenco.
Luke 19 21 Me'eka' -a hi Magau', apa' ku'inca kasoa-nu. Nupepae to bela-kowo hinu'a-nu, nu'ala' to uma nukarokoi.'
Luke 19 22 "Na'uli' magau' mpo'uli' -ki: `Iko pahawaa' to dada'a! Ane nu'inca kasoa-ku, ane nu'inca kampepae-ku to bela hinu'a-ku, pai' kampo'ala' -ku to uma kukarokoi,
Luke 19 23 napa pai' doi-ku uma nupopesua' hi bank, bona ane rata-apa, ku'ala' hante ana' -na!'
Luke 19 24 Oti toe, na'uli' wo'o-mi hi tauna to mokore hi ncori-na: `Ala' doi to hi tauna tetui, pai' wai' -ki to ria-ki hampulu'.'
Luke 19 25 "Ingu' -ramo to napahawa' toera, ra'uli': `Napa pai' hewa tetu, Magau'? Apa' ria-miki-hana hampulu' mpepa'!'
Luke 19 26 "Na'uli' magau': `Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: Tauna to ma'ala rasarumaka hante anu to rawai' -ki, rawai' tena-i-pidi. Tapi' tauna to uma rasarumaka, anu hangkedi' to ria hi hi'a, ra'alai' lau-i.
Luke 19 27 Pai' wae lau, keni-ramo tumai bali' -ku to mpoka'oja' -a jadi' magau' -ra. Patehi-ramo hi rehe'i bona kuhilo!'"
Luke 19 28 Ka'oti-na Yesus mpo'uli' hawe'ea toe, pomako' -nami meri'ulu ngkai doo-na hilou hi Yerusalem.
Luke 19 29 Mohu' -ramo hi ngata Betfage pai' Betania hi bulu' Zaitun, nahubui rodua ana'guru-na mako' meri'ulu.
Luke 19 30 Na'uli' -raka: "Hilou-mokoi hi ngata to tanyanyohi toe mai. Ane mesua' -pokoi hi rala ngata, nihilo mpai' hama'a ana' keledai to tehoo'. Keledai toe ko'ia hangkania rahawi'. Bongka koloro-na pai' keni-i tumai.
Luke 19 31 Ane ria tauna mpekune' -koi napa pai' nibongka-i, uli': `Apa' Pue' mparaluu-i.'"
Luke 19 32 Hilou mpu'u-ramo ana'guru-na to rodua tohe'era, pai' rarata bate hewa to na'uli' -raka Yesus.
Luke 19 33 Bula-ra mpobongka keledai toe, mepekune' -mi pue' -na: "Napa pai' nibongka keledai tetu-e?"
Luke 19 34 Ratompoi': "Apa' Pue' mparaluu-i."
Luke 19 35 Karakeni-nami hilou hi Yesus, ralampii hante baju-ra, pai' rapopehawi' -i Yesus.
Luke 19 36 Kaliu-na Yesus mpohawi' keledai tohe'e, tauna mpokodo baju-ra hi mata ohea, tanda pebila' -ra.
Luke 19 37 Mohu' -mi hi ngata Yerusalem, hi pana'ua-na hi bulu' Zaitun, hawe'ea topetuku' -na to wori' toe ntepu'u mpo'une' Alata'ala. Mogora-ra-damo nakeni kagoe' nono-ra sabana hawe'ea anu mekoncehi to rahilo.
Luke 19 38 Ra'uli' hi rala pe'une' -ra: Pue' Ala mpogane' Magau' to tumai mpokeni hanga' -na!" Une' -imi Pue' Ala to hi suruga, apa' nawai' -tamo kalompea'."
Luke 19 39 Ngkai ree, ba hangkuja dua to Parisi to hi olo' tauna to wori' mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Guru, tagi-ramo ana'guru-nu bona neo' -ra mpo'uli' hewa tetu!"
Luke 19 40 Na'uli' Yesus: "Uma-e'! Apa' ane mengkalino-ra ana'guru-ku, watu toe lau-ramo mpai' to mogora mpo'une' -a."
Luke 19 41 Kamoo-mohua' -imi Yesus hi Yerusalem, duu' -na mpohilo-i ngata toe. Kageo' -nami mpokageoi' ngata toe.
Luke 19 42 Na'uli': "Mpe'ahii' -koi to Yerusalem! Uma mowo kalompe' -na ane ke ni'inca napa to ngkeni-kokoi kalompea' tuwu' hi eo toe lau. Aga hawe'ea toe teleru ngkai mata-ni.
Luke 19 43 Rata mpai' tempo-na, bali' -ni mpanga'ei ngata-ni, ratipuhi ntololikia hante wala, duu' -na uma-pi ria ohea metibo'.
Luke 19 44 Raropuhi mpai' ngata-ni hante hawe'ea ihi' -na, duu' -na uma-pi ria watu to bate pomeduncu-na. Apa' uma-koina nisaile' karata-na Pue' Ala doko' mpotulungi-koi."
Luke 19 45 Oti toe, Yesus mesua' hi berewe Tomi Alata'ala pai' -i mpopalai tauna to mobabalu' hi ree.
Luke 19 46 Na'uli' -raka: "Hi rala Buku Tomoroli', Alata'ala mpo'uli' hewa toi: `Tomi-ku, tomi posampayaa.' Hiaa' koi' -koina, niponcawa tomi toperampaki-di!"
Luke 19 47 Butu eo-na Yesus metudui' hi Tomi Alata'ala. Imam pangkeni hante guru agama pai' pangkeni to Yahudi ntani' -na mpali' akala-ra doko' mpatehi-i,
Luke 19 48 aga uma ria ohea-ra mpobabehi anu hi nono-ra, apa' lutu-ramo ntodea mpe'epei lolita-na.
Luke 20 1 Rala-na ha'eo Yesus metudui' pai' mparata Kareba Lompe' hi wori' tauna hi Tomi Alata'ala. Muu-mule' rata-ramo imam pangkeni hante guru agama pai' pangkeni to Yahudi ntani' -na. Ra'uli' mpo'uli' -ki Yesus:
Luke 20 2 "Uli' -kakai pe' ngkaiapa huraa-nu mpobabehi hawe'ea tetu hi Tomi Alata'ala! Hema to mpowai' -ko kuasa tetu-e?"
Luke 20 3 Na'uli' Yesus: "Aku', ria wo'o-kuwo pompekunea' -ku hi koi'.
Luke 20 4 Uli' -ka pe', ngkaiapa kuasa-na Yohanes Topeniu' mponiu' tauna? Ngkai Alata'ala-di, ba ngkai manusia' -di?"
Luke 20 5 Momepololitai-ramo pangkeni to Yahudi toera, ra'uli': "Beiwa-tale' mpotompoi' -ie? Ane ta'uli' ngkai Alata'ala kuasa-na, na'uli' mpai': `Ane wae, napa pai' uma-i nipangala'?'
Luke 20 6 Hiaa' ane ta'uli' ngkai manusia' -wadi kuasa-na, rawatuhi-ta mpai' ntodea toera lau, apa' hawe'ea-ra mpo'uli' Yohanes hadua nabi."
Luke 20 7 Toe pai' ratompoi': "Uma ki'incai kangkaiapa kuasa-na."
Luke 20 8 Toe pai' na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Ane wae, uma wo'o-kuwo ku'uli' -kokoi kangkaiapa kuasa-ku mpobabehi toe lau!"
Luke 20 9 Oti toe, Yesus mpololitai ntodea, mpo'uli' -raka lolita rapa' tohe'i: "Ria tau hadua mpohu'ai bonea-na hante anggur, oti toe napewai' bonea-na rapobago hi ba hangkuja dua tauna, pai' hilou-imi hi ngata to molaa, pai' mahae-i tida hi ria.
Luke 20 10 Rata-mi tempo mpohopu' wua' anggur, napahawa' hadua batua-na hilou mperapi' bagia-na hi tompodoo bonea-na toera. Tapi' tompodoo bonea-na toera mpopao' suro tetu pai' -i rapopalai mara.
Luke 20 11 Oti toe, pue' bonea toei mpopahawa' tena wo'o-pi hadua batua. Aga rapao' wo'o-i-wadi-hawo, ralibui' pai' rapopalai mara.
Luke 20 12 Oti toe wo'o, nahubui tena batua katolu-na. Aga raserohi wo'o-i-wadi pai' rapetadi hi mali bonea.
Luke 20 13 "Ngkai ree, na'uli' -mi pue' bonea toei: `Napa-le' to kubabehi-e? Agina ana' -ku to kupe'ahi' moto lau-mi kupahawa' hilou, apa' bate rapengkorui-ile mpai'.'
Luke 20 14 "Ntaa' we'i, karahilo-na tompodoo bonea toera ana' pue' bonea tohe'ei, mohawa' -ramo, ra'uli': `Etu-mi tumai ana' -na! Hi'a mpai' to jadi' pue' bonea tohe'i-e. Kita tapatehi-i bona bonea-na toi kita' -mi pue' -na.'
Luke 20 15 Ngkai ree, radii' -imi hilou hi mali bonea pai' -i rapatehi. "Jadi', napa mpai' to nababehi pue' bonea toei hi tauna to mpodoo bonea-na?
Luke 20 16 Bate tumai-ile mpopatehi-ra, pai' nawai' bonea-na hi tau ntani' -na." Kara'epe-na ntodea lolita rapa' tohe'e, ra'uli' -mi: "Neo' mpu'u-kona jadi' hewa tetu-e'!"
Luke 20 17 Yesus mponaa-ra pai' na'uli' -raka: "Hiaa' toe-mile batua-na walatu to hi rala Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli': `Watu to ratadi topowangu tomi, watu toe lau-mi to jadi' poko parawatu.'
Luke 20 18 Hewa kura to monawu' hi watu mopengka, hewa kura to napitihi watu moreja', hewa toe wo'o mpai' tauna to mposapuaka-a."
Luke 20 19 Guru agama pai' imam pangkeni mpo'inca kahira' -na to natoa' Yesus hante lolita rapa' -na toe we'i. Toe pai' ria-mi nono-ra doko' mpohoko' -i hi jaa toe wo'o. Aga uma-ra daho', apa' mpoka'eka' -ra ntodea.
Luke 20 20 Jadi' rapali' loga to lompe'. Mpopahawa' -ra tauna hilou mpolelemata-i. Tauna toera, ntani' hewa tauna to monoa' nono-ra, tapi' patuju-ra mpo'opa kasala' lolita-na, bona rapakilu-i hi gubernur.
Luke 20 21 Karata-ra hi Yesus, ra'uli' -mi to rapahawa' toera: "Guru, ki'inca hawe'ea lolita-nu pai' tudui' -nu makono omea. Metudui' -ko hante kalonto' -lonto' -na mpo'uli' napa konoa Pue' Ala hi manusia', pai' uma-ko mpelence tauna.
Luke 20 22 Jadi', toe pai' kiperapi' bona nu'uli' -kakai Guru: ntuku' atura agama-ta, ba ma'ala moto-ta mpobayari paja' hi Kaisar, ba uma-di?"
Luke 20 23 Yesus mpo'inca pepanawu' -ra. Toe pai' na'uli' -raka:
Luke 20 24 "Popohiloi-a ulu doi hampepa'! Lence hema pai' hanga' hema to hi doi tetu-e?" Ratompoi': "Lence pai' hanga' Kaisar."
Luke 20 25 Ngkai ree, na'uli' -mi Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Ane wae-di, wai' -ki Kaisar napa to kasipato' -na rawai' -ki Kaisar, pai' wai' -ki Alata'ala napa to kasipato' -na rawai' -ki Alata'ala."
Luke 20 26 Ka'omea-na madagi-ramo bali' Yesus toera. Uma raruai' nau' hanyalaa sala' lolita-na hi nyanyoa ntodea. Konce-ra mpo'epe tompoi' -na, toe pai' ngkalino-ramo.
Luke 20 27 Ba hangkuja dua tauna to mpotuku' tudui' to Saduki rata hi Yesus. To Saduki toera, pangkeni agama Yahudi to ncapuaka tauna to mate tuwu' nculii' hi eo mpeno. Karata to Saduki toera, ra'uli' -ki Yesus:
Luke 20 28 "Guru, nabi Musa mpo'uki' hi rala buku atura hewa toi: ane hadua tomane mate hiaa' uma-ki ria ana' -na, pudupuhe-na kana mpotobine balu-na, bona ria-ki-hawo muli tomate toei.
Luke 20 29 Jadi', ria pitu ntali ompi', paka' tomane. To ulumua' motobinei, mate-i hante uma ria ana' -na.
Luke 20 30 Tu'ai-na mpotobine balu-na, aga mate wo'o-i-wadi, ko'ia napoka'alai mo'anai'.
Luke 20 31 Wae oa' -mi to jadi' hi katolu-na duu' -na hi kapitu-na. Mate omea-ra hante uma ria ana' -ra.
Luke 20 32 Ka'omea-na mate wo'o-imi-hawo tobine toei.
Luke 20 33 Jadi', hi eo mpeno, ane tuwu' nculii' mpu'u-di hawe'ea tomate-e, hema-ramo mpai' pue' tobine toei, apa' pitu-ramo mpotobine-i."
Luke 20 34 Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Tauna hi dunia' toi motobinei pai' motomanei.
Luke 20 35 Aga tauna to napotuwu' nculii' Pue' Ala pai' to masipato' mporata bagia hi dunia' to bo'u mpai', uma-rapa-hana motobinei ba motomanei.
Luke 20 36 Apa' tuwu' -ra hewa tuwu' mala'eka, uma-rapa mate. Ana' Alata'ala-ramo, apa' napotuwu' nculii' -ramo Alata'ala.
Luke 20 37 "Ane katuwu' -ra nculii' tomate-e, nabi Musa moto to mpakanoto katuwu' -ra nculii'. Hi rala jarita julumpu to jela', Musa mpokahangai' Pue' Ala hewa toi: `Alata'ala to napue' Abraham, to napue' Ishak, pai' to napue' Yakub.'
Luke 20 38 Jadi', ngkai lolita-na nabi Musa toe, monoto-mi ta'inca katuwu' -ra moto Abraham, Ishak pai' Yakub. Apa' bela tauna to mate to mepue' hi Alata'ala, tauna to tuwu' -hana to mpopue' -i. Apa' hi Alata'ala hawe'ea tauna tuwu'."
Luke 20 39 Oti toe, ba hangkuja dua guru agama mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Lompe' lia petompoi' -nu Guru."
Luke 20 40 Ngkai ree, uma-rapa daho' mepekune' ba napa-napa hi Yesus.
Luke 20 41 Ngkai ree, mepekune' wo'o-imi-hawo Yesus mpo'uli' -raka guru agama toera: "Beiwa pai' ra'uli' Magau' Topetolo' muli-na Magau' Daud?
Luke 20 42  
Luke 20 43  
Luke 20 44 Hiaa' bo Daud moto-hawo mpokahangai' -i Pue' -na. Hi rala Buku Rona' na'uli': Pue' Ala mpo'uli' -ki Pue' -ku: `Mohura-moko hi mali ngka'ana-ku duu' -na kupopengkoru hawe'ea bali' -nu hi Iko.'
Luke 20 45 Bula tauna mpe'epei lolita-na Yesus toe we'i, napololitai ana'guru-na, na'uli':
Luke 20 46 "Pelompehi-koi, neo' -koi mpenau' kehi-ra guru agama. Apa' goe' -ra modao' mpopake' baju to moloe, goe' -ra ane tauna hi wiwi' karajaa motingkua' mpotabe-ra. Goe' -ra rapopohura hi pohuraa karabilaa' hi tomi posampayaa, goe' -ra ane rapopohura-ra hi pohuraa to lompe' hi posusaa'.
Luke 20 47 Mpobagiu-ra tobine tobalu pai' rahagoi tomi-ra. Pai' -ra mpowunii' kadada'a gau' -ra tohe'e hante mosampaya rapomoloe-loe. Huku' -ra motomo lia mpai'."
Luke 21 1 Hi rala Tomi Alata'ala, Yesus mpohilo topo'ua' mpopuna' doi hi rala peti' pompunaa' doi pepue'.
Luke 21 2 Mpohilo wo'o-i hadua tobalu to mpe'ahii' tuwu' -na mpopuna' rompepa' doi ngkala.
Luke 21 3 Na'uli' Yesus: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: tobalu to mpe'ahii' tuwu' -na tohe'e mai, meliu pewai' -na ngkai pewai' hawe'ea tauna toera lau.
Luke 21 4 Apa' hira' mewai' ngkai labi ka'uaa' -ra. Tapi' tobine toei, nau' hewa apa-mi kampe'ahii' -na, napewai' omea-mi-hana to ria hi hi'a, to naparaluu-hawo hi katuwu' -na."
Luke 21 5 Nto'u toe, ria tauna mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Lompe' lia Tomi Alata'ala toi, apa' rawangu hante watu to ncola pai' rarampai hante rewa to rapopepue' hi Pue' Ala." Toe pai' na'uli' Yesus:
Luke 21 6 "Rata mpai' tempo-na hawe'ea to nihilo toe lau ragero, uma-pi mpai' ria hamehaa' watu to bate pomeduncu-na."
Luke 21 7 Ngkai ree, mepekune' -ra ana'guru-na mpekune' -i: "Guru, nto'uma mpai' kadupa' -na to nu'uli' toe-e we'i? Pai' napa mpai' to jadi' tanda ane neo' madupa' -pi?"
Luke 21 8 Na'uli' Yesus: "Pelompehi, neo' -koi ma'ala rabagiu. Apa' wori' mpai' tauna to mehupa' to mpo'uli' kahira' -na Magau' Topetolo'. Ria wo'o to mpo'uli' karata-na mpu'u Eo Kiama. Aga neo' nituku' -ra.
Luke 21 9 Neo' wo'o-koi me'eka' mpo'epe kareba to mpo'uli' wori' tauna manga'e pai' mpo'ewa topoparenta. Apa' hawe'ea tohe'e kana jadi' mperi'ulu. Tapi' ko'ia-hawo rata mpu'u-mi kahudua dunia'."
Luke 21 10 Ngkai ree, Yesus mpokaliliu lolita-na, na'uli': "Hi eo toe mpai', wori' ngata mosipanga'ei, magau' hadua mpo'ewa magau' kahadua-na.
Luke 21 11 Ria mpai' linu bohe, pai' hiapa-apa ria haki' ropu' pai' oro'. Pai' hi langi' ria tanda bohe to mewulungahi.
Luke 21 12 Aga kako'ia-na hawe'ea toe jadi', koi' mpai' rahoko' pai' rabalinai'. Rapakilu-koi hi rala tomi posampayaa, pai' -koi ratarungku'. Rabua' -koi hi magau' pai' hi topoparenta sabana petuku' -ni hi Aku'.
Luke 21 13 Nto'u toe mpai', ria loga-ni mpo'uli' -raka pepangala' -ni hi Aku'.
Luke 21 14 Pakaroho ami' -mi nono-ni, neo' -koi mingki' mpekiri ncala' ba beiwa mpai' tompoi' -ni.
Luke 21 15 Aku' moto-damo mpai' to mpowai' -koi petompoi' to monoto, alaa-na uma ria haduaa ngkai bali' -ni to mpokule' mpobaro ba mposapuaka napa to ni'uli'.
Luke 21 16  
Luke 21 17 Nto'u toe mpai', hawe'ea tauna mpokahuku' -koi sabana petuku' -ni hi Aku'. Ntahawe' totu'a-ni, ompi' -ni, posantina-ni, pai' ema' -ni mpewai' -koi hi bali' -ni. Hantongo' -koi mpai' rapatehi.
Luke 21 18 Aga kakoo-kono-na uma moto-koi moapa. Nau' hangkaho wuluwoo' -ni uma mpai' ria to moronto.
Luke 21 19 Ane uma mogego' pepangala' -ni hi Aku', bate mporata-koi katuwua' to lompe'.
Luke 21 20 "Ane nihilo-damo ngata Yerusalem toi ratipuhi tantara bali', ni'inca-mi ka'uma-napi mahae Yerusalem ragero.
Luke 21 21 Nto'u toe mpai', tauna to mo'oha' hi Yudea, agina metibo' -ra hilou hi bulu' -na. Tauna to hi rala ngata agina metibo' ngkai rala ngata. Pai' tauna to hi mali ngata neo' -pi leba' mesua' hi rala ngata.
Luke 21 22 Apa' tempo toe mpai', tempo pehukua' Alata'ala, bona madupa' -mi hawe'ea to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli'.
Luke 21 23 Mpe'ahii' -ra mpai' tobine to nto'u-ra motina'i pai' to mpentii' ana' -ra hi tempo toe, apa' mokoro petibo' -ra. Apa' ngata toi narumpa' silaka bohe, pai' Pue' Ala mpohuku' pue' ngata.
Luke 21 24 Ria-ra mpai' to jadi' konia' piho'. Ria-ra to ratawani pai' rapatau' hi humalili' dunia'. Pai' ngata Yerusalem toi ralisa tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi, duu' -na hudu tempo to napakatantu-raka Pue' Ala.
Luke 21 25 "Nto'u toe mpai', ria tanda hi eo, hi wula pai' hi betue'. Hawe'ea manusia' mokaratu nono-ra pai' ingu' mpo'epe pomoni pai' pojago tahi'.
Luke 21 26 Ria mpai' tauna to mate ngkokore nakeni kawulunga-ra, mpohilo to jadi' hi humalili' dunia'. Apa' hawe'ea anu to mobaraka' hi langi' ralengo.
Luke 21 27 Nto'u toe-damo mpai', hawe'ea tauna mpohilo-a, Aku' Ana' Manusia', mana'u tumai hi rala limu'. Uma mowo pehini-ku pai' kabaraka' -ku nto'u toe.
Luke 21 28 Ane hawe'ea toe ntepu'u majadi', pakaroho-mi nono-ni pai' mengoa' -mokoi, apa' neo' rata-mi tempo-na rabahaka-koi ngkai kaparia-ni."
Luke 21 29 Yesus mpololitai ana'guru-na hante lolita rapa' tohe'i, na'uli': "Petonoi-koi kaju ara pai' kaju-kaju ntani' -na wo'o.
Luke 21 30 Ane nihilo-damo mela' -mi rau-na, ni'inca-mi ka'uma-napi mahae mara eo.
Luke 21 31 Wae wo'o ane nihilo-damo kajadia' toe we'i lou, ni'inca-mi ka'uma-napi mahae Alata'ala jadi' Magau' mpu'u-mi hi dunia'.
Luke 21 32 "Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: hawe'ea toe we'i bate madupa' kako'ia-na mate omea tauna to tuwu' tempo toi.
Luke 21 33 Langi' pai' dunia' mogero moto mpai'. Tapi' lolita-ku bate-bate-na duu' kahae-hae-na.
Luke 21 34 "Mo'inga' -inga' -koi, neo' -koi sese' ntora mosusa' pai' nginu palangu-langu, ba ntora mpenonoi katuwu' -ni hi dunia', alaa-na lempe' moto-koi hi eo karata-ku. Apa' rata ncorobaa-a mpai'.
Luke 21 35 Karata-ku mpai' mporumpa' hawe'ea tauna hi dunia' hewa tewo' mpowoko' wulehu'.
Luke 21 36 Mo'inga' -inga' -koi pai' tida mekakae hi Pue' Ala, bona moroho-koi ntaha hawe'ea kaparia to neo' jadi' toe, duu' -na mpohirua' -ka Aku' Ana' Manusia'."
Luke 21 37 Hi eo-na, Yesus metudui' hi Tomi Alata'ala. Hi bengi-na, hilou-i hi mali ngata Yerusalem, pai' -i turu hi Bulu' Zaitun.
Luke 21 38 Butu mepulo-na ntodea morumpu hi Tomi Alata'ala doko' mpo'epe tudui' -na.
Luke 22 1 Mohu' -mi eo bohe to Yahudi to rahanga' Posusa' Roti to Uma Raragii, to rahanga' wo'o Eo Paskah.
Luke 22 2 Nto'u toe, imam pangkeni pai' guru agama mpali' ohea-ra ke mpatehi bongo Yesus, apa' me'eka' -ra mpoka'eka' ntodea.
Luke 22 3 Ngkai ree, Magau' Anudaa' mesua' hi rala nono Yudas, to rahanga' wo'o Iskariot, hadua ngkai ana'guru-na Yesus to hampulu' rodua.
Luke 22 4 Toe pai' hilou-imi mpololitai imam pangkeni hante kapala' polisi Tomi Alata'ala, ba beiwa akala-na mpobalu' Yesus hi hira'.
Luke 22 5 Goe' -ramo mpo'epe lolita Yudas toe, ra'uli' -ki: "Ane nutonu Yesus hi kai', kiwai' -ko doi."
Luke 22 6 Na'io' -mi Yudas, pai' ngkai ree napali' loga to lompe' mpobalu' Yesus hi bali' -na hante uma ra'incai ntodea.
Luke 22 7 Rata-mi tempo-na Posusa' Roti to Uma Raragii. Pai' eo to lomo' -na hi rala posusa' tohe'e, eo posumalea' bima to rakoni' hi Eo Paskah.
Luke 22 8 Yesus mpohubui Petrus pai' Yohanes, na'uli' -raka: "Hilou-mokoi mporodo-taka pongkoni' Paskah-ta."
Luke 22 9 Rapekune' -i: "Hiapa Pue' nupokono kipomporodoi-e?"
Luke 22 10 Na'uli' -raka: "Ane mesua' -koi mpai' hi rala ngata, hirua' -koi hante hadua tomane to ngkeni pontomua' oti ntomu'. Tuku' -i rata hi tomi pesuaa' -na.
Luke 22 11 Rata hi tomi pesuaa' -na, uli' -ki pue' tomi hewa toi: `Na'uli' Guru: Hiapa-kuwo pobabehia-ku Posusa' Paskah hante ana'guru-ku?'
Luke 22 12 Pue' tomi toei mpai' mpotudo' -kokoi hameha' kamar to bohe hi lolo-na. Kamar toe teporodo ami' -mi, hono' -mi rewa-na. Hi retu-mi mpai' niporodo pongkoni' Paskah-ta."
Luke 22 13 Hilou mpu'u-ramo Petrus pai' Yohanes, pai' rarata mpu'u-mi hewa to na'uli' -raka Yesus, pai' -ra mporodo-mi pongkoni' Paskah.
Luke 22 14 Karata-na mpu'u-mi tempo ngkoni' pongkoni' Paskah tohe'e, mohura-imi Yesus hante suro-na hi tomi toe.
Luke 22 15 Na'uli' -raka: "Doko' lia-a ngkoni' dohe-ni hi Eo Paskah toi, kako'ia-ku mporata kaparia.
Luke 22 16 Apa' bona ni'inca: uma-apa ngkoni' pongkoni' Paskah to hewa toi, duu' -na madupa' mpu'u-mi batua-na posusa' toi nto'u Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia'."
Luke 22 17 Oti toe, Yesus mpo'ala' sangkiri' to ihia' anggur, na'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala, pai' na'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Ala' -mi tohe'i pai' nibagi-bagi.
Luke 22 18 Apa' bona ni'inca: ntepu'u ngkai wae lau, uma-apa nginu anggur duu' -na rata mpu'u-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia'."
Luke 22 19 Oti toe, na'ala' -mi roti, pai' ka'oti-nai mpo'uli' tarima kasi hi Pue' Ala, napihe-pihe pai' natonu-miraka, na'uli': "Roti to kutonu-kokoi toi, toi-mi woto-ku ((to kutonu mpotolo' -koi. Babehi-mokoi ada toi bona mpokiwoi-a."
Luke 22 20 Wae wo'o, ka'oti-ra ngkoni', na'ala' sangkiri' to ihia' anggur pai' na'uli' -raka: "Ihi' sangkiri' toi mpobatuai pojanci Alata'ala to bo'u, to mpoposidai' Alata'ala pai' manusia'. Pojanci toe, rapadupa' hante raa' -ku, to rabowo mpai' ane mate-a mpotolo' -koi.))
Luke 22 21 "Aga hilo pe', tauna to mpobalu' -a mpai', ria-imi hi rehe'i lau, ngkoni' dohe-ku toi-e!
Luke 22 22 Aku' Ana' Manusia' bate kana mate hewa to napakatantu Alata'ala. Aga mpe'ahii' tauna to mpobalu' -a tetui!"
Luke 22 23 Kara'epe-na ana'guru-na toe, momepekune' -ramo ba hema-ra mpai' to mpobabehi hewa toe.
Luke 22 24 Ngkai ree, momehono' -ramo ana'guru-na Yesus, ba hema-ra to meliu kabohe pangka' -ra.
Luke 22 25 Toe pai' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Ane hi tauna to uma mpo'incai Alata'ala, uma mowo kasoa-na magau' mpohawai' ntodea. Pai' tauna to bohe pangka' -ra doko' rahanga' `to mpotiroi ntodea.'
Luke 22 26 Aga koi', neo' hewa tetu! Timali-na lau-di. Hema-koi to meliu kabohe pangka' -na kana mo'ingku hewa to kedi' lia tuwu' -na. Pai' tauna to mehawai' kana mo'ingku hewa hadua pahawaa'.
Luke 22 27 Kupekune' -koi ulu: hema to meliu kabohe pangka' -na? To mohura ngkoni' -di, ba to metonui-di? Tantu tauna to mohura. Hiaa' ohe'i-a hi laintongo' -ni hewa tauna to mpotonui-koi.
Luke 22 28 "Koi' tohe'i-e lau, ria oa' -koi dohe-ku hi rala hawe'ea kasusaa' -ku.
Luke 22 29 Jadi', hewa Tuama-ku mpowai' -a kuasa moparenta, wae wo'o Aku' mpowai' -koi kuasa moparenta.
Luke 22 30 Toe pai' goe' wo'o-ko-koiwo mpai' ngkoni' pai' nginu dohe-ku hi rala Kamagaua' -ku ane jadi' Magau' -apa mpai'. Pai' mohura moto-koi mpai' hi pohuraa to hampulu' romeha', mpoparentai to Israel to hampulu' rontina."
Luke 22 31 Oti toe, Pue' Yesus mpololitai Simon Petrus, na'uli': "Ee', Simon! Epe: Magau' Anudaa' rawai' loga mposori-koi omea. Hewa pae to ratapi, hewa toe wo'o mpai' kagaga-na pesori to mporumpa' -koi.
Luke 22 32 Aga kuposampayai ami' -moko Simon, bona neo' lelu' pepangala' -nu. Jadi', ane monoto nculii' mpai' nono-nu, iko kana mporohoi nono doo-nu."
Luke 22 33 Na'uli' Petrus: "Pue', nau' ratarungku' -a mpai' ba paiana rapatehi-a dohe-nu, sadia moto-a mpotuku' -ko!"
Luke 22 34 Na'uli' Yesus: "Petrus, bona nu'inca: kako'ia-na turua' manu' bengi toe mpai' lau, mpolia' tolu ngkani-moko mposapu kanu'inca-ku."
Luke 22 35 Oti toe Yesus mpololitai-ra, na'uli': "Nto'u kakuhubui-ni wengi hilou ngkeni Kareba Lompe', uma-koi kupiliu mpokeni karepe' doi ba boku ba sapatu'. Ha ria-mokoi nakakurai' ba napa-napa-e?"
Luke 22 36 Ratompoi': "Uma-hawo." Na'uli' Yesus: "Aga hewa toe lau, hema-koi to ria doi-ni ba boku-ni kana nikeni. Pai' hema-koi to uma ria piho' -ni, pobalu' baju-ni nipope'oli piho'.
Luke 22 37 Apa' ria lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli': `Magau' Topetolo' mpai' rapohewa tauna to dada'a.' Pai' napa to te'uki' toe kana madupa' hi Aku'. Apa' napa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' to mpolowa-a, neo' madupa' mpu'u-mi wae lau."
Luke 22 38 Ra'uli' ana'guru-na: "Pue', ohe'i moto piho' romata." Na'uli' Yesus: "Wae-mi."
Luke 22 39 Oti toe, malai-imi Yesus ngkai rala ngata, pai' hewa kabiasaa-na hilou-imi hi Bulu' Zaitun, pai' ana'guru-na hilou wo'o dohe-na.
Luke 22 40 Karata-ra hi ria, na'uli' mpo'uli' -raka: "Mosampaya-mokoi bona neo' -koi mporata pesori."
Luke 22 41 Oti toe, pai' hilou-i molaa hala' ngkai hira', pai' -i mowilingkudu mosampaya.
Luke 22 42 Na'uli': "Tuama-ku, ane dota-ko, wi'iha-ka-kuwo kaparia to neo' mporumpa' -a tohe'i. Aga bela konoa-ku Aku' to jadi', agina konoa-nu Iko moto." ((
Luke 22 43 Ngkai ree, mehupa' -mi hadua mala'eka ngkai suruga mporohoi-i.
Luke 22 44 Hangkedi' kanahuduwukui-na mosampaya, apa' pepa mpu'u na'epe. Ini' -na tudo' hi tana' hewa raa'.))
Luke 22 45 Oti mosampaya, mokore-imi hilou nculii' hi ana'guru-na. Narata-ra bula-ra leta', nakeni kasusa' nono-ra.
Luke 22 46 Na'uli' -raka: "Napa-di pai' leta' -koie! Memata-mokoi pai' mosampaya bona neo' -koi mporata pesori."
Luke 22 47 Bula-na Yesus mololita-pidi, muu-mule' rata-mi tauna hampodooa. Yudas, hadua ngkai ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua, hi'a-mi to mpakeni-ra. Karata-ra hi ree, hilou-imi Yudas mpomohui' Yesus, doko' natabe-i hante me'eki ntuku' ada-ra to Yahudi.
Luke 22 48 Aga Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Ee' Yudas, ha hante petabe-nu tetu-tanoe nupobalu' -a, Aku' Ana' Manusia' -e!"
Luke 22 49 Karahilo-na ana'guru-na napa to neo' jadi', ra'uli': "Pue', ki'ewa-ramo hante piho'!"
Luke 22 50 Ngkai ree, hadua ngkai ana'guru-na mpotime batua Imam Bohe, bela mpoholu tilinga ka'ana-na.
Luke 22 51 Na'uli' Yesus: "Neo' -pi!" Pai' najama tilinga-na napaka'uri' -ki.
Luke 22 52 Oti toe, Yesus mpololitai-ra imam pangkeni pai' polisi Tomi Alata'ala hante pangkeni to Yahudi to tumai mpohoko' -i. Na'uli' -raka: "Ha toperampaki-a toi-e, pai' mingki' tumai-koi ntali piho' pai' sumampu-e!
Luke 22 53 Butu eo-na ria lalau-a dohe-ni hi Tomi Alata'ala, tapi' uma-koi hema to dungku pale-ni hi Aku' nto'u toe. Tempo mobengi-damo pai' lako' daho' -koi mpohoko' -a. Toi-mi tempo-ni koi', pai' tempo-na magau' kabengia!"
Luke 22 54 Ngkai ree, rahoko' mpu'u-imi, pai' -i rakeni hilou hi tomi Imam Bohe. Petrus metuku' ngkawao-wadi.
Luke 22 55 Hi laintongo' berewe, rapobaa apu raponerui, pai' Petrus hilou wo'o-hawo mohura dohe-ra mpotololiki apu.
Luke 22 56 Hadua tobine topobago hi tomi Imam Bohe mpohilo Petrus bula-na moneru. Napelence pai' na'uli': "Tau tetui, hadua doo-na Yesus!"
Luke 22 57 Nasapu Petrus, na'uli': "Uma-kuna ku'incai-i!"
Luke 22 58 Uma mahae ngkai ree, kahadua-na mpohilo Petrus pai' na'uli' -ki: "Iko wo'o-mi hadua doo-ra ngone!" Na'uli' wo'o Petrus: "Uma! Bela aku'."
Luke 22 59 Ba ria hajaa ngkai ree, hadua wo'o-mi mpo'uli': "Bate hi'a mpu'u-di doo-nae, apa' to Galilea wo'o-i-hawo!"
Luke 22 60 Na'uli' Petrus: "Napa to nu'uli' tetu, uma-kuna ku'incai!" Bula-na Petrus mololita-pidi, turua' -mi manu',
Luke 22 61 pai' Pue' me'ili' mponaa-i. Ngkai ree, nakiwoi-mi lolita-na Pue' to mpo'uli' -ki: "Kako'ia-na turua' manu' bengi mpai', mpolia' tolu ngkani-moko mposapu kanu'inca-ku."
Luke 22 62 Palai-nami Petrus hilou hi mali-na, pai' -i geo' ngkai kapeda' nono-na.
Luke 22 63 Tauna to mpodongo Yesus mpopo'ore' -i pai' mpohopo' -i.
Luke 22 64 Raputu' lio-na bona neo' -i pehilo, pai' -i rapekune': "Ee nabi! Pe'uli' pe' ba hema to mpohopo' -koe!"
Luke 22 65 Wori' wo'o-pidi lolita peruge' -ra mporuge' -i.
Luke 22 66 Kamobaja-na, hawe'ea imam pangkeni pai' guru agama hante pangkeni to Yahudi ntani' -na moromu, pai' Yesus rakeni hi nyanyoa-ra.
Luke 22 67 Ra'uli' topohura toera mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Uli' -kakai hi rehe'i, ha Iko mpu'u-mi Magau' Topetolo' -e?" Na'uli' Yesus: "Nau' ku'uli' -kokoi, bate uma-le nipangalai' -e.
Luke 22 68 Pai' ane Aku' mepekune' hi koi', bate uma-le nitompoi' -ae.
Luke 22 69 Aga ngkai wae-e lau, Aku' Ana' Manusia' mohura pai' moparenta hi mali ngka'ana Alata'ala to Mobaraka'."
Luke 22 70 Ra'uli' wo'o-mi topohura toera: "Ane wae-di, Ana' Alata'ala mpu'u-ko?" Na'uli' Yesus: "Wae mpu'u-di, hewa to ni'uli' tetu-e."
Luke 22 71 Ngkai ree, ra'uli' -mi: "Uma-pi mingki' ria sabi'! Ta'epe moto-mi ngkai wiwi-na kasalaa' -na!"
Luke 23 1 Oti toe, mokore-ramo hawe'ea topohura toera pai' Yesus rakeni hilou hi Gubernur Pilatus.
Luke 23 2 Karata-ra hi ria, rapakilu-imi, ra'uli': "Tau toii kirata bula-na mpopanawu' ntodea! Na'uli' -raka neo' mpobayari paja' hi Kaisar. Pai' na'uli' wo'o, Hi'a-mi Kristus, hadua magau'."
Luke 23 3 Jadi', mepekune' Pilatus hi Yesus: "Ha Iko mpu'u-mi Magau' to Yahudi-e?" Na'uli' Yesus: "Wae mpu'u, hewa to nu'uli' tetu-e."
Luke 23 4 Ngkai ree, na'uli' Pilatus hi imam pangkeni pai' hi ntodea: "Uma-kuna kuruai' sala' -na tau toii."
Luke 23 5 Tapi' rajojo lau-mi mpo'uli': "Na'ukei' ntodea hante tudui' -na, hobo' hi tana' to Yahudi. Lomo' -na hi Galilea-i, hiaa' wae lau rata-imi hi rehe'i."
Luke 23 6 Kana'epe-na Pilatus tohe'e, mepekune' -i: "Ha to Galilea-i?"
Luke 23 7 Ratompoi': "Io', to Galilea-i-hawo." Mpo'epe toe, Pilatus mpohubui tauna mpokeni Yesus hilou hi Magau' Herodes, apa' Herodes toei topoparenta hi tana' Galilea. Pai' nto'u toe, hi Yerusalem wo'o-i-hawo Herodes.
Luke 23 8 Goe' lia-imi Herodes mpohilo Yesus, apa' mahae-imi mpo'epe tauna mpotompo'wiwi-i, pai' doko' nahilo-i. Nasarumaka, Yesus mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi bona nahilo.
Luke 23 9 Toe pai' wori' pompekunea' -na hi Yesus, aga Yesus uma winihi.
Luke 23 10 Imam pangkeni pai' guru agama ria wo'o-ra hi ree, karapo' -damo lolita-ra mpopakilu Yesus hi Herodes.
Luke 23 11 Oti toe, Herodes hante tantara-na mpopo'ore' pai' mporuge' Yesus. Raheai-i hante pohea magau', pai' rakeni nculii' -i hilou hi Pilatus.
Luke 23 12 Hi eo tohe'e momekalompei' -ramo Herodes pai' Pilatus, hiaa' ri'ulu mosisala-ra.
Luke 23 13 Ngkai ree, Pilatus mporumpu hawe'ea imam pangkeni pai' totu'a ngata hante ntodea,
Luke 23 14 pai' na'uli' -raka: "Tau toii nikeni tumai, ni'uli' mpopanawu' -i ntodea. Kuparesa' -imi hi nyanyoa-ni omea, aga uma ria kuruai' hanyalaa gau' -na to dada'a hewa to nipakilu-ki.
Luke 23 15 Wae wo'o-hawo pomporata-na Herodes, apa' napoponculi' -imi hi aku'. Tau toii, uma-i mpobabehi ba napa-napa to masipato' rahuku' mate-ki.
Luke 23 16 Jadi', kuweba' -i-wadi pai' kubahaka-i." ((
Luke 23 17 Pilatus mpo'uli' hewa toe, apa' biasa-na butu Eo Paskah kana nabahaka hadua tauna to ratarungku', bona mpo'ala' nono ntodea. Toe pai' na'uli': "Kuweba' -i-wadi pai' kubahaka-i."))
Luke 23 18 Mpo'epe toe, mogora-ramo ntodea mpo'uli': "Patehi-imi! Bahaka-kakai Barabas!"
Luke 23 19 Barabas toe ratarungku' sabana pe'ewa-na hi topoparenta hi rala ngata pai' topepatehi wo'o-i.
Luke 23 20 Jadi', apa' Pilatus doko' mpobahaka Yesus, toe pai' mololita tena-i hi ntodea.
Luke 23 21 Aga rajojo lau-mi mogora, ra'uli': "Parika' -i! Parika' -i!"
Luke 23 22 Nakatolu-ngkanii Pilatus mpo'uli' -raka: "Hiaa' napa-mile sala' -nae? Uma ria kuruai' nau' hanyalaa sala' -na to masipato' rahuku' mate-ki. Kuweba' -i-wadi pai' kubahaka."
Luke 23 23 Aga rahudukulei' lau-mi merapi' bona Yesus raparika'. Ka'omea-na medagi mpu'u-ramo.
Luke 23 24 Napomonoa' -mi Pilatus bona Yesus rahuku' mate, ntuku' pomperapia' -ra.
Luke 23 25 Pai' napomonoa' wo'o mpobahaka-raka tauna to raperapi', to ratarungku' sabana pe'ewa-na pai' pepatehi-na. Yesus ratonu hi tantara to Roma bona rapatehi ntuku' konoa-ra to Yahudi.
Luke 23 26 Ngkai ree, rakeni-imi Yesus hilou hi mali ngata, pai' hi lengko ohea hirua' -ra hante hadua tauna to rahanga' Simon to Kirene. Hi'a tohe'ei, lako' rata hi ngata. Tantara to Roma mpentoe Simon, rapewuku-i mpaha'a kaju parika' hilou dohe-ra mpotuku' Yesus.
Luke 23 27 Bula-na Yesus rakeni hilou hi mali ngata, wori' tauna to metuku'. Ria wo'o-ra ba hangkuja dua tobine to metuku'. Tobine toera mpokageoi' pai' mpotantangii' -i.
Luke 23 28 Yesus mpewili' -ra pai' na'uli' -raka: "Ee tobine to Yerusalem, neo' -a nikageoi'. Agina woto-ni moto pai' ana' -ni nikageoi'.
Luke 23 29 Apa' rata mpai' tempo-na tauna mpo'uli': `Marasi' lau-ramo tobine to lalo, to uma hangkania mo'ana', pai' to uma hangkania mpentii' ana'!'
Luke 23 30 Nto'u toe mpai', tauna mpololitai bulu' hewa toi: `Duruhi-makai bulu'! Lulihi-makai watu!'
Luke 23 31 Apa' ane Aku', to uma ria sala' -ku, rapohewa toe, peliu-liu-nami mpai' koi'."
Luke 23 32 Nto'u Yesus rakeni hilou raparika' toe, ria wo'o rodua tau ntani' -na to rakeni hilou dohe-na bona rapatehi. To rodua toe, paka' to dada'a gau' -ra.
Luke 23 33 Karata-ra hi po'ohaa' to rahanga' Bulu' Banga'woo', raparika' -imi Yesus. Pai' to rodua to dada'a gau' -ra toera, raparika' wo'o-ramo-rawo, hadua hi mali ka'ana-na hadua mali ki'ii-na.
Luke 23 34 Yesus mosampaya, na'uli': "Tuama-ku, ampungi-ra-rawo, apa' uma ra'incai napa to rababehi." Tantara to mpoparika' Yesus mpotene' undi hewa pompenoa' -ra, ba hema-ra to mporata pohea-na.
Luke 23 35 Wori' tauna tumai mokore hilau merono. Wae wo'o pangkeni to Yahudi mpopo'ore' -i, ra'uli': "Tau ntani' -na natulungi-ramo. Agina woto-na moto-pi natulungi, ane makono Kahi'a-na Magau' Topetolo' to napelihi Alata'ala-e!"
Luke 23 36 Tantara-tantara wo'o mpopo'ore' -i. Ramohui' -i pai' rapopo'inui-i anggur to mo'onco,
Luke 23 37 pai' ra'uli': "Ane Magau' to Yahudi mpu'u-ko, wae-pi tulungi moto-mi-kowo woto-nu!"
Luke 23 38 Hi kaju parika' -na Yesus hi ntoto woo' -na ria ukia' hewa toi: TOI-MI MAGAU' TO YAHUDI.
Luke 23 39 Hadua todada'a to raparika' dohe-na Yesus, mpolibui' Yesus, na'uli': "Nu'uli' -kona Iko Magau' Topetolo' -e! Ane bongko wae, tulungi-mi woto-nu pai' kai' wo'o-kaiwo!"
Luke 23 40 Aga to hadua-i-hana mpotanee' doo-na, na'uli' -ki: "Ha uma-ko me'eka' -e? Uma-ko mengkoru hi Alata'ala-e? Rahuku' mate omea-ta toi-e.
Luke 23 41 Aga huku' -ta kita' rodua, toto-na-tana ntuku' kadada'a gau' -ta. Hiaa' Hi'a-hana, uma ria sala' -na."
Luke 23 42 Oti toe, pai' -i mpololitai Yesus, na'uli': "Yesus, kiwoi-a-kuwo, ane rata-poko mpai' jadi' Magau'!"
Luke 23 43 Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -koko: eo toe mpai' lau, ria-ko dohe-ku hi Firdaus."
Luke 23 44 Tebua' -mi eo, muu-mule' uma-pi mehini eo. Hangaa mobengi-mi hobo' hi ngata toe, duu' rata jaa tolu.
Luke 23 45 Kain porini-olo' to tetoe hi rala Tomi Alata'ala, mobika' ntongo' jadi' rontau.
Luke 23 46 Oti toe, me'au-imi Yesus napesukui mpo'uli': "Tuama-ku, hi rala pale-nu kutonu-mi kao' -ku!" Ka'oti-na mololita hewa toe, modupe' -mi inoha' -na.
Luke 23 47 Kanahilo-na tadulako tantara napa to jadi' toe, mpo'une' Alata'ala-imi, na'uli': "Makono mpu'u-tawo! Hi'a he'e tauna to monoa'!"
Luke 23 48 Hawe'ea tauna to morumpu merono, karahilo-na napa to jadi' toe, nculii' -ramo hilou hi tomi-ra, pai' halengko ohea mporera' -rera' hunamu-ra.
Luke 23 49 Ane hawe'ea pome'inca-na Yesus hante tobine-tobine to mpotuku' -i ngkai Galilea, mokore molaa-ra mpohilo hawe'ea to jadi' toe.
Luke 23 50  
Luke 23 51 Ria hadua tomane to rahanga' Yusuf to ngkai ngata Arimatea hi tana' Yudea. Yusuf toei, tauna to lompe' pai' monoa' ingku-na, pai' to mpopea wo'o tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia'. Nau' -i hadua topohura hi Polibua' Bohe Agama to Yahudi, aga uma napokonoi hawa' pai' kabotu' -ra to mpo'uli' Yesus kana rapatehi.
Luke 23 52 Yusuf toei hilou hi Gubernur Pilatus mperapi' woto-na Yesus.
Luke 23 53 Napopana'u-mi woto Yesus ngkai kaju parika' -na, naputu' hante kain to bula, pai' napopoturu hi rala daeo' to ralonga' hi panapa bulu'. Daeo' toe bo'u-pidi, ko'ia hangkania rapotanai.
Luke 23 54 Eo toe, eo pomporodoa, pai' ntuku' ada to Yahudi ntepu'u ncimonou' toe rapalii' mobago, apa' ntepu'u-mi eo pepuea'.
Luke 23 55 Toe pai' tobine to mpodohei Yesus ngkai Galilea mpotuku' Yusuf hilou hi daeo' toe. Rahilo beiwa woto Yesus ratu'u hi rala daeo'.
Luke 23 56 Oti toe, nculii' -ramo hilou hi ngata, mporodo rampa-rampa hante lana honga bona ragelai' -ki woto Yesus. Oti toe, hi eo pepuea' rapento'oi-mi mobago ntuku' Atura Musa.
Luke 24 1 Eo Mingku mepupulo ngkii, tobine toera hilou hi daeo' mpokeni anu mohonga to oti-mi raporodo.
Luke 24 2 Rata hi ria, rahilo-rawo watu po'unca-na tederu' -mi.
Luke 24 3 Pesua' -rami hi rala daeo', aga uma raruai' woto-na Pue' Yesus.
Luke 24 4 Bula-ra mokore nakeni ka'ingu' -ra, muu-mule' mehupa' rodua tomane to moheai meringkila' mokore hi ncori-ra.
Luke 24 5 Wulunga-ramo tobine toera, pai' -ra motumpa hi tana'. Ra'uli' to rodua toera mpo'uli' -raka: "Napa pai' nipali' tauna to tuwu' hi olo' tomate?
Luke 24 6 Uma-ipi ria hi rehe'i. Tuwu' nculii' -imi! Kiwoi-dile napa to na'uli' -kokoi wengi hi Galilea-e.
Luke 24 7 Na'uli': Ana' Manusia' kana ratonu hi tauna to dada'a bona raparika', aga hi eo katolu-na tuwu' nculii' -i."
Luke 24 8 Ngkai ree, rakiwoi mpu'u-mi lolita Yesus.
Luke 24 9 Ponculi' -rami ngkai daeo', pai' ratutura hawe'ea to jadi' toe hi ana'guru Yesus to hampulu' hadua pai' hi hawe'ea topetuku' ntani' -na.
Luke 24 10 Tobine toera, hira' Maria Magdalena, Yohana, pai' Maria tina Yakobus, pai' tobine ntani' -na to dohe-ra. Ratutura hawe'ea to jadi' toe hi suro Yesus.
Luke 24 11 Aga suro toera uma mpangalai' lolita-ra, ra'uli' lolita to ratamangko-wadi.
Luke 24 12 Hiaa' Petrus-hana, pokeno-nami hilou hi daeo'. Pengkabungku' -nami mpelongi' hi rala-na, nahilo muntu' hompu' -na-damo to hi ree. Oti toe, nculii' -imi hilou hi tomi-na, pai' ntora mokanono mpenonoi napa to jadi' tohe'e.
Luke 24 13 Hi eo toe wo'o, rodua topetuku' Yesus mako' hilou hi ngata Emaus, kalaa-na kira-kira hampulu' hakilo ngkai Yerusalem.
Luke 24 14 Bula-ra momako' toe, ntora mololita-ra, mpololita hawe'ea to lako' jadi'.
Luke 24 15 Bula-ra mololita pai' momepekune', muu-mule' rata-imi Yesus mpomohui' -ra pai' mako' dohe-ra.
Luke 24 16 Pehilo moto-ra, aga ria anu to mpohilingai' -ra, alaa-na uma ra'incai Kayesus-na.
Luke 24 17 Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Napa-die to ntora nilolita ngkalako' -e?" Mentoda' -ra hante lence to monto'.
Luke 24 18 To hadua, to rahanga' Kleopas, mpekune' Yesus, na'uli': "Ha lako' rata-ko-tanoe hi Yerusalem-e, pai' uma-di nu'incai napa to jadi' ba hangkuja eo to liu toi-e?"
Luke 24 19 Na'uli' Yesus: "Napa-die?" Hampetompoi' -ra: "To jadi' hi Yesus to Nazaret-le! Hi'a nabi to mobaraka' hi pobago-na pai' pololita-na, lompe' hi poncilo Alata'ala pai' hi poncilo ntodea.
Luke 24 20 Imam pangkeni pai' totu'a ngata-ta mpotonu-i hi topoparenta bona rahuku' mate. Oti toe, raparika' mpu'u-i.
Luke 24 21 Hiaa' haru' -mi-kaina nono-kai, apa' ki'uli' Hi'a-mi mpai' to mpobahaka-ta to Israel ngkai bali' -ta. Eo toe lau, eo katolu-nami ngkai karapatehia-na.
Luke 24 22 Hiaa' toe-e, ba hangkuja dua tobine doo-kai mpolahoi ta'i-kai, apa' hilou-ra hi daeo' -na mepupulo ngone,
Luke 24 23 tapi' woto-na uma-pi raruai'. Nculii' -ramo ra'uli' -kakai kampohilo-ra mala'eka to mpo'uli' tuwu' nculii' -imi.
Luke 24 24 Ngkai ree, ba hangkuja dua doo-kai hilou hi daeo'. Rata hi ria, rahilo bate hewa to ra'uli' tobine toera. Aga Yesus uma rahiloi."
Luke 24 25 Oti toe, Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Wojo mpu'u-koi! Uma oa' -tanoe niparasaya hawe'ea to ra'uli' nabi owi-e!
Luke 24 26 Magau' Topetolo', bate kana mporata kaparia ncala' -i, pai' lako' mporata-i kabohe tuwu' -na."
Luke 24 27 Ngkai ree, Yesus mpakanoto-raka hawe'ea to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' to mpolowa woto-na, ntepu'u ngkai sura to na'uki' nabi Musa duu' rata hi hawe'ea sura nabi.
Luke 24 28 Mohu' -mi ngata to ratoa', Yesus ntani' kaliliu-i.
Luke 24 29 Ntaa' ratagi-idi, ra'uli' -ki: "Mehani-tamo ulu hi rehe'i! Ncimonou' -mi, neo' mobengi-mi." Jadi' mehani mpu'u-imi Yesus dohe-ra.
Luke 24 30 Mohura-ramo hangkaa-ngkania bona ngkoni'. Yesus mpo'ala' roti, naposampayai, napihe-pihe pai' natonu-miraka.
Luke 24 31 Nto'u toe, lako' monoto-rada, pai' ra'inca Kayesus-na. Ngkai ree, hangaa mengkaronto-imi, uma-ipi rahiloi.
Luke 24 32 Momepololitai-ramo, ra'uli': "Toe-tawo' pai' tuna nono-ta hi ohea-e we'i, bula-na mpololitai-ta pai' mpakanoto-taka ihi' Buku Tomoroli' -e!"
Luke 24 33 Pe'ongko' -ra wo'o-mi nculii' hilou hi Yerusalem, mpohirua' -raka ana'guru Yesus to hampulu' hadua, to bula-ra morumpu hante doo-ra.
Luke 24 34 Ra'uli' to morumpu toera: "Makono mpu'u-di, katuwu' -na nculii' Pue' -e! Mehupa' -imi hi Simon!"
Luke 24 35 Jadi', to rodua to lako' rata toera mpotutura wo'o-mi-rawo napa to jadi' hi lengko ohea we'i, pai' kara'inca-na Yesus nto'u kampopihe-pihe-na roti.
Luke 24 36 Bula-ra mololita-pidi, muu-mule' mokore wo'o-imi Yesus hi laintongo' -ra, pai' -i mpotabe-ra, na'uli': "Kalompea' rata hi koi'."
Luke 24 37 Hakene-radile me'eka', apa' ra'uli' -rana mpohilo-ra kiu.
Luke 24 38 Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Napa pai' me'eka' -koi pai' morara' nono-nie?
Luke 24 39 Hilo-dile rari' to hi pale-ku pai' to hi witi' -kue. Aku' -mile toi-e! Ganga-a pai' petonoi, apa' ane rate-hana, uma-hawo ihia pai' wukua hewa to nihilo hi Aku' toi-e."
Luke 24 40 Oti toe, pai' napopohiloi-ramo pale pai' witi' -na.
Luke 24 41 Ncaruku' raparasaya Kahi'a-na mpu'u-mi. Wule' mokanganga-ramo nakeni kagoe' nono-ra mogalo ingu'. Toe pai' Yesus mpekune' -ra, na'uli': "Ha ria koni' -ni?"
Luke 24 42 Ratonu-miki bau' uru to ratunu.
Luke 24 43 Nadoa-mi pai' nakoni', bona rahilo kabela-na-hawo kiu.
Luke 24 44 Oti toe, na'uli' -miraka: "Toe-mile to ku'uli' -kokoie bula-ku dohe-ni-pidi. Butu nyala-na to mpolowa woto-ku to te'uki' hi rala sura to na'uki' nabi Musa pai' sura nabi-nabi pai' Buku Rona' Daud, hawe'ea-na kana madupa'."
Luke 24 45 Oti toe, nanotohi nono-ra bona rapaha ihi' Buku Tomoroli'.
Luke 24 46 Na'uli': "Hi rala Buku Tomoroli' te'uki': Aku' Magau' Topetolo' kana mporata kaparia pai' kana rapatehi, pai' hi eo katolu-na tuwu' nculii'.
Luke 24 47 Pai' hi rala hanga' -ku Kareba Lompe' kana rapalele hi hawe'ea tauna, bona medea-ra ngkai jeko' -ra pai' Alata'ala mpo'ampungi-ra. Kareba toe kana rapalele hi humalili' dunia', ntepu'u ngkai Yerusalem.
Luke 24 48 Koi' -mile to jadi' sabi' ngkai hawe'ea tohe'e-e lau.
Luke 24 49 "Pe'epei lompe': kupakatu moto mpai' Inoha' Tomoroli' tumai hi koi', hewa to najanci Tuama-ku. Aga kana nipopea ulu hi rala ngata toi, duu' -na baraka' ngkai Alata'ala mana'u tumai mporohoi-koi."
Luke 24 50 Oti toe, Yesus mpo'ema' -ra hilou hi mali ngata Yerusalem, mohu' hi ngata Betania. Na'ongko' pale-na pai' nagane' -ramo.
Luke 24 51 Bula-na mpogane' -ra toe, kate'oo-ongkoa' -imi mpogaa' -raka pai' hilou-imi hi suruga.
Luke 24 52 Mowilingkudu-ramo mponyompa-i, pai' goe' lia nono-ra nculii' hilou hi Yerusalem.
Luke 24 53 Eo-eo-na tida-ra hi rala Tomi Alata'ala mpo'une' -une' Alata'ala.
John 1 1 Lomo' -na, kako'ia-na dunia' rapajadi', mpolia' ria-imi-hana Lolita. Lolita toei, dohe Alata'ala-i, pai' Lolita toei, Hi'a moto-mi Alata'ala.
John 1 2 Ngkai lomo' -na-imi dohe Alata'ala-e.
John 1 3 Hi'a-mi to napopale Alata'ala mpopajadi' hawe'ea to rapajadi'. Uma ria hanyalaa to jadi' ane uma Hi'a.
John 1 4 Hi'a-mi pehupaa' katuwua', pai' Hi'a-mi baja to mpobajahi nono manusia'.
John 1 5 Baja toe mehini ncuu hi rala kabengia-na, pai' kabengia uma mpakulei' mpopatehi-i.
John 1 6 Rata hadua tauna to nasuro Alata'ala, hanga' -na Yohanes Topeniu'.
John 1 7 Karata-na Yohanes toe, hi'a-mi jadi' sabi' to mpopalele baja toe hi hawe'ea tauna, bona hawe'ea-ra mpo'epe posabi' -na pai' mepangala' hi baja toei.
John 1 8 Yohanes, bela-hawo hi'a baja toe-e. Pai' -i tumai, mpopalele baja toe hi hawe'ea tauna.
John 1 9 Lolita toei, Hi'a-mi poko baja to mpobajahi nono hawe'ea tauna, rata-i hi rala dunia'.
John 1 10 Hi'a-mi to napopale Alata'ala mpopajadi' dunia' toi. Tapi' karata-na hi dunia', tauna hi dunia' uma mpo'incai-i.
John 1 11 Rata-i hi ngata-na moto, tapi' hingka ngata-na uma dota mpotarima-i.
John 1 12 Tapi' hema-hema to mpotarima-i pai' mepangala' hi Hi'a, nawai' -ra huraa jadi' ana' Alata'ala.
John 1 13 Uma-ra mewali ana' Alata'ala sabana totu'a-ra, bela wo'o ngkai kuasa manusia', ba ngkai poncamoko. Alata'ala moto to mpopajadi' -ra ana' -na.
John 1 14 Lolita toei, mewali manusia' -imi, pai' -i mo'oha' hi laintongo' -ta. Kai', kihilo-mi-kaina kabaraka' -na. Kabaraka' -na toe narata ngkai Tuama-na, apa' Hi'a-mi Ana' -na to Hadudua. Ngkai Hi'a toe-mi pai' alaa-na ta'inca Alata'ala pai' kabula rala-na hi kita'.
John 1 15 Yohanes Topeniu' mpopo'incai ntodea kahema-na Lolita toei. Mekio' -i napesukui na'uli': "Hi'a toi-mile to ku'uli' -e wengi! Ku'uli': ria mpai' to tumai ngkabokoa' ngkai aku', aga meliu kabaraka' -na ngkai aku'. Apa' kako'ia-ku putu, mpolia' ria-imi-hana."
John 1 16 Uma ria ka'otia ahi' -na, pai' ngkai ahi' -na toe nagane' -tamo omea, uma ria kaputua-na rasi' to tarata ngkai Hi'a.
John 1 17 Ngkai nabi Musa tatarima Atura Pue' Ala. Tapi' ngkai Yesus Kristus toe-mi pai' ta'inca mpu'u-i Alata'ala, pai' kabula rala-na hi kita'.
John 1 18 Uma ria haduaa to mpohilo Alata'ala. Tapi' Ana' -na to Hadudua toei, to tida oa' hi ncori-na, Hi'a-mi to mpakanoto Alata'ala hi kita'.
John 1 19 Hewa toi posabi' -na Yohanes Topeniu' mpo'uli' kahema-nai Yesus. Topoparenta to Yahudi hi Yerusalem mposuro ba hangkuja dua imam pai' to Lewi hilou hi Yohanes. Karata-ra hi Yohanes, mepekune' -ra: "Pai' -kai tumai toi-e, tumai mpekune' -ko ba hema-ko. Ba iko mpu'u-mi Magau' Topetolo' -e?"
John 1 20 Yohanes mpotompoi' -ra hante kalonto' -lonto' -na, na'uli' -raka: "Bela-kuwo aku' Magau' Topetolo'."
John 1 21 Mepekune' tena-ra: "Ane wae, hema-ko? Ba nabi Elia-dako?" Na'uli' Yohanes: "Bela wo'o." Mepekune' tena-ra: "Ba iko lau-midi nabi bohe to rajanci owi, to ra'uli' tumai mpai' hi rala dunia' -e?" Na'uli' Yohanes: "Bela wo'o."
John 1 22 Ngkai ree, ra'uli' tena: "Ane wae, uli' -kakai ba hema mpu'u-ko, bona ria woli' -na kiparata-raka to mposuro-kai. Beiwa petompoi' -nu kahema-na mpu'u-ko."
John 1 23 Yohanes mpotompoi' -ra hante lolita nabi Yesaya owi, na'uli': "Aku' toi-le, Tauna to mekio' hi papada to wao': 'Neo' rata-imi Pue'. Porodo ami' -miki ohea-na!'"
John 1 24  
John 1 25 Ra'uli' wo'o-mi suro to Parisi toera: "Ane bela-ko Magau' Topetolo', bela-ko nabi Elia, bela wo'o-ko nabi to rajanci, napa-di pai' mponiu' -ko tauna-e?"
John 1 26  
John 1 27 Na'uli' Yohanes: "Aku' -le mponiu' tauna hante ue-wadi. Tapi' rata mpai' hadua tauna ngkabokoa' ngkai aku'. Ria moto-imile hi laintongo' -ni tempo toi-e, tapi' uma-i ni'incai. Bangku' jadi' pahawaa' -na mpobongka koloro sapatu' -na, uma-a-kuwo natao."
John 1 28 Hawe'ea toe jadi' hi ngata Betania, hi peniua' -na Yohanes hi dipo ue Yordan.
John 1 29 Kampeneo-na, Yohanes mpohilo Yesus rata mpotoa' -i. Na'uli' -mi hi ntodea: "Hilo! Etu-imi tumai Ana' Bima to naporodo Alata'ala. Hi'a-mi to jadi' tolo' woto to mpolali jeko' manusia'.
John 1 30 Hi'a-mi to ku'uli' -e wengi. Ku'uli' rata-i ngkabokoa' ngkai aku', aga meliu kabaraka' -na ngkai aku'. Apa' kako'ia-ku putu, mpolia' ria-imi-hana.
John 1 31 Lomo' -na wengi, ko'ia wo'o-kuwo ku'incai Kahi'a-nami Magau' Topetolo'. Hiaa' katumai-ku toi-e, bona mponiu' -ra to Israel hante ue pai' mpotudo' -raka kahema-na Magau' Topetolo' toe-e."
John 1 32  
John 1 33  
John 1 34 Ria wo'o-mi posabi' -na Yohanes toi. Na'uli': "Lomo' -na uma ku'incai Kayesus-na Magau' Topetolo'. Tapi' Alata'ala mpohubui-a mponiu' tauna hante ue, pai' na'uli' -ka hewa toi: 'Ane nampa' nuhilo mpai' Inoha' Tomoroli' mana'u pai' rodo hi hadua tauna, Hi'a-mi mpai' to mponiu' tauna hante Inoha' Tomoroli'.' Jadi', kuhilo mpu'u-mi Inoha' Tomoroli' mana'u ngkai suruga molence danci mangkebodo, mehompo pai' mengkarodo hi Yesus. Toe pai' toi-ka lolita-ku: Yesus, Hi'a-mi Ana' Alata'ala."
John 1 35 Kampeneo-na, ria wo'o-i Yohanes hi ree hante ana'guru-na rodua.
John 1 36 Kanahilo-na Yesus liu, na'uli': "Hilo, etu-imi tumai Ana' Bima Alata'ala!"
John 1 37 Kara'epe-na ana'guru-na lolita toe, kahilou-rami mpotuku' Yesus.
John 1 38 Yesus mewili', nahilo-ra mpotuku' -i. Napekune' -ra: "Napa to nipali' -e?" Ra'uli' -ki: "Hiapa po'ohaa' -nu Guru?"
John 1 39 Na'uli' Yesus: "Mai-mokoi, nihilo moto mpai'." Hilou mpu'u-ramo mpotuku' -i rata hi po'ohaa' -na. Pai' hi ree-ramo dohe-na ngkai jaa opo' duu' mobengi.
John 1 40 Ana'guru-na Yohanes toera mpotuku' Yesus, apa' mpo'epe-ra lolita-na Yohanes Topeniu' we'i. Hadua ngkai to rodua toera, hanga' -na Andreas, ompi' -na Simon Petrus.
John 1 41 Kaliliu hilou-imi Andreas mpopali' Simon, na'uli' -ki: "Kirua' -imi-kaina Mesias!" (batua-na: Magau' Topetolo').
John 1 42 Pai' napo'ema' -imi hilou hi Yesus. Yesus mponaa Simon, pai' na'uli' -ki: "Iko Simon ana' -na Yohanes. Aga ntepu'u tempo toi, rahanga' Kefas-moko." (Hanga' "Kefas" hi rala basa-ra to Yahudi, hibalia hante hanga' "Petrus" hi rala basa Yunani. Batua-na: watu.)
John 1 43 Kampeneo-na, Yesus mopatuju hilou hi tana' Galilea. Kako'ia-na me'ongko', hilou-imi mpohirua' -ki Filipus pai' na'uli' -ki: "Tuku' -ama!"
John 1 44 Filipus toei, ngkai ngata Betsaida, ngata-ra hira' Andreas pai' Petrus.
John 1 45 Ngkai ree, hilou wo'o-imi-hawo Filipus mpohirua' -ki doo-na to rahanga' Natanael, na'uli' -ki: "Kirua' -imi-kaina Magau' Topetolo' -e, hewa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Atura Musa pai' sura nabi owi! Hanga' -na Yesus ngkai Nazaret, ana' -na Yusuf."
John 1 46 Hampetompoi' Natanael: "Ha ria wo'o-hawo to lompe' to mehuwu ngkai Nazaret-e?" Na'uli' Filipus: "Mai-moko, nuhilo moto-i mpai'!" Hilou-ramo hi Yesus.
John 1 47 Yesus mpohilo Natanael tumai mpohirua' -ki, na'uli': "Etu-i tumai hadua to Yahudi to mpo'uhi mpu'u kehi-na Israel ntu'a-na owi, bela-i topebagiu!"
John 1 48 Na'uli' Natanael: "Ngkaiapa kanu'incaa-ku Guru?" Na'uli' Yesus: "Kako'ia-na nakio' -ko Filipus, kuhilo-mokole, hi tawu kaju ara toe-e ria."
John 1 49 Na'uli' Natanael: "Ana' Alata'ala mpu'u-ko-tawo', Guru! Iko mpu'u-mi Magau' to Israel!"
John 1 50 Na'uli' Yesus: "Nupangala' apa' ku'uli' kakuhilo-nu hi tawu kaju ara-e? Nuhilo tena-pi mpai' to meliu kabohe-na ngkai tetu."
John 1 51 Oti toe, na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus: "Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: nihilo mpai' langi' tebea pai' mala'eka Alata'ala ngkahe' pai' mana'u tumai hi Aku', Ana' Manusia'."
John 2 1 Timpaliu ro'eo ngkai toe, ria susa' poncamokoa hi ngata Kana hi tana' Galilea. Tina-na Yesus mpokaralai susa' toe.
John 2 2 Pai' Yesus hante ana'guru-na, rakio' wo'o-ra-rawo ngkaralai susa' toe.
John 2 3 Bula-ra mosusa' toe, naka'otii-ramo ue anggur. Tina-na Yesus mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Naka'otii-ra ue anggur."
John 2 4 Na'uli' Yesus: "Napa pai' nu'uli' -ka hewa tetu-e, Ina'? Ko'ia rata tempo-na kupopo'incai-ra kahema-ku."
John 2 5 Ngkai ree, na'uli' tina-na Yesus mpo'uli' -raka topobago: "Napa-napa mpai' to nahubui-kokoi Yesus, nibabehi-e'!"
John 2 6 Hi tomi toe, ria ono meha' pontu'ua ue to rababehi ngkai watu. Pontu'ua ue toe rapake' rapontu'ui ue pobohoi' witi' pai' pale, ntuku' ada-ra to Yahudi. Kawori' ihi' -na, nte ha'atu lite butu meha' -na.
John 2 7 Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka topobago toera: "Ihii' pontu'ua ue tetu lau hante ue." Ra'ihii' mpu'u-mi rapoponu'.
John 2 8 Oti toe, na'uli' wo'o-miraka: "Tolou' hangkedi', keni hilou hi tompohawai' susa'." Ratolou' mpu'u-mi pai' rakeni hilou hi topohawa'.
John 2 9 Topohawa' toei mpemita ue to rakeni-ki. Bela-pi ue nonto, mobali' -mi mewali ue anggur. Aga uma-hawo na'incai kangkaiapa-na, muntu' topobago-wadi to mpo'inca. Ka'oti-na mpemita ue anggur toe, mekio' -i mpokio' topemua',
John 2 10 pai' na'uli' -ki: "Kabiasaa-ta-hawo, anggur to motomo' -di-hawo to ri'ulu ratua-raka torata. Ane oha-ra-damo nginu, pai' lako' ratua to uma ncako motomo'. Hiaa' iko-kona mpotalaa anggur to motomo', pai' lako' tempo toi-di nupewai' ratua!"
John 2 11 Yesus mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi toe hi ngata Kana hi tana' Galilea. Toe-mi tanda mekoncehi to lomo' -na to nababehi. Hante tanda toe napopohiloi kabaraka' -na, pai' ana'guru-na mepangala' hi Hi'a.
John 2 12 Hudu susa' toe, hilou-imi hi ngata Kapernaum hante tina-na, ompi' -na pai' ana'guru-na. Mo'oha' hi ree-ramo ba hangkuja mengi.
John 2 13 Neo' rata-mi tempo-na eo bohe agama Yahudi to rahanga' Eo Paskah. Jadi', hilou-imi Yesus hi Yerusalem mpokaralai eo bohe toe.
John 2 14 Hi berewe Tomi Alata'ala, mpohilo-i tauna to mpobalu' japi, bima pai' danci mangkebodo. Ria wo'o tauna to mposula' doi mohura hi ree.
John 2 15 Yesus mpobabehi poweba' ngkai koloro, pai' nawuso omea-ra ngkai berewe Tomi Alata'ala, hante bima pai' japi-ra. Meja' -ra toposula' doi nabilingko, alaa-na pahawu' -hawu' -mi doi-ra.
John 2 16 Na'uli' -raka topobabalu' danci mangkebodo: "Koi', keni omea tetu lau hilou hi mali-na! Tomi Tuama-ku neo' niponcawa tomi pobabalua'!"
John 2 17 Ana'guru-na mpokiwoi lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli' hewa tohe'i: "Dede' nono-ku, apa' kupe'ahi' Tomi-nu Pue'."
John 2 18 Ngkai ree, topoparenta to Yahudi mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Napa ntoto-kowo huraa-nu mpobabehi tetu-e? Ane ria mpu'u huraa-nu, popohiloi-kai tanda mekoncehi!"
John 2 19 Na'uli' Yesus: "Gero-mi-hana Tomi Alata'ala toi, nihilo moto mpai' kadupa' -na rala-na tolu eo kuwangu nculii'."
John 2 20 Konce-ra topoparenta to Yahudi, ra'uli': "Beiwa!? Tomi Alata'ala toi rawangu rala-na opo' mpulu' ono mpae, hiaa' nu'uli' -kona nuwangu nculii' rala-na tolu eo-wadi?"
John 2 21 Api' woto-nadi to nawalatu Yesus, mpokahangai' Tomi Alata'ala-e.
John 2 22 Ngkabokoa' -na ngkai toe, katuwu' -na nculii' mpu'u-mi Yesus, ana'guru-na mpokiwoi lolita-na toe-e. Ngkai ree rapangala' -mi napa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' pai' napa to na'uli' Yesus.
John 2 23 Bula-na Yesus hi Yerusalem mpokaralai Eo Paskah toe, wori' tauna to mepangala' hi Hi'a, apa' rahilo tanda-tanda mekoncehi to nababehi.
John 2 24 Aga Yesus uma mpangala' -ra, apa' na'inca nono hawe'ea tauna.
John 2 25 Uma mingki' kahadua-na to mpo'uli' -ki kabeiwa-na manusia', apa' na'inca ami' napa to hi rala nono manusia'.
John 3 1 Ria hadua tauna to rahanga' Nikodemus. Nikodemus toei, to Parisi pai' pangkeni agama Yahudi.
John 3 2 Rala-na hamengi, rata-i mpohirua' -ki Yesus, na'uli' -ki: "Guru, to ki'inca, Iko hadua guru to nasuro Alata'ala, apa' uma ria tauna to bisa mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi hewa to nubabehi, ane uma-i nadohei Alata'ala."
John 3 3 Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: Ane tauna uma putu nculii', uma-i mpai' jadi' ntodea Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua' -na."
John 3 4 Na'uli' Nikodemus: "Ha beiwa-hawo tauna to motu'a-mi putu nculii' -e? Ha bisa-i mempuna' hi rala puanaka tina-na, pai' -i putu karongkani-nae?"
John 3 5 Na'uli' Yesus: "Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: Ane tauna uma putu hante ue pai' hante baraka' Inoha' Alata'ala, uma-i jadi' ntodea Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua' -na.
John 3 6 Manusia' tuwu' hi rala dunia' toi, apa' putu ngkai totu'a-na. Tapi' katuwua' kao' -na to bo'u narata ngkai Inoha' Tomoroli'.
John 3 7 Jadi', neo' nupokakonce lolita-ku tohe'i to mpo'uli': koi' omea kana putu nculii'.
John 3 8 Rapa' -na ngolu', mewui hiapa kalaua-na. Wule' sere-na ta'epe, uma ta'incai kangkaiapa-na ba hilou hiapa-i. Wae wo'o hante tauna to putu ngkai baraka' Inoha' Alata'ala."
John 3 9 Na'uli' Nikodemus: "Beiwa wo'o-hawo kawali-na tetu-e?"
John 3 10 Na'uli' Yesus: "Iko-le hadua guru to Israel to rabila', hiaa' uma-di-kona nu'incai batua-na lolita-ku toi-e!
John 3 11 Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: Kai' mpo'uli' napa to ki'inca, kilolita napa to kihilo. Hiaa' uma-di nipangalai' lolita-kai.
John 3 12 Ane kututura-kokoi napa to jadi' hi dunia', uma nipangala'. Peliu-liu-nami mpai' ane kututura-kokoi napa to jadi' hi suruga.
John 3 13 Uma ria haduaa tauna hi dunia' to manake' hilou hi suruga. Muntu' Aku' -wadi to mpo'inca napa to jadi' hi suruga, apa' Aku' Ana' Manusia' to mo'oha' hi suruga ngkai owi pai' to mana'u tumai ngkai suruga.
John 3 14 "Owi hi papada to wao', nabi Musa mpobabehi lence ule ngkai ngkala, pai' natu'u hi doe hampole kaju pai' natunya' napopokore. Hema-hema to natilo' ule, ane rangoa' lence ule ngkala toe, tuwu' moto-ra. Jadi', hewa ule ngkala toe rapokalangko owi, wae wo'o mpai' Aku' Ana' Manusia' kana rapokalangko,
John 3 15 bona hema-hema to mepangala' hi Aku' mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na."
John 3 16 Hewa toi-mi Alata'ala mpoka'ahi' hawe'ea tauna hi dunia', alaa-na napewai' Ana' -na to Hadudua, bona hema-hema to mepangala' hi Ana' -na toe, uma-ra mporata huku', tapi' mporata-ra katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na.
John 3 17 Bela patuju-na Alata'ala mposuro Ana' -na tumai hi dunia' bona mpohuku' manusia'. Patuju-na mposuro Ana' -na tumai-le, bona mpohore manusia' ngkai huku' jeko' -ra.
John 3 18 Tauna to mepangala' hi Ana' Alata'ala, uma-ra rahuku'. Aga tauna to uma mepangala', monoa' -mi kanahuku' -ra Alata'ala, apa' uma-ra dota mepangala' hi Ana' Alata'ala to Hadudua toei.
John 3 19 Rata-imi hi dunia' mpokeni baja hi hawe'ea tauna. Tapi' manusia' mpokono-pi bengi ngkai baja, apa' dada'a kehi-ra. Toe pai' Alata'ala mpohuku' -ra.
John 3 20 Hawe'ea tauna to mpobabehi kehi to dada'a, mpokahuku' baja. Uma-ra dota rata hi kabajaa-na, bona neo' mpai' kahiloa kehi-ra to dada'a.
John 3 21 Tauna to monoa' kehi-ra rata hi kabajaa-na, bona kahiloa po'ingku-ra pai' bona monoto-mi kampotuku' -ra konoa Alata'ala.
John 3 22 Oti toe, Yesus pai' ana'guru-na hilou hi tana' Yudea. Bula-ra hi ree, meniu' -ra mponiu' tauna to doko' jadi' topetuku' -na.
John 3 23  
John 3 24 Nto'u toe, Yohanes Topeniu' ko'ia-i ratarungku'. Meniu' -i hi ngata Ainon, uma molaa ngkai ngata Salim, apa' hi ree wori' ue. Butu eo-na tauna hilou mpopeniu' hi Yohanes.
John 3 25 Rala-na ha'eo, ba hangkuja dua ana'guru Yohanes momehono' hante to Yahudi mpomehonoi' ada peniu' rala agama.
John 3 26 Hilou-ramo hi Yohanes ra'uli' -ki: "Guru, nukiwoi-pidi wengi tauna to dohe-ta hi dipo ue Yordan, to nutudo' -kakaie? Oe-imi ria, meniu' wo'o-i-hawo, pai' kawoo-woria' tauna lou hi Hi'a!"
John 3 27 Na'uli' Yohanes: "Kita' manusia' uma mporata napa-napa ane uma pewai' -na Alata'ala.
John 3 28 Ni'epe moto-mi wengi lolita-ku. Ku'uli': aku' bela Magau' Topetolo'. Pai' -a tumai-kuwo-le, tumai meri'ulu ngkai Hi'a mporodo-ki ohea-na.
John 3 29 "Ane rapa' -na hi susa' poncamokoa, topemua' -di-hana to jadi' poko-na, apa' hi'a-mi pue' tobine to rapemuai'. Ane bale-na topemua' -hawo-le, mokore-i mpopanene' -wadi-ki-hawo pai' mpe'epei hawa' -na. Pai' goe' -i mpo'epe libu' topemua'. Wae-mi-kuwo aku' -e, aku' hewa bale-na topemua'. Goe' -a, pai' gana kagoea' -ku, apa' kawoo-woria' tauna mpotuku' -i Yesus.
John 3 30 Hi'a-mi to kana tepaiwongko tuwu' -na, pai' aku' kana tepai'ara' tuwu' -ku."
John 3 31 Yesus, Hi'a-mi to tumai ngkai suruga, pai' meliu tuwu' -na ngkai hawe'ea. Tauna to ngkai dunia', bate manusia' biasa, pai' lolita-na mpololita napa-napa to jadi' hi dunia'. Aga Yesus, ngkai suruga-i-hana, pai' meliu tuwu' -na ngkai hawe'ea.
John 3 32 Lolita-na mpololita napa to nahilo pai' to na'epe, tapi' uma ria to mpangala' lolita-na.
John 3 33 Aga hema to mpangala' lolita-na mpo'uli': "Bate makono-hanale lolita Alata'ala-e."
John 3 34 Apa' Hi'a-mi to nasuro Alata'ala mpohowa' lolita-na, pai' Alata'ala mpowai' -i Inoha' Tomoroli' hante uma ria huka' -na.
John 3 35 Alata'ala to Tuama mpoka'ahi' Ana' -na, pai' nawai' -imi hawe'ea kuasa-na.
John 3 36 Tauna to mepangala' hi Ana' -na toei, mporata-ramo katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na. Tauna to uma mengkoru hi Ana' -na toei, uma-ra mporata katuwua'. Mporata roe Alata'ala lau-rada duu' kahae-hae-na.
John 4 1 To Parisi mpo'epe kawoo-woria' tauna to hilou mpopeniu' hi Yesus jadi' topetuku' -na, alaa-na meliu-pi kawori' -na topetuku' -na Yesus ngkai topetuku' -na Yohanes Topeniu'.
John 4 2 (Kakoo-kono-na, bela-hawo Yesus to meniu', ana'guru-na to meniu'.)
John 4 3 Jadi', kana'inca-na Yesus kara'epe-nami to Parisi kareba toe, malai-imi ngkai tana' Yudea hilou nculii' hi tana' Galilea.
John 4 4 Rala pomako' -na tohe'e, kana mpotara tana' Samaria-i.
John 4 5  
John 4 6 Neo' tebua' -mi eo-na, rata-imi hi ngata to Samaria to rahanga' Sikar, uma molaa ngkai tana' to napewai' Yakub owi hi Yusuf ana' -na. Hi mali ngata toe, ria hameha' buwu to rahanga' buwu Yakub. Mohura-imi Yesus hi wiwi' buwu toe, apa' lenge' -imi momako'.
John 4 7  
John 4 8 Ana'guru-na kaliliu hilou hi ngata me'oli pongkoni'. Ko'ia mahae, rata hadua tobine to Samaria tumai ntomu'. Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Totina, wai' -a-kuwo ue ku'inu."
John 4 9 Konce tobine toei, apa' biasa-na to Yahudi morungku mposigalo-raka to Samaria. Toe pai' na'uli': "Iko to Yahudi, aku' to Samaria-a. Napa pai' daho' -ko mperapii' -a ue?"
John 4 10 Na'uli' Yesus: "Ane ke nu'inca kabohe rasi' to nawai' Alata'ala, pai' ane nu'inca-a kahema-ku Aku' to mperapii' -ko ue, tantu merapi' wo'o-ko-kowo hi Aku', pai' kuwai' -ko ue to tuwu'."
John 4 11 Na'uli' tobine toei: "Ngkaiapa-kona ue to tuwu' to nu'uli' tetu-e, bo uma-di ria potolou' -nue, hiaa' buwu toi monala-hana.
John 4 12 Buwu toi sosora ngkai Yakub, ntu'a-kai owi. Hi'a nginu ue ngkai rei moto-i-hawo, wae wo'o ana' -na pai' porewua-na. Ha nu'uli' -kona meliu kabohe tuwu' -nu ngkai Yakub, pai' ma'ala-ko mpewai' ue to meliu kalompe' -na ngkai ue buwu toi-e?"
John 4 13 Na'uli' Yesus: "Hawe'ea tauna to nginu ue ngkai buwu toi, ngkamara nculii' -ra-pidi mpai'.
John 4 14 Tapi' hema to mpo'inu ue to kuwai' -raka, uma-rapa ngkamara duu' kahae-hae-na. Apa' ue to kuwai' -raka toe, jadi' ue tuwu' to mo'ili ncuu hi rala nono-ra-- batua-na, mporata-ra katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na."
John 4 15 Na'uli' tobine toei: "Ane wae, wai' -ama-kuna ue tetu, bona uma-apa ngkamara oa', pai' uma-apa mingki' tumai ntomu' butu eo-na hi rehe'i."
John 4 16 Na'uli' Yesus: "Koi' ulu, kio' tomane-nu, pai' -ko nculii' tumai."
John 4 17 Na'uli' tobine toei: "Uma-kuna motomanei-a." Na'uli' Yesus: "Makono-di,
John 4 18 apa' lima ngkani-mokole motomanei-e, pai' tomane-nu tetu-e lou, bela tomane-nu moto. Jadi', makono lia lolita-nu we'i-e."
John 4 19 Na'uli' tobine toei: "Ei', nabi-ko-tawo'!
John 4 20 Kai' to Samaria, mepue' hi bulu' tohe'i moto-ka-kaiwo, hi bulu' pepuea' ntu'a-kai. Hiaa' koi' to Yahudi mpo'uli', kana hi Yerusalem-wadi pepuea' to makono."
John 4 21 Na'uli' Yesus: "Pangala' -mi lolita-ku toi: Rata mpai' tempo-na, uma-pi wule' hi Yerusalem-wadi tauna mpopue' Alata'ala, uma wo'o hi bulu' toi-wadi.
John 4 22 Koi' to Samaria, uma ni'incai kahema-na to nipue'. Kai' to Yahudi, ki'inca kahema-na to kipue', apa' ria pojanci Alata'ala to mpo'uli' kalompea' manusia' mehuwu ngkai laintongo' to Yahudi.
John 4 23 Tapi' rata mpai' tempo-na-- pai' toi-mi tempo-na-- tauna to mepue' mpu'u-mpu'u hi Alata'ala to Tuama, kana mpopue' -i hante kuasa Inoha' Tomoroli', pai' ntuku' ohea to makono. Pepue' to hewa toe-mi to napokono Alata'ala to Tuama.
John 4 24 Alata'ala, Hi'a-mi Inoha'. Jadi', tauna to mpopue' -i, kana mepue' hante kuasa Inoha' Tomoroli' pai' ntuku' ohea to makono."
John 4 25 Na'uli' tobine toei: "Io', to ku'inca-na, rata mpai' Magau' Topetolo', to rahanga' Kristus. Ane rata-ipi mpai', Hi'a to mpakanoto omea hi kita'."
John 4 26 Na'uli' Yesus: "Aku' -mile toi-e, to mpololitai-ko wae-e lau."
John 4 27 Bula-ra mololita, rata-ramo ana'guru-na ngkai ngata. Konce-ra mpohilo Yesus mpololitai hadua tobine. Aga uma haduaa to daho' mpopekune' tobine toei ba napa paraluu-na. Uma wo'o-ra daho' mpekune' Yesus ba napa pai' napololitai-i.
John 4 28 Ngkai ree, tobine toei mpalahii-mi pontomua' -na hi ree, ncaliu hilou hi ngata mpo'uli' -raka hingka ngata-na:
John 4 29 "Kita hilou mpohilo tauna to mpolohu-ka hawe'ea gau' -ku. Meka' ba lue' Hi'a mpu'u-mi Magau' Topetolo' -e!"
John 4 30 Toe pai' hilou-ramo hi mali ngata doko' mpohirua' -ki Yesus.
John 4 31 Lingku' -na tobine toe hilou hi rala ngata, ana'guru-na Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Guru, mai-tamo ngkoni'."
John 4 32 Aga na'uli' Yesus: "Ria-ka-kuna koni' -ku to uma ni'incai."
John 4 33 Momepekune' -ramo ana'guru-na ra'uli': "Hema-die to mpowai' -i pongkoni' -e?"
John 4 34 Toe pai' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Pongkoni' -kule, mpotuku' konoa Pue' Ala to mposuro-a, pai' mposipolea pobago to nawai' -ka.
John 4 35 Koi' biasa mpo'uli' lolita bulawa toi: Opo' mula-damo pai' lako' mepae-ta. Aga Aku' mpo'uli' -kokoi: Naa-dile, oe lau bonea to mperenene-damo pae-na pai' to hangaa rapepae-damo.
John 4 36 Tauna to mepae bate mporata gaji' -ra, alaa-na topepae pai' to ntuja' goe' hangkaa-ngkania. Wua' to rapepae, batua-na, tauna to mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na.
John 4 37 Jadi', makono lolita bulawa to mpo'uli': 'Kahadua-na to ntuja', kahadua-na to mpepae.'
John 4 38 Kuhubui-koi mpepae to bela tinuja' -ni. Tau ntani' -na to mpotuja', koi' to mpepae wua' pobago-ra."
John 4 39 Hi ngata to Samaria toe, wori' tauna to mepangala' hi Yesus, apa' ra'epe lolita tobine toe we'i to mpo'uli': "Nalohu-maka hawe'ea gau' -ku."
John 4 40 Jadi', kahilou-rami mpohirua' -ki Yesus, pai' raperapi' bona mehani-i hi ngata-ra. Mehani mpu'u-imi hi ree romengia.
John 4 41 Ngkai ree, kawoo-woria' tena pue' ngata to mepangala' hi Yesus, apa' ra'epe moto-mi lolita-na.
John 4 42 Ra'uli' mpo'uli' -ki tobine toei: "Wae lau kipangala' mpu'u-mi, uma muntu' ngkai lolita-nu iko-wadi. Apa' ki'epe ntilinga moto-mi lolita-na, pai' ki'inca Kahi'a-na mpu'u-mi Magau' Tompohore manusia' ngkai huku' jeko' -ra."
John 4 43 Timpaliu romengia hi Samaria, Yesus mpokaliliu pomako' -na hilou hi tana' Galilea.
John 4 44 Ria hangkani Yesus mpo'uli': "Hadua nabi uma biasa rabila' hi ngata-na moto."
John 4 45 Jadi', karata-na hi Galilea, tauna mpotarima-i hante kagoe' nono-ra, apa' ria-ra wengi hi Yerusalem mpokaralai eo bohe Paskah, pai' mpohilo hante mata-ra moto-mi hawe'ea anu mekoncehi to nababehi hi ria nto'u toe.
John 4 46 Rata wo'o-imi Yesus hi ngata Kana hi Galilea, hi ngata pompobalia' -na ue jadi' anggur. Uma molaa ngkai Kana toe, ria hadua topohawa' hi ngata Kapernaum, to mobago hi tomi raja, peda' gaga ana' -na.
John 4 47 Kana'epe-na topohawa' toei karata-na Yesus hi Galilea ngkai Yudea, hilou-imi hi ngata Kana mpohirua' -ki, na'uli' -ki: "Pue', hilou-ta hi Kapernaum, nupaka'uri' -ka-kuwo ana' -ku, apa' neo' mate-imi."
John 4 48 Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Ane uma-koi mpohilo tanda mekoncehi pai' anu mobaraka', uma oa' -koi mepangala'!"
John 4 49 Na'uli' topohawa' toei: "Pue', hilou-tamo sohi', mate mpai' ana' -ku!"
John 4 50 Na'uli' Yesus: "Nculii' -moko, mo'uri' -imi ana' -nu." Napangala' mpu'u-mi topohawa' toei lolita Yesus, pai' nculii' mpu'u-imi-hawo.
John 4 51 Hi lengko ohea-i-pidi, ba hangkuja dua batua-na mpotomu-i, ra'uli' -ki: "Mo'uri' -imile ana' -nue!"
John 4 52 Napekune' -ramo: "Jaa hangkuja-i mo'uri' -e?" Ra'uli': "Wengi, ba jaa satu mpo'eo tu, uma-ipi ngkelengi'."
John 4 53 Nakiwoi-mi topohawa', nto'u-na toe mpu'u-mi wengi Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Mo'uri' -imi ana' -nu." Ngkai ree, topohawa' toei pai' hira' hantomia, mepangala' -ramo hi Yesus.
John 4 54 Toe-mi tanda mekoncehi karongkani-na to nababehi Yesus hi Galilea karata-na ngkai Yudea.
John 5 1 Oti toe, nculii' -imi Yesus hilou hi Yerusalem bona mpokaralai-i eo bohe to Yahudi hi ria.
John 5 2 Hi Yerusalem, mohu' hi wobo' wala to rahanga' Wobo' Bima, ria wuhu', hi rala basa Yahudi hanga' -na Betesda. Ntololikia wuhu' toe, ria lima meha' pengkawinaraa.
John 5 3 Hi retu, wori' tauna to peda'. Ria towero, ria tokejo, ria topungku, ntora turu hi pengkawinaraa, ((mpopea kamojago-na ue wuhu'.
John 5 4 Apa' pontu-na ria mala'eka Pue' mana'u tumai hi wuhu' toe mpojago ue-na. Pai' hema to ri'ulu mehompo hi rala wuhu' nto'u ue-na mojago, mo'uri' -i ngkai haki' to natodohaka.))
John 5 5 Ria hi ree hadua tomane, tolu mpulu' walu mpae-imi peda'.
John 5 6 Yesus mpohilo-i turu hi ree, pai' na'inca kamahae-nami peda'. Napekune' -i: "Dota-ko mo'uri'?"
John 5 7 Na'uli' topeda' toei: "Pue', apa' uma-kuwo hema to mpokeni-a hilou rala wuhu' nto'u mojago ue-na. Ke lako' hilou-a-kuwo, to ntani' -na wo'o-mi to mpori'uluhi-a."
John 5 8 Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Memata-moko, lulu-mi ali' -nu, pai' mako' -moko."
John 5 9 Kamo'uri' -nami tau toei, nalulu-mi ali' -na, pai' -i momako' -mi. Tohe'e jadi' hi Eo Sabat, eo pepuea' -ra to Yahudi.
John 5 10 Toe pai' topoparenta to Yahudi mpokamaro tauna to lako' mo'uri' toei, ra'uli' -ki: "Eo Sabat-hanale toe-e lau! Uma-ko ma'ala ngkeni ali' -nu."
John 5 11 Na'uli' tauna toei: "Apa' nahubui-a-kuwo tauna to mpaka'uri' -a we'i, na'uli' -ka: 'Lulu-mi ali' -nu pai' mako' -moko.'"
John 5 12 Rapekune' -i: "Hema-i to mpohubui-ko ngkeni ali' -nue?"
John 5 13 Tapi' uma na'incai kahema-na to mpaka'uri' -i, apa' Yesus uma-pi ria hi ree, mpolia' hilou-imi hi olo' tauna to wori'.
John 5 14 Uma mahae ngkai ree, Yesus mpohirua' -ki tauna toei hi Tomi Alata'ala, pai' na'uli' -ki: "Mo'uri' -moko, neo' -pi-hawo mpobabehi jeko', bona neo' mpai' narumpa' -ko ba napa-napa to meliu kada'a-na."
John 5 15 Ngkai ree, hilou-imi tauna toei mpohirua' -raka topoparenta to Yahudi, na'uli' -raka Kayesus-na to mpaka'uri' -i.
John 5 16 Toe pai' topoparenta to Yahudi ntepu'u mpobalinai' Yesus, apa' mepaka'uri' -i-hana hi Eo Sabat.
John 5 17 Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Tuama-ku mobago duu' eo toi, pai' Aku' wo'o kana mobago."
John 5 18 Ngkai ree, rahuduwukui-mi topoparenta to Yahudi mpali' ohea-ra mpopatehi-i. Apa' uma wule' kampotiboki-na ada hi Eo Sabat, tapi' na'uli' wo'o-hana ka'Alata'ala-na Tuama-na; jadi', napopohibalia-hana woto-na hante Alata'ala.
John 5 19 Toe pai' na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: Aku' Ana' Alata'ala, uma-a bisa mobago ntuku' konoa-ku moto. Muntu' to kuhilo ngkai Tuama-ku, toe-mi to kupobago. Napa-napa bago Tuama-ku, tetu wo'o-kuwo bago-ku.
John 5 20 Apa' Tuama-ku mpoka'ahi' -a, pai' napopohiloi-a hawe'ea to napobago. Kakupaka'uri' -na topeda' toe ngone ria, pai' kubabehi wo'o mpai' pobago to meliu kabohe-na ngkai toe, alaa-na konce mpu'u-mokoi mpai'.
John 5 21 Hewa Tuama-ku mpopemata tomate pai' mpowai' -ra katuwua', wae wo'o Aku' mpowai' katuwua' hi hema-hema to kupelihi.
John 5 22 Tuama-ku moto uma mpobotuhi kara-kara manusia'. Hawe'ea kuasa pompobotuhi natonu-mi hi Aku' Ana' -na.
John 5 23 Nababehi toe, bona hawe'ea tauna mpobila' -a hewa pompobila' -ra Tuama-ku. Hema to uma mpobila' -a, uma wo'o-ra mpobila' Tuama-ku to mposuro-a.
John 5 24 "Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: Hema to mpo'epe lolita-ku pai' -ra mepangala' hi Pue' Ala to mposuro-a, bate mporata-ra katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na. Uma-ra mpai' rahuku' sabana jeko' -ra. Tebahaka-ramo ngkai kamatea, mporata-ramo katuwua'.
John 5 25 Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: Rata mpai' tempo-na-- pai' toi-mi tempo-na-- tauna tomate mpo'epe libu' Ana' Alata'ala, pai' hira' to mpo'epe mporata katuwua' to bo'u.
John 5 26 Apa' hewa Tuama-ku mobaraka' mpowai' katuwua', wae wo'o nawai' -a baraka' mpowai' katuwua'.
John 5 27 Nawai' wo'o-a kuasa mpobotuhi kara-kara manusia', apa' Aku' Ana' Manusia'.
John 5 28 "Neo' nipokakonce lolita-ku toi, apa' rata mpai' tempo-na hawe'ea tauna to hi rala daeo' mpo'epe libu' -ku,
John 5 29 pai' -ra memata ngkai daeo' -ra. To mpobabehi gau' to lompe' rapopemata bona mporata katuwua' to lompe'. To mpobabehi gau' to dada'a rapopemata bona rahuku'.
John 5 30 "Aku', uma-a bisa mpobabehi napa-napa ntuku' konoa-ku moto. Kubotuhi ntuku' to nahawai' -ka Alata'ala. Pobotuhi-ku monoa', apa' uma-a mpotuku' dota-ku moto, mpotuku' -a kadota-na Pue' Ala to mposuro-a.
John 5 31 "Ane ke Aku' moto-wadi to mpo'uli' ka'Aku' -na suro Alata'ala, pai' uma ria tau ntani' -na to mposabii' -a, uma ni'incai ba makono lolita-ku ba uma-di.
John 5 32 Tapi' ria moto kahadua-na to mposabii' -a, pai' ku'inca kamakono-na posabi' -na toe.
John 5 33 Koi' mpohubui doo-ni hilou hi Yohanes Topeniu' wengi, pai' na'uli' -miraka posabi' -na. Napa to na'uli' toe, bate makono omea.
John 5 34 Aga kakoo-kono-na uma kuparaluu posabi' ngkai manusia'. Kupopokiwoii-koi lolita-na Yohanes toe-e, bona mporata-koi kalompea'.
John 5 35 Yohanes toei hewa lampu to mehini pai' ngkeni kabajaa-na hi koi'. Pai' koi', goe' lia moto-koi mpo'epe lolita-na. Aga kagoe' -ni tetu hampai' -wadi.
John 5 36 "Aga Aku', ria-ka-kuna sabi' to mpakanoto kahema-ku, pai' sabi' toei meliu ngkai posabi' -na Yohanes. Ane ninaa lompe' pobago-ku, toe-mile to mposabii' kahema-kue. Napa to kupobago hewa toe lau, pobago to nahawai' -ka Tuama-ku bona kuposipolea. Pobago-ku toi-mi to mpakanoto ka'Aku' -na suro Tuama-ku.
John 5 37 Pai' meliu ngkai toe, Tuama-ku to mposuro-a, Hi'a moto-mi jadi' sabi' -ku mpo'uli' kahema-ku. Tapi' koi', ko'ia hangkania ni'epei libu' -na, ko'ia nihiloi lence-na.
John 5 38 Lolita-na uma nitimamahi hi rala nono-ni, apa' uma-koi mepangala' hi Aku' to nasuro.
John 5 39 Koi' mpewulihi' ihi' Buku Tomoroli', apa' ni'uli' mporata-koi katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na ngkai Buku Tomoroli' toe. Hiaa' Buku Tomoroli' moto wo'o-mi to mpotompo'wiwi-a.
John 5 40 Aga nau' wae, uma oa' -koi dota tumai hi Aku', bona mporata katuwua' to lompe' toe.
John 5 41 "Uma-a mpopebila' hi manusia'.
John 5 42 Apa' ku'inca moto-koi, ka'uma-na ria ahi' -ni hi Alata'ala.
John 5 43 Katumai-ku toi, mpokeni-a hanga' -na Tuama-ku, aga uma-koi dota mpotarima-a. Ane ria to tumai mpokeni hanga' -ra moto-wadi, nitarima lau-ra.
John 5 44 Beiwa kamepangala' -ni hi Aku' -e, apa' doko' rabila' doo-wadi-koi, uma-koi mpali' pebila' to ngkai Alata'ala to Hadudua.
John 5 45 Aga neo' ni'uli' wae, Aku' mpai' to mpakilu-koi hi Tuama-ku. Nabi Musa moto-mi to mpakilu-koi. Ni'uli' -koina ngkai petuku' -ni hi hawa' Musa pai' -koi mporata kalompea'.
John 5 46 Tapi' ane bongko nipangala' mpu'u-i Musa, tantu nipangala' wo'o-a Aku' -e, apa' napa to na'uki' Musa, Aku' -mi kadungkua-na.
John 5 47 Bangku' to na'uki' Musa uma nipangala', peliu-liu-nami ka'uma-na nipangala' lolita-ku."
John 6 1 Oti toe, hilou-imi Yesus hi dipo Rano Galilea, to rahanga' wo'o Rano Tiberias.
John 6 2 Wori' lia tauna mpotuku' -i, apa' rahilo hawe'ea tanda mekoncehi to nababehi, mpaka'uri' topeda'.
John 6 3 Manake' -i lou hi panapa bulu' hante ana'guru-na, pai' mohura-imi hi ree.
John 6 4 Nto'u toe, neo' rata-mi eo bohe agama Yahudi to rahanga' Eo Paskah.
John 6 5 Yesus mponaa ntololikia-na, nahilo-hawo, mo'iko-ra-damo tauna tumai mpomohui' -i. Na'uli' mpo'uli' -ki Filipus: "Hiapa-ta me'oli pongkoni', tapokoni' -raka tauna to wori' toera lau?"
John 6 6 (Kakoo-kono-na, na'inca ami' moto-mi napa mpai' to nababehi. Napekune' hewa toe hi Filipus, apa' doko' naponciloi pepangala' -na.)
John 6 7 Na'uli' Filipus: "Nau' ro'atu doi pera' tapope'oli-ki pongkoni' pai' butu dua-ra tawai' hore hangkedi' -wadi, uma oa' hono'."
John 6 8 Ngkai ree, hadua ana'guru-na to rahanga' Andreas, ompi' -na Simon Petrus, mpo'uli':
John 6 9 "Ohe'i hadua ana' to mobokui lima meha' roti pai' tinapa uru roma'a, aga napa-mile kalaua-na hi tauna to wori' hewa toe-e lau?"
John 6 10 Na'uli' Yesus: "Hubui-ramo mohura!" Jadi' mohura-ramo hi kowo' raponcawa ali', apa' wori' kowo' hi ree. Hi olo' ntodea toe, ria ba lima ncobu paka' tomane.
John 6 11 Ngkai ree, na'ala' -mi roti, na'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala, pai' nabagi-bagi hi tauna to wori' to mohura. Hewa toe wo'o pompobabehi-na hante bau' uru. Ngkoni' -ramo omea duu' -ra bohu.
John 6 12 Bohu-ramo omea, na'uli' Yesus hi ana'guru-na: "Rumpu-koi toro-na, bona neo' ria to rakerei."
John 6 13 Rarumpu mpu'u-mi, hampulu' roluncu-pi toro-na ngkai lima meha' roti to rakoni' tauna to wori' we'i.
John 6 14 Karahilo-na ntodea tanda mekoncehi tohe'e, momepololitai-ramo, ra'uli': "Hi'a mpu'u-mi-tawo' nabi to rajanci owi-e, to ra'uli' rata mpai' hi dunia' toi-e!"
John 6 15 Jadi', ria patuju-ra doko' mpewuku-i jadi' magau' -ra. Kana'inca-na Yesus patuju-ra toe, malai-imi ngkai ree hilou hi bulu' -na.
John 6 16 Ncimonou' tohe'e, mana'u-ramo ana'guru-na hilou hi rano mpopea-i.
John 6 17 Rapopea duu' mobengi, ko'ia oa' -i rata. Jadi', mosakaya moto-ramo hilou mpotoa' ngata Kapernaum.
John 6 18 Bula-ra mosakaya toe, rata ngolu' bohe mporumpa' -ra, alaa-na bohe balumpa hi rano.
John 6 19 Lima ba ono kilo-ramo ngkai talinti, rahilo-rawo, etu-imi tumai Yesus momako' hi lolo ue mpototopa-ra. Aga uma ra'incai Kayesus-na. Me'eka' lia-ramo.
John 6 20 Na'uli' Yesus: "Neo' me'eka'! Aku' -mile toi-e."
John 6 21 Mpo'epe toe-di, goe' -ramo mpodoa Yesus hi rala sakaya. Pesua' -na Yesus hi rala sakaya, rata-ramo hi wiwi' talinti to ratoa'.
John 6 22 Kampeneo-na, wori' tauna hi dipo rano mpopali' Yesus, ra'uli': "Hiapa-imidie? Uma-idi mohawi' sakaya dohe ana'guru-nae ngone. Hiaa' uma ria sakaya ntani' -na hi rei ngone, muntu' sakaya to rahawi' ana'guru-na-wadi."
John 6 23 Ngkai ree, rata wo'o tauna ngkai ngata Tiberias hi rala sakaya-ra, pai' -ra mencore mohu' hi pongkonia' -ra ntodea wengi, to mpokoni' roti to nagane' Pue' Yesus.
John 6 24 Kara'inca-na ntodea ka'uma-napi ria Yesus hi ree, ntahawe' ana'guru-na uma wo'o-pi ria, mosakaya wo'o-ramo-rawo hilou hi Kapernaum mpopali' -i.
John 6 25 Karata-ra ntodea hi dipo rano mpohirua' -ki Yesus, rapekune' -i: "Nto'uma-ko rata hi rehe'i-e, Guru?"
John 6 26 Na'uli' Yesus: "Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: Ku'inca moto-le patuju-ni mpali' -ae. Uma ba kani'inca-na batua-na tanda mekoncehi to kubabehi. Nipali' -ale apa' bohu-mokoi kupokoni'.
John 6 27 Neo' -koi mobago mpali' pongkoni' to sohi' oti pai' waha'. Mobago-koi mpali' pongkoni' to uma ria kawahaa' -na pai' to mpowai' katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na. Aku' Ana' Manusia' to mpowai' -koi pongkoni' tohe'e, apa' Alata'ala to Tuama mpotudo' ka'Aku' -nami to napelihi pai' to napokono."
John 6 28 Mepekune' -ra ntodea: "Napa to kana kipobago bona pobago-kai ntuku' konoa Alata'ala?"
John 6 29 Na'uli' Yesus: "Toi-mile pobago to napokono Alata'ala-e: mepangala' hi Aku' to nasuro."
John 6 30 Ra'uli' wo'o-mi ntodea: "Ane wae, tanda napa to nupopohiloi-kakai, bona kipangala' -ko kangkai Alata'ala-na mpu'u-ko? Napa to nubabehi?
John 6 31 Wai' -ka-kaiwo pongkoni', hewa to rakoni' ntu'a-ta owi. Bula-ra hi papada to wao', ngkoni' -ra pongkoni' to rahanga' manna, hewa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli': 'Nawai' -ra pongkoni' ngkai suruga.'"
John 6 32 Na'uli' Yesus: "Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: Bela nabi Musa owi to mpowai' pongkoni' ngkai suruga. Tempo toi-e, Tuama-ku-hana to mpowai' -koi pongkoni' to mpu'u-mpu'u ngkai suruga.
John 6 33 Pongkoni' to nawai' Alata'ala, batua-na, to mana'u tumai ngkai suruga pai' to mpowai' katuwua' hi manusia'."
John 6 34 Ra'uli' -ki ntodea: "Ane wae, wai' -ka-kaiwo pongkoni' tetu butu-butu eo-na!"
John 6 35 Na'uli' Yesus: "Aku' toi-mi pongkoni' to mpowai' katuwua'. Hema to tumai hi Aku' uma-rapa mo'oro', pai' hema to mepangala' hi Aku' uma-rapa ngkamara, duu' kahae-hae-na.
John 6 36 Aga hewa to ku'uli' we'i, nau' nihilo-ama, uma oa' -a nipangala'.
